name: Flame Lance
text:
Deal $25 damage
to a minion.
flavor: It's on the rack next to ice lance, acid lance, and English muffin lance.

name: Effigy
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, summon a random minion with the same Cost.
flavor: Burning man, brah.

name: Fallen Hero
text: Your Hero Power deals 1 extra damage.
flavor: And he can't get up.

name: Arcane Blast
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. This spell gets double bonus from Spell Damage.
flavor: Now with 100% more blast!

name: Polymorph: Boar
text: Transform a minion into a 4/2 Boar with Charge.
flavor: It's always Huffer.

name: Dalaran Aspirant
text: Spell Damage +1 Inspire: Gain Spell Damage +1.
flavor: Is he aspiring or inspiring?  Make up your mind!

name: Spellslinger
text: Battlecry: Both players get a random spell. Yours costs (2) less.
flavor: Does he sling spells, or do his spells linger about.  Who can say?

name: Coldarra Drake
text: You can use your Hero Power any number of times.
flavor: The Grand Tournament has a "No dragons allowed" policy, but it's rarely enforced.

name: Rhonin
text: Deathrattle: Add 3 copies of Arcane Missiles to your hand.
flavor: A masterless shamurai.

name: Ram Wrangler
text: Battlecry: If you have a Beast, summon a random Beast.
flavor: Not getting trampled is really the trick here.

name: Holy Champion
text: Overheal: Gain +2 Attack.
flavor: She really likes seeing people get better.  That's why she hurts them in the first place.

name: Spawn of Shadows
text: Battlecry and Inspire: Deal 4 damage to each hero.
flavor: What did you expect to happen?  He's a Spawn.  Of Shadows.

name: Power Word: Glory
text:
Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, restore 4 Health to
your hero.
flavor: The promise of glory is a powerful tool to get minions to do your bidding.  Only slightly less powerful than the promise of an ice cream bar!

name: Shadowfiend
text: Whenever you draw a card, reduce its Cost by (1).
flavor: Hopes to be promoted to "Shadowfriend" someday.

name: Convert
text: Put a copy of an enemy minion into your hand. It costs (1).
flavor: "Are you interested in... HEALTH benefits?!"

name: Confuse
text: Swap the Attack and Health of all minions.
flavor: This minion is really powerful!

name: Twilight Guardian
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
flavor: A result of magical experiments carried out by the Black Dragonflight, it's not his fault that he's a vicious killer.

name: Confessor Paletress
text: Battlecry and Inspire: Summon a random Legendary minion.
flavor: She sees into your past and makes you face your fears.  Most common fear:  Getting Majordomo out of Sneed's Old Shredder.

name: Dreadsteed
text: Deathrattle: At the end of the turn, summon a Dreadsteed.
flavor: Crescendo himself summoned this steed, riding it to victory in the Grand Tournament.  Wherever he rides, an army of riders ride behind him, supporting the legendary champion.

name: Fearsome Doomguard
flavor: They were originally called Cuddleguards, but they were not inspiring the proper amount of fear.

name: Tiny Knight of Evil
text: Whenever you discard a card, gain +2/+1.
flavor: "No, no, no. I asked for a tiny JESTER of evil."

name: Fist of Jaraxxus
text: When you play or discard this, deal $4 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: * Not actually Jaraxxus' fist.

name: Void Crusher
text: Inspire: Destroy a random minion for each player.
flavor: We like to call him "Wesley".

name: Demonfuse
text: Give a Demon +3/+3.
flavor: Very dangerous when attached to a demonbomb.

name: Dark Bargain
text: Destroy 2 random enemy minions. Discard 2 random cards.
flavor: A prime example of lose-lose negotiating.

name: Wrathguard
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, also deal that amount to your hero.
flavor: After playing against 5 Annoy-O-Trons, any normal guard will become a Wrathguard.

name: Wilfred Fizzlebang
text: Cards you draw from your Hero Power cost (0).
flavor:
He can summon anything, even a FEARSOME DOOMGUARD*.
*He's pretty sure this is going to work out.

name: Shado-Pan Rider
text: Combo: Gain +4 Attack.
flavor: He needed a break after that business in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms. Naturally, he chose to spend his vacation in an icy snowscape killing monsters.

name: Buccaneer
text: Whenever you equip a weapon, give it +1 Attack.
flavor: The best part of buccaneering is the pants.

name: Undercity Valiant
text: Combo: Deal 1 damage.
flavor: Almost went to play for Stormwind before signing with Undercity.

name: Cutpurse
text: Whenever this minion attacks a hero, add the Coin to your hand.
flavor: He has a giant collection of purses now.  One for every outfit!

name: Shady Dealer
text: Battlecry: If you have a Pirate, gain +1/+1.
flavor: I have great deal for you... for 4 damage to your face!

name: Burgle
text: Get 3 random cards (from your opponent's class).
flavor: Yoink!

name: Poisoned Blade
text:
Your Hero Power gives this +1 Attack instead
of replacing it.
flavor: How much more poisoned can a blade get?  The answer is a lot.  A lot more poisoned.

name: Beneath the Grounds
text: Shuffle 3 Ambushes into your opponent's deck. When drawn, you summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
flavor: Can you hold these eggs for just a second?  I promise they're not full of giant enraged undead spider things.

name: Anub'arak
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/4 Nerubian with "Deathrattle: Summon Anub'arak."
flavor: Was actually a pretty nice guy before, you know, the whole Lich King thing.

name: Living Roots
text: Choose One - Deal $2 damage; or Summon two 1/1 Saplings.
flavor: 2 out of 2 saplings recommend that you summon the saplings.

name: Darnassus Aspirant
text: Battlecry: Gain an empty Mana Crystal. Deathrattle: Lose a Mana Crystal.
flavor: She loves mana crystals, she hates mana crystals.   So fickle!

name: Savage Combatant
text: Inspire: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn.
flavor: Maybe if you whistle a tune it will soothe him.  Yeah...  Try that.

name: Wildwalker
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +3 Health.
flavor: She was born to be something.  She is just not quite sure what yet...

name: Knight of the Wild
text: Costs (1) less for each Beast you've summoned this game.
flavor: He gets a discount on the tournament entry fee because he is his own horse.

name: Druid of the Saber
flavor: That's saberTEETH, not like curved pirate blades.  That's a different kind of druid.  Druid of the Curved Pirate Blades.

name: Astral Communion
text: Gain 10 Mana Crystals. Discard your hand.
flavor: Hey!  Moon!  Can I have some mana crystals?

name: Mulch
text:
Destroy a minion.
Add a random minion to your opponent's hand.
flavor: Is this a noun or a verb?  We will never know.

name: Aviana
text: Your minions cost (1).
flavor: Call her "Tweety".  She'll find it real funny.  I PROMISE.

name: Tuskarr Totemic
text: Battlecry: Summon a random basic Totem.
flavor: Turns out the tuskarr aren't real choosy about their totems.

name: Draenei Totemcarver
text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each friendly Totem.
flavor: It's nice to find a real craftsman in this day and age of mass-produced totems.

name: Healing Wave
text: Restore #8 Health. Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, restore #16 instead.
flavor: Favored by shaman who study the art of restoration and healing, this spell would feel smug, if it had feelings.

name: Thunder Bluff Valiant
text: Battlecry and Inspire: Give your Totems +2 Attack.
flavor: Allowing totems to attack is not cheating.  I mean, there isn't anything in the rule books about it.

name: Charged Hammer
text: Deathrattle: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage.'
flavor: You can only pick it up if you are worthy.

name: Elemental Destruction
text: Deal $4-$5 damage to all minions. Overload: (2)
flavor: I'm not a shaman or anything, but isn't Elemental Destruction the opposite of what they want to do?

name: Totem Golem
text: Overload: (1)
flavor: What happens when you glue a buncha totems together.

name: Ancestral Knowledge
text: Draw 2 cards. Overload: (1)
flavor: MOMMMMMYYYYYYYYY!!!

name: The Mistcaller
text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand and deck +1/+1.
flavor: Calling the mist doesn't sound all that great.  "Ooooh, it is slightly damp now!"

name: Flash Heal
text: Restore #5 Health.
flavor: Flash!  Ahhhhhhh~

name: Powershot
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.
flavor: pow POW pow

name: Stablemaster
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast Immune this turn.
flavor: Takes way better care of her pets than her brother, Unstablemaster.

name: King's Elekk
text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, draw it.
flavor: Elekk jousting is AWESOME.

name: Brave Archer
text: Inspire: If your hand is empty, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: This is a "bearly" concealed reference.

name: Bear Trap
text: Secret: After your hero is attacked, summon a 3/3 Bear with Taunt.
flavor: You'll never guess what's in that conveniently bear-sized, bear-smelling box.

name: Lock and Load
text: Each time you cast a spell this turn, get a random Hunter card.
flavor:
Rexxar narrowed his eyes, grabbed his machine gun, and said: "It's go time.  Lock and load."
This card pays homage to that special moment.

name: Ball of Spiders
text: Summon three 1/1 Webspinners with "Deathrattle: Get a random Beast."
flavor: "THEY'RE EVERYWHERE GET THEM OFF!!!" - Everyone

name: Acidmaw
text: Whenever an enemy minion takes damage, destroy it.
flavor: With the help of his trusty sidekick Dreadscale, the giant jormungar Acidmaw is ready to face any knight!

name: Dreadscale
text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all enemies.
flavor: Let's be clear about this:  ACIDMAW is the sidekick.

name: Bash
text:
Deal $3 damage.
Gain 3 Armor.
flavor: You might think bashing doesn't take a lot of practice.  It doesn't.

name: King's Defender
text: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Taunt, gain +1 Durability.
flavor: "King's Attacker" is a shield.  Funny, huh?

name: Orgrimmar Aspirant
text: Inspire: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
flavor: "Four out of three orcs struggle with math." - Angry Zurge

name: Magnataur Alpha
text:
Also damages the minions next to whomever
he attacks.
flavor: Playing him also gets you into the Magnataur Beta.

name: Bolster
text: Give your Taunt minions +2/+2.
flavor: The best offense is a good defense.

name: Sparring Partner
text: Taunt Battlecry: Give a minion Taunt.
flavor: Come at me, bro.

name: Skycap'n Kragg
text: Charrrrrge Costs (1) less for each friendly Pirate.
flavor: What's more boss than riding a parrot with a jawbone for a shoulderpad while wielding a giant hook-lance-thing and wearing a pirate hat?  NOTHING.

name: Alexstrasza's Champion
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Charge.
flavor: "Put more spikes on her.  No, more spikes.  What part of 'more spikes' do you not understand?  MORE SPIKES!" - Alexstrasza

name: Varian Wrynn
text: Battlecry: Draw 3 cards. Put any minions you drew directly into the battlefield.
flavor: Leader of the Alliance!  Father of Anduin!  Also he likes to play Arena, and he averages 12 wins.

name: Competitive Spirit
text: Secret: When your turn starts, give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: Competition can be an inspiration to improve oneself.  Or kill all the competitors.

name: Seal of Champions
text: Give a minion +3 Attack and Divine Shield.
flavor: "Arf! Arf! Arf!" - Seal of Champions

name: Warhorse Trainer
text: Your Silver Hand Recruits have +2 Attack and Taunt.
flavor: He doesn't even get Sundays off.  Every day he's hostling.

name: Murloc Knight
text: Inspire: Summon a random Murloc.
flavor: Hee hee!  Look at his cute little feet.

name: Argent Lance
text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, +1 Durability.
flavor: The stripes make it look like a candy cane, but we recommend against licking it.

name: Enter the Coliseum
text: Destroy all minions except each player's highest Attack minion.
flavor: You have to get past the vendors first.  So many are lost to shopping...

name: Mysterious Challenger
text: Battlecry: Put one of each Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
flavor: He may sound surly and antisocial, but he's actually just really shy.

name: Garrison Commander
text: You can use your Hero Power twice a turn.
flavor: He'll never admit it, but he pushes you hard because he really cares about you.

name: Eadric the Pure
text: Battlecry: Change all enemy minions' Attack to 1.
flavor: Nobody rocks a monocle like Eadric.

name: Lowly Squire
text: Inspire: Gain +1 Attack.
flavor: But not the lowliest!

name: Dragonhawk Rider
text: Inspire: Gain Windfury this turn.
flavor: Check it out.  You can do barrel rolls on this thing.

name: Lance Carrier
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Attack.
flavor: Lance Carrier is an obscure entry level position in orcish armies.  A mystery, since orcs don't generally use lances.

name: Maiden of the Lake
text: Your Hero Power costs (1).
flavor: Not a good basis for a system of government.

name: Saboteur
text: Battlecry: Your opponent's Hero Power costs (5) more next turn.
flavor: Listen all y'all it's a saboteur!

name: Argent Horserider
text: Charge Divine Shield
flavor: His horse's name is Betsy.

name: Mogor's Champion
text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
flavor: This champion has learned from the best.  Except for his target selection.

name: Boneguard Lieutenant
text: Inspire: Gain +1 Health.
flavor: Underneath all that impressive armor, he's just skin and bones.  Okay, maybe just bones.

name: Mukla's Champion
text: Inspire: Give your other minions +1/+1.
flavor: An elegant gorilla, for a more civilized age.

name: Tournament Medic
text: Inspire: Restore #2 Health to your hero.
flavor: The medic tournament is less entertaining than the Grand Tournament.

name: Ice Rager
flavor: He's a lot cooler than Magma Rager.

name: Frigid Snobold
text: Spell Damage +1
flavor: Ironically, the natural enemy of the snobold is THE CANDLE.

name: Flame Juggler
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: At first he liked juggling chain saws, but then he thought, "Flames are better!  Because FIRE!"

name: Silent Knight
text: Stealth Divine Shield
flavor: He used to be a librarian.  Old habits die hard.

name: Clockwork Knight
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +1/+1.
flavor: It takes a lot to wind him up.

name: Tournament Attendee
text: Taunt
flavor: He was so excited to get season tickets to this year's Grand Tournament.  He normally doesn't get them at first and has to buy them from Ogre scalpers.

name: Sideshow Spelleater
text: Battlecry: Copy your opponent's Hero Power.
flavor: Hey!  Let me try that...

name: Kodorider
text: Inspire: Summon a 3/5 War Kodo.
flavor: Someone called her a Rhinorider, and she's NOT HAPPY.

name: Silver Hand Regent
text: Inspire: Summon a 1/1 Silver Hand Recruit.
flavor: The Silver Hand is the best paladin organization.  The Argent Crusaders are super jealous.

name: Pit Fighter
flavor: What did the pits ever do to you?

name: Captured Jormungar
flavor: You can keep him, but you have to promise to feed him and clean out his tank every day!

name: North Sea Kraken
text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage.
flavor: You have no idea how tired this guy is of being released.

name: Tuskarr Jouster
text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, restore #7 Health to your hero.
flavor: Just could not be talked out of using his turtle for the joust...

name: Injured Kvaldir
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to this minion.
flavor: Don't worry.  With a little skin cream he's going to clear right up.

name: Light's Champion
text: Battlecry: Silence a Demon.
flavor: When there's something strange (say, a gibbering demon) in your neighborhood, who are you going to call?

name: Armored Warhorse
text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Charge.
flavor: Yep.  It's a horse... wearing armor... going to war.

name: Argent Watchman
text: Can't attack. Inspire: Can attack as normal this turn.
flavor: Who argent watches the Argent Watchman?

name: Coliseum Manager
text: Inspire: Return this minion to your hand.
flavor: Meets monthly with the gladiators to discuss career goals.

name: Refreshment Vendor
text: Battlecry: Restore #4 Health to each hero.
flavor: Menu:  Funnel cakes, carrots, popcorn, jormungar steaks.  It's hard serving a diverse clientele.

name: Master Jouster
text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: Needs just a few more ratings points to become Grandmaster Jouster.

name: Recruiter
text: Inspire: Add a 2/2 Squire to your hand.
flavor: Join the Argent Crusade!  We have attractive tabards and you get to carry really nice swords!

name: Evil Heckler
text: Taunt
flavor: To be honest, heckling is not the most effective form of evil.

name: Fencing Coach
text: Battlecry: The next time you use your Hero Power, it costs (2) less.
flavor: Good fencers make good neighbors, right?

name: Wyrmrest Agent
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
flavor: Keeping tabs on the Grand Tournament is priority #1 for the five mighty Dragonflights!

name: Master of Ceremonies
text: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Spell Damage, gain +2/+2.
flavor: Goes by "MC ElfyElf".

name: Grand Crusader
text: Battlecry: Add a random Paladin card to your hand.
flavor: A veteran of a number of crusades, she is a force for light and goodness.  Her latest crusade is against goblin telemarketers.

name: Kvaldir Raider
text: Inspire: Gain +2/+2.
flavor: Coming soon... to a tuskarr village near you!

name: Frost Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each time you used your Hero Power this game.
flavor: Don't ask him about the beard.  JUST DON'T.

name: Crowd Favorite
text: Whenever you play a card with Battlecry, gain +1/+1.
flavor: The crowd ALWAYS yells lethal.

name: Gormok the Impaler
text: Battlecry: If you have at least 4 other minions, deal 4 damage.
flavor: Gormok has been giving impaling lessons in a small tent near the tournament grounds.  For only 25g you too could learn the fine art of impaling!

name: Chillmaw
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all minions.
flavor: Chillmaw keeps trying to ruin the Grand Tournament, and she would've done it too, if it weren't for those dang kids!

name: Bolf Ramshield
text: Whenever your hero takes damage, this minion takes it instead.
flavor: Bolf keeps coming in 2nd at the Grand Tournament.  It might be his year this year, if Lebron doesn't enter.

name: Icehowl
text: Charge Can't attack heroes.
flavor: This massive yeti just closes his eyes and charges at the nearest target.  The nearest Target is a couple blocks away and has sick deals on skateboards.

name: Nexus-Champion Saraad
text: Inspire: Add a random spell to your hand.
flavor: The ethereals have their own jousting tournament, and Saraad is the reigning champion.  Also he won the ethereal hot dog eating contest.

name: The Skeleton Knight
text: Deathrattle: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, return this to your hand.
flavor: Apparently it really was just a flesh wound.

name: Fjola Lightbane
text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, gain Divine Shield.
flavor: LOVES being called "the wonder twins".

name: Sea Reaver
text: When you draw this, deal 1 damage to your minions.
flavor: A little better than Sea Minus Reaver.

name: Eydis Darkbane
text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: HATES being called "the wonder twins".

name: Justicar Trueheart
text: Battlecry: Replace your starting Hero Power with a better one.
flavor: It's like putting racing stripes and a giant spoiler on your hero power.

name: Gadgetzan Jouster
text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain +1/+1.
flavor: It's not HER fault you didn't put a spinning saw blade on your horse.

name: Drek'Thar
text: [x]Battlecry: If this costs more than every minion in your deck, summon one of those minions.
flavor:
Inside your deck there are two wolves.
One is a frostwolf. The other is a frostwolf.
You are a Frostwolf.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "For the Stormpike!" Achievement.

name: Herald of Lokholar
text: Battlecry: Draw a Frost spell.
flavor: “I don’t care how hot it is. I am not going over there to be your air conditioning."
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Look! Holar!" Achievement.

name: Popsicooler
text: [x]Deathrattle: Freeze two random enemy minions.
flavor: Just passing through Alterac on its way to apply for a job at the Ice Cream Citadel.

name: Glaciate
text: Discover an 8-Cost minion. Summon and Freeze it.
flavor: We now have a more accurate answer to the age-old question "What's cooler than being cool?"

name: Shield Shatter
text:
[x]Deal $5 damage to all
minions. Costs (1) less
for each Armor you have.
flavor:
"Is the shield being shattered or doing the shattering?"
"Yes."

name: Frozen Buckler
text: Gain 10 Armor. At the start of your next turn, lose 5 Armor.
flavor: "Hey, I bet I could shatter this."

name: Snowblind Harpy
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Frost spell, gain 5 Armor.
flavor: Not snowblind; she can spot a level 51 noob over 40 yards away.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Snowblind? Sno Problem!" Achievement.

name: Beaststalker Tavish
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover and cast 2 Improved Secrets.
flavor: Tavish left home to forge his own path. But it still led him back to Alterac to kick some Frostwolf butt.

name: Shivering Sorceress
text: [x]Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of the highest Cost spell in your hand by (1).
flavor: Remember to use your sick days wisely.

name: Amplified Snowflurry
text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power costs (0) and Freezes the target.
flavor: I bet it’s just exaggerating.

name: Arcane Brilliance
text: Add a copy of a 7, 8, 9, and 10-Cost spell in your deck to your hand.
flavor: They could probably do with a dash of Arcane Humility.

name: Battleworn Vanguard
text:
[x]After your hero attacks,
summon two 1/1 Felwings.
flavor: "Welcome to Dun Baldar Felwings! Do you want 'em mild, spicy, or BURNING Legion?"

name: To the Front!
text: Your minions cost (2) less this turn (but not less than 1).
flavor: Except healers. You go to the back.

name: Gnome Private
text: [x]Honorable Kill: Gain +2 Attack.
flavor: She's doing her part.

name: Corporal
text: Honorable Kill: Give your other minions Divine Shield.
flavor: When he’s sitting in the graveyard ready to rez, he’s incorporal.

name: Sneaky Scout
text: [x]Stealth Honorable Kill: Your next Hero Power costs (0).
flavor: Do you know what they call Scouts that aren't sneaky? Target practice.

name: Direwolf Commander
text: Honorable Kill: Summon a 2/2 Wolf with Stealth.
flavor: When you’re riding a wolf, it’s in charge and you're allowed to make suggestions.

name: Tower Sergeant
text: Battlecry: If you control at least 2 other minions, gain +2/+2.
flavor: Best helmet in the valley.

name: Bunker Sergeant
text: [x]Battlecry: If your opponent has 2 or more minions, deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Best hair in the valley.

name: Ice Revenant
text: Whenever you cast a Frost spell, gain +2/+2.
flavor: There must have been some magic in that old ice mace we found.

name: Frozen Mammoth
text: This is Frozen until you cast a Fire spell.
flavor: *record scratch* "So, you may be wondering how I got here."

name: Blood Guard
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, give your minions +1 Attack.
flavor: Has never donated blood and doesn’t plan on ever doing so.

name: Legionnaire
text: Deathrattle: Give all minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: *not related to the Burning Legion

name: Knight-Captain
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage. Honorable Kill: Gain +3/+3.
flavor: Very dangerous shoulder-to-ears situation here.

name: Troll Centurion
text: [x]Rush. Honorable Kill: Deal 8 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Centurion? Ha, come back when you’re a millennion.

name: Icehoof Protector
text: Taunt Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
flavor: I can't feel my axe!

name: Frostwolf Warmaster
text: Costs (1) less for each card you've played this turn.
flavor: “The spoils of war ain’t free… Unless you’re me!”
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Harder, Better, Warmaster, Stronger" Achievement.

name: Stormpike Marshal
text: [x]Taunt If you took 5 or more damage on your opponent's turn, this costs (1).
flavor: The Stormpike have a very direct take on life insurance.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "One For All, Marshall For 1!" Achievement.

name: Kobold Taskmaster
text: [x]Battlecry: Add 2 Armor Scraps to your hand that give +2 Health to a minion.
flavor: Fabled questgiver of the “Get me candle”, “Get me another candle”, and “Get me 11 more candle” questline.

name: Irondeep Trogg
text:
[x]After your opponent
casts a spell, summon
 another Irondeep Trogg.
flavor: STOP AGGROING MORE!

name: Grimtotem Bounty Hunter
text: Battlecry: Destroy an enemy Legendary minion.
flavor: He’ll take a big weight off your shoulders.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "1600 Dust Bounty" Achievement.

name: Abominable Lieutenant
text:
At the end of your turn,
eat a random enemy minion and gain its stats.
flavor: If you can't join 'em, eat 'em.

name: Lokholar the Ice Lord
text: Rush, Windfury Costs (5) less if you have 15 Health or less.
flavor: Suddenly the names of Iceblood Tower and Iceblood Garrison make a lot more sense.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Fractured in Alterac Valley Reward Track.

name: Ivus, the Forest Lord
text: [x]Battlecry: Spend the rest of your Mana and gain +2/+2, Rush, Divine Shield, or Taunt at random for each.
flavor: He's always welcome at the local tavern, unlike a certain Ancient.

name: Korrak the Bloodrager
text: [x]Deathrattle: If this wasn't Honorably Killed, resummon Korrak.
flavor: “I live, I love, I slay, and I am undying.”

name: Captain Galvangar
text: [x]Battlecry: If you have gained 15 or more Armor this game, gain +3/+3 and Charge.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: It wasn't the ravages of war that took Galvangar, it was hypothermia.

name: Dun Baldar Bunker
text: [x]At the end of your turn, draw a Secret and set its Cost to (1). Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: Brutalist architecture for brutal times.
how_to_earn_golden: Obtained by gaining Honor in Fractured in Alterac Valley.

name: Magister Dawngrasp
text: [x]Battlecry: Recast a spell from each spell school you've cast this game.
flavor: Magister is a humble title for one who united warring armies against the greatest threat to Azeroth.

name: Coldtooth Yeti
text: Combo: Gain +3 Attack.
flavor: Its arrival heralds the Brain Freeze Yeti.

name: Rokara, the Valorous
text: Battlecry: Equip a 5/2 Unstoppable Force.
flavor: As strong-willed and stubborn as her first day in the Horde, Rokara now wielded a weapon that rivaled even her tenacity.

name: Shadowcrafter Scabbs
text: [x]Battlecry: Return all minions to their owner's hands. Summon two 4/2 Shadows with Stealth.
flavor: Sneaking behind enemy lines isn't so different from being a line cook. People are hostile, something's on fire, and your only hope is to get out of there with all your fingers.

name: Kurtrus, Demon-Render
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 1/4 Demons with Rush. (Improved by your hero attacks this game.)
flavor: "I dedicated my life to vanquishing demons, but I never thought to face the demons in me. Maybe, in time, I can help quell the demons in you." -Kurtrus, to Cariel

name: Wildheart Guff
text: [x]Battlecry: Set your maximum Mana to 20. Gain an empty Mana Crystal. Draw a card.
flavor: Guff faced his biggest challenge yet: making friends on a battlefield.

name: Lightforged Cariel
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all enemies. Equip a 2/5 Immovable Object.
flavor:
Her faith, unshakable.
Her shield, immovable.
Her enemies, irredeemable.

name: Xyrella, the Devout
text: [x]Battlecry: Trigger the Deathrattle of every friendly minion that died this game.
flavor: Xyrella thought she was only saving her daughter. Her actions may very well have saved the entire world.

name: Dreadprison Glaive
text: [x]Honorable Kill: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to the enemy hero.
flavor: Keep your allies close. Keep your evil demons in your weapon.

name: Pathmaker
text: [x]Battlecry: Cast the other choice from the last Choose One spell you've cast.
flavor: You can never choose the wrong path if you make your own.

name: Dire Frostwolf
text: Stealth Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Wolf with Stealth.
flavor:
Tips to survive a frostwolf attack:
-Stay calm
-Lay down
-Drizzle steak sauce over your body
Brought to you by the Frostwolf Council for Alliance Safety.

name: Siphon Mana
text: Deal $2 damage. Honorable Kill: Reduce the Cost of spells in your hand by (1).
flavor: Why spend mine when I can take yours?

name: Vitality Surge
text:
Draw a minion.
Restore Health to your hero equal to its Cost.
flavor: If your vitality lasts longer than four hours, consult a Priest.

name: Frantic Hippogryph
text: Rush. Honorable Kill:  Gain Windfury.
flavor: It's killed and it'll kill again!
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Flappy Bird" Achievement.

name: Mass Polymorph
text: Transform all minions into 1/1 Sheep.
flavor: Sheep in Frostwolves' clothing.

name: Ram Commander
text: [x]Battlecry: Add two 1/1 Rams with Rush to your hand.
flavor: Get your RAM in pairs for better performance.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Mary Had a Little Ram" Achievement.

name: Spammy Arcanist
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions. If any die, repeat this.
flavor: You don't have to jump while spamming, but it’s more fun that way.

name: Vanndar Stormpike
text: [x]Battlecry: If this costs less than every minion in your deck, reduce their Cost by (3).
flavor: His favorite modes of transportation? Van, car, board, bike.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "For the Frostwolves!" Achievement.

name: Spring the Trap
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion and cast a Secret from your deck. Honorable Kill: Cast 2.
flavor: Talk about starting off on the wrong foot.

name: Ice Trap
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, return it to their hand instead. It costs (1) more.
flavor: I literally watched the Hunter place it down in front of me and I still stepped in it.

name: Gankster
text: [x]Stealth After your opponent plays a minion, attack it.
flavor: UGH! IM GETTING MY MAIN!

name: Bloodseeker
text: Honorable Kill: Gain +1/+1.
flavor: What do you mean shooting them in the back isn’t honorable?!

name: Snowball Fight!
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion and Freeze it. If it survives, repeat this on another minion!
flavor: Woahwoahwoah, we said no friendly fire!

name: Cheaty Snobold
text: After an enemy is Frozen, deal 3 damage to it.
flavor: This one will knock you out cold.

name: Snowfall Guardian
text: [x]Battlecry: Freeze all other minions.
flavor: You’re finally awake! That fall looked really bad. Demon Hunters? Mercenaries? What are you talking about? Come on, I just unpacked a Golden Moorabi, let’s go build a Freeze Shaman deck.

name: Reflecto Engineer
text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of all minions in both players' hands.
flavor: The whole thing's based on the Rubber-Glue Phenomenon.

name: Bearon Gla'shear
text: [x]Battlecry: For each Frost spell you've cast this game, summon a 3/4 Elemental that Freezes.@ (@)
flavor: When you get hit by a royally bad pun, you just have to grin and bear it.

name: Bru'kan of the Elements
text: [x]Battlecry: Call upon the power of two Elements!
flavor: The elements crackled through Bru'kan's veins and his life flashed before his eyes. He knew this moment would come, but he wondered, had he given them enough?

name: Frostbite
text: Deal $3 damage. Honorable Kill: Your opponent's next spell costs (2) more.
flavor: The sad reality of a raging toothpaste addiction.

name: Sleetbreaker
text: Battlecry: Add a Windchill to your hand.
flavor: Likes chilly, hates chili.

name: Flag Runner
text: Whenever a friendly minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: I see your argument, but…do you have a flag?

name: Warden of Chains
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you're holding a Demon that costs (5) or more, gain +1/+2.
flavor: Can’t stay out too late. I gotta head back home to the ol’ ball and chained demon.

name: Sigil of Reckoning
text: At the start of your next turn, summon a random Demon from your hand.
flavor: “It’s dangerous ‘round these parts, I reckon.”

name: Ur'zul Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each friendly minion that died this game.
flavor: Nothing personal, tiny human. I have many mouths to feed.

name: Windchill
text: Freeze a minion. Draw a card.
flavor: The thermometer says it’s 0° right now, but with the windchill it feels like -25°.

name: Caria Felsoul
text: Battlecry: Transform into a 6/6 copy of a Demon in your deck.
flavor: This is what happens when you keep taking the advice of the little demon on your shoulder.

name: Wildpaw Cavern
text: [x]At the end of your turn, summon a 3/4 Elemental that Freezes. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: Adventurers were quite confused when they saw how many boots were frozen to the ceiling.

name: Flanking Maneuver
text: Summon a 4/2 Demon with Rush. If it dies this turn, summon another.
flavor: So, do we have advantage? Can I sneak attack?

name: Seeds of Destruction
text:
[x]Shuffle four Rifts
into your deck. They
summon a 3/3 Dread
Imp when drawn.
flavor: May your harvest be dreadful.

name: Felfire in the Hole!
text: Draw a spell and deal $2 damage to all enemies. If it's a Fel spell, deal $1 more.
flavor: Fear not, feebleminded friends, for failure to fell your foes with felfire is fundamentally farfetched!

name: Build a Snowman
text: Summon a 3/3 Snowman that Freezes. Add "Build a Snowbrute" to your hand.
flavor: This is the coolest spell once you get it rolling.

name: Rune of the Archmage
text:
[x]Cast 20 Mana worth of
Mage spells at enemies.
flavor: “It’s not a slot machine! It took YEARS of rigorous studying the intricacies of the universe to unravel the strands of reality. The arcane knowledge alone would enfeeble even the most brilliant of minds. Give it the credence it deserves. It’s a magic slot machine.”

name: Balinda Stonehearth
text: Battlecry: Draw 2 spells. Swap their Costs with this minion's stats.
flavor: Imagine her surprise, ending up in a game called Hearthstone.

name: Full-Blown Evil
text:
Deal $5 damage randomly split among
all enemy minions. Repeatable this turn.
flavor:
This isn’t your average, everyday evil.
This is ADVANCED evil.

name: Felwalker
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Cast the highest Cost Fel spell from your hand.
flavor: How it feels to chew Fel Gum.

name: Iceblood Tower
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
cast another spell from
your deck. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor:
“Why is it called Iceblood Tower?”
“Not really sure. Anyways, try not to lose your footing on any of the frozen bodies as you make your way in.”
how_to_earn_golden: Obtained by gaining Honor in Fractured in Alterac Valley.

name: Frostsaber Matriarch
text: [x]Taunt. Costs (1) less for each Beast you've  summoned this game.
flavor: They say “don’t poke the bear”, but they NEVER said “don’t poke the frostsaber or her cubs”.

name: Heart of the Wild
text: Give a minion +2/+2, then give your Beasts +1/+1.
flavor: In each of us beats a wild heart. Except the Forsaken.

name: Wing Commander Mulverick
text: [x]Rush. Your minions have "Honorable Kill: Summon a  2/2 Wyvern with Rush."
flavor: “A board full of 2-Health minions? This is what I call a target rich environment.”

name: Clawfury Adept
text: Battlecry: Give all other friendly characters +1 Attack this turn.
flavor: The Inept Clawfury is a danger only to themselves.

name: Capture Coldtooth Mine
text: Choose One - Draw your lowest Cost card; or Draw your highest Cost card.
flavor: We hit a huge haul! Or wait… no, it's just a coin.

name: Pride Seeker
text: [x]Battlecry: Your next Choose One card costs (2) less.
flavor: When you're putting your head in the lion's mouth, you may as well dress the part.

name: Wildpaw Gnoll
text: [x]Rush Costs (1) less for each non-Rogue Class card added to your hand this game.
flavor: A big fan of four-claw discounts.

name: Grave Defiler
text: Battlecry: Copy a Fel spell in your hand.
flavor: She keeps her Fel spells nice and organized in her defiling cabinet.

name: Piggyback Imp
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/1 Imp.
flavor: Imp my ride.

name: Sacrificial Summoner
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion. Summon a minion from your deck that costs (1) more.
flavor: Summoning will cost you an arm and a brother.

name: Hollow Abomination
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. Honorable Kill: Gain the minion's Attack.
flavor: As soon as you land your first Honorable Kill, trust me, you'll be hooked!

name: Deliverance
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Honorable Kill: Summon a new 3/3 copy of it.
flavor: In 30 minutes or less, or else it’s free!

name: Dreadlich Tamsin
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to all minions. Shuffle 3 Rifts into your deck. Draw 3 cards.
flavor: At a certain point, you stop mocking death and start becoming it.

name: Tamsin's Phylactery
text: Discover a friendly Deathrattle minion that died this game. Give your minions its Deathrattle.
flavor: Eau de Morte. Guaranteed to take your date’s breath away

name: Glory Chaser
text: After you play a Taunt minion, draw a card.
flavor: When you've reached the peak of competition twice, how hard can winning one valley be?

name: Snowed In
text: Destroy a damaged minion. Freeze all other minions.
flavor: “What do you mean school isn’t cancelled?! It’s a snow day!”

name: Scrapsmith
text: Taunt Battlecry: Add two 2/4 Grunts with Taunt to your hand.
flavor: Takes the ugly scraps of armor from dead players and combines them into ridiculous looking PVP armor sets.

name: Shadow Word: Devour
text:
Choose a minion.
It steals 1 Health from
 ALL other minions.
flavor: Devouring souls is like a buffet. You have to take a little bit of everything.

name: Undying Disciple
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to all enemy minions.
flavor: We get it, you're undead. But jumping out of a grave? That's a bit much.

name: Luminous Geode
text: After a friendly minion is healed, give it +2 Attack.
flavor: No take candle. BE CANDLE.

name: Spirit Guide
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Draw a Holy spell and a Shadow spell.
flavor:
"Hey Jake."
"Back again?"
"Yup."
"See you in 2 minutes."

name: Bless
text:
[x]Give a minion +2 Health,
then set its Attack to be
equal to its Health.
flavor: Bless is bmore.

name: Gift of the Naaru
text:
[x]Restore #3 Health to
all characters. If any
are still damaged,
draw a card.
flavor: What do I look like, a charity?

name: Najak Hexxen
text: [x]Battlecry: Take control of an enemy minion. Deathrattle: Give the minion back.
flavor: "I've got friends on the other side... of the battlefield."
targeting_arrow_text: Take control of an enemy minion

name: Revive Pet
text: Discover a friendly Beast that died this game. Summon it.
flavor: Best friends never really leave.

name: Stormpike Battle Ram
text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Your next Beast costs (2) less.
flavor: Baa ram ewe! To your dwarves, your beard, Stormpike clan be true!

name: Ram Tamer
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a Secret, gain +1/+1 and Stealth.
flavor: Pump up the ram, pump it up. While your hooves are stompin’.

name: Wing Commander Ichman
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a Beast from your deck and give it Rush. If it kills a minion this turn, repeat.
flavor: “Mulverick, it’s not your flying, it’s your faction.”

name: Mountain Bear
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon two 2/4 Cubs with Taunt.
flavor: If they want your picnic basket, I recommend giving it to them.

name: Hold the Bridge
text: [x]Give a minion +2/+1 and Divine Shield. It gains Lifesteal until end of turn.
flavor: You! Shall not! Pass!

name: Templar Captain
text: [x]Rush. After this attacks a minion, summon a 5/5 Defender with Taunt.
flavor: You can combine two of these into a Captain Archon.

name: Brasswing
text: [x]At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to all enemies. Honorable Kill: Restore 4 Health to your hero.
flavor: I’ve seen this before. You just have to time it right to avoid the dragon.

name: Cavalry Horn
text: Deathrattle: Summon the lowest Cost minion in your hand.
flavor: The clarion call of the Alliance skipping every objective and going straight to Drek’Thar.

name: Protect the Innocent
text: Summon a 5/5 Defender with Taunt. If your hero was healed this turn, summon another.
flavor: "Quick, strike a super hero pose!"

name: Stonehearth Vindicator
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a spell that costs (3) or less. It costs (0) this turn.
flavor: “True strength comes from within your deck” is a whole lot less inspiring.

name: Dun Baldar Bridge
text:
[x]After you summon a
minion, give it +2/+2.
Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: At least there's no fall damage in Hearthstone.
how_to_earn_golden: Obtained by gaining Honor in Fractured in Alterac Valley.

name: Saidan the Scarlet
text: Rush. Whenever this minion gains Attack or Health, double that amount (wherever this is).
flavor: An orc mage accidentally kited him all the way from Stratholme.

name: Frostwolf Kennels
text: [x]At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Wolf with Stealth. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: The #1 reason Alliance members defect to the Horde is to adopt a cute frostwolf puppy.
how_to_earn_golden: Obtained by gaining Honor in Fractured in Alterac Valley.

name: Snowfall Graveyard
text: [x]Your Deathrattles trigger twice. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: Live fast, die twice.

name: Stormpike Quartermaster
text:
After you cast a spell,
give a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Frozen funnel cakes taste just like ice cream, if you pretend real hard.

name: The Lobotomizer
text: [x]Honorable Kill: Get a copy of the top card of your opponent's deck.
flavor: This may hurt a little, but don't worry, you won't remember it.

name: Cera'thine Fleetrunner
text: [x]Battlecry: Replace your minions in hand and deck with ones from other classes. They cost (2) less.
flavor: World Record CTF Champion 16 years running.

name: Contraband Stash
text: Replay 5 cards from other classes you've played this game.
flavor:
“Coggsprocket! We happy?"
"Yeah, we happy."

name: Axe Berserker
text: Rush. Honorable Kill: Draw a weapon.
flavor: All the body spray went to her head.

name: Forsaken Lieutenant
text: Stealth. After you play a Deathrattle minion, become a 2/2 copy of it with Rush.
flavor: WE didn’t forsake him. He CHOSE to defend a tower against the entire Alliance front line by himself.

name: Desecrated Graveyard
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
destroy your lowest Attack
minion to summon a
4/4 Shade. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: People are dying to get in.

name: Iceblood Garrison
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
deal $1 damage to all 
minions. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: On weekends, it hosts the local community theater rehearsals.
how_to_earn_golden: Obtained by gaining Honor in Fractured in Alterac Valley.

name: Field of Strife
text:
[x]Your minions have
+1 Attack.
Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: I heard it's lovely there around this time of year.

name: Stormpike Aid Station
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
give your minions +2
Health. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: Known by some as the “Stormpike Naptime Lounge.”
how_to_earn_golden: Obtained by gaining Honor in Fractured in Alterac Valley.

name: Humongous Owl
text: Deathrattle: Deal 8 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: "Humongous what?" -Torug's last words.

name: Reconnaissance
text: Discover a Deathrattle minion from another class. It costs (2) less.
flavor: “But Commander, I already did the connaissance.”

name: Double Agent
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a card from another class,  summon a copy of this.
flavor: And under the Alliance tabard? Another Horde tabard.

name: Razormane Raider
text: Frenzy: Attack a random enemy.
flavor: "Call me hedgehog one more time. I dare you."

name: Gold Road Grunt
text: [x]Taunt Frenzy: Gain Armor equal to the damage taken.
flavor: No, no, no, Gold Roads are very different from Yellow Brick Roads.

name: Peon
text: [x]Frenzy: Add a random spell from your class to your hand.
flavor: Joke's on the peon: the job's never done.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Frenzy Friends" Achievement.

name: Oasis Thrasher
text: Frenzy: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Didn't get tickets for E.T.C.'s show.

name: Sunwell Initiate
text: Frenzy: Gain Divine Shield.
flavor: Initiates don’t study pronunciation until level 20.

name: Death's Head Cultist
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Restore 4 Health to your hero.
flavor: Nothing can stop death. Except a Taunt. With Healing.

name: Darkspear Berserker
text: Deathrattle: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavor: "If I die, I'm taking my hero down with me."

name: Pack Kodo
text: Battlecry: Discover a Beast, Secret, or weapon.
flavor: He looks simple, but there’s a lot to unpack.

name: Sunscale Raptor
text: Frenzy: Shuffle a Sunscale Raptor into your deck with permanent +2/+1.
flavor: And they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they don't stop coming and they—

name: Piercing Shot
text: Deal $6 damage to a minion. Excess damage hits the enemy hero.
flavor: Goblins hate wasting money on unnecessary ammunition.

name: Prospector's Caravan
text: At the start of your turn, give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Prospectors came from all around in the Golden Legendary Rush of '49.

name: Tame Beast (Rank 1)
text: Summon a 2/2 Beast with Rush. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: "Trust me laddie, I never eat seafood!"

name: Kolkar Pack Runner
text: [x]After you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Hyena with Rush.
flavor: Is he running or galloping?

name: Warsong Wrangler
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a Beast from your deck. Give all copies of it +2/+1 (wherever they are).
flavor: "Me? Playing favorites? I love my beasts all the same!"

name: Tavish Stormpike
text: After a friendly Beast attacks, summon a Beast from your deck that costs (1) less.
flavor: "Hurry up, laddie, we're getting overrun! Serpents everywhere! They may look cute, but do ye see the fury in their eyes?!" —Tavish Stormpike

name: South Coast Chieftain
text: Battlecry: If you control another Murloc, deal 2 damage.
flavor: It got the conch. You let it speak!

name: Nofin Can Stop Us
text:
[x]Give your minions
+1/+1. Give your
Murlocs an extra +1/+1.
flavor: "I'm having a good time! I don't want to stop at all!"

name: Primordial Protector
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw your highest Cost spell. Summon a random minion with the same Cost.
flavor: I thought the "shape of water" meant something else.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Grand Guardian" Achievement.

name: Tinyfin's Caravan
text: At the start of your turn, draw a Murloc.
flavor: Movin' right along, mrgl mrg mrgl mrg.

name: Chain Lightning (Rank 1)
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and a random adjacent one. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Still better than receiving a chain letter.

name: Arid Stormer
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, gain Rush and Windfury.
flavor: Some people chase storms, some storms chase elementals.

name: Bru'kan
text: Nature Spell Damage +3
flavor: Bru'kan, his body weathered and weary, felt his time nearing its end. Teaching brave champions like Rokara gives him hope for a greater future.

name: Hog Rancher
text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/1 Hog with Rush.
flavor: Suspiciously close to a Quilboar village.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Hog Wild" Achievement.

name: Ratchet Privateer
text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
flavor: There's a fine line between privateering and pirating. It comes down to tax breaks.

name: Lushwater Murcenary
text: Battlecry: If you control a Murloc, gain +1/+1.
flavor: You can't just switch sides because they have more fish!

name: Lushwater Scout
text: After you summon a Murloc, give it +1 Attack and Rush.
flavor: Only knows how to play "Careless Murgl" and "Mrgl Mrgl Little Star."

name: Talented Arcanist
text: Battlecry: Your next spell this turn has Spell Damage +2.
flavor: "Ey mon, you don't get this good just on raw talent ... but it helps."

name: Venomous Scorpid
text: Poisonous Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavor: Despite what Guff says, he is NOT a "nice little guy."
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Sting Operation" Achievement.

name: Injured Marauder
text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 6 damage to this minion.
flavor: He’ll keep going despite the neighsayers.

name: Gruntled Patron
text: Frenzy: Summon another Gruntled Patron.
flavor: Gruntled and whelmed.

name: Taurajo Brave
text: Frenzy: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: "He's brave, but splinters will make any Tauren cry."

name: Burning Blade Acolyte
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/8 Demonspawn with Taunt.
flavor: Wields a disappointingly normal looking blade.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Spawn Shop" Achievement.

name: Barrens Blacksmith
text: Frenzy: Give your other minions +2/+2.
flavor: "Maybe someday you’ll make it to Gadgetzan, kid."

name: Far Watch Post
text: [x]Can't attack. After your opponent draws a card, it    costs (1) more (up to 10).
flavor: Dabu, man. Like, far out.

name: Crossroads Watch Post
text:
[x]Can't attack. Whenever your
opponent casts a spell, give
your minions +1/+1.
flavor: All of Barrens Chat is recorded and kept on thousands of scrolls stored beneath this tower.

name: Mor'shan Watch Post
text:
[x]Can't attack. After your
opponent plays a minion,
 summon a 2/2 Grunt.
flavor: Pushing into Ashenvale made this post uneventful.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Maximum Security" Achievement.

name: Kargal Battlescar
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Lookout for each Watch Post you've   summoned this game.
flavor: One if by land, two if by tree.

name: Blademaster Samuro
text: [x]Rush Frenzy: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack  to all enemy minions.
flavor: Artists paint their visions meticulously on canvas. Blademasters paint with, uh, broader strokes.

name: Kazakus, Golem Shaper
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 4-Cost cards, build a custom Golem.
flavor: With a little love and some tenderness, we’ll CRUSH OUR FOES!

name: Shadow Hunter Vol'jin
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Swap it with a random one in its owner's hand.
flavor: You wouldn’t see this swap-meet on the Zandalari Roadshow.
how_to_earn: Unlocked when opening a Forged in the Barrens pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Equivalent Exchange" Achievement.
targeting_arrow_text: Swap with a minion in hand.

name: Southsea Scoundrel
text: Battlecry: Discover a card in your opponent's deck. They draw theirs as well.
flavor: "…and here we see the Southsea Scoundrel in their natural habitat: a den of scum and villainy."

name: Barrens Trapper
text: Your Deathrattle cards cost (1) less.
flavor: Just add a bit of murloc meat for bait. Beasts can’t resist that special seasoning…

name: Flurry (Rank 1)
text: Freeze a random enemy minion. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Flurry, Flurrier, Flurriest.

name: Sigil of Flame
text:
At the start of your next turn, deal $3 damage
to all minions.
flavor: "Huh, it reads F-I-R-E. Wonder what that means?"

name: Void Flayer
text: [x]Battlecry: For each spell in your hand, deal 1 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor: The Void, just like onions, has flayers.

name: Power Word: Fortitude
text: Give a minion +3/+5. Costs (1) less for each spell in your hand.
flavor: Part of a balanced breakfast.

name: Desperate Prayer
text: Restore #5 Health to each hero.
flavor: Woah, we're halfway there, woah oh...

name: Lightshower Elemental
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Restore #8 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: The forecast calls for light showers, but you won’t need an umbrella.

name: Devouring Plague
text: [x]Lifesteal. Deal $4 damage randomly split among all enemy minions.
flavor: "How’d we miss this one in Uldum?" —Rafaam

name: Soothsayer's Caravan
text: At the start of your turn, copy a spell from your opponent's deck to your hand.
flavor: With tusks like those, you might call her a "Toothsayer."

name: Priest of An'she
text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you've restored Health this turn, gain +3/+3.
flavor: "An’she?" "Bless you!" "No, you, An'she…" "Bless you again!"

name: Condemn (Rank 1)
text: [x]Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: "I wished you no harm, but for your cruelty, by the light, I condemn you all!" Xyrella shouted, unaware that irony was not her strong suit.

name: Serena Bloodfeather
text: Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Steal Attack and Health from it until this has more.
flavor: She’s really into networking! After all, she’s introduced countless low-level Horde players to the Spirit Healer.

name: Oil Rig Ambusher
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage. If this entered your hand  this turn, deal 4 instead.
flavor: Days since last accident: 0

name: Field Contact
text: [x]After you play a Battlecry or Combo card, draw a card.
flavor: That's not a knife... THIS is a knife!

name: Silverleaf Poison
text:
[x]Give your weapon
"After your hero attacks,
draw a card."
flavor: Kazakus has taken to a more direct approach in recent times.

name: Wicked Stab (Rank 1)
text: Deal $2 damage. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Always go for the glowing weak point.

name: Efficient Octo-bot
text: Frenzy: Reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1).
flavor: Pull the lever, Octo-bot... Wrong leverrrrr!

name: Paralytic Poison
text: [x]Give your weapon +1 Attack and "Your hero is Immune while attacking."
flavor: The hammer is overkill.

name: Swinetusk Shank
text:
[x]After you play a Poison,
 gain +1 Durability.
flavor: Comes with a rack of ribs!

name: Yoink!
text: Discover a Hero Power and set its Cost to (0). Swap back after 2 uses.
flavor: Saying the spell’s name makes it work better.

name: Apothecary Helbrim
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a random Poison to your hand.
flavor: The best way to maintain your health is to poison everyone else.

name: Razorboar
text: Deathrattle: Summon a Deathrattle minion that costs (3) or less from your hand.
flavor: And this little pig built his house out of VENGEANCE.

name: Razorfen Beastmaster
text: Deathrattle: Summon a Deathrattle minion that costs (4) or less from your hand.
flavor: It's a homebrew variant on my favorite role-playing game.

name: Vile Call
text: Summon two 2/2 Demons with Lifesteal.
flavor: "We're calling to inform you that your vehicle's insurance is about to expire."

name: Vengeful Spirit
text: Outcast: Draw 2 Deathrattle minions.
flavor: Sheesh, even the spirits are edgy when it comes to Demon Hunters.

name: Death Speaker Blackthorn
text: Battlecry: Summon 3 Deathrattle minions that cost (5) or less from your deck.
flavor: He can speak death but has a hard time reading it.

name: Tuskpiercer
text: [x]Deathrattle: Draw a Deathrattle minion.
flavor: It's the Barrens, everything has tusks! The Quilboar have tusks, the boars have tusks, the tusks have tusks.

name: Kurtrus Ashfallen
text: [x]Battlecry: Attack the left and right-most enemy minions. Outcast: Immune this turn.
flavor: Kurtrus fled the Black Temple, abandoning Illidan's cause, to seek revenge against the Dreadlord Anetheron.

name: Overlord Saurfang
text: Battlecry: Resurrect 2 friendly Frenzy minions. Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Eats more than his fair share of sour candy.

name: Horde Operative
text: Battlecry: Copy your opponent's Secrets and put them into play.
flavor: "We all have our secrets. I mean, your secrets."
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Top Secret Snoop" Achievement.

name: Thorngrowth Sentries
text: Summon two 1/2 Turtles with Taunt.
flavor: Maybe we shouldn't drink from this Oasis…

name: Pride's Fury
text: Give your minions +1/+3.
flavor: Day 4: I think they're starting to suspect.

name: Thickhide Kodo
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Gain 5 Armor.
flavor: The introduction of professions was devastating for kodo populations.

name: Living Seed (Rank 1)
text: Draw a Beast. Reduce its Cost by (1). (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Every desert needs an oasis. And it's Guff's duty to make it happen.

name: Razormane Battleguard
text: The first Taunt minion you play each turn costs (2) less.
flavor: Where there's a quill, there's a way.

name: Druid of the Plains
text: Rush Frenzy: Transform into a 6/7 Kodo with Taunt.
flavor: Not to be confused with the aeronautically advanced Druid of the Planes.

name: Celestial Alignment
text: Set your Mana Crystals to 0. Set the Cost of cards in your hand and deck to (1).
flavor:
"Is my deck any good?"
"I mean, if the stars align."

name: Plaguemaw the Rotting
text: [x]After a friendly minion with Taunt dies, summon a new  copy of it without Taunt.
flavor: This is why you should brush your teeth three times a day!

name: Runed Orb
text: Deal $2 damage. Discover a spell.
flavor: The most dangerous Winter Veil ornament.

name: Refreshing Spring Water
text:
Draw 2 cards.
Refresh 2 Mana Crystals for each spell drawn.
flavor: "Mana" is just another name for "electrolytes."

name: Reckless Apprentice
text: Battlecry: Fire your Hero Power at all enemies.
flavor: It’s all a great learning experience until someone accidentally aggros the boss.

name: Arcane Luminary
text: [x]Cards that didn't start in your deck cost (2) less (but not less than 1).
flavor: They say true value is the cards you find along the way.

name: Wildfire
text:
[x]Your Hero Power
deals 1 more damage
this game.
flavor: The Barrens were a lush jungle. Then this happened.

name: Mordresh Fire Eye
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've dealt 10 damage with your Hero Power this game, deal 10 damage to all enemies.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: You're not hardcore unless you died hardcore.

name: Mark of the Spikeshell
text: Give a minion +2/+2. If it has Taunt, add a copy of it to your hand.
flavor: "I'm DEFINITELY turtle-y enough for the turtle club."

name: Galloping Savior
text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, summon a 3/4 Steed with Taunt.
flavor: "Look to my coming on the first light of the third card."

name: Barak Kodobane
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a 1, 2,   and 3-Cost spell.
flavor: They say he's a pro at horseback archery.

name: Scabbs Cutterbutter
text: [x]Combo: The next two cards you play this turn cost (2) less.
flavor: "Never lie, steal, cheat, or drink. Unless you're compelled to, that is…" —Scabbs Cutterbutter

name: Sigil of Silence
text: At the start of your next turn, Silence all enemy minions.
flavor: A little heard-of spell.

name: Guff Runetotem
text: After you cast a Nature spell, give another friendly minion +2/+2.
flavor: "By the twins above and twins below, our companions will lead us through." —Guff Runetotem

name: Mankrik
text: [x]Battlecry: Help Mankrik find his wife! She was last seen somewhere in your deck.
flavor: Relives his nightmare every day a new Horde player is created.
how_to_earn: Unlocked when opening a Forged in the Barrens pack.

name: Xyrella
text: Battlecry: If you've restored Health this turn, deal that much damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: On the Night of Falling Stars, Xyrella had a vision of a shattered naaru. "Go to the Barrens," the being said. "Seek the shards of my broken body. Restore me, and I will restore your daughter."

name: Toad of the Wilds
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you're holding a Nature spell, gain +2 Health.
flavor: "Someday we'll find it. The Oasis Connection. The peons, the caravans, and me."

name: Spirit Healer
text: After you cast a Holy spell, give a random friendly minion +2 Health.
flavor: "You again? What did I tell you about trying to fight ALL the quilboars."

name: Hecklefang Hyena
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavor: Even their teeth are laughing at you.

name: Varden Dawngrasp
text: [x]Battlecry: Freeze all enemy minions. If any are already Frozen, deal 4 damage to them instead.
flavor: Varden Dawngrasp could wield fire, summon hailstorms, and morph a night elf into a sheep with a snap of their fingers. Knowing how malleable reality could be, certain labels felt downright trivial.

name: Earth Revenant
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Have you guys seen a pair of rock legs lying around anywhere?

name: Spawnpool Forager
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Tinyfin.
flavor: Putting food on the table requires persistence, enthusiasm, and the finest murloc Gloves of Foraging.

name: Wound Prey
text: Deal $1 damage. Summon a 1/1 Hyena with Rush.
flavor: You steal the cranberry juice, you pay the price.

name: Oasis Ally
text: [x]Secret: When a friendly minion is attacked, summon a 3/6 Water Elemental.
flavor: As gentle as a bellyflop.

name: Whirling Combatant
text: [x]Battlecry and Frenzy: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
flavor: It's called capoeira! And yes, it is dangerous!

name: Bulk Up
text: Give a random Taunt minion in your hand +1/+1 and copy it.
flavor: "For breakfast I usually go for a couple of kodo steaks, 5 Plainstrider eggs and an ice-cold milk to wash it down… all raw."

name: Conditioning (Rank 1)
text: Give minions in your hand +1/+1. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Now drop and give me 5 Mana.

name: Warsong Envoy
text: [x]Frenzy: Gain +1 Attack for each damaged character.
flavor: "What do you mean we didn’t give the flag to the Druid?"

name: Outrider's Axe
text: After your hero attacks and kills a minion, draw a card.
flavor: "I only have to get 4 Zhevra hooves? How hard could that be?"

name: Rancor
text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to all
minions. Gain 2 Armor
for each destroyed.
flavor: Wise men say "Only fools rush in." Wise Orcs say the opposite.

name: Mor'shan Elite
text: [x]Taunt. Battlecry: If your hero attacked this turn, summon a copy of this.
flavor: "Fear not the orc who has slain a million training dummies, but the orc who keeps CAMPING MY CORPSE!"

name: Rokara
text: [x]Rush After a friendly minion attacks and survives, give it +1/+1.
flavor: "Tread carefully, but stand tall, and stand together. For strength and honor!" —Rokara

name: Lilypad Lurker
text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, transform an enemy minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
flavor: Honestly, the frog did nothing wrong.

name: Kindling Elemental
text: [x]Battlecry: The next Elemental you play costs (1) less.
flavor: Burn baby burn. Little inferno!

name: Firemancer Flurgl
text:
[x]After you play a Murloc,
deal 1 damage to
all enemies.
flavor: Diss tracks spitting straight fire.

name: Soldier's Caravan
text:
[x]At the start of your turn,
summon two 1/1
Silver Hand Recruits.
flavor: It’s a clown car… for JUSTICE!

name: Knight of Anointment
text: Battlecry: Draw a Holy spell.
flavor: "I dub thee... injured."

name: Sword of the Fallen
text: [x]After your hero attacks, cast a Secret from your deck.
flavor: Hoarding secrets is no fun, so play each and every one.

name: Northwatch Commander
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, draw a minion.
flavor: It was all going well until some Horde had the cunning idea of attacking from the south.

name: Veteran Warmedic
text: [x]After you cast a Holy spell, summon a 2/2 Medic with Lifesteal.
flavor: In times of war, warmedics bring their own medics.

name: Cannonmaster Smythe
text: Battlecry: Transform your Secrets into 3/3 Soldiers. They transform back when they die.
flavor: "Smythe, it's been a real blast serving the Alliance with you."

name: Conviction (Rank 1)
text: [x]Give a random friendly minion +3 Attack. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: It was the strength of Cariel's faith that emboldened the defenders of Northwatch that day. Although the strength of her giant hammer didn’t exactly hurt either.

name: Invigorating Sermon
text: Give +1/+1 to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavor: Every underdog sports coach knows this one.

name: Rimetongue
text: After you cast a Frost spell, summon a 1/1 Elemental that Freezes.
flavor:
Warriors are red,
Frost spells are blue,
If you're being hit by a weapon,
Rimetongue's got you.

name: Crossroads Gossiper
text: After a friendly Secret is revealed, gain +2/+2.
flavor: Not afraid to spill the tea.

name: Fury (Rank 1)
text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Rank 3 is when your mom uses your middle name.

name: Stonemaul Anchorman
text: [x]Rush Frenzy: Draw a card.
flavor: "Brug will read anything you put on the parchment prompter. Anything."

name: Cariel Roame
text: [x]Rush, Divine Shield Whenever this attacks, reduce the Cost of Holy       spells in your hand by (1).
flavor: Cariel had pledged her honor to the Alliance, but when someone matching her long-lost sister's description was sighted at the Crossroads, Cariel did the unthinkable: she abandoned her post and set out across the Barrens.

name: Grimoire of Sacrifice
text: Destroy a friendly minion. Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: "What kind of bedtime story is this?"

name: Soul Rend
text:
[x]Deal $5 damage to all
minions. Destroy a card in
your deck for each killed.
flavor: About as close to feeling guilt as a warlock's ever going to get.

name: Apothecary's Caravan
text:
[x]At the start of your turn,
summon a 1-Cost minion
from your deck.
flavor: If you won't bring out your dead, we'll bring the dead to you.

name: Altar of Fire
text: Destroy the top 3 cards of each deck.
flavor: "I now pronounce you, Crispy and Fried."

name: Imp Swarm (Rank 1)
text: Summon a 3/2 Imp. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Not a cauldron, or a mischief, or a cackle, but a swarm.

name: Kabal Outfitter
text: [x]Battlecry and Deathrattle: Give another random  friendly minion +1/+1.
flavor: Don’t ask her for feathers on your necklace though.

name: Blood Shard Bristleback
text: [x]Lifesteal. Battlecry: If your deck contains 10 or fewer cards, deal 6 damage to a minion.
flavor:
I'm bringin' bristle back (Yeah)
Those other minions don't know how to act (Yeah)
I think it's special how these crystals crack (Yeah)
So turn around and I'll give you a smack (Yeah)
(Take 'em to the Barrens)

name: Barrens Scavenger
text: [x]Taunt Costs (1) while your deck has 10 or fewer cards.
flavor: When the hundredth centaur dropped, so did her bracers.

name: Tamsin Roame
text:
[x]Whenever you cast a Shadow
spell that costs (1) or more,
add a copy to your hand
that costs (0).
flavor: In life, Tamsin Roame was one of the Alliance's most promising mages; now she is the Horde's most dangerous warlock.

name: Neeru Fireblade
text: Battlecry: If your deck is empty, open a portal that fills your board with 3/2 Imps each turn.
flavor: Look at this guy! He’s obviously evil! OBVIOUSLY!!!

name: Bob the Bartender
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose an action from the Battlegrounds!
flavor: A good bartender always knows how to stir up the conversation.
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a The Great Dark Beyond card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after opening a golden The Great Dark Beyond card pack.
targeting_arrow_text: Choose an enemy minion to add a copy of it to your hand.

name: Skaterbot
text: Magnetic Rush
flavor:
"See you later bot"
- Jaina

name: Bronze Gatekeeper
text: Magnetic Taunt
flavor: "You have my shield! And the rest of me too."

name: Goblin Bomb
text: [x]Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: They're Dr. Boom's babies. His baby boomers.

name: Bomb Toss
text: Deal $2 damage. Summon a 0/2 Goblin Bomb.
flavor: Me throw face.

name: Boommaster Flark
text: Battlecry: Summon four 0/2 Goblin Bombs.
flavor: Every good plan requires a bit of patience. And a lot of explosives.

name: Venomizer
text: Magnetic Poisonous
flavor: Keeps getting banned for toxic behavior.

name: Fireworks Tech
text: [x]Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +1/+1. If it has Deathrattle, trigger it.
flavor: She learns by trial and error.  Mostly error.

name: Necromechanic
text: Your Deathrattles trigger twice.
flavor: If at first you don't succeed, die, die again.

name: Weapons Project
text:
Each player equips a 2/3 weapon and
gains 6 Armor.
flavor: Harrison Jones was kicked off this project.

name: Rusty Recycler
text: Taunt Lifesteal
flavor: Ironic. It could recycle others, but not itself.

name: Biology Project
text: Each player gains 2 Mana Crystals.
flavor:
Step 1: Grow giant evil strawberry.
Step 2: ????
Step 3: Rule Azeroth!

name: Eternium Rover
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain 2 Armor.
flavor: He's all beeps and smiles but you're just a walking pile of armor to him.

name: Mechanical Whelp
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 7/7 Mechanical Dragon.
flavor: "Well if I didn't build the whelp and YOU didn't build the whelp…"

name: Rocket Boots
text: Give a minion Rush. Draw a card.
flavor: This is the happiest moment of Grik's life. We'll miss him.

name: The Boomship
text: Summon 3 random minions from your hand. Give them Rush.
flavor: Dr. Boom ends his motivational speeches by dropping the mechs.

name: Faithful Lumi
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +1/+1.
flavor: They're a little light-headed.

name: Toxicologist
text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
flavor: Double-majoring in culinary sciences was definitely a mistake.

name: Violet Haze
text: Add 2 random Deathrattle cards to your hand.
flavor: Elite Tauren Chieftain's next hit single.

name: Academic Espionage
text: Shuffle 10 cards from your opponent's class into your deck. They cost (1).
flavor: The tenth Pyroblast really felt like overkill.

name: Elementary Reaction
text: Draw a card. Copy it if you played an Elemental last turn.
flavor: It's just a Tempest Tantrum.

name: Unpowered Mauler
text: Can only attack if you cast a spell this turn.
flavor: After a stressful work day it really needs an outlet.

name: Eureka!
text: Summon a copy of a random minion from your hand.
flavor: Genius is 1% inspiration, and 99% drawing your Deathwing.

name: Astral Rift
text: Add 2 random minions to your hand.
flavor: Let's see what's behind rift number one!

name: Spark Drill
text: Rush Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Sparks with Rush to your hand.
flavor: Preferred weapon of Dr. Boom's orthodontist.

name: Stargazer Luna
text:
After you play the
right-most card in your hand, draw a card.
flavor: She's Dr. Boom's right-hand mage.

name: Dyn-o-matic
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all minions except Mechs.
flavor: Star player on the inter-office Boomball team.

name: Missile Launcher
text: [x]Magnetic At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other characters.
flavor: We asked, "Where do the missiles go?" and he answered, "Yes."

name: Omega Medic
text: Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, restore #10 Health to your hero.
flavor: She feels waiting for healing makes you appreciate it more.

name: Security Rover
text: [x]Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/3 Mech with Taunt.
flavor: Insecurity detected. Alerting hugbots.

name: Extra Arms
text:
[x]Give a minion +2/+2.
Add 'More Arms!' to your
hand that gives +2/+2.
flavor: All the better to hug you with!

name: Spirit Bomb
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion and your hero.
flavor: Might take a few episodes to power up.

name: Doubling Imp
text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
flavor: What's worse than finding two imps in your lab? Only finding one of them.

name: Nethersoul Buster
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each damage your hero has taken this turn.
flavor: Why did the demon cross the streams? To get to The Other Side.

name: Shrink Ray
text:
Set the Attack and Health of all minions
to 1.
flavor: Actually works by enlarging the rest of the world.

name: Crystalsmith Kangor
text: Divine Shield, Lifesteal Your healing is doubled.
flavor: He wants to tank, but Boom always makes him play support.

name: Beryllium Nullifier
text: Magnetic Elusive
flavor: Why Beryllium? Because it's hard to spell.

name: Dr. Boom, Mad Genius
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Mechs have Rush.
flavor: "Of course I've gone mad with power. Ever try going mad without it?"

name: Myra's Unstable Element
text:
Draw the rest of
your deck.
flavor: What could go wrong?

name: Myra Rotspring
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a Deathrattle minion. Also gain its Deathrattle.
flavor: On her first day on the job, Myra removed the smoke detectors.

name: The Storm Bringer
text: Transform your minions into random Legendary minions.
flavor: Finally, Electra can work from home.

name: Beakered Lightning
text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. Overload: (2)
flavor: Working in a shaman's lab, it's important to be well-grounded.

name: Spider Bomb
text: Magnetic Deathrattle: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: Wrecks a dude, any size. Catches thieves, eats those guys. Look out! Here comes a Spider Bomb!

name: Unexpected Results
text: [x]Summon two random $2-Cost minions (improved by Spell Damage).
flavor: Sometimes science is more art than science. A lot of people don’t get that.

name: Astromancer
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a random minion with Cost equal to your hand size.
flavor: All signs point to Antonidas.

name: Luna's Pocket Galaxy
text:
Change the Cost of minions in your
deck to (1).
flavor: Luna became head of the astronomy department when her boss invented the Pocket Black Hole.

name: Zerek, Master Cloner
text: Deathrattle: If you've cast any spells on this minion, resummon it.
flavor: His original name was Aerek. Then the first clone was Berek. They went evil around Merek.

name: Soul Infusion
text:
Give the
left-most minion in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: People called him a soulless monster. We're not sure this is better.

name: Piloted Reaper
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random minion from your hand that costs (2) or less.
flavor: New facial recognition systems keep out the Lorewalkers and Doomsayers.

name: Giggling Inventor
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/2 Mechs with Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: "I shall build a mighty golden paladin! And he will GREET the WORLD!"

name: Holomancer
text: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a 1/1 copy of it.
flavor: Help me, worthy opponent. You're my only hope.

name: Pogo-Hopper
text: [x]Battlecry: Gain +2/+2 for each other Pogo-Hopper you played this game.
flavor: Once you hop, you just can't stop!

name: Necrium Blade
text: Deathrattle: Trigger the Deathrattle of a random friendly minion.
flavor: Grab death by the handle.

name: Lab Recruiter
text: Battlecry: Shuffle 3 copies of a friendly minion into your deck.
flavor: Join the chemistry lab! We've got all the solutions.

name: Storm Chaser
text: Battlecry: Draw a spell from your deck that costs (5) or more.
flavor: Best drank after a stiff gale.

name: Omega Defender
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, gain +10 Attack.
flavor: "Surrender. You have 10 mana to comply."

name: Omega Assembly
text: Discover a Mech. If you have 10 Mana Crystals, keep all 3 instead.
flavor: They told Dr. Boom he could only pick one. He disagreed.

name: Spring Rocket
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.
flavor: Proper grammar would be "sprung rocket."

name: Upgradeable Framebot
flavor: *Awesome arm not included.

name: Replicating Menace
text: Magnetic Deathrattle: Summon three 1/1 Microbots.
flavor:
It's a car!
*Whomp whomp whomp*
It's a robot!
*Whomp whom-CRUNCH*
It's… three.. smaller robots!

name: Weaponized Piñata
text: Deathrattle: Add a random Legendary minion to your hand.
flavor: It'll be fine.  It's not like they have any reason to hate us.

name: Secret Plan
text: Discover a Secret.
flavor: The secret is... There is no plan!

name: Juicy Psychmelon
text:
Draw a 7, 8, 9, and
10-Cost minion
 from your deck.
flavor: It's not juicy at all. IT'S JUST MESSING WITH YOUR HEAD.

name: Supercollider
text:
[x]After you attack a minion,
force it to attack one
of its neighbors.
flavor:
Boom's Second Law of Motion:
HIT IT VERY HARD!

name: Thunderhead
text: [x]After you play a card with Overload, summon two 1/1 Sparks with Rush.
flavor: Most of his friends are still Metalheads.

name: Electra Stormsurge
text: Battlecry: Your next spell this turn casts twice.
flavor: "The coin? You used me for THE COIN!?"

name: Brainstormer
text: [x]Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each spell in your hand.
flavor: Her hair was always like that.

name: Cloakscale Chemist
text: Stealth Divine Shield
flavor: Her suit was fitted using a scale model.

name: Dendrologist
text: Battlecry: If you control a Treant, Discover a spell.
flavor: He's teaching his little buddy to talk, but all it says is, "I am Gloop."

name: Landscaping
text: Summon two 2/2 Treants.
flavor: We'll put a happy tree right here... and give him a little friend.

name: Tending Tauren
text: [x]Choose One - Give your other minions +1/+1; or Summon two 2/2 Treants.
flavor: That racial bonus to Herbalism finally paid off.

name: Dreampetal Florist
text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of a random minion in your hand by (7).
flavor: Unlike gnomes, dreampetals grow more than 3 feet tall.

name: Mecha'thun
text: [x]Deathrattle: If you have no cards in your deck, hand, and battlefield, destroy the enemy hero.
flavor: "Your software will fail. Your users will abandon you. You are already obsolete."

name: Flark's Boom-Zooka
text:
[x]Summon 3 minions from
your deck. They attack
enemy minions, then die.
flavor: It used to be a Ba-zooka but we ran out of sheep.

name: Whirliglider
text: Battlecry: Summon a 0/2 Goblin Bomb.
flavor: She's on a bomb voyage.

name: Dr. Morrigan
text: Deathrattle: Swap this with a minion from your deck.
flavor: She will NOT STOP until she gets tenure.

name: Flobbidinous Floop
text: While in your hand, this is a 3/4 copy of the last minion you played.
flavor: Of all the scientists, he has the most knowledge (when measured in volume).

name: Cloning Device
text: Discover a copy of a minion in your opponent's deck.
flavor: Zerek got sick of fighting over the remote.

name: Prismatic Lens
text: Draw a minion and a spell from your deck. Swap their Costs.
flavor: Mined exclusively from the dark side of the moon.

name: Goblin Prank
text: Give a friendly minion +3/+3 and Rush. It dies at end of turn.
flavor: "Ha ha! Glork looks ridiculous! ...Glork? Glork?"

name: Cybertech Chip
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Add a random Mech to your hand."
flavor: Goes great with Cyber-Salsa.

name: Void Analyst
text: Deathrattle: Give all Demons in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Conclusion: Nothing there.

name: Floop's Glorious Gloop
text:
Whenever a minion dies this turn, refresh
a Mana Crystal.
flavor:
How much gloop could Floop's Gloop gloop if Floop's Gloop
could gloop gloop?

name: Mecharoo
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Jo-E Bot.
flavor: Its project name was KAN-GA. The little one was R-00.

name: Crystallizer
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero. Gain 5 Armor.
flavor: This elf's winning the arms race.

name: Damaged Stegotron
text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 6 damage to this minion.
flavor: Sadly the warranty does not cover fireballs or acts of Boom.

name: Voltaic Burst
text: Summon two 1/1 Sparks with Rush. Overload: (1)
flavor: Batteries have three components: Cathode, Anode, and Overload.

name: Shooting Star
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.
flavor: Literally starstruck.

name: Gloop Sprayer
text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of each adjacent minion.
flavor:
"Are you sure that's enough gloop?"
"Hold on."

name: Necrium Vial
text: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle twice.
flavor: Two near-death experiences for the price of one!

name: Dead Ringer
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Deathrattle minion from your deck.
flavor: Shortstop on N'zoth's softball team.

name: Seaforium Bomber
