name: Holy Nova
text: Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions. Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell.  Also, you're probably a jerk.

name: Mind Control
text: Take control of an enemy minion.
flavor: Nominated as "Spell Most Likely to Make Your Opponent Punch the Wall."

name: Inner Fire
text: Change a minion's Attack to be equal to its Health.
flavor: Good idea: Buffing your minions.  Bad idea: Starting a conversation in the Barrens.

name: Holy Smite
text:
Deal $3 damage
to a minion.
flavor: It doesn't matter how pious you are.  Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

name: Mind Vision
text: Put a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand into your hand.
flavor: I see what you did there.

name: Power Word: Shield
text:
Give a minion +2 Health.
Draw a card.
flavor: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

name: Claw
text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. Gain 2 Armor.
flavor: The claw decides who will stay and who will go.

name: Healing Touch
text: Restore #8 Health.
flavor: 8 Health, no waiting.

name: Moonfire
text: Deal $1 damage.
flavor: "Cast Moonfire, and never stop." - How to Be a Druid, Chapter 5, Section 3

name: Mark of the Wild
text: Give a minion Taunt and +2/+3. (+2 Attack/+3 Health)
flavor: Not to be confused with Jim of the Wild.

name: Savage Roar
text: Give your characters +2 Attack this turn.
flavor: What do they roar? Nobody can quite tell, but it sounds like "Elephant Macho Breeze".  It's probably not that, though.

name: Swipe
text: Deal $4 damage to an enemy and $1 damage to all other enemies.
flavor: When a bear rears back and extends his arms, he's about to Swipe!  ... or hug.

name: Wild Growth
text: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavor: Grow your own mana crystals with this Mana Crystal Growth Kit, only 39.99!

name: Polymorph
text:
Transform a minion
into a 1/1 Sheep.
flavor: There was going to be a pun in this flavor text, but it just came out baa-d.

name: Arcane Intellect
text: Draw 2 cards.
flavor: Playing this card makes you SMARTER.  And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

name: Frostbolt
text: Deal $3 damage to a character and Freeze it.
flavor: It is customary to yell "Chill out!" or "Freeze!" or "Ice ice, baby!" when you play this card.

name: Arcane Explosion
text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: This spell is much better than Arcane Implosion.

name: Frost Nova
text: Freeze all enemy minions.
flavor: Hey man, that's cold.  Literally and metaphorically.

name: Mirror Image
text: Summon two 0/2 minions with Taunt.
flavor: Oh hey it's Mirror Image! !egamI rorriM s'ti yeh hO

name: Blizzard
text: Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions and Freeze them.
flavor: This spell can be very Entertaining.

name: Fireball
text: Deal $6 damage.
flavor: This spell is useful for burning things.  If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

name: Ice Lance
text: Freeze a character. If it was already Frozen, deal $4 damage instead.
flavor: The trick is not to break the lance.  Otherwise, you have "Ice Pieces."  Ice Pieces aren't as effective.

name: Flamestrike
text: Deal $5 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

name: Water Elemental
text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
flavor: Don't summon a water elemental at a party.  It'll dampen the mood.

name: Frost Shock
text: Deal $1 damage to an enemy character and Freeze it.
flavor: FROST SHOCK!

name: Ancestral Spirit
text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
flavor: It was just a flesh wound.

name: Windfury
text: Give a minion Windfury.
flavor: Windfury is like Earthfury and Firefury, but more light and airy.

name: Ancestral Healing
text: Restore a minion to full Health and give it Taunt.
flavor: I personally prefer some non-ancestral right-the-heck-now healing, but maybe that is just me.

name: Fire Elemental
text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage.
flavor: He can never take a bath. Ewww.

name: Rockbiter Weapon
text: Give a friendly character +3 Attack this turn.
flavor: This would be real handy if your enemy is made of rock.

name: Bloodlust
text: Give your minions +3 Attack this turn.
flavor: blaarghghLLGHRHARAAHAHHH!!

name: Far Sight
text: Draw a card. That card costs (3) less.
flavor: Drek'thar can't see, but he can see. You know what I mean? It's ok if you don't.

name: Shadow Bolt
text:
Deal $4 damage
to a minion.
flavor: It’s a Bolt.   It's made out of Shadow.   What more do you need to know!

name: Blood Imp
text: [x] Stealth. At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.
flavor: Imps are content to hide and viciously taunt everyone nearby.

name: Drain Life
text: Deal $2 damage. Restore #2 Health to your hero.
flavor: "I've just sucked one year of your life away."

name: Hellfire
text: Deal $3 damage to ALL characters.
flavor: It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

name: Corruption
text: Choose an enemy minion. At the start of your turn, destroy it.
flavor: It starts with stealing a pen from work, and before you know it, BOOOM!  Corrupted!

name: Dread Infernal
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to ALL other characters.
flavor: "INFERNOOOOOOOOOO!" - Jaraxxus, Eredar Lord of the Burning Legion

name: Voidwalker
text: Taunt
flavor: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.

name: Backstab
text: Deal $2 damage to an undamaged minion.
flavor: It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.

name: Cold Blood
text: Give a minion +2 Attack. Combo: +4 Attack instead.
flavor: "I'm cold blooded, check it and see!"

name: Deadly Poison
text: Give your weapon +2 Attack.
flavor: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells.  Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison?  Poison Elemental?  Nobody wants that.

name: Sinister Strike
text: Deal $3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: There's something about this strike that just feels off.  Sinister, even.

name: Assassinate
text: Destroy an enemy minion.
flavor: If you don't want to be assassinated, move to the Barrens and change your name. Good luck!

name: Sprint
text: Draw 4 cards.
flavor: Rogues are not good joggers.

name: Assassin's Blade
flavor: Guaranteed to have been owned by a real assassin.   Certificate of authenticity included.

name: Hunter's Mark
text: Change a minion's Health to 1.
flavor: Never play 'Hide and Go Seek' with a Hunter.

name: Blessing of Might
text: Give a minion +3 Attack.
flavor: "As in, you MIGHT want to get out of my way." - Toad Mackle, recently buffed.

name: Guardian of Kings
text: Taunt Battlecry: Restore #6 Health to your hero.
flavor: Holy beings from the beyond are so cliché!

name: Holy Light
text: Restore #8 Health to your hero.
flavor: If you are often bathed in Holy Light, you should consider wearing sunscreen.

name: Light's Justice
flavor: Prince Malchezaar was a collector of rare weapons. He'd animate them and have them dance for him.

name: Blessing of Kings
text: Give a minion +4/+4. (+4 Attack/+4 Health)
flavor: Given the number of kings who have been assassinated, are you sure you want their blessing?

name: Consecration
text: Deal $2 damage to all enemies.
flavor: Consecrated ground glows with Holy energy.  But it smells a little, too.

name: Hammer of Wrath
text:
Deal $3 damage.
Draw a card.
flavor: A good paladin has many tools.  Hammer of Wrath, Pliers of Vengeance, Hacksaw of Justice, etc.

name: Truesilver Champion
text: Whenever your hero attacks, restore #3 Health to it.
flavor: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)

name: Charge
text: Give a friendly minion +2 Attack and Charge.
flavor: "Guys! Guys! Slow down!" - some kind of non-warrior minion

name: Rampage
text: Give a damaged minion +3/+3.
flavor: Minion get ANGRY.   Minion SMASH!

name: Heroic Strike
text: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn.
flavor: Really, if you're a hero, this is every strike.

name: Fiery War Axe
flavor: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

name: Execute
text: Destroy a damaged enemy minion.
flavor: It's okay, he deserved it.

name: Arcanite Reaper
flavor: No… actually you should fear the Reaper.

name: Cleave
text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to
two random enemy
minions.
flavor: Hey you two…could you stand next to each other for a second…

name: Earthen Ring Farseer
text: Battlecry: Restore #3 Health.
flavor: He can see really far, and he doesn't use a telescope like those filthy pirates.

name: Magma Rager
flavor: He likes to think he is powerful, but pretty much anyone can solo Molten Core now.

name: Oasis Snapjaw
flavor: His dreams of flying and breathing fire like his idol will never be realized.

name: River Crocolisk
flavor: Edward "Lefty" Smith tried to make luggage out of a river crocolisk once.

name: Frostwolf Grunt
text: Taunt
flavor: Grunting is what his father did and his father before that.   It's more than just a job.

name: Raid Leader
text: Your other minions have +1 Attack.
flavor: "That's a 50 DKP minus!"

name: Wolfrider
text: Charge
flavor: Orcish raiders ride wolves because they are well adapted to harsh environments, and because they are soft and cuddly.

name: Ironfur Grizzly
text: Taunt
flavor: "Bear Carcass 1/10"
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked at Hunter Level 59.

name: Silverback Patriarch
text: Taunt
flavor: He likes to act like he's in charge, but the silverback matriarch actually runs things.

name: Stormwind Knight
text: Charge
flavor: They're still embarrassed about "The Deathwing Incident".

name: Ironforge Rifleman
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
flavor: "Ready! Aim! Drink!"

name: Kobold Geomancer
text: Spell Damage +1
flavor: In the old days, Kobolds were the finest candle merchants in the land. Then they got pushed too far...

name: Southsea Deckhand
text: Has Charge while you have a weapon equipped.
flavor: Pirates are into this new fad called "Planking".

name: Gnomish Inventor
text: Battlecry: Draw a card.
flavor: She's never quite sure what she's making, she just knows it's AWESOME!

name: Stormpike Commando
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.
flavor: The Stormpike Commandos are demolition experts.  They also bake a mean cupcake.

name: Silver Hand Knight

name: Archmage
text: Spell Damage +1
flavor: You earn the title of Archmage when you can destroy anyone who calls you on it.

name: Ravenholdt Assassin
text: Stealth
flavor: Just mail him a package with a name and 10,000 gold.  He'll take care of the rest.

name: Lord of the Arena
text: Taunt
flavor: He used to be a 2100+ rated arena player, but that was years ago and nobody can get him to shut up about it.

name: Murloc Raider
flavor: Mrrraggglhlhghghlgh, mrgaaag blarrghlgaahahl mrgggg glhalhah a bghhll graggmgmg Garrosh mglhlhlh mrghlhlhl!!

name: Young Dragonhawk
text: Windfury
flavor: They were the inspiration for the championship Taurenball team: The Dragonhawks.

name: Stonetusk Boar
text: Charge
flavor: This card is boaring.

name: Bloodfen Raptor
flavor: "Kill 30 raptors." - Hemet Nesingwary

name: Bluegill Warrior
text: Charge
flavor: He just wants a hug.   A sloppy... slimy... hug.

name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta
text: Taunt
flavor: Sen'jin Village is nice, if you like trolls and dust.

name: Injured Blademaster
text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to HIMSELF.
flavor: He claims it is an old war wound, but we think he just cut himself shaving.

name: Chillwind Yeti
flavor: He always dreamed of coming down from the mountains and opening a noodle shop, but he never got the nerve.

name: War Golem
flavor: Golems are not afraid, but for some reason they still run when you cast Fear on them.  Instinct, maybe?  A desire to blend in?

name: Booty Bay Bodyguard
text: Taunt
flavor: You can hire him... until someone offers him enough gold to turn on you.

name: Abusive Sergeant
text: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.
flavor: ADD ME TO YOUR DECK, MAGGOT!

name: Elven Archer
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
flavor: Don't bother asking her out on a date.  She'll shoot you down.

name: Razorfen Hunter
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Boar.
flavor: Someone did mess with Tuskerr once.  ONCE.

name: Ogre Magi
text: Spell Damage +1
flavor: Training Ogres in the art of spellcasting is a questionable decision.

name: Boulderfist Ogre
flavor: "ME HAVE GOOD STATS FOR THE COST"

name: Core Hound
flavor: You don’t tame a Core Hound. You just train it to eat someone else before it eats you.

name: Ironbeak Owl
text: Battlecry: Silence a minion.
flavor: Their wings are silent but their screech is... whatever the opposite of silent is.

name: Reckless Rocketeer
text: Charge
flavor: One Insane Rocketeer.   One Rocket full of Explosives.   Infinite Fun.

name: Spiteful Smith
text: Your weapon has +2 Attack while this is damaged.
flavor: She'll craft you a sword, but you'll need to bring her 5 Steel Ingots, 3 Motes of Earth, and the scalp of her last customer.

name: Stormwind Champion
text: Your other minions have +1/+1.
flavor: When Deathwing assaulted the capital, this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive. Now he's all bitter and stuff.

name: Frostwolf Warlord
text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly minion on the battlefield.
flavor: The Frostwolves are locked in combat with the Stormpike Expedition over control of Alterac Valley.  Every attempt at peace-talks has ended with Captain Galvangar killing the mediator.

name: Venture Co. Mercenary
text: Your minions cost (3) more.
flavor: No Job is too big.  No fee is too big.

name: Wisp
flavor: If you hit an Eredar Lord with enough Wisps, it will explode.   But why?

name: Ironbark Protector
text: Taunt
flavor: I dare you to attack Darnassus.

name: Blade Flurry
text: Destroy your weapon and deal its damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: "Look, it's not just about waving daggers around really fast.  It's a lot more complicated than that." - Shan, Rogue Trainer

name: Shadow Word: Pain
text: Destroy a minion with 3 or less Attack.
flavor: A step up from a spell cast by many beginning acolytes: "Shadow Word: Annoy".

name: Northshire Cleric
text: Whenever a minion is healed, draw a card.
flavor: They help the downtrodden and distressed.  Also they sell cookies.

name: Divine Spirit
text: Double a minion's Health.
flavor: Double the trouble. Double the fun!

name: Starving Buzzard
text: Whenever you summon a Beast, draw a card.
flavor: If you feed him, he loses his whole identity.

name: Aegwynn, the Guardian
text: Spell Damage +2 Deathrattle: The next minion you draw inherits these powers.
flavor: With Medivh as her son, nothing YOU do could ever disappoint her.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked after winning 500 games as Mage.

name: Ritual of Doom
text:
Destroy a friendly minion. If you had 5 or more, summon a
5/5 Demon.
flavor: "Who wants to sing the Doom song?!"

name: Felsoul Jailer
text: [x]Battlecry: Your opponent discards a minion. Deathrattle: Return it.
flavor: He can lock 'em up, but he just can't keep 'em.

name: Vanessa VanCleef
text: Combo: Add a copy of the last card your opponent played to your hand.
flavor: Some people collect stamps or flowers. She collects enemies.

name: Novice Zapper
text: Spell Damage +1 Overload: (1)
flavor: The novices would prefer that he did not.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Shaman.

name: Bloodsail Deckhand
text: [x]Battlecry: The next weapon you play costs (1) less.
flavor: Piracy is technically a discount.

name: War Cache
text: Add a random Warrior minion, spell, and weapon to your hand.
flavor: It's much tidier than Illidan's storage locker.

name: Nordrassil Druid
text: Battlecry: The next spell you cast this turn costs (3) less.
flavor: The World Tree Nordrassil provides life-giving energy to the world--and excellent mana savings.

name: Shadowed Spirit
text: [x]Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: They can't all be grim grinning ghosts.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Priest.

name: Crimson Clergy
text: Overheal: Draw a card.
flavor: He won't drop the ball.

name: Selective Breeder
text: Battlecry: Discover a copy of a Beast in your deck.
flavor: His ethics are top notch. Just look at that smiling kitty!
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Hunter.

name: Reckoning
text: Secret: After an enemy minion deals 3 or more damage, destroy it.
flavor: He would henceforth be known as "Karmerr, the Doom of Kazzak."

name: Gan'arg Glaivesmith
text: Outcast: Give your hero +3 Attack this turn.
flavor: When isolation becomes motivation.
how_to_earn: Unlocked with the Demon Hunter class.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Demon Hunter.

name: Kor'vas Bloodthorn
text: [x]Charge, Lifesteal After you play a card with Outcast, return this to your hand.
flavor: Illidan taught her that demon hunters should sacrifice EVERYTHING… but she still brought Lifesteal just in case.

name: Illidari Inquisitor
text: Rush. After your hero attacks an enemy, this attacks it too.
flavor: Armed with fear, big eyes, ruthless efficiency, almost fanatical devotion to your hero, and nice brown robes.
how_to_earn: Unlocked with the Demon Hunter class.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Demon Hunter.

name: Enslaved Fel Lord
text: Taunt. Also damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.
flavor: He's not really chained up. He just wears that to scare the imps when they get too unruly.

name: Fogsail Freebooter
text: Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, deal 2 damage.
flavor: Goes cheap on wardrobe so he can spend on weaponry.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked after 1000 total wins.

name: Taelan Fordring
text: [x]Taunt, Divine Shield Deathrattle: Draw your highest Cost minion.
flavor: After growing up with the Scarlet Crusade for most of his life, Taelan finally realized they were maybe not the nicest people.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked after 5000 total wins.

name: Overlord Runthak
text: [x]Rush. Whenever this attacks, give +1/+1 to all minions in your hand.
flavor: Knows how to lift everyone up while tearing every enemy down.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked after 5000 total wins.

name: Focused Will
text: Silence a minion, then give it +3 Health.
flavor: Extreme focus is almost as effective as a really flashy distraction.

name: Thrive in the Shadows
text: Discover a spell from your deck.
flavor: Why would your spells be afraid of the dark? It's easier to nap there.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Priest.

name: Pursuit of Justice
text: Give +1 Attack to Silver Hand Recruits you summon this game.
flavor: "Is this about justice or just us?"

name: Warsong Outrider
text: Rush
flavor: When it comes to the Warsong clan, outriders are the insiders.

name: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a character. If it's friendly, restore 8 Health. If it's an    enemy, deal 8 damage.
flavor: Friendly Fire: Off
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked after 5000 total wins.

name: Onyxia the Broodmother
text: At the end of each turn, fill your board with 1/1 Whelps.
flavor: Throw more dots, throw more dots, more dots, more dots!
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked after 5000 total wins.

name: Ysera the Dreamer
text: Battlecry: Add one of each Dream card to your hand.
flavor: Quick! Quick! Write it down before you forget them all!
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked after 5000 total wins.

name: Malygos the Spellweaver
text: Battlecry: Draw spells until your hand is full.
flavor: After many years, Malygos has decided mortals can use magic. ALL THE MAGIC!
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked after 5000 total wins.

name: Nozdormu the Eternal
text: [x]Start of Game: If this is in BOTH players' decks, turns  are only 15 seconds long.
flavor: Live life in the fast lane. As long as your opponent does too.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked after 5000 total wins.

name: Deathwing the Destroyer
text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions. Discard a card for each destroyed.
flavor: "He’s Deathwing? That one's Deathwing? You're Deathwing!? I'm DEATHWING! ARE THERE ANY OTHER DEATHWINGS I SHOULD KNOW ABOUT?"
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked after 5000 total wins.

name: Emerald Skytalon
text: Rush
flavor: Sworn protectors of Ysera at the Emerald Dragonshrine, these majestic owls have been touched by the powers of the Emerald Dream, taking on an almost crystalline appearance.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked after 500 total wins.

name: Redgill Razorjaw
text: Rush
flavor: One fish, two fish, red fish replaces blue fish.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked after 500 total wins.

name: Rafaam's Scheme
text: Summon 1 1/1 Imp. (Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: "When your first plan fails... imp-rovise."

name: Dr. Boom's Scheme
text: Gain 1 Armor. (Upgrades each turn!)
flavor:
“We did it! We blew up the vault!”
“You mean the vault door?”
“Oh. The doooor…”

name: Hagatha's Scheme
text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. (Upgrades each turn!)
flavor:
"All shall suffer!"
"But Hagatha, those are your minions..."
"I said ALL!!!"

name: Togwaggle's Scheme
text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 1 copy of it into your deck. (Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: "Many minions equals many treasures for king. Kobold arithmetic!"

name: Lazul's Scheme
text: Reduce the Attack of an enemy minion by 1 until your next turn. (Upgrades each turn!)
flavor:
"What's that you're dreaming?
You're weak and you're screaming!
It must be my scheming..."

name: Shadowy Figure
text: Battlecry: Transform into a 2/2 copy of a friendly Deathrattle minion.
flavor: Terrible at shadow puppets: “This is… a tentacle! And this is… two tentacles!”

name: Convincing Infiltrator
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: It’s always nice to steal a familiar face.

name: Hench-Clan Shadequill
text: Deathrattle: Restore 5 Health to the enemy hero.
flavor: The Hench-Clan has a point.

name: Walking Fountain
text: Lifesteal, Rush, Windfury
flavor: The weirdest part is that it doesn't have legs.

name: Underbelly Angler
text: After you play a Murloc, add a random Murloc to your hand.
flavor: Attracts murlocs… and moths.

name: Muckmorpher
text: [x]Battlecry: Transform into a 4/4 copy of a different minion in your deck.
flavor: Fan favorite in the muck morphin' sewer strangers.

name: Hecklebot
text: Taunt Battlecry: Your opponent summons a minion from their deck.
flavor: Built by goblins, designed by a troll.

name: Dimensional Ripper
text: Summon 2 copies of a minion in your deck.
flavor:
The first dimensional ripper had a point.
The second fell flat.
The THIRD one really started to take shape!

name: Clockwork Goblin
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle a Bomb into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 5 damage.
flavor: They always wind up bombing.

name: Sweeping Strikes
text: Give a minion "Also damages minions next to whomever this attacks."
flavor: Infinitely preferable to mopping strikes.

name: Wrenchcalibur
text: After your hero attacks, shuffle a Bomb into your [x]opponent's deck.
flavor: Whoso pulleth out this wrench from the toolbox is rightwise king of the lab.

name: Blastmaster Boom
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Boom Bots for each Bomb in your opponent's deck.
flavor: He's gonna fly through the air with the greatest of grease.

name: Unsleeping Soul
text: Silence a friendly minion, then summon a copy of it.
flavor: It's 3 am. Do you know where your soul is?

name: The Boom Reaver
text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of a minion in your deck. Give it Rush.
flavor: “What’s better than reaving? BOOM reaving!”

name: Mutate
text: Transform a friendly minion into a random one that costs (1) more.
flavor: You'll get the transformation you want when murlocs fly.

name: Toxfin
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Murloc Poisonous.
flavor: I'm addicted to him, but I know that he's Toxfin.

name: Traveling Healer
text: [x]Divine Shield Battlecry: Restore #3 Health.
flavor: Some heroes have soft hearts and hard shells.

name: Spellward Jeweler
text: Battlecry: Your hero is Elusive until next turn.
flavor: The fanciest possible way of distracting enemies with shiny things.

name: Dalaran Crusader
text: Divine Shield
flavor: Stops for nothing—except donuts.

name: Sunreaver Spy
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, gain +1/+1.
flavor: She's watching. Always watching.

name: Hench-Clan Hag
text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Amalgams with all minion types.
flavor: The Hench Clan is an equal opportunity employer, no matter which parts of you came from where.

name: Safeguard
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 0/5 Vault Safe with Taunt.
flavor: Keep it secret. Keep it safeguarded!

name: Spellbook Binder
text: Battlecry: If you have Spell Damage, draw a card.
flavor: You're bound to love his work!

name: Hench-Clan Sneak
text: Stealth
flavor: He’d be a lot sneakier if he wasn’t trailing 300 yards of power cable…

name: Arcane Servant
flavor: "Would sir like me to punch something?"

name: Violet Spellsword
text: [x]Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each spell in your hand.
flavor: If you have to wield a spell and a sword, then neither is performing to expectation.

name: Violet Warden
text: Taunt Spell Damage +1
flavor: He's got magic, a shield, and an unwavering obsession with the color purple.

name: Desperate Measures
text: Twinspell Cast a random Paladin Secret.
flavor: Desperate times call for disparate secrets.

name: Bronze Herald
text: Deathrattle: Add two 4/4 Dragons to your hand.
flavor: This is why you shouldn’t shoot the messenger.

name: Dragon Speaker
text: Battlecry: Give all Dragons in your hand +3/+3.
flavor: All of his speeches really drag on.

name: Messenger Raven
text: Battlecry: Discover a Mage minion.
flavor: You can make a collect CAW!

name: Darkest Hour
text: Destroy all friendly minions. For each one, summon a random minion from your deck.
flavor: It's always darkest just before you find the light switch.

name: Conjurer's Calling
text: Twinspell Destroy a minion. Summon 2 minions of the same Cost to replace it.
flavor: If only you’d let it go to voicemail…

name: Magic Dart Frog
text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor: There's a powerful throat in this frog.

name: Aranasi Broodmother
text: [x]Taunt When you draw this, restore #4 Health to your hero.
flavor: She's got a big brood and a big mood.

name: The Forest's Aid
text: Twinspell Summon five 2/2 Treants.
flavor: Delicious Forest’s Aid! Made from real forests.

name: Crystal Power
text: Choose One - Deal $2 damage to a minion; or Restore #5 Health.
flavor: Often used as healing crystals, but also good for throwing at people.

name: Blessing of the Ancients
text: Twinspell Give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: Arguably the cutest blessing.

name: Crystalsong Portal
text: Discover a Druid minion. If your hand has no minions, keep all 3 instead.
flavor: Experience the draw of the wild!

name: Acornbearer
text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Squirrels to your hand.
flavor: You’d be nuts to mess with the squirrel squad.

name: Lifeweaver
text: Whenever you restore Health, add a random Druid spell to your hand.
flavor: Lifeweaving is all well and good until it's time to cut the thread.

name: Lucentbark
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Go Dormant. Restore 5 Health to awaken this minion.
flavor: Always feels refreshed after a little dirt nap.

name: Unidentified Contract
text: Destroy a minion. Gains a bonus effect in your hand.
flavor: The terms of service are constantly changing.

name: Marked Shot
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. Discover a spell.
flavor: Obviously it's marked for greatness.

name: Arcane Fletcher
text:
[x]Whenever you play a
1-Cost minion, draw a
spell from your deck.
flavor: Stop trying to make fletch happen. It's not going to happen.

name: Rapid Fire
text: Twinspell Deal $2 damage.
flavor: Pew! Pew!

name: Oblivitron
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a Mech from your hand and trigger its Deathrattle.
flavor: Reduce, reuse, re-rattle!

name: Nine Lives
text: Discover a friendly Deathrattle minion that died this game. Also trigger its Deathrattle.
flavor: Beware the night of the living pets!

name: Unleash the Beast
text: Twinspell Summon a 5/5 Wyvern with Rush.
flavor: The Kirin Tor have always been lax in enforcing leash laws.

name: Vereesa Windrunner
text: Battlecry: Equip Thori'dal, the Stars' Fury.
flavor: Good things come in threes: Windrunner sisters and arrows of Thori'dal.

name: EVIL Cable Rat
text: Battlecry: Add a Lackey to your hand.
flavor: Gradually driven to darkness by the promise of unobtainable cheese.

name: EVIL Conscripter
text: Deathrattle: Add a Lackey to your hand.
flavor:
Kobold! There’s a place you can handle
I said kobold! When you’re short in the candle
Cast a spell with the E! V! I! L!

name: EVIL Miscreant
text: Combo: Add two random Lackeys to your hand.
flavor: Because there are no G.O.O.D. Miscreants.

name: Hench-Clan Burglar
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from another class.
flavor: She’s more of a rat burglar.

name: Heistbaron Togwaggle
text: Battlecry: If you control a Lackey, choose a fantastic treasure.
flavor: A staunch ally of Rafaam, at least while the shinies keep flowing.

name: Arch-Villain Rafaam
text: Taunt Battlecry: Replace your hand and deck with Legendary minions.
flavor: Minions must wash hands before being LIQUIDATED AND REPLACED BY SOMEONE BETTER.

name: Swampqueen Hagatha
text: [x]Battlecry: Add a 5/5 Horror to your hand. Teach it two Shaman spells.
flavor: Rafaam mainly enjoys working with Hagatha because she never laughs at Dr. Boom's jokes.

name: Witch's Brew
text: Restore #4 Health. Repeatable this turn.
flavor: The swill has eyes!

name: Sludge Slurper
text: Battlecry: Add a Lackey to your hand. Overload: (1)
flavor: You can't stop slurping this delicious sludge!

name: Arcane Watcher
text: Can't attack unless you have Spell Damage.
flavor: Now his watch has ended… until you have Spell Damage.

name: Unseen Saboteur
text: Battlecry: Your opponent casts a random spell from their hand (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: Far more effective than the flamboyant saboteur.

name: Sunreaver Warmage
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, deal 4 damage.
flavor: What, did you expect the Sunreavers to be coldages?

name: Potion Vendor
text: Battlecry: Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: Everyone gets two because that’s all she can hold.

name: Barista Lynchen
text: Battlecry: Add a copy of each of your other Battlecry minions to your hand.
flavor: "Thanks a latte!"

name: Azerite Elemental
text: At the start of your turn, gain Spell Damage +2.
flavor: This is some bad blood.

name: Underbelly Ooze
text: After this minion survives damage, summon a copy of it.
flavor: It's always accepting of the less successful adventurers.

name: Proud Defender
text: Taunt Has +2 Attack while you [x]have no other minions.
flavor: It'll take a humble offender to defeat him.

name: Big Bad Archmage
text:
At the end of your turn, summon a random
6-Cost minion.
flavor: "My, my, what big minions I have!"

name: Chef Nomi
text: Battlecry: If your deck is empty, summon six 6/6 Greasefire Elementals.
flavor: His cooking is always very well done.

name: Archmage Vargoth
text: [x]At the end of your turn, cast a spell you've cast this turn (targets are random).
flavor: He's an archmage, but he might want to brush up on the basics... like aiming.

name: Heroic Innkeeper
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +2/+2 for each other friendly minion.
flavor: We reserve the right to refuse service to any 1/1.

name: Jumbo Imp
text: Costs (1) less whenever a friendly Demon dies while this is in your hand.
flavor: Jumbo in size! Huge in E.V.I.L.!

name: Eager Underling
text: Deathrattle: Give two random friendly minions +2/+2.
flavor: Eager to please, even if it kills him.

name: Portal Overfiend
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/2 Demon with Rush.
flavor: It’s like an interdimensional game of demon tag.

name: Eccentric Scribe
text: Deathrattle: Summon four 1/1 Vengeful Scrolls.
flavor: Them’s fightin’ words!

name: Lightforged Blessing
text: Twinspell Give a friendly minion Lifesteal.
flavor: Some might call this a lightforgery.

name: Never Surrender!
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, give your minions +2 Health.
flavor: But sometimes concede.

name: Mysterious Blade
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: It knows every secret you have left.

name: Commander Rhyssa
text: Your Secrets trigger twice.
flavor: Two people can keep a secret as long as neither of them are Commander Rhyssa.

name: Khadgar
text: Your cards that summon minions summon twice as many.
flavor: "What do you call two minions summoned at once? Twinions, haha! Wait... where are you going?"

name: Kirin Tor Tricaster
text: Spell Damage +3 Your spells cost (1) more.
flavor: The math checks out!

name: Ray of Frost
text: Twinspell Freeze a minion. If it's already Frozen, deal $2 damage to it.
flavor: If you have zero chill, this can help.

name: Power of Creation
text: Discover a 6-Cost minion. Summon two copies of it.
flavor: Mostly used for party tricks, to be honest.

name: Nozari
text: Battlecry: Restore both heroes to full Health.
flavor: In another timeline, she was called Yeszari.

name: Portal Keeper
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/2 Demon with Rush.
flavor: No longer allowed to be “it” when playing demon tag.

name: Shimmerfly
text: Deathrattle: Add a random Hunter spell to your hand.
flavor: Plenty of buzz around this card.

name: Hunting Party
text: Copy all Beasts in your hand.
flavor: Not sure I’d call it a good party if everyone ends up beside themselves.

name: Batterhead
text: Rush. After this attacks and kills a minion, it may attack again.
flavor: When it comes to problem-solving, he always uses his head.

name: Plot Twist
text:
Shuffle your hand
into your deck.
Draw that many cards.
flavor: It’s coming from inside the deck!

name: Mana Cyclone
text: [x]Battlecry: For each spell you've cast this turn, add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavor: It'll put a good spin on your spells.

name: Ursatron
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Mech from your deck.
flavor: It's been programmed to include all the bear necessities.

name: Impferno
text: Give your Demons +1 Attack. Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Imps don't get mad when you set them on fire. They think it's cozy.

name: EVIL Genius
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion to add 2 random Lackeys to your hand.
flavor: You do not want to be on the business end of this intellect!

name: Fel Lord Betrug
text: [x]Whenever you draw a minion, summon a copy with Rush that dies at end of turn.
flavor: Nobody else likes rush hour.

name: Magic Trick
text: Discover a spell that costs (3) or less.
flavor: The world is not ready for an illusion of this depth and intricacy!

name: Kalecgos
text: Your first spell each turn costs (0). Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavor: He was once the Aspect of Magic but gave it up to focus on cheap tricks.

name: Soul of the Murloc
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Murloc."
flavor: Previously thought nonexistent.

name: Underbelly Fence
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a card from another class,  gain +1/+1 and Rush.
flavor: She’ll take anything you have—except scruples and a good work ethic.

name: Vendetta
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. Costs (0) if you're holding a card from another class.
flavor: A vengeful and vicarious vanguard against violent villains or vexed victims.

name: Tak Nozwhisker
text:
[x]Whenever you shuffle a
card into your deck, add
a copy to your hand.
flavor: "One for me and one for future me!"

name: Waggle Pick
text: [x]Deathrattle: Return a random friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.
flavor: Kobolds informally refer to its effect as a deathwaggle.

name: Catrina Muerte
text: At the end of your turn, resurrect another friendly Undead minion.
flavor: She always manages to lift your spirits.

name: Forbidden Words
text:
[x]Spend all your Mana.
Destroy a minion with that
much Attack or less.
flavor: Please confirm your age before reading this flavor text.

name: Mass Resurrection
text:
Summon 3 friendly minions that died
this game.
flavor: One's company, two's a crowd, and three's a “mass” resurrection, apparently.

name: Scargil
text: Your Murlocs cost (1).
flavor: Wanna know how he got those scars? So does he.

name: Call to Adventure
text: Draw the lowest Cost minion from your deck. Give it +2/+2.
flavor: Even the smallest minion can change the outcome of the game.

name: Daring Escape
text: Return all friendly minions to your hand.
flavor: Impossible to cast without cackling evilly.

name: Madame Lazul
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a copy of a card in your opponent's hand.
flavor: Of course she knows the future, she’s been looking at your cards the WHOLE TIME!

name: Duel!
text:
Summon a minion from each player's deck.
They fight!
flavor: If you don’t fight to the death, it’s Duel Yielding.

name: Keeper Stalladris
text: After you cast a Choose One spell, add copies of both choices to your hand.
flavor: Keeps your choices handy.

name: Dreamway Guardians
text: Summon two 1/2 Dryads with Lifesteal.
flavor: They're a nightmare to deal with.

name: Dalaran Librarian
text: Battlecry: Silence adjacent minions.
flavor: Don't make her raise her "shush"!

name: Archivist Elysiana
text: Battlecry: Discover 5 cards. Replace your deck with 2 copies of each.
flavor: Your deck is just another organizational challenge to her.

name: Whirlwind Tempest
text: Your minions with Windfury have Mega-Windfury.
flavor: And your minions with mega-windfury get... dizzy.

name: Hench-Clan Hogsteed
text: Rush Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Murloc.
flavor: This is CLEARLY their first rodeo.

name: Faceless Rager
text: Battlecry: Copy a friendly minion's Health.
flavor: When you need to rage anonymously.

name: Flight Master
text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2 Gryphon for each player.
flavor: Your gryphon will be summoned following a brief safety demonstration.

name: Mana Reservoir
text: Spell Damage +1
flavor: If it soaks too long, it becomes a reservoir hog.

name: Recurring Villain
text: Deathrattle: If this minion has 4 or more Attack, resummon it.
flavor: Mwahahaha! You'll never catch him this time!

name: Mad Summoner
text: [x]Battlecry: Fill each player's board with 1/1 Imps.
flavor: Does he summon because of his madness, or is he mad from all the summoning?

name: Jepetto Joybuzz
text: Battlecry: Draw 2 minions from your deck. Set their Attack, Health, and Cost to 1.
flavor: “I’m a real toy now!”

name: Vicious Scraphound
text:
Whenever this minion
deals damage, gain that much Armor.
flavor: It begs for scraps.

name: Burly Shovelfist
text: Rush
flavor: Shovel beats paper and rock!

name: Improve Morale
text: [x]Deal $1 damage to a minion. If it survives, add a Lackey to your hand.
flavor: "The beatings will continue until MY morale improves."

name: Omega Devastator
text: [x]Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, deal 10 damage to a minion.
flavor: The Alpha Devastator didn’t devastate enough. The Beta Devastator devastated too much. But the Omega was just right!

name: Soldier of Fortune
text: Whenever this minion attacks, give your opponent a Coin.
flavor: His allies call him invaluable.

name: Magic Carpet
text: After you play a 1-Cost minion, give it +1 Attack and Rush.
flavor: Its small yet fierce riders are affectionately known as rug rats.

name: Exotic Mountseller
text:
Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random
3-Cost Beast.
flavor: *Taps roof of mammoth* “You can fit so many squirrels in this thing!”

name: Tunnel Blaster
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to all minions.
flavor: And you always thought they wore the candles just for fun.

name: Crystal Stag
text: Rush. Battlecry: If you've restored 5 Health this game, summon a copy of this.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: Arrives alone, but usually leaves with a friend just like him.

name: Zayle, Shadow Cloak
text: You start the game with one of Zayle's EVIL Decks!
flavor: E.V.I.L. is the new black.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked by owning all The Dalaran Heist chapters.

name: Druid of the Reef
text: [x]Choose One - Transform into a 3/1 Shark with Rush; or a 1/3 Turtle with Taunt.
flavor: “Wow, there’s a whole sunken city down here!”

name: Moonlit Guidance
text: [x]Discover a copy of a card in your deck. If you play it this turn, draw the original.
flavor: Guff always makes the best decisions after 2 AM.

name: Jerry Rig Carpenter
text: Battlecry: Draw a Choose One spell and split it.
flavor: Choose Two – Good; Cheap; or Fast.

name: Blackwater Cutlass
text: [x]Tradeable After you Trade this, reduce the Cost of a spell in your hand by (1).
flavor: Popular around Stormwind for slashing prices.

name: Parrrley
text: Swap this for a card in your opponent's deck.
flavor: Time to engage in some unfriendly negotiations.

name: Mr. Smite
text: Your Pirates have Charge.
flavor: “Please, Mr. Smite was my father. Call me Yorik.”

name: Defias Blastfisher
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy. Repeat for each of your Beasts.
flavor: She's a dynamite fishing trainer.

name: Monstrous Parrot
text: Battlecry: Get a copy of the last friendly Deathrattle minion that died.
flavor: What kind of crackers are you feeding that thing?

name: Doggie Biscuit
text: [x]Tradeable Give a minion +2/+3. After you Trade this, give a friendly minion Rush.
flavor: Reserved for Edwin’s favorite lapdogs.

name: Wealth Redistributor
text: [x]Taunt. Battlecry: Swap the Attack of the highest and lowest Attack minion.
flavor:
WOULD YE LIKE CASH BACK?
[  ] YAR HAR        [  ] YO HO

name: Sunwing Squawker
text: [x]Battlecry: Repeat the last spell you've cast on a   friendly minion on this.
flavor: Most parrots repeat curses, not blessings.

name: Righteous Defense
text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 1. Give the stats it lost to a minion in your hand.
flavor: Paladins... Always stealing someone else’s thunder. And stats.

name: Shadowblade Slinger
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've taken damage this turn, deal that  much to an enemy minion.
flavor: Throwing knives isn’t easy for a warlock. It’s quite painful, in fact.
targeting_arrow_text: Deal damage to an enemy minion.

name: Wicked Shipment
text: [x]Tradeable Summon 2 1/1 Imps. (Upgrades by 2 when Traded!)
flavor: All horns on deck!

name: Hullbreaker
text: [x]Battlecry and Deathrattle: Draw a spell. Your hero takes damage equal to its Cost.
flavor: Breaks through the hard shell to reach the ship's gooey interior.

name: Need for Greed
text: Tradeable Draw 3 cards. If drawn this turn, this costs (3).
flavor: Sorry guys, I TOTALLY meant to click greed.

name: Crow's Nest Lookout
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to the left and right-most enemy minions.
flavor: The extra eyes means he sees extra good.

name: Proving Grounds
text:
Summon two minions from your deck.
They fight!
flavor: 1v1 me on Proving Grounds, DH only, no items, 4 stocks.

name: Brilliant Macaw
text: Battlecry: Repeat the last Battlecry you played.
flavor: He's been repeating the same shanty for a month. Four pirates walked the plank last week. Middle of the ocean, just walked right off.

name: Edwin, Defias Kingpin
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a card. If you play it this turn, gain +2/+2 and repeat this effect.
flavor: He’s not going to tear down the walls of Stormwind sitting around in the Hall of Fame.

name: Suckerhook
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
transform your weapon into
one that costs (1) more.
flavor: A moderately better dining companion than Suckerbeard.

name: Amulet of Undying
text: [x]Tradeable Resurrect 1 friendly Deathrattle minion. (Upgrades when Traded!)
flavor: Didn't seem to work out too well for this guy.

name: Defias Leper
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a Shadow spell, deal 2 damage.
flavor: Do NOT eat Cookie’s Seafood Surprise.

name: Copycat
text: Battlecry: Add a copy of the next card your opponent plays to your hand.
flavor: Whatever you do, DON’T let two of them meet.

name: Grey Sage Parrot
text: Battlecry: Repeat the last spell you've cast that costs (6) or more.
flavor: Nothing is more terrifying than a parrot squawking "Pyroblast!"

name: Deepwater Evoker
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a spell. Gain Armor equal to its Cost.
flavor: "Cap'n! We've hit an iceberg! ...No, it’s not my fault!"

name: Arcane Overflow
text:
[x]Deal $8 damage to an
enemy minion. Summon a
 Remnant with stats equal
to the excess damage.
flavor: On this ship, when you can’t use an int, learn how to float.

name: Man the Cannons
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion and $1 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Now THAT’S a lotta splash damage!

name: Defias Cannoneer
text:
[x]After your hero attacks,
deal 2 damage to a
random enemy twice.
flavor: "... three."

name: Maddest Bomber
text: Battlecry: Deal 12 damage randomly split among all other characters.
flavor: Talk about a name that limits design space.

name: Cookie the Cook
text: [x]Lifesteal Deathrattle: Equip a 2/3   Stirring Rod with Lifesteal.
flavor: Unsurprisingly, "Seafood Surprise" was no one's favorite dish.

name: Golakka Glutton
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Beast and gain +1/+1.
flavor: We lost our last cook to one of these.

name: Multicaster
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a card for  each different spell school   you've cast this game.@ (@)
flavor: Has a questionable talent tree.

name: Goliath, Sneed's Masterpiece
text: [x]Battlecry: Fire five rockets at enemy minions that deal 2 damage each. (You pick the targets!)
flavor: “Listen, this baby has blades, rockets, and rocket blades. Only thing it doesn’t have is good gas mileage.”

name: Blacksmithing Hammer
text: [x]Tradeable After you Trade this,  gain +2 Durability.
flavor: Passed through the hands of countless smiths, and eventually the skulls of their enemies.

name: Summoning Ward
text: [x]Secret: When your turn starts, summon a copy of your highest Cost minion.
flavor: You couldn't handle one Snowflipper Penguin. So what hope do you have… against two?!

name: Mismatched Fossils
text: Discover a Beast and an Undead. Swap their stats.
flavor: Whoever put these fossils together must be really careless.

name: Elemental Companion
text: Summon a random Elemental Companion.
flavor: Always Hiffar.

name: Shimmer Shot
text: Deal $1 damage. Summon a random minion of that Cost.
flavor: I hope I don't jinx the outcome.

name: Mantle Shaper
text:
Costs (1) less for
each spell you've cast while holding this.
flavor: You got a fireplace? I've got a guy who shapes mantles.

name: Obsidian Revenant
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon two random Deathrattle minions that cost (3) or less.
flavor: What is this? A Reven for Ants?!

name: Stone Drake
text: Divine Shield, Taunt, Lifesteal, Elusive
flavor: "I am the great Stone Drake - good morning!"

name: Sir Finley, the Intrepid
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Excavated twice, transform all enemy minions into 1/1 Murlocs.
flavor: And exactly how does Finley turn everyone into a murloc?

name: Needlerock Totem
text:
At the end of your turn, gain 2 Armor and
draw a card.
flavor: You put the Needlerock in to get the Bloodrock out.

name: Digging Straight Down
text: Deal $8 damage to a minion. Excavate a treasure.
flavor: You only make this mistake once.

name: Aftershocks
text: Deal $1 damage to all minions, three times. Costs (2) less if you cast a spell last turn.
flavor: They look shocked right now!

name: Burning Heart
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it survives, give your hero +3 Attack this turn.
flavor: A 100% ethically sourced fire elemental heart is very hard to come by. This one definitely wasn't.

name: Shadestone Skulker
text: [x]Rush. Battlecry: Take your  weapon and gain its stats.  Deathrattle: Give it back.
flavor: Sharing is caring - and they don't care.

name: Fel Fissure
text: Deal $2 damage to all minions. At the start of your next turn, deal $2 more damage to all minions.
flavor: This will clear the board, I'm fisSURE of it!

name: Quick Pick
text: After your hero attacks, draw a card.
flavor: QUICK! Pick which quick pick trick will stick in the thick of the wick! Lickety split!

name: Prosthetic Hand
text: Magnetic, Reborn Can Magnetize to Mechs or Undead.
flavor: It's creaky and it's rusty! It's spooky and it's dusty!

name: Quartzite Crusher
text: Lifesteal. Freeze any character damaged by your hero.
flavor: It's not just a weapon… it's a rock!

name: Mining Casualties
text: Summon two 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits with "Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Frail Ghoul".
flavor: They'll be fiiiiiiiiine.

name: Shroomscavate
text: Give a minion Divine Shield. Excavate a treasure.
flavor: As Globb shroominated on his situation, toiling endlessly in the mushroom mines, he came to the startling realization. His boss wasn't a very fun guy.

name: Crimson Expanse
text: [x]Choose a damaged minion. Summon a copy of it that goes Dormant for one turn.
flavor: Idk. Looks pink to me.

name: Deepminer Brann
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck started with no duplicates, your Battlecries trigger twice for the rest of the game.
flavor: This is a very on-brannd effect.

name: Shadow Word: Steal
text: Return an enemy minion to YOUR hand.
flavor: Anduin will literally take your stuff and say it's a Shadow Word.

name: Fool's Gold
text: Get a random Golden Pirate and Elemental from other classes.
flavor: Worth its weight in rocks.

name: Hidden Gem
text: Stealth At the end of your turn, restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: This will be a staple in Unicorn Priest.

name: Glowstone Gyreworm
text: [x]Lifesteal Quickdraw: Deal 5 damage. Forge: Change Quickdraw to Battlecry.
flavor: Believe it or not, this is Tram Conductor Gerry's Gyreworm. But is it pronounced Gerry's Gyreworm, Gerry's Gyreworm, Gerry's Gyreworm, or Gerry's Gyreworm?

name: Shattered Reflections
text:
[x]Choose a minion.
Add a copy to your hand,
deck, and battlefield.
flavor: Get mad at your mirror once, see Shattered Reflections forever :(

name: Pendant of Earth
text: [x]Discover a minion from your deck. Restore Health to your hero equal to its Cost.
flavor: Eaaaarrrrthhhhhh Pendaaaannnttttt Poweeerrrrrrrrrrr!!!!!!!!

name: Gloomstone Guardian
text: [x]Taunt. Choose One - Discard 2 cards; or Destroy one of your Mana Crystals. Forge: Do NEITHER.
flavor: From the same people who brought you Choose One, and Choose Twice, comes the exciting prequel: Choose NEITHER!

name: Crystal Cluster
text: Gain three empty Mana Crystals. Any that can't fit summon a 3/7 Elemental with Taunt.
flavor: And if you can't fit any of the Elementals… do better.

name: Trogg Gemtosser
text: Finale: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy for each of your Mana Crystals.
flavor: Oh no! You're throwing valuable gems at me! Please stop!

name: Elementium Geode
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Draw a card. Deal 2 damage to your hero.
flavor: Elementium, my dear Geode.

name: Chaos Creation
text:
Deal $6 damage.
Summon a random 6-Cost
minion. Destroy the bottom
6 cards of your deck.
flavor: So THIS is who's been Greening everything!

name: Soulfreeze
text: Freeze a minion and its neighbors. Deal damage to your hero equal to the number Frozen.
flavor: An effective way to freeze someone's soul is to just freeze their body.

name: Fossilized Kaleidosaur
text: Battlecry: Gain two random Bonus Effects. Excavate a treasure.
flavor: He's not that bad if you don't die turn 4.

name: Shale Spider
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, draw a card.
flavor: The 2nd member of the VERY exclusive Is-Called-A-Spider-But-Isn't-A-Beast Club.

name: Iridescent Gyreworm
text: Deathrattle: Give each of your minions a random Bonus Effect.
flavor: This card smells of iride.

name: Therazane
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Double the stats of all Elementals in your hand and deck.
flavor: You thought we forgot about her, didn't you? *nervous laughter*

name: Maruut Stonebinder
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck started with no duplicates, Discover an Elemental to summon. Add the others to your hand.
flavor: Savior of the World Pillar, Maruut valiantly fought the Twilight's Hammer to aid Therazane against the Cataclysm.

name: Longneck Egg
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Beast. Give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: Baby longnecks are unfortunately not called shortnecks.

name: Possessed Animancer
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a random Beast from your deck. Give it Lifesteal.
flavor: I don’t know what came over me. I started drawing dinosaurs and I couldn't stop!

name: Asphyxiodon
text: [x]Taunt. At the end of your turn, deal 5 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor: Surgeon Tortollan's Warning: Avoid Asphyxiodon at all costs.

name: Horn of Feasting
text: Summon three 2/1 Raptors with Rush. Outcast: Give them Immune while attacking this turn.
flavor: Good flavor text is a rare medium well done.

name: Skittish Saucier
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of adjacent cards in your hand by (1).
flavor: "Can I ask why this position was vacant?"

name: Diabolus Rex
text: Kindred: Deal 6 damage to your opponent's left and right-most minions.
flavor: It's got a BIG HEAD... and little arms.

name: Barricade Basher
text:
[x]Whenever you gain Armor,
 gain +2/+2 and attack a
random enemy minion.
flavor: She's aggressively affectionate.

name: The Great Dracorex
text: [x]Rush After this attacks an enemy minion, it damages ALL other enemy minions.
flavor: You were so preoccupied with whether or not you could, you didn't stop to think if you should.

name: Bat Mask
text: Set a friendly minion's stats to 1/1. Fill your board with copies of it.
flavor: LURE'S EFFECT WORE OFF.

name: Devilsaur Mask
text: Set a minion's stats to 8/8. Give it Charge.
flavor: "Let's see who's under this mask… SNOWFLIPPER PENGUIN?!?!"

name: Firegill
text: Kindred: Give your other minions Rush.
flavor: Can breathe air, water, or completely ablaze.

name: Hatching Ceremony
text: At the end of your next turn, give your minions +2/+2.
flavor: Don't count your dinos before they ha- Ok...now you can count them.

name: Fire Breath
text:
Deal $4 damage.
Give your Elementals +1/+1.
flavor: "…let’s sit in the back row for this performance."

name: Mirrex, the Crystalline
text:
[x]While in your hand, this is a
3/4 copy of the last minion
your opponent played.
flavor: Every hatching ceremony, Mirrex emerges from its cavern. If the light doesn't shine upon its reflective scales, it means there will be 6 more weeks of volcanic eruptions.

name: Crystal Tusk
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle the left- most card in your hand into your deck. Deathrattle: Draw 2 cards.
flavor: I stopped watching after the third film. You said this one's about aliens?

name: Techysaurus
text: [x]Taunt. Costs (1) less for each card you played this game that didn't start in your deck.
flavor: The field of dino prosthetics was nearly extinct before the Tortollans came around.

name: The Egg of Khelos
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a slightly cracked Egg. (Break 5 times to hatch a 20/20 Beast with Taunt!)
flavor: Thousands upon thousands of years Khelos has been waiting to hatch. Hopefully you won't have to wait that long.

name: Holy Eggbearer
text: Battlecry: Draw a 0-Attack minion.
flavor: If this goes poorly, there's always a job as the Holy Breakfast Chef!

name: Tortotem
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
get a random minion with
multiple minion types.
flavor: If you tip it over, you're cursed with 7 years of bad luck.

name: Chillspine Stegodon
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to two random enemy minions.  Kindred: And Freeze them.
flavor: I'm freezin' my tail off over here!

name: Tribute Dance
text:
[x]Choose a minion.
Choose a different minion
to transform it into.
flavor: This is just a tribute.

name: Story of Umbra
text: [x]Discover a Deathrattle minion that costs (5) or more. Summon it and trigger its Deathrattle.
flavor: "She tried to tell people about our secret city, so we kicked her out of our secret city. That'll show her!"

name: Hollow Direhorn
text: Rush After a friendly minion dies, spend 3 Corpses to gain Reborn.
flavor: I'm alive! I'm dead! I'm watching tv.

name: Soulrest Ceremony
text: [x]Give your minions +1 Attack and Rush. They die at the end of your turn.
flavor: When you're looking for lethal, you might have to break a few eggs.

name: Herbivore Assistant
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2 and Rush.
flavor: "Your afternoon is completely booked. I'm going to have to reschedule your leaf chomping to make space for your mandatory meandering."

name: Seismopod
text: Taunt, Elusive Deathrattle: Give all minions in your hand and deck +3/+3.
flavor: "Let your heart guide you. It whispers, so listen closely."

name: Ankylodon
text: [x]Taunt. Deathrattle: Summon two random 3-Cost Beasts.  They attack random enemies.
flavor: Babies are known as "Break-Your-Ankles-O-Don"

name: Hero's Welcome
text: Discover a Legendary minion to summon. Set its stats to 10/10.
flavor: After Umbra's defeat, Loh had finally fulfilled his lifelong dream and was ready for a peaceful retirement in Latorvia.

name: Ritual of Life
text: Discover a 3-Cost minion. Summon a 2/3 copy of it.
flavor: Naaaaaants ingonyama bagithi baba!

name: Costume Merchant
text: [x]Battlecry: Get a random Mask from another class.  Combo: It costs (2) less.
flavor: Every fall, this tortollan rents out the abandoned shellshop.

name: Behemoth Mask
text: [x]Set a minion's stats to 8/10 and give it Lifesteal. Force a random enemy minion to attack it.
flavor:
"How many little fish does it take to change a light bulb?"
"I don't know, they keep vanishing."

name: Sheep Mask
text: Set a minion's stats to 1/1 and give it "Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to all minions."
flavor: Baa, Baa, Bomb Sheep

name: Beast Speaker Taka
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a    Legendary Beast from any     class to gain its stats.   Deathrattle: Summon it.
flavor: Each year, Beast Speaker Taka kicks off the Day of Rebirth festivities, heralding the start of the dinosaur hatching season. It is a time to mourn those we have lost, and to celebrate the joy of new life in the Crater.

name: Atlasaurus
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Summon a random Taunt minion that costs (5) or more.
flavor: He's got the weight of the world on his shoulders.

name: Panther Mask
text: Set a minion's stats to 5/4 and give it Stealth. Draw 2 cards.
flavor: Every minion wants to be a cat.

name: Guard Duty
text: Summon a random 6, 4, and 2-Cost Taunt minion.
flavor: "My cousin's out fighting dragons and what do I get? Guard duty."

name: Raptor-Nest Nurse
text: [x]Battlecry: Get a random 1-Cost minion. Deathrattle: Get a random 1-Cost spell.
flavor: Spectacular, give me 14 of them right now.

name: Crater Experiment
text: Kindred: Summon a copy of this.
flavor: Finally, a dinosaur designed by committee.

name: N'Zoth, God of the Deep
text: Battlecry: Resurrect a friendly minion of each minion type.
flavor: It really just wants to cuddle all the creatures of Azeroth.

name: Yogg-Saron, Master of Fate
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast 10 spells this game, spin the Wheel of Yogg-Saron.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: Yogg take the wheel!

name: Rock Rager
text: Taunt
flavor: Still doesn't understand why he can't beat Paper Rager.

name: Blood of G'huun
text: [x]Taunt At the end of your turn, summon a 5/5 copy of a minion in your deck.
flavor: An attempted cure becomes disease, blooming and thriving as rot and decay.

name: Insight
text: Draw a minion. Corrupt: Reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor: Shouldn't the eyes be facing backwards for insight?

name: Idol of Y'Shaarj
text: Summon a 10/10 copy of a minion in your deck.
flavor: Without a tongue, it speaks in seven. Without a voice, its echo lingers forever.

name: G'huun the Blood God
text: Battlecry: Draw 2 cards. They cost Health instead of Mana.
flavor: All of the other Old Gods used to laugh and call him names. They never let poor G'huun join in any Old God games.

name: Lunar Eclipse
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Your next spell this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: When the Azeroth is between the Sun and the Moon.

name: Solar Eclipse
text: The next spell you cast this turn casts twice.
flavor: When the Moon is between the Sun and the Azeroth.

name: Fizzy Elemental
text: Rush Taunt
flavor: Loved. Hated. Carbonated.

name: Umbral Owl
text: [x]Rush Costs (1) less for each spell you've cast this game.
flavor: It sleeps with one eye open.

name: Faire Arborist
flavor: The bad apple never falls far from the treant.

name: Gyreworm
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, deal 3 damage.
flavor: This game of ring toss just got really intense.

name: Carousel Gryphon
text: Divine Shield Corrupt: Gain +3/+3 and Taunt.
flavor: "When does this bird land in Stormwind? I've been flying for hours!"

name: Banana Vendor
text: Battlecry: Add 2 Bananas to each player's hand.
flavor: There's always money in the banana stand.

name: Knife Vendor
text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to each hero.
flavor: "They're perfectly safe! These gloves totally aren't hiding any bandages."

name: Prize Vendor
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Each player draws a card.
flavor: He's just making sure they're real. Authentic tickets taste like strawberry.

name: Optimistic Ogre
text: 50% chance to attack the correct enemy.
flavor: "What if this goes wrong?" "But what if this goes right?"

name: Claw Machine
text: Rush. Deathrattle: Draw a minion and give it +3/+3.
flavor: "I have been mrglrlglr… chosen!"

name: Darkmoon Rabbit
text: Rush, Poisonous Also damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.
flavor: That's no ordinary rabbit! That's the most foul, cruel, and bad-tempered rodent you ever set eyes on!

name: Tenwu of the Red Smoke
text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It costs (1) this turn.
flavor: Red, the color of subtlety.
targeting_arrow_text: Return a minion to your hand.

name: Darkmoon Dirigible
text: Divine Shield Corrupt: Gain Rush.
flavor: "It's dirigible? I don’t even know what diriging is!"

name: Silas Darkmoon
text: Battlecry: Choose a direction to rotate all minions.
flavor: "You might remember me from such attractions as 'Being Shot out of a Cannon' or 'That Carousel Ate My Friend.'"

name: Guess the Weight
text: Draw a card. Guess if your next card costs more or less to draw it.
flavor: "And then at the last second, I'll shapeshift into cat form!"

name: Strongman
text: Taunt Corrupt: This costs (0).
flavor: Sure, it looks impressive until you realize it's a barrel of helium.

name: Inconspicuous Rider
text: Battlecry: Cast a Secret from your deck.
flavor: Improvise, adapt, overcome.

name: Fleethoof Pearltusk
text: Rush Corrupt: Gain +4/+4.
flavor: Guest interactions may vary over the duration of the visit.

name: K'thir Ritualist
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Add a random 4-Cost minion to your opponent's hand.
flavor: Something evil this way comes… and it's bringing friends over!

name: Darkmoon Statue
text: Your other minions have +1 Attack. Corrupt: This gains +4 Attack.
flavor: As far as workplace injuries go, Silas is protected by his statue of limitations.

name: Dancing Cobra
text: Corrupt: Gain Poisonous.
flavor: Snakes are just tentacles with fangs.

name: Jewel of N'Zoth
text: Summon three friendly Deathrattle minions that died this game.
flavor: This coveted gem calls for you to free it… and unleash an inescapable prison.

name: Darkmoon Tonk
text: Deathrattle: Fire four missiles at random enemies that deal 2 damage each.
flavor: "Ready to roll out!"

name: Petting Zoo
text: Summon a 3/3 Strider. Repeat for each Secret you control.
flavor: Welcome to the petting zoo. DO NOT TOUCH THE ANIMALS.

name: Trampling Rhino
text: Rush. After this attacks and kills a minion, excess damage hits the enemy hero.
flavor: "Whew. I thought you said 'Trampoline Rhino.' Now that would have been scary."

name: Rinling's Rifle
text: After your hero attacks, Discover a Secret and cast it.
flavor: This rifle needs a muzzle for its muzzle.

name: Maxima Blastenheimer
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a minion from your deck. It attacks the enemy hero, then dies.
flavor: Believe it or not, this is only the faire's fourth most dangerous game.

name: Don't Feed the Animals
text: Give all Beasts in your hand +1/+1. Corrupt: Give them +2/+2 instead.
flavor: They're still cleaning up the mess from the last time someone fed the basilisk a deep fried candybar.

name: Wriggling Horror
text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1.
flavor: Created to scare. Born to wriggle.

name: Confection Cyclone
text: Battlecry: Add two 1/2 Sugar Elementals to your hand.
flavor: "Oh, I thought it was a desert elemental?"

name: Firework Elemental
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to a minion. Corrupt: Deal 12 instead.
flavor: The brightest spark can still go dark.

name: Game Master
text: The first Secret you play each turn costs (1).
flavor: "You hear the mrgrgls of angry murlocs approaching. Roll initiative!"

name: Mask of C'Thun
text: Deal $10 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Hide in the mask, but it will wear you. Through its gleaming eye, you shall see true.

name: Grand Finale
text: Summon an 8/8 Elemental. Repeat for each Elemental you played last turn.
flavor: Considering all the other hazards at Darkmoon, overindulgent pyrotechnics seem downright pedestrian.

name: Ring Toss
text: Discover a Secret and cast it. Corrupt: Discover 2 instead.
flavor: If you liked it, then you shoulda put a ring on it!

name: Occult Conjurer
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, summon a copy of this.
flavor: Like mirror image, but more secretive and angsty.

name: Rigged Faire Game
text: Secret: If you didn't take any damage during your opponent's turn, draw 3 cards.
flavor: What's faire is fair.

name: Deck of Lunacy
text: Transform spells in your deck into ones that cost (3) more. (They keep their original Cost.)
flavor: Voted "Most Lunacy" in Madness Monthly magazine.

name: Sayge, Seer of Darkmoon
text: Battlecry: Draw 1 card. (Upgraded for each friendly Secret that has triggered this game!)
flavor: There are no secrets between us... or refunds.

name: Fire Breather
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all minions except Demons.
flavor: "Phew! That skull has been stuck between my teeth for hours!"

name: Man'ari Mosher
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Demon +3 Attack and Lifesteal this turn.
flavor: "E.T.C. is sooo mainstream. Have you heard of Blight Boar?"

name: Free Admission
text: Draw 2 minions. If they're both Demons, reduce their Costs by (2).
flavor: "Quick, get in before someone sees you, or worse, someone sees me."

name: Midway Maniac
text: Taunt
flavor: Faire owners hate him! Learn his secrets with one simple spell!

name: Revenant Rascal
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Mana Crystal for each player.
flavor: Turns out his face really did get stuck that way.

name: The Nameless One
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Become a 4/4 copy of it, then Silence it.
flavor: Used to be called "             , the Nameless," but everyone got confused.

name: Cascading Disaster
text: [x]Destroy a random enemy minion. Corrupt: Destroy 2. Corrupt Again: Destroy 3.
flavor: Please keep all hands, arms, feet and legs inside the ride until the monster comes to a complete stop.

name: Tickatus
text: [x]Battlecry: Remove the top 5 cards from your deck. Corrupt: Your opponent's deck instead.
flavor: "These are all.... EXPIRED!"

name: Wicked Whispers
text: Discard your lowest Cost card. Give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: When the Old Ones whisper, others will scream.

name: Nazmani Bloodweaver
text:
[x]After you cast a spell,
reduce the Cost of a random
card in your hand by (1).
flavor: Her first stage name, Ketchupweaver, failed to excite the audience.

name: Fortune Teller
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each spell in your hand.
flavor: "I see a giant piano in your future."

name: Mystery Winner
text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret.
flavor: Yeah, but the mystery prize could be anything! Even a boat!

name: Open the Cages
text: [x]Secret: When your turn starts, if you control two minions, summon an Animal Companion.
flavor: "Coming out of my cage, and I'm dead by turn nine..."

name: Horrendous Growth
text: Corrupt: Gain +1/+1. Can be Corrupted endlessly.
flavor: Stop picking at it! You’re only making it worse.

name: Safety Inspector
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle the  lowest-Cost card from your hand into your deck. Draw a card.
flavor: "All right, you're good. No sign of safety anywhere."

name: Carnival Clown
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Summon 2 copies of this. Corrupt: Fill your board with copies.
flavor: Send in the clowns!

name: Circus Medic
text: Battlecry: Restore #4 Health. Corrupt: Deal 4 damage instead.
flavor: Just be careful not to mix this with any creepy eyeballs, tentacles, or dark whispers, and you'll be fine in the morning.

name: Fairground Fool
text: Taunt Corrupt: Gain +4 Health.
flavor: "What did Illidan say when his rocketeer broke down on the Darkmoon racetrack? YOU ARE NOT REPAIRED!"

name: Auspicious Spirits
text: Summon a random 4-Cost minion. Corrupt: Summon a 7-Cost minion instead.
flavor: "I'm not AWE-spicious, but I am a little spicious."

name: Palm Reading
text: Discover a spell. Reduce the Cost of spells in your hand by (1).
flavor: Actual palms not required.

name: Y'Shaarj, the Defiler
text: [x]Battlecry: Add a copy of each Corrupted card you've played this game to your hand. They cost (0) this turn.
flavor: Y'Shaarj made an excellent office intern, doing the copying AND defiling.

name: Costumed Entertainer
text: [x]Battlecry: Give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: Just remember not to talk. It breaks character.

name: Fantastic Firebird
text: Windfury
flavor: The original flaming chicken.

name: Showstopper
text: Deathrattle: Silence all minions.
flavor: This act is killing it!

name: Redscale Dragontamer
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Dragon.
flavor: Sir Finley made this look a lot easier three expansions ago...

name: Snack Run
text: Discover a spell. Restore Health to your hero equal to its Cost.
flavor: "I'll have two monster churros, a combo box of Yogg-Saron, and one of those turkey legs that ate the Silver Hand Recruit."

name: Derailed Coaster
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Rider with Rush for each minion in your hand.
flavor: So long as it doesn’t kill you, it's considered part of the ride "experience."

name: Line Hopper
text: Your Outcast cards cost (1) less.
flavor: There are two things Demon Hunters know: hopping, and cutting.

name: Relentless Pursuit
text: Give your hero +4 Attack and Immune this turn.
flavor: If you steal a Demon Hunter's corn dog, you'll get what's coming.

name: Felscream Blast
text: Lifesteal. Deal $1 damage to a minion and its neighbors.
flavor: All the souls start running when they see the felscream truck.

name: Redeemed Pariah
text: After you play an Outcast card, gain +1/+1.
flavor: "Look at this stick. Look at it!"

name: Renowned Performer
text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Summon two   1/1 Assistants with Taunt.
flavor: Cutting the assistant in half is the easy part.

name: Expendable Performers
text: Summon seven 1/1 Illidari with Rush. If they all die this turn, summon seven more.
flavor: When someone gets injured, it's considered performance art.

name: Throw Glaive
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it dies, add a Temporary copy of this to your hand.
flavor: "No, no, I said SHOW me the glaive!"

name: Bladed Lady
text: [x]Rush Costs (1) if your hero has 6 or more Attack.
flavor: While you were busy learning magic, she studied the blade.

name: Dreadlord's Bite
text: [x]Outcast: Deal 1 damage to all enemies.
flavor: When it gets too dull, it's more of a nibble.

name: Stiltstepper
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a card. If you play it this turn, give your hero +4 Attack this turn.
flavor: Circus school was tough, sometimes you had to step on people to make it to the top.

name: Il'gynoth
text: [x]Lifesteal Your Lifesteal damages the enemy hero instead of healing you.
flavor: Well, that just sounds like damage with extra steps.

name: Zai, the Incredible
text: Battlecry: Copy the left- and right-most cards in your hand.
flavor: Following this act will be her younger brother, Frank the Mediocre.

name: Balloon Merchant
text: Battlecry: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +1 Attack and Divine Shield.
flavor: It's a shiny yellow balloon! But it can be popped with a single point of damage.

name: Oh My Yogg!
text: [x]Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, they instead cast a random one of the same Cost.
flavor: Many wonders lie within, but they are not mere toys when your mind is their plaything.

name: Carnival Barker
text: Whenever you summon a 1-Health minion, give it +1/+2.
flavor: The barking initially confused faire-goers, so he switched to words.

name: Hammer of the Naaru
text: Battlecry: Summon a 6/6 Holy Elemental with Taunt.
flavor: The naaru wasn't using it. It doesn't have arms.

name: Lothraxion the Redeemed
text: [x]Battlecry: For the rest of the game, after you summon a Silver Hand Recruit, give it Divine Shield.
flavor: So infused with the Light, he has to wear double sleep masks at night.

name: High Exarch Yrel
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, gain Rush, Lifesteal, Taunt, and Divine Shield.
flavor: There can be no neutrality in the fight against darkness.

name: Day at the Faire
text: Summon 3 Silver Hand Recruits. Corrupt: Summon 5.
flavor: Karl knew he would someday regret that turkey leg.

name: Insatiable Felhound
text: Taunt Corrupt: Gain +1/+1 and Lifesteal.
flavor: Back-to-back winner of the annual hot dog eating contest... and the judge-eating contest.

name: Felsteel Executioner
text: Corrupt: Become a weapon.
flavor: "My mom said I could be anything I want."

name: Acrobatics
text: Draw 2 cards. If you play both this turn, draw 2 more.
flavor: He soars through the air with the greatest of fleas.

name: C'Thun, the Shattered
text: [x]Start of Game: Break into pieces. Battlecry: Deal 30 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: My grandfather's deck has no useless cards!

name: Foxy Fraud
text: Battlecry: Your next Combo card this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: His other street con involves a druid. He can't pull it off without a plant.

name: Cloak of Shadows
text: Give your hero Stealth until your next turn.
flavor: Only worthy emperors can see the cloak.

name: Shadow Clone
text: Secret: After a minion attacks your hero, summon a copy of it with Stealth.
flavor: "You thought you were attacking face, but it was me! You!"

name: Ticket Master
text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle 3 Tickets into your deck. When drawn, summon a 3/3 Plush Bear.
flavor: You can exchange one ticket for a bear or save up thousands for a tacky light-up paperweight!

name: Swindle
text: Draw a spell. Combo: And a minion.
flavor: You know, it's probably just cheaper to find a place that sells the plushie…

name: Grand Empress Shek'zara
text: Battlecry: Discover a card in your deck and draw all copies of it.
flavor: So is a Grand Empress an empress that's grand or an empress's empress?

name: Sweet Tooth
text: Corrupt: Gain +2 Attack and Stealth.
flavor: He's been eyeballing that ice cream cone all day!

name: Malevolent Strike
text:
[x]Destroy a minion.
 Costs (1) less for each
  card in your deck that
  didn't start there.
flavor: "I don't know how those got in there, but I'm blaming you two."

name: Prize Plunderer
text: [x]Combo: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each other card you've played this turn.
flavor: But he'll never be able to plunder the prize of a happy childhood.
targeting_arrow_text: Deal 1 damage for each other card played this turn.

name: Parade Leader
text: After you summon a Rush minion, give it +2 Attack.
flavor: He's always going to reign on his parade.

name: Sword Eater
text: Taunt Battlecry: Equip a 3/2 Sword.
flavor: How tough is he? He eats swords for breakfast! Without any milk.

name: Minefield
text: Deal $5 damage randomly split among all minions.
flavor: Dodge bombs like you're playing Tonksweeper!

name: Bumper Car
text: Rush Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Riders with Rush to your hand.
flavor:
Subject: Re: Unsafe Rides?
bump

name: Ringmaster's Baton
text: After your hero attacks, give a Mech, Dragon, and Pirate in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: A mech, a dragon, and a pirate walk into an Old God's gaping maw. The mech was too crunchy, the dragon was too hot, but the pirate was just right.

name: Ringmaster Whatley
text: Battlecry: Draw a Mech, Dragon, and Pirate.
flavor: His main qualification is that he'll work with anyone. Or anything.

name: Stage Dive
text: Draw a Rush minion. Corrupt: Give it +2/+1.
flavor: The most metal trust fall.

name: Tent Trasher
text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each friendly minion with a unique minion type.
flavor: "I consider it redecorating."

name: E.T.C., God of Metal
text: After a friendly Rush minion attacks, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: There are Old Gods and then there are Rock Gods.

name: Feat of Strength
text: Give a random Taunt minion in your hand +5/+5.
flavor: Generally happens right after the airing of grievances.

name: Stage Hand
text: [x]Battlecry: Give a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Holds everything himself because people wouldn't stop touching the prop table.

name: Circus Amalgam
text: Taunt This has all minion types.
flavor: Who needs a petting zoo when you have all the creatures right here?!

name: Ring Matron
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon two 3/2 Imps.
flavor: But where does she keep them?

name: Deck of Chaos
text: Swap the Cost and Attack of all minions in your deck.
flavor: Yeah, it's chaos, but it's organized chaos.

name: Revolve
text: Transform all minions into random ones with the same Cost.
flavor: "Please don't ride the carousel for thirty minutes after eating. After the carousel eats, I mean."

name: Dunk Tank
text: Deal $4 damage. Corrupt: Then deal $2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: "When I said bring a tank to the dungeon, this is not what I had in mind!"

name: Stormstrike
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Give your hero +3 Attack this turn.
flavor: When your phone is at 5%.

name: Pit Master
text: Battlecry: Summon a 3/2 Duelist. Corrupt: Summon two.
flavor: If you win your duel, he'll throw in some of his famous Pit Master barbecue.

name: Cagematch Custodian
text: Battlecry: Draw a weapon.
flavor: Cleans up after a dust up.

name: Whack-A-Gnoll Hammer
text: After your hero attacks, give a random friendly minion +1/+1.
flavor: Hogger's most hated attraction.

name: Deathmatch Pavilion
text:
Summon a 3/2 Duelist.
If your hero attacked this turn, summon another.
flavor: Worth it for the stuffed toy at the end.

name: Magicfin
text: After a friendly Murloc dies, add a random Legendary minion to your hand.
flavor: The best part is when he pulls Deathwing out of a top hat!

name: Inara Stormcrash
text: On your turn, your hero has +2 Attack and Windfury.
flavor: A fan favorite, Inara is always met with thunderous applause.

name: Grand Totem Eys'or
text:
At the end of your turn,
give +1/+1 to all other Totems in your hand, deck and battlefield.
flavor: Some say it can see straight into the soul of any who dare to read its flavor text...

name: Moontouched Amulet
text: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn. Corrupt: And gain 6 Armor.
flavor: The Suntouched Amulet melted.

name: Cenarion Ward
text:
Gain 8 Armor.
Summon a random
8-Cost minion.
flavor: Don't ask about his right hand. He's still growing into it.

name: Kiri, Chosen of Elune
