text: Battlecry: Add a Solar Eclipse and Lunar Eclipse to your hand.
flavor: Now, when the Sun is between the Moon and the Azeroth... that's when you've got a problem.

name: Greybough
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon Greybough."
flavor: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The next best time is when you lose a minion.

name: Corrosive Breath
text:
[x]Deal $3 damage to a
minion. If you're holding
a Dragon, it also hits
the enemy hero.
flavor: It's a breath of fresh terror!

name: Stormhammer
text: Doesn't lose Durability while you control a Dragon.
flavor: It brings the storm before the calm.

name: Righteous Cause
text: Sidequest: Summon 5 minions. Reward: Give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: "And I hereby dub thee a cadet of the Explorer’s League! NEXT!"

name: Diving Gryphon
text: Rush Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion from your deck.
flavor: Warning: May cause carousel flashbacks.

name: Scion of Ruin
text: Rush. Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, summon 2 copies of this.
flavor: Ruined! RUINED!

name: EVIL Quartermaster
text: Battlecry: Add a Lackey to your hand. Gain 3 Armor.
flavor: He trained for a whole year to become quarter-master. Three more, and he'll be a full-master.

name: Ritual Chopper
text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
flavor: Chop chop, Galakrond!

name: Ramming Speed
text: Force a minion to attack one of its neighbors.
flavor: Her deductible keeps going up.

name: Skybarge
text:
[x]After you summon a
Pirate, deal 2 damage
to a random enemy.
flavor: It's more of a ship-gun than a gunship.

name: Sky Raider
text: Battlecry: Add a random Pirate to your hand.
flavor: Maybe he should've hatched a plan that could actually carry booty back too.

name: Ancharrr
text: After your hero attacks, draw a Pirate from your deck.
flavor: The problem with anchors is they often end up sinking to the bottom of your deck.

name: Deathwing, Mad Aspect
text: Battlecry: Attack ALL other minions.
flavor: Bite that one, bite that other one, claw this one, swallow that one whole....

name: Umbral Skulker
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, add 3 Coins to your hand.
flavor: "Three gold?! Do you have any idea how long this quest chain was?"

name: Dragon's Hoard
text: Discover a Legendary minion from another class.
flavor: The Alliance loves this hoard.

name: Praise Galakrond!
text: [x]Give a minion +1 Attack. Invoke Galakrond.
flavor:
"Turn to Galakrond, Chapter 3 Verse 12.
'SNARL! ROAR! GRAAAAGH!'
Let us reflect on this wisdom."

name: Necrium Apothecary
text: Combo: Draw a Deathrattle minion from your deck and gain its Deathrattle.
flavor: Necrium: Get the afterlife without the aftertaste!

name: Candle Breath
text: Draw 3 cards. Costs (3) less while you're holding a Dragon.
flavor:
"And Waxadred shall light their fires, with roaring breath hotter than pyres!
Come before him, scamp and vandal, pledge your faith and lift your candle!"

name: Stowaway
text: [x]Battlecry: If there are cards in your deck that didn't start there, draw 2 of them.
flavor: Cut him a break. Even economy class tickets are pretty expensive these days.

name: Bloodsail Flybooter
text: Battlecry: Add two 1/1 Pirates to your hand.
flavor: They’re pretty fly for some pirate guys.

name: Waxadred
text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle a Candle into your deck that resummons Waxadred when drawn.
flavor: Waxadred the dragon fought for his king, frolicking through the fields melting everything!

name: Flik Skyshiv
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a minion and all copies of it (wherever they are).
flavor: Junior explorers scan the night sky in fear of her candle’s flame!
targeting_arrow_text: Destroy a minion and copies of it.

name: Tasty Flyfish
text: Deathrattle: Give a Dragon in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: Reinforced with vitamins and mrglrls.

name: Devoted Maniac
text: Rush Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
flavor: There are plenty of apathetic maniacs, but they couldn't be bothered.

name: Strength in Numbers
text: Sidequest: Spend 10 Mana on minions. Reward: Summon a minion from your deck.
flavor: One minion, two minions... tree minions!

name: Big Ol' Whelp
text: Battlecry: Draw a card.
flavor: A chonker, a real absolute unit.

name: Hoard Pillager
text: Battlecry: Equip one of your destroyed weapons.
flavor: Better to have stabbed and lost. And then found again!

name: Parachute Brigand
text:
[x]After you play a Pirate,
summon this minion
from your hand.
flavor: She flies standby.

name: Hot Air Balloon
text: At the start of your turn, gain +1 Health.
flavor: The Gadgetzan Pilgrim's Bounty parade is missing a float this year.

name: Wing Commander
text: Has +2 Attack for each Dragon in your hand.
flavor: "Flap! Flap! FLAP!"

name: Goboglide Tech
text: Battlecry: If you control a Mech, gain +1/+1 and Rush.
flavor: The word "glide" is always in quotes in the manual.

name: Fire Hawk
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each card in your opponent's hand.
flavor: It’s our fault for making all those card backs that look like food.

name: Gyrocopter
text: Rush Windfury
flavor: The hula doll is still absolutely required.

name: Wyrmrest Purifier
text: [x]Battlecry: Transform all Neutral cards in your deck into random cards from your class.
flavor: She keeps your deck classy.

name: Dragonmaw Poacher
text: Battlecry: If your opponent controls a Dragon, gain +4/+4 and Rush.
flavor: I prefer my dragons over-easy.

name: Zul'Drak Ritualist
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Summon three random 1-Cost minions for your opponent.
flavor: Generosity is a core value in cult culture.

name: Hippogryph
text: Rush Taunt
flavor: Known for its ferocious grace, the hippogryph is a truly majestic creature. Except when molting.

name: Evasive Chimaera
text: Poisonous Elusive
flavor: One head only tells the truth, while the other head only tells lies. But they both spit poison.

name: Troll Batrider
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor: "Quiet! The bat can't hear where he's goin'!"

name: Living Dragonbreath
text: Your minions can't be Frozen.
flavor: If you want that muscular physique, you've really gotta feel the burn.

name: Platebreaker
text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's Armor.
flavor: Worst. Dinner guest. Ever.

name: Dragon Breeder
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Dragon. Add a copy of it to your hand.
flavor: Deathwing would have been more well-adjusted if he'd been raised by this guy.
targeting_arrow_text: Add a copy to your hand.

name: Bad Luck Albatross
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle two 1/1 Albatross into your opponent's deck.
flavor: Legend holds that it's bad luck to harm it. So maybe just pat it on the head, okay?

name: Skyfin
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, summon 2 random Murlocs.
flavor:
"Do you want to be a murloc or a dragon?" 
"Yes."

name: Evasive Feywing
text: Elusive
flavor: I've never heard of this fey-dragon called "Brightwing," but if I HAD, I’d say we’d be best friends.

name: Camouflaged Dirigible
text: Battlecry: Give your other Mechs Stealth until your next turn.
flavor:
"What does that cloud look like to you?" 
"Trouble."

name: Cobalt Spellkin
text: Battlecry: Add two 1-Cost spells from your class to your hand.
flavor: Spews more spells than a sleep-talking wizard.

name: Faceless Corruptor
text: [x]Rush. Battlecry: Transform one of your minions into a copy of this.
flavor: What does Madame Lazul have against faces?!

name: Utgarde Grapplesniper
text: Battlecry: Both players draw a card. If it's a Dragon, summon it.
flavor: Note: The dragon may be a little cranky upon arrival.

name: Depth Charge
text: At the start of your turn, deal 5 damage to ALL minions.
flavor: * Does not have Charge.

name: Evasive Wyrm
text: Rush Divine Shield Elusive
flavor: Deftly dodges spells like a real wiggle wyrm.

name: Scalerider
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 2 damage.
flavor: Do Re Me Fa So La Spear Throw!

name: Kobold Stickyfinger
text: Battlecry: Steal your opponent's weapon.
flavor: He no take candle. He take sword.

name: Tentacled Menace
text: Battlecry: Each player draws a card. Swap their Costs.
flavor: He calls this one the "Calamari Special."

name: Chromatic Egg
text: [x]Battlecry: Secretly Discover a Dragon to hatch into. Deathrattle: Hatch!
flavor: Nefarian was known for creating two things: horrible monsters and excellent breakfasts.

name: Dread Raven
text: Has +3 Attack for each other Dread Raven you control.
flavor: Fun Fact: A group of three Dread Ravens is an unkindness. Four is lethal!

name: Dragonqueen Alexstrasza
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, add 2 other random Dragons to your hand. They cost (0).
flavor: Givin' lives and takin' names.

name: Murozond the Infinite
text: Battlecry: Play all cards your opponent played last turn.
flavor: "Well, I'm glad YOU knew what I should be doing this turn."

name: Shu'ma
text:
At the end of your turn,
fill your board with 1/1 Tentacles.
flavor: How to tell your mother to go away.

name: Transmogrifier
text: Whenever you draw a card, transform it into a random Legendary minion.
flavor: All it takes is some imagination and a cardboard box.

name: Veranus
text: Battlecry: Change the Health of all enemy minions to 1.
flavor: As an empty nester, she just misses her little ones.

name: Bandersmosh
text: [x]Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a 5/5 copy of a random Legendary minion.
flavor: The Shudderwock finds him particularly frumious.

name: Kronx Dragonhoof
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw Galakrond. If you're already Galakrond, unleash a Devastation.
flavor: The only one who knows how to properly prepare Galakrond's coffee.

name: Azure Explorer
text: Spell Damage +2 Battlecry: Discover a Dragon.
flavor: Has an appetite for knowledge!

name: Chenvaala
text: After you cast three spells in a turn, summon a 5/5 Elemental.
flavor: Like the Dragon Soul. If dragons had souls of ice.

name: Arcane Breath
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a spell.
flavor: One of many side effects from eating mana cookies.

name: Violet Spellwing
text: Deathrattle: Add an 'Arcane Missiles' spell to your hand.
flavor: A bird in the hand is worth three missiles in the grave.

name: Mana Giant
text:
[x]Costs (1) less for each
card you've played this
game that didn't start
in your deck.
flavor: Spell more and save more with a GIANT discount!

name: Crazed Netherwing
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other characters.
flavor: Always tail swipes left.

name: Dragonblight Cultist
text: [x]Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond. Gain +1 Attack for each other friendly minion.
flavor: Galakrond would be extra mad if he was resurrected with gnaw marks on his bones.

name: Veiled Worshipper
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, draw 3 cards.
flavor: If you’re not wearing your regulation cultist clothing, how will Galakrond know to devour you last?

name: Dark Skies
text:
[x]Deal $1 damage to a
random minion. Repeat
for each card in your hand.
flavor: "It's a drizzle of fire. A fine mist, really."

name: Nether Breath
text: Deal $2 damage. If you're holding a Dragon, deal $4 damage with Lifesteal instead.
flavor:
"Whether the Nether is cold,
whether the Nether is hot,
we'll burn together,
whatever the Nether,
whether we like it or not."

name: Rain of Fire
text: Deal $1 damage to all characters.
flavor: You know it’s autumn when the skies rain brimstone and fire. Also: pumpkin spice!

name: Abyssal Summoner
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a Demon with Taunt and stats equal to your hand size.
flavor: But gnomes have tiny hands...

name: Valdris Felgorge
text: Battlecry: Increase your maximum hand size to 12. Draw 4 cards.
flavor: I don't mean to pry, but you don't by chance happen to have six fingers on both of your hands?

name: Zzeraku the Warped
text:
[x]Whenever your hero
takes damage, summon
a 6/6 Nether Drake.
flavor: The extra Z is for "zesty."

name: Squallhunter
text: Spell Damage +2 Overload: (2)
flavor:
"Oh, the weather outside is frightful… But Squallhunter's so delightful!
And since we've gone down this road--overload, overload, overload!"

name: Twin Tyrant
text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to two random enemy minions.
flavor: They can never agree on whether it's too hot or too cold.

name: Storm's Wrath
text: Give your minions +1/+1. Overload: (1)
flavor: How many dragons does it take to destroy a hot air balloon? One, two, three, CRUNCH!

name: Surging Tempest
text: Has +1 Attack while you have Overloaded Mana Crystals.
flavor: "Overloaded? Should've gotten a surge protector."

name: Dragon's Pack
text: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. If you've Invoked twice, give them +3/+3.
flavor: Each dragon's pack is guaranteed to have at least one rare.

name: Corrupt Elementalist
text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond twice.
flavor: Her element is "Horns."

name: Lightning Breath
text:
[x]Deal $4 damage to a
minion. If you're holding
a Dragon, also damage
its neighbors.
flavor: Recipe: One dragon, four wool socks, thick shag carpet.

name: Cumulo-Maximus
text: Battlecry: If you have Overloaded Mana Crystals, deal 5 damage.
flavor: "Are your clouds not entertained?!"

name: Nithogg
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 0/3 Eggs. Next turn they hatch into 4/4 Drakes with Rush.
flavor: Not to be confused with Nithogger.

name: Sky Claw
text: Your other Mechs have +1 Attack. Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Microcopters.
flavor: Carefully engineered to never grab the Mimiron plush toy.

name: Amber Watcher
text: Battlecry: Restore #8 Health.
flavor: Healing really resin-ates with him.

name: Bronze Explorer
text: Lifesteal Battlecry: Discover a Dragon.
flavor: Always ready to explore new friendships! Except with Deathwing.

name: Lightforged Crusader
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, add 5 random Paladin cards to your hand.
flavor: Self-appointed president of the Paladins Only Paladin Club.

name: Lightforged Zealot
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, equip a   4/2 Truesilver Champion.
flavor: Card-carrying member of the Paladins Only Paladin Club.

name: Sand Breath
text: [x]Give a minion +1/+2. Give it Divine Shield if you're holding a Dragon.
flavor: After Uldum, EVERYONE had sand breath.

name: Dragonrider Talritha
text: Deathrattle: Give a Dragon in your hand +3/+3 and this Deathrattle.
flavor: You can't just run away from your problems. Unless you have another dragon to jump to.

name: Blazing Battlemage
flavor: Weaponized an ancient technique once used to slice cold butter.

name: Shield of Galakrond
text: Taunt Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
flavor: Realistically, she's the shield for Galakrond's big toe.

name: Time Rip
text: Destroy a minion. Invoke Galakrond.
flavor: "It's time. R.I.P."

name: Seal Fate
text: Deal $3 damage to an undamaged character. Invoke Galakrond.
flavor: Firmly press the seal of your fates instead of leaving the flap open.

name: Invocation of Frost
text: Freeze an enemy. Invoke Galakrond.
flavor: Galakrond adores a little frosting.

name: Awaken!
text: Invoke Galakrond. Deal $1 damage to all minions.
flavor: This is an alarm clock you can't ignore.

name: Fiendish Rites
text: Invoke Galakrond. Give your minions +1 Attack.
flavor: "You have the right to sacrifice an ally. If you do not have an ally, then one will be sacrificed for you."

name: Clear the Way
text: [x]Sidequest: Summon 3 Rush minions. Reward: Summon a 4/4 Gryphon with Rush.
flavor: The terrifying part is the gryphons' squeaky voices afterward.

name: Phase Stalker
text: [x]After you use your Hero Power, cast a Secret from your deck.
flavor: It's not just a phase! I don't have to tell you anything! GAWSH!

name: Dwarven Sharpshooter
text: Your Hero Power can target minions.
flavor: Scissors, knives, needles, you name it! He'll shoot it.

name: Primordial Explorer
text: Poisonous Battlecry: Discover a Dragon.
flavor: "We're letting the poisonous dude carry the bags?"

name: Toxic Reinforcements
text: [x]Sidequest: Use your Hero Power three times. Reward: Summon three 2/1 Leper Gnomes.
flavor: In the event of a sudden loss of cabin pressure, a slingshot will be deployed for convenient evacuation.

name: Dragonbane
text: After you use your Hero Power, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: *Thunk* "That wasn’t a dragon!" *Thunk* "THAT wasn’t a dragon!"

name: Frizz Kindleroost
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Dragons in your deck by (2).
flavor: Frizz knows that baby dragons need warmth, care, and the highest possible level of goblin engineering.

name: Sanctuary
text: [x]Sidequest: Take no damage for a turn. Reward: Summon a 3/6 minion with Taunt.
flavor: Few quests are completed by cowering under a table.

name: Malygos, Aspect of Magic
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover an upgraded Mage spell.
flavor: It's official. We can say Malygeese.

name: Fate Weaver
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Invoked twice, reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1).
flavor: Do not draw the attention of a Fate Weaver, for it will always loom over your destiny.

name: Whispers of EVIL
text: Add a Lackey to your hand.
flavor: Madame Lazul’s ASMR program is off to a promising start!

name: Grave Rune
text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Summon 2 copies of this."
flavor: I'm gravely sorry to rune this.

name: Disciple of Galakrond
text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond.
flavor: Raising Galakrond will cause thurible, thurible damage.

name: Chronobreaker
text: [x]Deathrattle: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: If he asks to borrow your watch, just say no.

name: Envoy of Lazul
text: [x]Battlecry: Look at 3 cards. Guess which one is in your opponent's hand to get a copy of it.
flavor: "Note to self: possess someone who's local and knows directions next time."

name: Breath of the Infinite
text: Deal $2 damage to all minions. If you're holding a Dragon, only damage enemies.
flavor: It's called "circular breathing."

name: Mindflayer Kaahrj
text: Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Deathrattle: Summon a new copy of it.
flavor: It’s pronounced "Kaahrj."

name: Nozdormu the Timeless
text: Battlecry: Set each player to 10 Mana Crystals.
flavor: Time is mana!

name: Evasive Drakonid
text: Taunt Elusive
flavor: Doesn't respond to spells, hero powers, calls, or text messages.

name: Treenforcements
text: [x]Choose One - Give a minion +2 Health and Taunt; or Summon a 2/2 Treant.
flavor: Treemendous value!

name: Shrubadier
text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2 Treant.
flavor: Her shoots can kill.

name: Emerald Explorer
text: Taunt Battlecry: Discover a Dragon.
flavor: Make it a double dragon!

name: Aeroponics
text:
Draw 2 cards.
Costs (2) less for each Treant you control.
flavor: Good seeds can go far.

name: Embiggen
text: Give all minions in your deck +2/+2. They cost (1) more (up to 10).
flavor: Did you set it to "wumbo?"

name: Secure the Deck
text: Sidequest: Attack twice with your hero. Reward: Add 3 'Claw' spells to your hand.
flavor: "Tied it down, boss. I don't really know why you asked me to do that."

name: Breath of Dreams
text: Draw a card. If you're holding a Dragon, gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavor: Ysera has the worst morning breath.

name: Goru the Mightree
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Treants have +1/+1.
flavor: He's untreefeated.

name: Ysera, Unleashed
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 7 Dream Portals into your deck. When drawn, summon a random Dragon.
flavor: Releash the Dragon!

name: Rolling Fireball
text:
Deal $8 damage to a minion. Any excess damage continues to
the left or right.
flavor: Why don't they ever run perpendicular?

name: Dragoncaster
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, your next spell this turn costs (0).
flavor: It’s challenging to perform magic on dragonback. It’s so easy to drop the rabbit.

name: Learn Draconic
text: [x]Sidequest: Spend 8 Mana on spells. Reward: Summon a 6/6 Dragon.
flavor: Upon taking up the spellbook, Reno realized with a start: "I can't read."

name: Elemental Allies
text: [x]Sidequest: Play an Elemental 2 turns in a row. Reward: Draw 3 spells from your deck.
flavor: Reno’s lucky he wasn’t caught by a fire elemental.

name: Grizzled Wizard
text: Battlecry: Swap Hero Powers with your opponent until your next turn.
flavor: When he was young, he was an Outrageous Magus.

name: Sathrovarr
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a copy of it to your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavor: Just wait until you also find a copy in your pocket. And your desk! And your FRIDGE!!
targeting_arrow_text: Add a copy to your hand, deck, and battlefield.

name: Blowtorch Saboteur
text: Battlecry: Your opponent's next Hero Power costs (2) more.
flavor: Before he came along, we went through a lot of duct tape.

name: Molten Breath
text:
[x]Deal $5 damage to a
minion. If you're holding
a Dragon, gain 5 Armor.
flavor: Pizza so hot it burns OTHER PEOPLE’S MOUTHS.

name: Galakrond, the Wretched
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon 1 random Demon.
flavor: Fel-flames slowly writhed around the skeleton, until the great bones knit themselves together into a demonic monstrosity. Rafaam shielded his face from the heat but could not hide his grin.

name: Galakrond, the Nightmare
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw 1 card. It costs (0).
flavor: The enormous creature unfurled terrifying claws dripping with poisonous ichor. King Togwaggle was pleased, but inwardly disappointed the great Nightmare refused to wear the candle.

name: Galakrond, the Tempest
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 2/2 Storms with Rush.
flavor: Hagatha cried out over the winds: "Truly, you are as powerful as the Maelstrom!" To which the Tempest answered: "I AM THE MAELSTROM."

name: Galakrond, the Unbreakable
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw 1 minion. Give it +4/+4.
flavor: The ground quaked beneath the behemoth as Dr. Boom continued: "…with over 400 TONS of solid Storm Silver plate." Then he beeped a small remote. "And luxury spikes!"

name: Galakrond, the Unspeakable
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy 1 random enemy minion.
flavor: Lazul called Galakrond’s name, her voice echoed by whispers from the deep. Both of Galakrond’s eyes opened… and then other eyes opened, as well.

name: Darkscale Healer
text: Battlecry: Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: Healing is just something she does in her free time.  It's more of a hobby really.

name: Houndmaster
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2 and Taunt.
flavor: "Who let the dogs out?" he asks.  It's rhetorical.

name: Timber Wolf
text: Your other Beasts have +1 Attack.
flavor: Other beasts totally dig hanging out with timber wolves.

name: Tundra Rhino
text: Your Beasts have Charge.
flavor: Tundra rhinos are often mistaken for kodos.  Or am I mistaken?

name: Multi-Shot
text: Deal $3 damage to two random enemy minions.
flavor: You see, it's all about throughput.

name: Tracking
text: Discover a card from your deck.
flavor: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!

name: Arcane Shot
text: Deal $2 damage.
flavor: Magi conjured arcane arrows to sell to hunters, until hunters learned just enough magic to do it themselves.  The resulting loss of jobs sent Stormwind into a minor recession.

name: Gladiator's Longbow
text: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
flavor: The longbow allows shots to be fired from farther away and is useful for firing on particularly odorous targets.

name: Mind Blast
text: Deal $5 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: This spell blasts you directly in the MIND.

name: Ysera, Emerald Aspect
text: [x]Start of Game: Increase both players'maximum Mana by 5. Battlecry: Gain 3 Mana Crystals.
flavor: She was previously Yuhsera, with a ‘yuh’.
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a Into the Emerald Dream card pack.

name: Hopeful Dryad
text: Battlecry: Get a random Dream card.
flavor: "I hope this dragon doesn't eat me when it grows up."

name: Verdant Dreamsaber
text: Battlecry: If this costs (3) or less, attack two random enemy minions.
flavor: Hey, at least the card frame is verdant.

name: Ohn'ahra
text: At the end of your turn, play the top 3 cards from your deck.
flavor: Revered by the tauren and centaur, Ohn’ahra’s power over wind remains an inspiration to many.

name: Ward of Earth
text: Gain 5 Armor. Summon a random 5-Cost minion and give it Taunt.
flavor: Rock solid defense.

name: Treacherous Tormentor
text: Battlecry: Discover a Legendary minion with a Dark Gift.
flavor: He's so mean, he leaves you on red.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Into the Emerald Dream Reward Track.

name: Creature of Madness
text: Battlecry: Discover a 3-Cost minion with a Dark Gift.
flavor: So THIS is madness!
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a Into the Emerald Dream card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after opening a golden Into the Emerald Dream card pack.

name: Sporegnasher
text: Poisonous Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor: The overbite of a century.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Into the Emerald Dream Reward Track.

name: Forest Lord Cenarius
text: [x]Choose Thrice - Give your other minions +1/+3; or Summon a 5/5 Ancient with Taunt.
flavor: He handpicked Malfurion, and not Illidan, to become the first druid, therefore ensuring an endless cycle of sibling rivalry.

name: Exotic Houndmaster
text: Battlecry: Draw a Beast. Imbue your Hero Power.
flavor: "Hi lil guy! Have a bite of Green, it's good for you!"

name: Umbraclaw
text: Rush Deathrattle: Imbue your Hero Power.
flavor: Umbraclaws of a feather hibernate together.

name: Beanstalk Brute
text: Battlecry: Give +4/+4 to the top 3 minions in your deck.
flavor: I know a guy who might be able to handle this for us. He's kind of a specialist.

name: Aspect's Embrace
text: [x]Restore #4 Health. Draw a card. Imbue your Hero Power.
flavor: For when you really need a hug. Or to Imbue your Hero Power.

name: Typhoon
text: Each minion gets shuffled into a random player's deck.
flavor: I gotta go Julia, we got satyrs.

name: Spirits of the Forest
text: Choose One - Summon three 2/3 Wolves with Taunt; or Summon two 4/3 Falcons with Windfury.
flavor: ...or sixteen cows.

name: Emerald Bounty
text:
Draw 2 cards.
You can't play them
for 2 turns.
flavor: Overgrowd: (2)

name: Merithra
text: [x]Battlecry: Resurrect all different friendly minions that cost (8) or more.
flavor: The green dragon flight was always a Merithracracy.

name: Dragonscale Armaments
text: Draw a spell that started in your deck and one that didn't.
flavor: Why are dragons so good in the late game? 'Cause they scale!!!!

name: Mark of Ursol
text:
[x]Choose a minion. If it's
an enemy, set its stats
to 1/1. If it's friendly, set
its stats to 3/3 instead.
flavor: Marko! Ursol!

name: Ursine Maul
text: After your hero attacks, draw your highest Cost card.
flavor: Buy all the bears at the Ursine Mall!

name: Animated Moonwell
text: After you cast a spell, gain Attack equal to its Cost.
flavor: Your spells are sure to make a splash!

name: Renewing Flames
text: Lifesteal. Deal $5 damage to the lowest Health enemy, twice.
flavor: I AM THE PHOENIX KING!!!

name: Dreamwarden
text: [x]Taunt. Battlecry: If there is a card in your deck that didn't start there, draw it and gain +2/+2.
flavor: This is advanced dreamcatching.

name: Lightmender
flavor: How many lightmenders does it take to mend a lightorb?

name: Toreth the Unbreaking
text: [x]Divine Shield, Taunt Your Divine Shields take three hits to break.
flavor: Toreth took Bubble Hearth extra seriously.

name: Ursol
text: [x]Battlecry: Cast the highest Cost spell from your hand as  an Aura that lasts 3 turns.
flavor: Twin of Ursoc, they were inseparable until death drove Ursoc’s spirit to corruption, while Ursol’s remained at peace.

name: Illusory Greenwing
text: [x]Taunt. Deathrattle: Shuffle two 4/5 Dragons with Taunt into your deck. They're    Summoned When Drawn.
flavor: "MORE LIKE, A LOSER-Y GREENWING! MUAHAHA!" - Nightmare Lord Xavius
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Into the Emerald Dream Reward Track.

name: Amphibian's Spirit
text: [x]Give a minion +2/+2 and "Deathrattle: Give a friendly minion +2/+2 and this Deathrattle."
flavor: Look before you leap.

name: Spirit Bond
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. If that kills it, summon a 3/2 Wolf with Rush.
flavor: The name's Bond. Spirit Bond.

name: Grace of the Greatwolf
text: [x]Choose One - Deal $4 damage to the enemy hero; or Summon two 3/2 Wolves with Rush.
flavor: LOOK WHAT I CAN DO!!!!

name: Aegis of Light
text: Summon a random 2-Cost minion and give it Taunt. Imbue your Hero Power.
flavor: "Try scooching together! The arrows are getting through!"

name: Horn of Plenty
text: [x]Discover a Nature spell. It costs (2) less.
flavor: Don't be silly, there's never been a cornucopia in the art.

name: Grove Shaper
text: [x]After you cast a Nature spell, summon a 2/2 Treant with "Deathrattle: Get a copy of that spell."
flavor: Infinite Nature spell glitch.

name: Evergreen Stag
text: Elusive Lifesteal Taunt
flavor: Nevergreen Stag has Enrage, Overkill, and Honorable Kill.

name: Symbiosis
text: [x]Discover a Choose One card from another class.
flavor: It's the circle of life.

name: Shepherd's Crook
text: After your hero attacks, summon a 3/3 Sheep that's Dormant for 2 turns.
flavor: Beloved weapon of Little Bo-Sleep.

name: Omen
text: [x]Rush, Windfury Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. (Improves after this attacks!)
flavor: His tremendous wisdom could not survive the foul influence of the demons’ fel magic during the War of the Ancients. But his blessing from Elune did.

name: Aessina
text: [x]Battlecry: If 20 friendly minions have died this game, deal 20 damage split among all enemies.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: The Mother Wisp is a mysterious figure to most mortals, but to Ysera, she is a dear friend and companion.

name: Lunarwing Messenger
text: Lifesteal Battlecry: Imbue your Hero Power.
flavor: Back in my day this is how we got friend requests.

name: Goldpetal Drake
text: [x]Battlecry and Deathrattle: Imbue your Hero Power.
flavor: All that glitters is gold... Petal. Drake.

name: Briarspawn Drake
text: [x]At the end of your turn, attack a random enemy minion (excess damage hits the enemy hero).
flavor: Stop briarspawn-camping!

name: Clutch of Corruption
text:
[x]Choose a friendly Dragon.
Summon a 0/2 Egg that
hatches into a copy of it.
flavor: These eggs are no yolk!

name: Succumb to Madness
text: Discover a friendly Dragon that died this game. Resummon it.
flavor: u mad bro?

name: Darkrider
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a Dragon with a Dark Gift.
flavor: Before the corruption spread to the Emerald Dream, he was known only by this: Rider.

name: Brood Keeper
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, equip a 2/2 Sword.
flavor: Mess with the brood, and you get the dude!

name: Afflicted Devastator
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to all other friendly minions. Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: No pain, no... pain!

name: Wish of the New Moon
text: Deal $6 damage to a minion. (Cast 3 spells to gain Lifesteal.)
flavor: Because wishing upon a star was soooo last expansion.

name: Ritual of the New Moon
text: [x]Summon two random 3-Cost minions. (Cast 3 spells to summon 6-Cost minions instead.)
flavor: This ritual does nothing, but they do it anyway for the social connection.

name: Selenic Drake
text: [x]Elusive At the end of your turn, get a random Dragon.
flavor: Shouldn't this have like, a thousand times more attack?

name: Twilight Influence
text: Choose One - Destroy a minion with 3 or less Attack; or Summon a random 2-Cost minion.
flavor: "M-must... read... y-young adult... vampire novels..."

name: Tyrande
text: Battlecry: The next 3 spells you play cast twice.
flavor: High Priestess of the Moon Goddess, Tyrande has journeyed into the Emerald Dream to find Malfurion. Discovering Xavius’s nightmarish influence, she is determined to thwart those seeking to corrupt it.

name: Ysondre
text: [x]Taunt. Deathrattle: Summon a random Dragon for each time Ysondre has died this game.
flavor: Because sondre!

name: Eggbasher
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +4 Attack.
flavor: We could do this the over-easy way or the over-hard way.

name: Slumbering Sprite
text: [x]Starts Dormant. After you use your Hero Power, this awakens.
flavor: Careful, sometimes he punches and screams when he wakes up.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Into the Emerald Dream Reward Track.

name: Barkshield Sentinel
text: [x]Taunt After you use your Hero Power, gain +2 Health.
flavor: His bite is worse than his bark.

name: Tortolla
text: [x]Taunt, Elusive After this takes damage, gain 1 Armor and give this minion +1 Attack.
flavor: Tortolla survived the Burning Legion’s invasion unscathed, but the Nightmare’s corruption really got under his shell.

name: Weaver of the Cycle
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, deal 3 damage.
flavor: A terror at spin class.

name: Moonwell
text: Deal $4 damage to all enemy characters. Restore #4 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: Everyone always asks what the moonwell is but how come no one ever asks how well the moon is?

name: Glowroot Lure
text: [x]Taunt. Costs (1) less for each time you used your Hero Power this game.
flavor: You'd think this is a creation of the Emerald Nightmare, but you would be wrong.

name: Goldrinn
text: Rush Friendly Beasts deal double damage.
flavor: His relentless ferocity has made him well known among many peoples and by many names, including Lo’Gosh and the Great Wolf.

name: Mythical Runebear
text: Taunt. Battlecry: If this has 4 or more Attack, summon a copy of this.
flavor: The eyes have it: that's a Runebear.

name: Rotten Apple
text:
Restore #12 Health to your hero. For the
next 2 turns, deal $3 damage to your hero.
flavor: The rotten apple doesn't fall far from the corrupted world tree.

name: Fractured Power
text:
Destroy one of your Mana Crystals.
In 2 turns, gain two.
flavor: Look what Warlocks need just to mimic a fraction of our power!

name: Scavenging Flytrap
text:
After a minion dies,
gain its Attack.
flavor: Feed me, Seymour!

name: Rotheart Dryad
text: Deathrattle: Draw a minion that costs (7) or more.
flavor: Rot through the heart and Xavius is to blame!

name: Scorching Observer
text: Rush Lifesteal
flavor: We get it, you're mad that you only have one eye. But that's no excuse to burn down the entire Emerald Dream.

name: Wallow, the Wretched
text: While this is in your hand or deck, it gains a copy of every Dark Gift given to your minions.
flavor: Their hairdo is anything BUT wretched.

name: Avant-Gardening
text: [x]Discover a Deathrattle minion with a Dark Gift.
flavor: Normal gardening is so passé.

name: Agamaggan
text: [x]Battlecry: The next card you play costs your OPPONENT'S Health instead of Mana (up to 10).
flavor: Though he fell during the War of the Ancients, his legacy on Azeroth can be seen in the flourishing quilboar tribes who still worship him.

name: Sleep Paralysis
text: [x]Choose One - Summon two 3/6 Demons with Taunt that can't attack; or Destroy an enemy minion.
flavor: The wild SPRITE is paralyzed! It can't sleep!

name: Archdruid of Thorns
text: Battlecry: Gain the Deathrattles of your minions that died this turn.
flavor: He EARNED that "arch" gosh dangit!

name: Mother Duck
text: Battlecry: Summon three 1/1 Ducklings with Rush.
flavor: Also summons a 0/0 Ugly Duckling.

name: Alara'shi
text: [x]Battlecry: Transform minions in your hand into random Demons. (They keep their   original stats and Cost.)
flavor: It's a bird! It's a plane! It's a bear! It's a felstalker! It's a doomguard! It's an imp!

name: Hungering Ancient
text: [x]At the end of your turn, eat a minion in your deck and gain its stats. Deathrattle:       Add them to your hand.
flavor: This guy puts the horror in horrorticulture.

name: Twisted Treant
text: Deathrattle: Give a random minion in each player's hand -2 Attack.
flavor: You twist me right round baby right round like a treant baby right round round round

name: Q'onzu
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. Choose to keep it or put it on top of your opponent's deck.
flavor: "Where did Sarge go? Anyone seen Sarge?" - Harth

name: Living Garden
text: [x]Battlecry: Imbue your Hero Power. Reduce the Cost of a  minion in your hand by (1).
flavor: Prairies, horizons, gardens, what's next??

name: Wisprider
text: Battlecry: Imbue your Hero Power, then trigger it.
flavor: "I surf dead people."

name: Forbidden Shrine
text:
[x]Spend all your Mana.
Cast a random spell
that costs that much.
flavor: Telling me not to use something just makes me want to use it more.

name: Tricky Satyr
text: Battlecry: Get a copy of the lowest Cost card in your opponent's hand.
flavor: Silly Satyr, tricks are for whelps!

name: Mimicry
text:
Your opponent
draws 2 cards. You get copies of them.
flavor:
"Stop copying me!"
"sToP cOpyInG mEE!"

name: Web of Deception
text: Return a friendly minion to your hand to summon a 4/4 Spider with Stealth.
flavor: You sit on a web of LIES!

name: Shadowcloaked Assailant
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding one of the same cards as your opponent, shuffle theirs into their deck.
flavor:
"Got any Finjas?"
"Go fish."

name: Barbed Thorn
text: [x]Choose One - Gain Poisonous this turn; or Gain "Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to all enemies."
flavor: Comes with a pack of bandages.

name: Renferal, the Malignant
text: [x]Battlecry: Trap 1 random card in your opponent's hand for a turn. (Improved for each time you've played this.)
flavor: Go web go!

name: Ashamane
text: [x]Battlecry: Fill your hand with copies of cards from your opponent's deck. They cost (3) less.
flavor: In ancient times, Ashamane sacrificed herself to save night elves from the Legion’s wrath. Her name is still honored among their descendants.

name: Nightmare Fuel
text: Discover a copy of a minion in your opponent's deck. Combo: With a Dark Gift.
flavor: Every instance of "but not less than (1)" has been replaced with "but not more than (1)."

name: Plucky Podling
text:
[x]If this would transform into
a minion, it transforms into
one that costs (2) more.
flavor: "When I grow up I wanna be a Deathwing!"

name: Daydreaming Pixie
text:
At the end of your turn,
get a random Nature spell.
flavor: Pixie perfect.

name: Siphoning Growth
text:
Destroy a friendly
minion to gain 8 Armor.
flavor: No thanks. This one's all yours, bud.

name: Twisted Webweaver
text:
[x]Whenever you play another
minion you've already
played, draw a card.
flavor: This spider is so evil that it catches things in its web and EATS them!

name: Ominous Nightmares
text: [x]Choose One - Deal $1 damage to all minions; or Give a damaged minion +2/+2.
flavor: Everyone keeps talking about nightmares, but I don't see any horses?

name: Fae Trickster
text: Deathrattle: Draw a spell that costs (5) or more.
flavor: Muahaha they'll never see this spell that costs (5) or more coming!!
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Into the Emerald Dream Reward Track.

name: Tormented Dreadwing
text: Deathrattle: Draw 2 Dragons. Reduce their Costs by (1).
flavor: People say you can't see clearly through corruption, but you have more eyes than ever!
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Into the Emerald Dream Reward Track.

name: Dream Rager
text: Elusive
flavor: "Just try and ping me now!"

name: Overgrown Horror
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of minions in your hand with Dark Gifts by (2).
flavor: Fetch me the garden shears. The BIG shears.

name: Bloodthistle Illusionist
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a copy of this. One secretly dies when it takes damage.
flavor: Some people have imaginary friends. He has an imaginary twin.

name: Harbinger of the Blighted
text:
[x]Whenever this enters your
hand from the battlefield,
summon two random
2-Cost minions.
flavor: The more pretentious the name, the eviler the character.

name: Flutterwing Guardian
text: Taunt, Divine Shield Battlecry: Imbue your Hero Power.
flavor: Flutterwing in the skyyyyy, I can go twice as highhhhhh

name: Divination
text: Destroy a friendly Wisp to draw 3 cards.
flavor: Stop! It's already dead!

name: Hideous Husk
text: [x]Your Leeches steal 1 more Health from their victims. Battlecry: Summon two 0/2 Leeches.
flavor: This is what's known as a zombiotic relationship.

name: Rite of Atrocity
text: Discover an Undead. Spend 2 Corpses to give it a Dark Gift.
flavor: Turns out 2 Atrocities do make a Rite!

name: Grotesque Runeblade
text: [x]Battlecry: If the last card you played had an Unholy rune, gain +1 Attack. Repeat for     Blood and +1 Durability.
flavor: Frost confirmed to be the least gross rune.

name: Morbid Swarm
text: Choose One - Summon two 1/1 Ants; or Spend 2 Corpses to deal $4 damage to a minion.
flavor: Death Knights are masters of death who use shadow magic to control swarms of... ants?

name: Infested Breath
text: Deal $2 damage. Summon a 0/2 Leech.
flavor: Remember to brush your tongue as well as your teeth.

name: Corpse Flower
text: After your opponent summons a minion, spend 2 Corpses to deal 3 damage to it.
flavor: Sometimes it's better not to stop and smell the flowers.

name: Monstrous Mosquito
text: At the end of your turn, give your other minions +1 Attack.
flavor: I know every creature is valuable in the ecosystem of life. But these guys SUCK.

name: Sanguine Infestation
text:
Draw 2 cards.
Summon two 0/2 Leeches.
flavor: Don't worry, they're prescribed leeches!

name: Nythendra
text: [x]Taunt. Deathrattle: Split into 1/1 Beetles. At the start of your turn, reform with any remaining.
flavor: Bug Report: Minion split into 1/1 Beetles and then reformed at the start of next turn.

name: Ursoc
text: Battlecry: Attack ALL other minions. Deathrattle: Resurrect any this killed.
flavor: The great bear lord was so mighty that the Nightmare could only corrupt his spirit, not his strength.

name: Wyvern's Slumber
text: Choose One - Summon two Dormant Dreadseeds; or Deal $2 damage to all minions.
flavor: But watch, as soon as you try to go to sleep it'll be running all around the house making a bunch of noise.

name: Grim Harvest
text: Draw a card. Summon a random Dormant Dreadseed.
flavor: "Muahaha… This year's harvest was quite grim… just how I like it! Because I'm EVIL!"

name: Dreadsoul Corrupter
text: [x]Battlecry and Deathrattle: Summon a random Dormant Dreadseed.
flavor: Believe it or not, Dreadsouls aren't already corrupted.

name: Defiled Spear
text:
[x]After your hero attacks an
 enemy, deal your hero's
Attack damage to another
random enemy.
flavor: TOGETHAAA

name: Reforestation
text: [x]Choose One - Draw a spell; or Draw a minion. (Hold this for 3 turns to do both!)
flavor: ¿Porque no los dos?

name: Naralex, Herald of the Flights
text:
Your first Dragon
each turn costs (1).
flavor: Naptime is officially OVER!
how_to_earn: Earnable on the Into the Emerald Dream Reward Track.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Into the Emerald Dream Reward Track.

name: Hamuul Runetotem
text: [x]Start of Game: If each spell in your deck is Nature, Imbue your Hero Power. Repeat this every 2 spells you cast.
flavor: Rune (Death Knight) + Totem (Shaman) = Druid??

name: Shaladrassil
text:
[x]Get all 5 Dream cards.
If you've played a higher
Cost card while holding
this, corrupt them!
flavor: Wow, that Nightmare-B-Gone spray really works! Too bad we didn't have enough for the whole tree.

name: Dreambound Disciple
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Your next Hero Power costs (0).
flavor: I'm not taking a nap, I'm just doing some extra studying about the Dream!

name: Photosynthesis
text: Restore #6 Health. Get 3 random Druid spells.
flavor: Nothing beats some time relaxing in the sun with a pile of good mulch.

name: Dreambound Raptor
text: After you play a minion, give it a random Bonus Effect.
flavor: Dream, dream, dream, dream, dream, dreeeeeeeeam.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Into the Emerald Dream Reward Track.

name: Bitterbloom Knight
text: Battlecry: Imbue your Hero Power.
flavor: Every rose has its thorn, beard, and shield.

name: Broll Bearmantle
text:
After you cast a spell, summon a random
Animal Companion.
flavor: That's just how he Brolls.

name: Nightmare Lord Xavius
text: Battlecry: Discover a minion from your deck. Give it a Dark Gift.
flavor: Xavius will also be replacing Illidan as the Demon Hunter hero in an upcoming patch.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Into the Emerald Dream Reward Track.

name: Resplendent Dreamweaver
text: [x]Lifesteal Battlecry: If you've Imbued your Hero Power twice, deal 4 damage to a minion.
flavor: Have you ever had a dream that that you um you had you'd you would you could you'd do you wi you wants you you could do so you you'd do you could you you want so much you could do anything?

name: Tranquil Treant
text: Deathrattle: Both players gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavor: "Cut down my trunk and make a Mana Crystal," said the tree. "Then you can ramp away... and be happy."

name: Spirit Gatherer
text: Battlecry: Get a Wisp. Imbue your Hero Power.
flavor: They call him the Wisp Whisperer.

name: Spark of Life
text: Choose One - Discover a Mage spell; or Discover a Druid spell.
flavor: Just don't spark that life too close to the World Tree.

name: Envoy of the Glade
text: [x]Battlecry: Transform all Neutral cards in your deck  into random Druid ones.
flavor: Announce Gladeness.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Into the Emerald Dream Reward Track.

name: Stellar Balance
text: Get a Moonfire and a Starfire. Give them Spell Damage +1.
flavor: Famously, Moonfire and Starfire are about equal in power.

name: Jumpscare!
text: Discover a Demon that costs (5) or more with a Dark Gift. Shuffle the other two into your deck.
flavor: Might need a pair of [Druidic Pants of Water Resistance] after this one.

name: Malorne the Waywatcher
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a Legendary Wild God. If you've Imbued your Hero Power 4 times, set its Cost to (1).
flavor: A figure of legend and myth, Malorne is one of the oldest of the Wild Gods and father to Cenarius himself.

name: Petal Peddler
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
give another random
 friendly Dragon +1/+1.
flavor: The Emerald Nightmare might actually be a good thing for her business.

name: Nightmare Dragonkin
text: Deathrattle: Reduce the Cost of the right-most card in your hand by (2).
flavor: But what if I'm left-handed??

name: Ravenous Felhunter
text: Deathrattle: Resurrect a friendly Deathrattle minion that costs (4) or less. Summon a copy of it.
flavor: Loves soul food.

name: Ferocious Felbat
