name: Aviana, Elune's Chosen
text: [x]Battlecry: Start a three turn lunar cycle. When the Full Moon rises, your cards cost (1) this game.
flavor: The Mistress of Birds takes a special interest in all creatures of the sky, as well as those who have wings but have yet to fly.

name: Merry Moonkin
text: [x]At the end of your turn, gain 1 Armor. (Improved by Wisps you control!)
flavor: Merry Wispmas!

name: Starsurge
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. (Improved by each friendly minion that died this game.)
flavor: "The stars urge you to DIE."

name: Curious Cumulus
text: [x]At the end of your turn, give your hero Divine Shield.
flavor: Hole in one!

name: Sharp-Eyed Lookout
text: Battlecry: Draw a card. It costs (1) less this turn. (I know its name!)
flavor: "It's a bird! It's a bird! It's a bird!"
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a Into the Emerald Dream card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after opening a golden Into the Emerald Dream card pack.

name: Kaldorei Priestess
text: [x]Battlecry: Give all enemy minions -2 Attack until your next turn. Imbue your Hero Power.
flavor: Elune, I implore you... bless my game with good rng, so that I may achieve Legend with a 100% winrate.

name: Critter Caretaker
text: At the end of your turn, restore #3 Health to both heroes.
flavor: She teaches all her critters two things: heel and heal.

name: Meadowstrider
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Put a Meadowstrider on the bottom of your deck. It costs (1).
flavor: Pwease stop meadowing in my affaiws.

name: Ancient of Yore
text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns. While Dormant, gain 3 Armor and draw a card at the end of your turn.
flavor: Ancient of my what?

name: Gnawing Greenfin
text: Battlecry: Get a random Murloc.
flavor:
"Are you eating bark again!?"
"Gnawwwww...."

name: Guitar Soloist
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control no other minions, draw a spell, a minion, and a weapon.
flavor: She is the hero of the guitar. The guitar hero. Trademark.

name: Harmonica Soloist
text: Battlecry: If you control no other minions, Discover and cast a Secret.
flavor: A magician never reveals their Secrets. A musician on the other hand...

name: Keyboard Soloist
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control no other minions, summon two 1/2 Amps with Spell Damage +1.
flavor: Give her a hand, everybody! Or maybe 4!

name: Opera Soloist
text: Battlecry: If you control no other minions, deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: It ain't over until the imp mother sings.

name: Drum Soloist
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you control no other minions, gain +2/+2 and Rush.
flavor: "Was I rushin' or was I dragon?"

name: Baritone Imp
text: [x]Battlecry: Take Fatigue damage. Gain that much Attack and Health.
flavor: He used to be an epic sax guy, but now he's just a common.

name: Crescendo
text:
[x]Take Fatigue damage.
Deal that much damage
to all enemies.
flavor: The more you flail your arms, the better the orchestra plays! Yup, that's definitely how it works.

name: Crazed Conductor
text: [x]Battlecry: Take Fatigue damage. Summon that many 3/3 Imps.
flavor: "The Twisting Nether is singing to me… WHAT IS THAT MELODY!?"

name: Rin, Orchestrator of Doom
text: [x]Taunt. Deathrattle: Both players draw 2 cards, discard 2 cards, and destroy the top 2 cards of their deck.
flavor: Rin's orchestra is the best of the best. When your replacement is just one summoning away, you have to play perfectly.

name: Beatboxer
text: [x]Combo: Deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: "ERROR. CANNOT COMPUTE 'NO PUNCHING ALLOWED DURING MUSICAL PERFORMANCE'."

name: Rhyme Spinner
text: [x]Rush Combo: Gain +1/+1 for each other Combo card you've played this game.@ (@)
flavor: For ONCE we're not talking about ice!

name: Mixtape
text: Discover a copy of a card your opponent played this game.
flavor: That tape has got poetry and clarinet on it, Garona. POETRY. AND CLARINET.

name: Mic Drop
text: Draw 2 cards. Finale: Give your weapon +2 Attack.
flavor: The perfect card to play after emoting.

name: Breakdance
text: Return a friendly minion to your hand. Summon a Dancer with its stats and Rush.
flavor: "Commander! Uhh... I'm... Pretty sure we just got served? I'm not really trained for this."

name: Disc Jockey
text: Combo: Add a random Combo card to your hand.
flavor: Hype coefficient insufficient.

name: MC Blingtron
text: [x]Battlecry: Both players equip 1/2 Microphones. Your opponent's increases all damage they take by 1!
flavor: If this is the outcome of the robot uprising, then sign me up!

name: Bounce Around (ft. Garona)
text: Return all friendly minions to your hand. They cost (1) this turn.
flavor: Another one.

name: E.T.C., Band Manager
text: [x]While building your deck, assemble a band of 3 cards.  Battlecry: Discover one!
flavor: "This next band features the one and only M.C. Tech on the drums, the fungal king of the keyboard Loatheb, and the showstopping vocal chops of Spellbreaker!"
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a Festival of Legends card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the Festival of Legends Tavern Pass.

name: Void Virtuoso
text: During your turn, your hero is Immune.
flavor: That is one interesting dress code.

name: Dirge of Despair
text:
[x]Deal $3 damage to a
character. If that kills it,
summon a Demon from
your deck.
flavor: Oh, the misery!

name: Demonic Dynamics
text: [x]Discover 2 Demons. Finale: Give them +1/+2.
flavor: The Blue Imp Group sure knows how to put on a show!

name: Felstring Harp
text:
[x]Whenever your hero would
take damage on your turn,
restore 2 Health instead.
Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: Playing it will singe your fingers and wither your soul, but at least it never needs restringing!

name: Symphony of Sins
text: [x]Discover and play a Movement. Shuffle the other 6 into your deck.
flavor: Makes for some killer final boss music.

name: Amplified Elekk
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Before this show can continue, we have to bass-boost the elephant in the room.

name: Audio Amplifier
text: Battlecry: Set your maximum Mana and hand size to 11.
flavor: And you thought we were putting Wildheart Guff in Core. We'd never do that! WINK WINK.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Festival of Legends Reward Track.

name: Ghost Writer
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. Finale: Discover another.
flavor: This eccentric scribe was cursed to an afterlife of never being recognized for his talents! Muahaha!
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Festival of Legends Reward Track.

name: Static Waveform
text: At the start of EACH turn, lose 1 Attack or Health (chosen randomly).
flavor: LET ME SEE YOU MAKE SOME NOISE!!!

name: Worgen Roadie
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 0/3 Instrument Case for your opponent. (Break it for a random weapon!)
flavor: "I asked for an instrument, and you give me a CURSED BLADE!?"
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Festival of Legends Reward Track.

name: Concert Promo-Drake
text: Tradeable Finale: Destroy an enemy minion.
flavor: There's a reason why it's promoting the festival instead of playing in it - it's a rhyme-lost protodrake.

name: Cowbell Soloist
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control no other minions, deal 2 damage.
flavor: Hot take: We need LESS cowbell. Much, much less.

name: Air Guitarist
text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Durability.
flavor: Nailing that solo was a breeze.

name: Hipster
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell from your opponent's class that isn't in their deck.
flavor: Oh, so you like Hearthstone? Name every spell.

name: Crowd Surfer
text: [x]Deathrattle: Give ANY other minion +1/+1 and this Deathrattle.
flavor: I'm pretty sure it's the band that's supposed to be crowd surfing, but you do you little dude.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the Festival of Legends Tavern Pass.

name: Stereo Totem
text: At the end of your turn, give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: Pass the ox cord!
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Festival of Legends Reward Track.

name: Frequency Oscillator
text: Battlecry: The next Mech you play costs (1) less.
flavor: Our lawyer made us change the flavor text of this card so we wouldn't get sued.

name: Rowdy Fan
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. It has +4 Attack while this is alive.
flavor: "This song is so good, it makes me want to PUNCH SOMEONE IN THE FACE!!"
targeting_arrow_text: Give +4 Attack while this is alive.

name: Obsessive Fan
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. It has Stealth while this is alive.
flavor: "Obsessed? No! I'm just really really really really really really really really really really into E.T.C.'s music and everything he says, does, thinks, lives, and breathes!"
targeting_arrow_text: Give Stealth while this is alive.

name: Annoying Fan
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. It can't attack while this is alive.
flavor: No, Annoy-o-Tron, an air horn is not an instrument.
targeting_arrow_text: Give "Can't attack" while this is alive.

name: Cover Artist
text: Battlecry: Transform into a 3/3 copy of a minion.
flavor: The Faceless Ones are servants of Yogg-Saron, and they feed on fear. Right now they are feeding on our fear of you realizing we copied this flavor text.

name: Merch Seller
text:
[x]At the end of your turn, put
a random spell on the top
 of your opponent's deck.
flavor: "Sorry, we're all out of Mediums. All we've got left are Gnome, Extra Large, and Annihilan."

name: Photographer Fizzle
text: [x]Battlecry: Take a Snapshot of your current hand and shuffle it into your deck. (Once per game)
flavor: Look at this photograph.

name: Rock Master Voone
text: Battlecry: Copy each minion of a different type in your hand.
flavor: After several audience members were burnt to a crisp, Voone's band became a lot less all-in on Dragons.

name: Rush the Stage
text: [x]Draw two Rush minions. They cost (1) less.
flavor: Left Shark, get to the stage now!

name: Bunch of Bananas
text: Give a minion +1/+1. (3 Bananas left!)
flavor: This card has bananas (spelled: B-A-N-A-N-A-S).

name: Volume Up
text: Draw 3 spells. Finale: Discover a copy of one.
flavor: You have to pay Mana to do that!? I thought it was just in the settings menu!

name: Infinitize the Maxitude
text: Discover a spell. Reduce its Cost by (1). Finale: Return this to your hand at end of turn.
flavor: When your music is instrumental, it doesn't matter if the words make no sense.

name: Barrel of Monkeys
text: Summon a 1/4 Monkey with Taunt. (3 Monkeys left!)
flavor: There used to be four monkeys, but then one fell off and bumped his head.

name: Stranglethorn Heart
text: Tradeable Resurrect all friendly Beasts that cost (5) or more.
flavor: The Stranglethorn mentality is to be happy with the bare necessities.

name: Hardcore Cultist
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage. Finale: To all enemies.
flavor: Thumb in = devil horns. Thumb out = I love you. A VERY important distinction when you're at a metal concert.

name: Climactic Necrotic Explosion
text: [x]Lifesteal. Deal ${0} damage. Summon {1} {2}/{3} Souls. (Randomly improved by Corpses you've spent)
flavor: The less legible the band's logo, the more hardcore it is.

name: Shadow Chord: Distort
text:
Give a minion -5/-5.
If it has 0 Attack, destroy it.
flavor: For some unknown reason, using distortion intentionally in your music will attract hundreds of geckos to your location.

name: Idol's Adoration
text: Your Hero Power costs (0). After you use it, lose 1 Durability.
flavor: That is a mic, not a door.

name: Harmonic Pop
text: Deal $3 damage to all minions. Summon a 6/6 Popstar. (Swaps each turn.)
flavor: Here with supporting vocals: Snap and Crackle!

name: Fight Over Me
text:
Choose two enemy minions. They fight!
Add copies of any that
die to your hand.
flavor: And you thought the battles between the Alliance and Horde got ugly…

name: Disco Maul
text: [x]Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +1/+1. (Play minions while equipped to improve!)
flavor: Nah, dis go face.

name: Boogie Down
text: [x]Summon two 1-Cost minions from your deck. Finale: Summon another.
flavor: Whatever you do, do NOT sashay to the right.

name: Spotlight
text: Tradeable Convert a friendly Divine Shield into a 5/5 Elemental.
flavor: Everyone's eyes are on you! Well, they're also looking at the giant Elemental that we're using as a spotlight, but mainly at you!

name: Annoy-o-Troupe
text: [x]Taunt, Divine Shield Deathrattle: Summon three 1/2 Mechs with Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: Some classes get Void Lords, other classes get Annoyed Lords.

name: Jitterbug
text: Divine Shield After a friendly character loses Divine Shield, draw a card.
flavor: The only bug that was intentional.

name: Audio Medic
text: Rush Finale: Gain Lifesteal.
flavor: His performance isn't over, watch!

name: Paparazzi
text: Battlecry: Discover a Legendary minion.
flavor: When you're a Legendary minion, you get a shiny orange gem, a dragon emblem, and about 100 of these people following you everywhere.

name: Lead Dancer
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your deck with less Attack than this minion.
flavor:
"Follow my lead!"
*dies*

name: Kangor, Dancing King
text: [x]Lifesteal Deathrattle: Swap this with a minion from your hand and give it Lifesteal.
flavor: After Dr. Boom's involvement with the League of EVIL, Kangor cut ties with the Boomsday Labs and began pursuing his true passion - DISCO!!!

name: Starlight Groove
text: Give your hero Divine Shield. For the rest of the game, playing a Holy spell refreshes it.
flavor: In space, no one can hear you groove.

name: Dreamboat
text: Battlecry: Restore #3 Health to all other friendly minions. Gain +1/+1 for each one Overhealed.
flavor: As the only member that can sing underwater, Paz saved Poison Bloom's Zin-Azshari tour from failure.

name: Heartbreaker Hedanis
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to this minion. Overheal: Deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: Hedanis has won over the hearts and minds of millions of fans all over Azeroth! Shadow magic had nothing to do with it - not that you asked or anything.

name: Love Everlasting
text: Your first spell each turn costs (2) less. Lasts until you don't play a spell on your turn.
flavor: Poison Bloom was accused of plagiarizing the "Ooh, how long can this go on (ooh yeah)" hook from an old-school musical group called The Saronite Chain Gang.

name: Freebird
text: [x]Charge Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other Freebird you've played this game.@ (@)
flavor: Free!? But it costs Mana!

name: Funkfin
text: Divine Shield Your minions with Divine Shield have +2 Attack.
flavor: Shake your groove fin!

name: Power Chord: Synchronize
text: [x]Choose a minion. Add a copy of it to your hand. Finale: Give both +1/+2.
flavor:
"It's all about you, girl
On your 16,000th birthday"

name: Heartthrob
text: Overheal: Summon a random minion with Cost equal to the amount Overhealed.
flavor: Oh no, Harth! Look out! He's here to rob you!

name: Unpopular Has-Been
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 5-Cost minion from the past.
flavor: Oh man, she used to rock more than ANYONE back in the Year of the Kraken. I wish I could've seen her perform back then…

name: Party Animal
text: [x]Battlecry: Give +1/+1 to each minion of a different type in your hand.
flavor: He's the wildlife of the party!
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Festival of Legends Reward Track.

name: Razorfen Rockstar
text:
After you gain Armor,
gain 2 more.
flavor: Quilboar feel Rock in their blood. And blood in their rocks.

name: Altered Chord
text: Lifesteal Deal $6 damage to a minion. Costs (3) less if you're Overloaded.
flavor: I'll never understand how bands and orchestras allow musicians that just…. play... off-key. Would love opinions on this.

name: Brass Elemental
text: Rush, Divine Shield, Taunt, Windfury
flavor: You handle the water spells. It's got the earth, wind, and fire covered.

name: Saxophone Soloist
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control no other minions, add a Saxophone Soloist to your hand.
flavor: He used to play to crowds of adoring Murlocs, but 20 years later all that's left is gigs at secluded clubs and regrets. Where did all the time go? His dreams of fame and fortune, snuffed out like the flame of a small candle in a dimly lit bar. Nothing but smoke in the wind.

name: Flowrider
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're Overloaded, Discover a spell from your deck.
flavor: Her music sounds a lot better underwater where you can't hear it at all.

name: JIVE, INSECT!
text: Transform a minion into Ragnaros the Firelord. Overload: (2)
flavor: "WHY IS NO ONE JIVING? I SPECIFICALLY REQUESTED IT!"

name: Verse Riff
text: [x]Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. Gain 2 Armor. Finale: Play your last Riff.
flavor: Well anyways, here's Worgen Wall.

name: Chorus Riff
text: Draw a minion. Give it +3/+3. Finale: Play your last Riff.
flavor: What do you mean, what do you mean, I SAY WHAT DO YOU MEEEEEAN, mean, mean, meaaaaaaan this chorus is repetitive?

name: Bridge Riff
text: [x]Summon a 3/4 Rocker with Taunt and a 4/3 with Rush. Finale: Play your last Riff.
flavor: Can be played in other places too.

name: Melomania
text:
Each time you play a minion this turn,
add a random Shaman spell to your hand.
flavor: I once saw a horse that had watermelons for hair. It was a melon mane, ya?!

name: Chill Vibes
text: Restore #8 Health. Finale: Summon a 3/3 Elemental with Taunt.
flavor: "You're listening to 47.7 Shaman FM radio. It's time to kick back, relax, and take in the music."

name: Pack the House
text: Summon a random 6, 5, 4, and 3-Cost minion. Overload: (2)
flavor: How many Pack the Houses would a pack house if a pack could house Pack the House?

name: Inzah
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Overload cards cost (1) less.
flavor: Inzah plays the trumpet, saxophone, piano, guitar, AND bass. No wonder he's always so overloaded!

name: Roaring Applause
text:
Draw a card.
Repeat for each
minion of a different
type you control.
flavor: Please clap.

name: Drum Circle
text: Choose One - Summon five 2/2 Treants; or Give your minions +2/+4 and Taunt.
flavor: It's more of a drum pentagon, really.

name: Peaceful Piper
text: Choose One - Draw a Beast; or Discover one.
flavor: "Is there anything worth more than peace and love on the planet Azeroth?"

name: Summer Flowerchild
text: [x]  Battlecry: Draw two cards   that cost (6) or more. Finale: They cost (1) less.
flavor: "Ugh, those Winter Floweradults just don't get our music."

name: Harmonic Mood
text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. Gain 4 Armor. (Swaps each turn.)
flavor: ROYGBive your hero +2 Attack this turn.

name: Free Spirit
text: [x]Battlecry and Deathrattle: Your Hero Power gains 1 more Armor this game.
flavor: His soul was supposed to go to Ardenweald, but you can't chain a free spirit down.

name: Spread the Word
text:
Draw 2 cards.
Costs (1) less for each Attack your hero has.

name: Groovy Cat
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Your Hero Power gives your hero 1 more Attack this game.
flavor: "Like, what if we're all just cards living in this box called Hearthstone, man?"

name: Zok Fogsnout
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two {0}/{1} Quilboar with Taunt.  (Improved by your hero Attack    & Armor gained this turn!)
flavor: Despite having only 3 digits on each hand, Zok plays Bass like he has 5.

name: Rhythm and Roots
text: [x]Choose One (Secretly) - Summon three 5/5 Ancients in 2 turns; or 8/8 Giants in 4 turns.
flavor: For Zok's latest song, he decided to go back to his roots. Like the ones on a tree. Tree roots.

name: Timber Tambourine
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon 1 5/5 Ancient. (Play cards that cost (5) or more while   equipped to improve!)
flavor: Timberine anyone? TIMBERINE!?

name: Taste of Chaos
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Finale: Discover a Fel spell.
flavor: It's spicy!

name: DJ Manastorm
text: Battlecry: Set the Cost of spells in your hand to (0). After you cast one, the others cost (1) more.
flavor: Do not sleep on his Tinker Town deep house set - absolutely legendary.

name: Eye of Shadow
text: Your hero has Lifesteal.
flavor: It's hard to makeup flavor text sometimes.

name: Halveria Darkraven
text: Rush After a friendly Rush minion attacks, give your minions +1 Attack.
flavor: You know someone's cool when their name sounds like a font.

name: Instrument Smasher
text:
[x]Whenever your weapon is
destroyed, equip a random
Demon Hunter weapon.
flavor: Guitar? Nah, she plays percussion.

name: Glaivetar
text: [x] Deathrattle: Draw 1 card.  (Play Outcast cards while  equipped to improve!)
flavor: Might need tuning, I think it's a bit sharp.

name: Power Slider
text: [x]Rush. Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each minion of a different type you've played this game.@ (@)
flavor: There's a huge difference between a battle-axe and an axe-guitar. One is for combat, and the other is for combat AND rocking out.

name: The One-Amalgam Band
text: [x]Battlecry: Gain a random Bonus Effect for each minion of a different type you've played this game.@ (@)
flavor: Why be good with ONE instrument when you can be terrible with ALL of them!!!

name: Snakebite
text: Rush Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each minion that died this turn.@ (@)
flavor: Don't look her in the eyes or you'll turn to ROCK!

name: SECURITY!!
text: Summon two 1/1 Illidari with Rush. Outcast: Summon one more.
flavor: Check all of the boxes that contain VENGEANCE to play this card.

name: Going Down Swinging
text: [x]Give your hero +2 Attack and Immune this turn, then attack each enemy minion.
flavor: Halveria was outcast from Gilneas for being too edgy, which she sees as an achievement.

name: Blackrock 'n' Roll
text: Give all minions in your deck Attack and Health equal to their Cost.
flavor: Thank goodness it's not called Black-ska Mountain.

name: Instrument Tech
text: Battlecry: Draw a weapon.
flavor: A tech card without Tradeable? CRINGE.

name: Mish-Mash Mosher
text: [x]Rush After this attacks, gain +1 Attack and attack a  random enemy minion.
flavor: In the pit, he feels more alive than ever.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Festival of Legends Reward Track.

name: Outfit Tailor
text: [x]Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Attack and Health equal to this minion's.
flavor: She has this terrible habit of eating melted cheese while on the job.
targeting_arrow_text: Give stats equal to this minion's.

name: Metrognome
text: [x]After you play a {0}-Cost card, draw a {1}-Cost card. (Then increase!)
flavor: He's very popular on Click-Clock.

name: Arcanite Ripper
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Lifesteal Undead. (Change your Health on your turn while equipped to improve!)
flavor: A guitar with a skull - perfect for headbanging.

name: Death Growl
text: Choose a minion. Spread its Deathrattle to adjacent minions.
flavor: GRRRRR I'M SO ANGRY BECAUSE I'M DEAD!

name: Pozzik, Audio Engineer
text: Battlecry: Add two 3/3 Bots to your opponent's hand. Deathrattle: Summon them for yourself.
flavor: "I'm down here, fixin' all the Gnomish tech that breaks down mid-set while that buffoon Fizzle is up there taking pictures of the sky. YOU tell ME who's the better engineer!"
how_to_earn: Earnable after collecting 30 Festival of Legends cards.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the Festival of Legends Tavern Pass.

name: Harmonic Metal
text: [x]Give 4 random minions in your hand +2/+2. (Swaps each turn.)
flavor: I have bashed together plenty of pieces of metal in my day and not ONCE has it sounded harmonic.

name: Boneshredder
text: [x]Battlecry: Spend 5 Corpses to trigger and gain the Deathrattle of a random friendly minion that died this game.
flavor: Is that his makeup or just his natural fur pattern?

name: Fan Club
text: Restore #3 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: "Well that was weird. Yeah, I just walked up to the president of the fan club, he blabbered on for like 10 minutes, and then gave me a bike voucher..."

name: Harmonic Disco
text: Discover a 5-Cost minion. Summon it with +1/+1. (Swaps each turn.)
flavor: "Worry not, festival patrons! A disco is hardly any means for panic!"

name: Record Scratcher
text: [x]Deathrattle: Refresh 1 Mana Crystal. (Play Combo cards while     equipped to improve!)
flavor: A Rogue's favorite audio sample is an orchestral stab.

name: Kodohide Drumkit
text: [x]Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions. (Gain Armor while     equipped to improve!)
flavor: Stolen from a druidic drum circle, now destined to make music that is actually good.

name: Cosmic Keyboard
text:
[x]After you cast a spell,
summon an Elemental with
stats equal to its Cost.
Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: Mine is signed by Algalon himself.

name: Screaming Banshee
text: [x]Lifesteal  After your hero gains Health,  summon a Soul with that  much Attack and Health.
flavor: Her singing will be sure to wake you up (wake you up inside).

name: Death Metal Knight
text: [x]Taunt Costs Health instead of Mana if your hero was healed this turn.
flavor: He prefers listening to bands dead rather than live.

name: Cage Head
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 9/9 Blight Boar with Charge and Taunt.
flavor: You get your head stuck in a cage ONCE, and all of a sudden you've got a new nickname.

name: Lightshow
text:
[x]Shoot 2 beams at enemies
that each deal $2 damage.
Your future Lightshows
shoot one more beam.
flavor: Always remember P.L.U.R.: Peace, Laser-beams, Unity, Respect.

name: Rewind
text: Discover a copy of another spell you've cast this game.
flavor: If you don't find the spell you want, just cast this one more time and see if you get lucky.

name: Mosh Pit
text: [x]Spend 3 Corpses to give a friendly minion Reborn.
flavor: Let the Corpses hit the floor!

name: Holotechnician
text:
After ANY minion takes exactly 1 damage,
destroy it.
flavor: Ironically, operating the spotlight comes with very little recognition.

name: Synthesize
text:
Add a random 1, 2,
and 3-Cost Elemental to your hand.
flavor: After the invention of elemental audio processing, Azeroth went through a major synth phase.

name: Audio Splitter
text: Deathrattle: Copy the highest Cost spell in your hand.
flavor: "I tried to give him some constructive criticism but gosh, he really hates feedback!"

name: Pyrotechnician
text:
[x]After you cast a spell,
add a random Fire spell
to your hand.
flavor: The difference between a pyrotechnician and a pyromaniac is a paycheck.

name: Tony, King of Piracy
text: Battlecry: Replace your deck with a copy of your opponent's. Finale: Draw a card.
flavor: Tony prefers sailing on torrents rather than streams.

name: Festival Security
text: [x]Taunt Finale: Force all enemy minions to attack this.
flavor: "Incident in the mosh pit? Copy that, be there in a year."
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Festival of Legends Reward Track.

name: Candleraiser
text: [x]Divine Shield Finale: Give adjacent minions Divine Shield.
flavor:
You would not believe your eyes
If ten million kobold guys
Lit up the world to this ogre beat

name: Harmonic Hip Hop
text: Deal $1 damage. Give your weapon +3 Attack. (Swaps each turn.)
flavor: I can name four things that rhyme with 'orange': Four inch, Door hinge, Syringe, and uh… Shmorange.

name: Rolling Stone
text: [x]Rush Battlecry: If the last card you played costs (1), gain +1/+1.
flavor: Sadly, the mariachi band it used to play in gathers no más.

name: Jazz Bass
text: [x]Deathrattle: Your next spell costs (1) less. (Overload while equipped to improve!)
flavor: No birds, plural, were harmed in the making of this bass.

name: Thornmantle Musician
text: Finale: The next Beast you summon gets +1/+1.
flavor: She calls the hyena her "little chef". Not sure what that's about.

name: Jungle Jammer
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a random 1-Cost Beast. (Cast spells while     equipped to improve!)
flavor: When asked what animal they would be, people always say things like "I'd be wolf-lion hybrid mix. King of the jungle, but still sociable and ferocious." No, you'd be a rat.

name: Arrow Smith
text:
[x]After you cast a spell,
deal 1 damage to the
lowest Health enemy.
flavor: "What do you mean it's a violin bow!?!"

name: Mister Mukla
text: [x]Rush. Battlecry: Fill your opponent's hand with Bananas.
flavor: Music is Mukla's escape from his anger. When he's on-stage, it's like he's a whole different gorilla… Until you boo him.

name: Big Dreams
text: Summon the highest Cost Beast from your hand. It goes Dormant for 2 turns.
flavor:
Just a small town Taunka
Livin' in a lonely... waunka

name: Banjosaur
text: [x]Rush Whenever this attacks, draw a Beast and gain its stats.
flavor: You'll all be singing along once he gets to the tyranno-chorus.

name: Lightwarden
text: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
flavor: She’s smaller than her sisters Mediumwarden and Heavywarden.

name: The Black Knight
text: Tradeable Battlecry: Destroy an enemy minion with Taunt.
flavor: He was sent by the Lich King to disrupt the Argent Tournament.   We can pretty much mark that a failure.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked after 5000 total wins.

name: Young Priestess
text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.
flavor: She can't wait to learn Power Word: Fortitude Rank 2.

name: Big Game Hunter
text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Destroy a minion with 7 or more Attack.
flavor: Mere devilsaurs no longer excite him.  Soon he'll be trying to catch Onyxia with only a dull Krol Blade.
targeting_arrow_text: Destroy a minion with an Attack of 7 or more.

name: Alarm-o-Bot
text:
[x]At the start of your turn,
swap this minion with a
   random one in your hand.
flavor: WARNING.  WARNING.  WARNING.

name: Acolyte of Pain
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, draw a card.
flavor: He trained when he was younger to be an acolyte of joy, but things didn’t work out like he thought they would.

name: Argent Squire
text: Divine Shield
flavor: "I solemnly swear to uphold the Light, purge the world of darkness, and to eat only burritos." - The Argent Dawn Oath

name: Angry Chicken
text: Has +5 Attack while damaged.
flavor: There is no beast more frightening (or ridiculous) than a fully enraged chicken.

name: Worgen Infiltrator
text: Stealth
flavor: If you want to stop a worgen from infiltrating, just yell, "No! Bad boy!"

name: Voodoo Doctor
text: Battlecry: Restore #2 Health.
flavor: Voodoo is an oft-misunderstood art. But it is art.

name: Bloodmage Thalnos
text: Spell Damage +1 Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavor: He's in charge of the Annual Scarlet Monastery Blood Drive!

name: King Mukla
text: Battlecry: Give your opponent 2 Bananas.
flavor: King Mukla wanders Jaguero Isle, searching for love.

name: Novice Engineer
text: Battlecry: Draw a card.
flavor: "Half of this class will not graduate… since they'll have been turned to chickens." - Tinkmaster Overspark, teaching Gizmos 101.

name: Sylvanas Windrunner
text: Deathrattle: Take control of a random enemy minion.
flavor: Sylvanas was turned into the Banshee Queen by Arthas, but he probably should have just killed her because it just pissed her off.

name: Jungle Panther
text: Stealth
flavor: Stranglethorn is a beautiful place to visit, but you wouldn't want to live there.

name: Shattered Sun Cleric
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +1/+1.
flavor: They always have a spare flask of Sunwell Energy Drink™!

name: Scarlet Crusader
text: Divine Shield
flavor: Never wash your whites with a Scarlet Crusader.

name: Thrallmar Farseer
text: Windfury
flavor: He's stationed in the Hellfire Peninsula, but he's hoping for a reassignment closer to Orgrimmar, or really anywhere the ground is less on fire.

name: Silvermoon Guardian
text: Divine Shield
flavor: The first time they tried to guard Silvermoon against the scourge, it didn’t go so well…

name: Dragonling Mechanic
text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/1 Mechanical Dragonling.
flavor: She is still working on installing the rocket launcher add-on for Mr. Bitey.

name: Stranglethorn Tiger
text: Stealth
flavor: The wonderful thing about tigers is tigers are wonderful things!

name: Leper Gnome
text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: He really just wants to be your friend, but the constant rejection is starting to really get to him.

name: Sunwalker
text: Taunt Divine Shield
flavor: She doesn’t ACTUALLY walk on the Sun.  It's just a name.  Don’t worry!

name: Windfury Harpy
text: Windfury
flavor: Harpies are not pleasant sounding.  That's the nicest I can put it.

name: Twilight Drake
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.
flavor: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy.  And Tacos.

name: Questing Adventurer
text: Whenever you play a card, gain +1/+1.
flavor: "Does anyone have some extra Boar Pelts?"

name: Ancient Watcher
text: Can't attack.
flavor: Why do its eyes seem to follow you as you walk by?

name: Dark Iron Dwarf
text: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.
flavor: Guardians of Dark Iron Ore.  Perhaps the most annoying ore, given where you have to forge it.

name: Spellbreaker
text: Battlecry: Silence a minion.
flavor: Spellbreakers can rip enchantments from magic-wielders.  The process is painless and can be performed on an outpatient basis.

name: Youthful Brewmaster
text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
flavor: His youthful enthusiasm doesn’t always equal excellence in his brews.   Don’t drink the Mogu Stout!
targeting_arrow_text: Return a minion to your hand.

name: Coldlight Oracle
text: Battlecry: Each player draws 2 cards.
flavor: They can see the future.   In that future both players draw more cards.   Spoooky.

name: Mana Addict
text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2 Attack this turn.
flavor: She’s trying to kick the habit, but still takes some mana whenever she has a stressful day.

name: Ancient Brewmaster
text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
flavor: Most pandaren say his brew tastes like yak.  But apparently that's a compliment.
targeting_arrow_text: Return a minion to your hand.

name: Sunfury Protector
text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions Taunt.
flavor: She carries a shield, but only so she can give it to someone she can stand behind.

name: Crazed Alchemist
text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.
flavor: "You'll love my new recipe!" he says... especially if you're not happy with your current number of limbs.
targeting_arrow_text: Swap Attack and Health of a minion.

name: Old Murk-Eye
text: Charge. Has +1 Attack for each other Murloc on the battlefield.
flavor: He's a legend among murlocs.  "Mrghllghghllghg!", they say.
how_to_earn: Unlocked when you have all the Murlocs from the Legacy Set.

name: Acidic Swamp Ooze
text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon.
flavor: Oozes love Flamenco.  Don't ask.

name: Argent Commander
text: Charge Divine Shield
flavor: The Argent Dawn stands vigilant against the Scourge, as well as people who cut in line at coffee shops.

name: Pint-Sized Summoner
text: The first minion you play each turn costs (1) less.
flavor: She's quite jealous of the Gallon-Sized Summoner.

name: Secretkeeper
text: Whenever a Secret is played, gain +1/+1.
flavor: Where is Mankrik’s wife? She’ll never tell.

name: Mad Bomber
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage randomly split between all other characters.
flavor: He's not really all that crazy, he is just not as careful with explosives as he should be.

name: Tinkmaster Overspark
text: [x]Battlecry: Transform another random minion into a 5/5 Devilsaur or a 1/1 Squirrel.
flavor: Tinkmaster Overspark nearly lost his Tinker's license after the Great Ironforge Squirrel Stampede of '09.
targeting_arrow_text: Transform a minion into a 5/5 or a 1/1 at random.

name: Warsong Commander
text: Whenever you summon a minion with 3 or less Attack, give it Charge.
flavor: The Warsong clan is such drama. It's really not worth it to become a commander.

name: Mind Control Tech
text: [x]Battlecry: If your opponent has 4 or more minions, take control of one.
flavor: Mind Control technology is getting better, but that's not saying much.

name: Arcane Golem
text: Charge. Battlecry: Give your opponent a Mana Crystal.
flavor: Having Arcane golems at home really classes up the place, and as a bonus they are great conversation pieces.

name: Cabal Shadow Priest
text: Battlecry: Take control of an enemy minion that has 2 or less Attack.
flavor: You never know who may be secretly working for the Cabal....
targeting_arrow_text: Steal a minion that has 2 or less Attack.

name: Defender of Argus
text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1 and Taunt.
flavor: You wouldn’t think that Argus would need this much defending.  But it does.

name: Gadgetzan Auctioneer
text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.
flavor: He used to run the black market auction house, but there was just too much violence and he had to move.

name: Loot Hoarder
text: Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavor: Always roll need.

name: Abomination
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to ALL characters.
flavor: Abominations enjoy Fresh Meat and long walks on the beach.

name: Lorewalker Cho
text: Whenever a player casts a spell, put a copy into the other player’s hand.
flavor: Lorewalker Cho archives and shares tales from the land of Pandaria, but his favorite story is the one where Joey and Phoebe go on a road trip.

name: Demolisher
text: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: Laying siege isn't fun for anyone.  It's not even all that effective, now that everyone has a flying mount.

name: Coldlight Seer
text: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs +2 Health.
flavor: The Coldlight murlocs reside in the darkest pits of the Abyssal Depths.  So no, there's no getting away from murlocs.

name: Mountain Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
flavor: His mother said that he was just big boned.

name: Cairne Bloodhoof
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 5/5 Baine Bloodhoof.
flavor: Cairne was killed by Garrosh, so... don't put this guy in a Warrior deck.  It's pretty insensitive.

name: Gelbin Mekkatorque
text: Battlecry: Summon an AWESOME invention.
flavor: He's the leader of the gnomes, and an incredible inventor.  He's getting better, too; He turns things into chickens WAY less than he used to.
how_to_earn_golden: This was rewarded to players who helped test the Store during the Beta.

name: Leeroy Jenkins
text: Charge. Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps for your opponent.
flavor: At least he has Angry Chicken.

name: Eviscerate
text: Deal $2 damage. Combo: Deal $4 damage instead.
flavor: There is a high cost to Eviscerating your opponent. You might tweak your elbow! That really hurts!

name: Betrayal
text: Force an enemy minion to deal its damage to the minions next to it.
flavor: Everyone has a price. Gnomes, for example, can be persuaded by stuffed animals and small amounts of chocolate.

name: Conceal
text: Give your minions Stealth until your next turn.
flavor: Rogues conceal everything but their emotions.  You can't get 'em to shut up about feelings.

name: Fan of Knives
text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. Draw a card.
flavor: I wouldn't say I LOVE knives, but I'm definitely a fan.

name: Noble Sacrifice
text: Secret: When an enemy attacks, summon a 2/1 Defender as the new target.
flavor: We will always remember you, "Defender!"

name: Defias Ringleader
text: Combo: Summon a 2/1 Defias Bandit.
flavor: He stole the deed to town years ago, so technically the town is his. He just calls people Scrub to be mean.

name: Eye for an Eye
text: Secret: When your hero takes damage, deal that much damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Justice sometimes takes the form of a closed fist into a soft cheek.

name: Perdition's Blade
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage. Combo: Deal 2 instead.
flavor: Perdition's Blade is Ragnaros's back-up weapon while Sulfuras is in the shop.

name: SI:7 Agent
text: Combo: Deal 3 damage.
flavor: The agents of SI:7 are responsible for Stormwind's covert activities.  Their duties include espionage, assassination, and throwing surprise birthday parties for the royal family.

name: Redemption
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to life with 1 Health.
flavor: I am not sure how you get demptioned the first time.  It’s a mystery!

name: Headcrack
text: Deal $2 damage to the enemy hero. Combo: Return this to your hand next turn.
flavor: When all else fails, nothing beats a swift whack upside the head.

name: Shadowstep
text: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.
flavor: Rogue dance troops will sometimes Shadowstep away at the end of a performance.  Crowds love it.

name: Preparation
text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: "Be Prepared" - Rogue Motto

name: Wrath
text: Choose One - Deal $3 damage to a minion; or $1 damage and draw a card.
flavor: The talk around the Ratchet Inn is that this card is too good and should be a Legendary.

name: Mark of Nature
text: Choose One - Give a minion +4 Attack; or +4 Health and Taunt.
flavor: Druids call it the "Mark of Nature."  Everyone else calls it "needing a bath."

name: Soul of the Forest
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Treant."
flavor: "Reforestation" is suddenly a terrifying word.

name: Power of the Wild
text: Choose One - Give your minions +1/+1; or Summon a 3/2 Panther.
flavor: Never look a panther in the eye.  Or is it 'Always look a panther in the eye'?  Well, it's one of those.

name: Naturalize
text:
Destroy a minion.
Your opponent draws 2 cards.
flavor: Another one bites the dust.

name: Dire Wolf Alpha
text: Adjacent minions have +1 Attack.
flavor: We are pretty excited about the upcoming release of Dire Wolf Beta, just repost this sign for a chance at a key.

name: Nourish
text: Choose One - Gain 2 Mana Crystals; or Draw 3 cards.
flavor: Druids take nourishment from many things: the power of nature, the songbird's chirp, a chocolate cake.

name: Druid of the Claw
flavor: Cat or Bear?  Cat or Bear?!  I just cannot CHOOSE!

name: Keeper of the Grove
text: Choose One - Deal 2 damage; or Silence a minion.
flavor: These guys just show up and start Keeping your Groves without even asking.

name: Innervate
text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavor: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

name: Emperor Cobra
text: Poisonous
flavor: The Sholazar Basin is home to a lot of really horrible things. If you're going to visit, wear bug spray.  And plate armor.

name: Starfire
text:
Deal $5 damage.
Draw a card.
flavor: Balance is important to druids.  This card is perfectly balanced.

name: Ancient of War
text: Choose One - +5 Attack; or +5 Health and Taunt.
flavor: Young Night Elves love to play "Who can get the Ancient of War to Uproot?"  You lose if you get crushed to death.

name: Icicle
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it's Frozen, draw a card.
flavor: This may appear weak at frost glance, but it's actually a very ice spell.
how_to_earn: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
how_to_earn_golden: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Tome of Intellect
text: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavor: Just a compilation of napkins of intellect.
how_to_earn: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
how_to_earn_golden: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Call of the Void
text: Add a random Demon to your hand.
flavor:
"Marco!"
"Polo!"
"Marco!"
"Who dares summon me?!"
how_to_earn: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
how_to_earn_golden: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Pilfer
text: Add a random card from another class to your hand.
flavor: The class is always greener on the other side of the board.
how_to_earn: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
how_to_earn_golden: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Gift of the Wild
text: Give your minions +2/+2 and Taunt.
flavor: The gift that keeps on living.
how_to_earn: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
how_to_earn_golden: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Righteousness
text: Give your minions Divine Shield.
flavor: Shield yourself in righteousness! It feels like a warm fuzzy blanket.
how_to_earn: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
how_to_earn_golden: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Siegebreaker
text: Taunt Your other Demons have +1 Attack.
flavor: Has a side hustle as a siegebroker.
how_to_earn: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
how_to_earn_golden: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: SI:7 Infiltrator
text: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy Secret.
flavor: What will she destroy? It’s a secret!
how_to_earn: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
how_to_earn_golden: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Arcane Devourer
text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2/+2.
flavor: Likes her magic with a pinch of salt.
how_to_earn: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
how_to_earn_golden: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Barrens Stablehand
text: Battlecry: Summon a random Beast.
flavor: It’s never Huffer.
how_to_earn: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
how_to_earn_golden: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Brightwing
text: Battlecry: Add a random Legendary minion to your hand.
flavor: Little faerie dragons are made of sugar and spice and maniacal vice.
how_to_earn: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
how_to_earn_golden: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: High Inquisitor Whitemane
text: Battlecry: Summon all friendly minions that died this turn.
flavor: No one told her that champions want to sleep in.
how_to_earn: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
how_to_earn_golden: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Plaguebringer
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Poisonous.
flavor: One sip and you've got the grippe.

name: Radiance
text: Restore #5 Health to your hero.
flavor: Because you're worth it!

name: Psychic Conjurer
text: Battlecry: Copy a card in your opponent’s deck and add it to your hand.
flavor: "I see... a WISP? Why do you have a wisp?!"

name: Power Infusion
text: Give a minion +2/+6.
flavor: It infuses, it enthuses, it amuses!

name: Kul Tiran Chaplain
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Health.
flavor: The maritime Kul Tiran clergy are unique among priests for using holy saltwater.
how_to_earn: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
how_to_earn_golden: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Scarlet Subjugator
text: Battlecry: Give an enemy minion -2 Attack until your next turn.
flavor: At the Scarlet Monastery, he learned the sacred art of kicking people when they're up.
how_to_earn: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
how_to_earn_golden: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Shadow Word: Ruin
text: Destroy all minions with 5 or more Attack.
flavor: Discovered by a worgen priest after a giant spilled a drink on her new white robes.
how_to_earn: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
how_to_earn_golden: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Natalie Seline
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion and gain its Health.
flavor: She discovered Xal'atath, Blade of the Black Empire, a terrible weapon of shadow magic that could both swallow a soul and cut a mean julienne.
how_to_earn: Not available in packs, must be crafted.
how_to_earn_golden: Not available in packs, must be crafted.

name: Lightning Bolt
text: Deal $3 damage. Overload: (1)
flavor: Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt!

name: Lava Burst
text: Deal $5 damage. Overload: (2)
flavor: It's like an ocean of liquid magma in your mouth!

name: Dust Devil
text: Windfury. Overload: (2)
flavor: Westfall is full of dust devils. And buzzards. And crazed golems. And pirates. Why does anyone live here?

name: Totemic Might
text: Give your Totems +2 Health.
flavor: Totem-stomping is no longer recommended.

name: Earth Shock
text: Silence a minion, then deal $1 damage to it.
flavor: Earth Shock? Shouldn't it be "Azeroth Shock"?

name: Hex
text: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
flavor: If you Hex a Murloc... it really isn't much of a change, is it?

name: Stormforged Axe
text: Overload: (1)
flavor: Yo, that's a nice axe.

name: Feral Spirit
text: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. Overload: (1)
flavor: Spirit wolves are like regular wolves with pom-poms.

name: Baron Geddon
text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL other characters.
flavor: Baron Geddon was Ragnaros's foremost lieutenant, until he got FIRED.

name: Earth Elemental
text: Taunt Overload: (2)
flavor: Nothing beats rock.

name: Forked Lightning
text: Deal $2 damage to 2 random enemy minions. Overload: (2)
flavor: If you combine it with Spooned Lightning and Knived Lightning, you have the full dining set.

name: Unbound Elemental
text: After you play a card with Overload, gain +1/+1.
flavor: Unlike bound elementals, Unbound ones really enjoy a night on the town.

name: Lightning Storm
text: Deal $3 damage to all enemy minions. Overload: (1)
flavor: An umbrella won't be effective, I'm afraid.

name: Ethereal Arcanist
text: If you control a Secret at the end of your turn, gain +2/+2.
flavor: The ethereals are wrapped in cloth to give form to their non-corporeal bodies. Also because it's nice and soft.

name: Cone of Cold
text: Freeze a minion and the minions next to it, and deal $1 damage to them.
flavor: Magi of the Kirin Tor were casting Cubes of Cold for many years before Cones came into fashion some 90 years ago.

name: Arcane Missiles
text: Deal $3 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: You'd think you'd be able to control your missiles a little better since you're a powerful mage and all.

name: Shiv
text:
Deal $1 damage.
Draw a card.
flavor: Rogues are experts at SHIV-al-ry.

name: Pyroblast
text: Deal $10 damage.
flavor: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

name: Frost Elemental
text: Battlecry: Freeze a character.
flavor: When a Water elemental and an Ice elemental love each other VERY much...

name: Azure Drake
text: Spell Damage +1 Battlecry: Draw a card.
flavor: They initially planned to be the Beryl or Cerulean drakes, but those felt a tad too pretentious.

name: Counterspell
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
flavor: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't?  The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

name: Ice Barrier
text: Secret: When your hero is attacked, gain 8 Armor.
flavor: This is Rank 1.  Rank 2 is Chocolate Milk Barrier.

name: Mirror Entity
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a copy of it.
flavor: "You go first." - Krush'gor the Behemoth, to his pet boar.

name: Ice Block
text: Secret: When your hero takes fatal damage, prevent it and become Immune this turn.
flavor: Ice is nice, and will suffice!

name: Ragnaros the Firelord
text: Can't attack. At the end of your turn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: Ragnaros was summoned by the Dark Iron dwarves, who were eventually enslaved by the Firelord.  Summoning Ragnaros often doesn’t work out the way you want it to.

name: Felguard
text: Taunt Battlecry: Destroy one of your Mana Crystals.
flavor: Yes, he'll fight for you.  BUT HE'S NOT GOING TO LIKE IT.

name: Mortal Coil
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card.
flavor: If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let's be honest, you should get to draw some cards.

name: Shadowflame
text: Destroy a friendly minion and deal its Attack damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Start with a powerful minion and stir in Shadowflame and you have a good time!

name: Void Terror
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy both adjacent minions and gain their Attack and Health.
flavor: If you put this into your deck, you WILL lose the trust of your other minions.

name: Felstalker
text: Battlecry: Discard a random card.
flavor: This puppy chews up cards instead of shoes.

name: Soulfire
text:
[x]Deal $4 damage.
Discard a random card.
flavor: Are you lighting a soul on fire? Or burning someone with your OWN soul? This seems like an important distinction.

name: Siphon Soul
text: Destroy a minion. Restore #3 Health to your hero.
flavor: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul.  You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

name: Doomguard
text: Charge. Battlecry: Discard two random cards.
flavor: Summoning a doomguard is risky. Someone is going to die.

name: Twisting Nether
text:
Destroy all minions
and locations.
flavor: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

name: Pit Lord
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavor: Mannoroth, Magtheridon, and Brutallus may be dead, but it turns out there are a LOT of pit lords.

name: Summoning Portal
text: Your minions cost (2) less, but not less than (1).
flavor: NOT LESS THAN 1!  Don't get any ideas!

name: Power Overwhelming
text: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 until end of turn. Then, it dies. Horribly.
flavor: We cannot even describe how horrible the death is.  It's CRAZY bad!  Maybe worse than that.  Just don't do it.

name: Sense Demons
text:
Draw 2 Demons
from your deck.
flavor: Generally demons are pretty obvious and you don’t need a spell to sense them.

name: Flame Imp
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavor: Imps like being on fire.  They just do.

name: Bane of Doom
text: Deal $3 damage to a character. If that kills it, summon a random Demon.
flavor: My advice to you is to avoid Doom, if possible.

name: Lord Jaraxxus
text: Battlecry: Equip a 3/8 Blood Fury.
flavor: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"

name: Silence
text: Silence a minion.
flavor: Reserved for enemy spellcasters, evil liches from beyond the grave, and karaoke nights at the Grim Guzzler.

name: Shadow Madness
text: Gain control of an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack until end of turn.
flavor: You can rationalize it all you want, it's still a mean thing to do.

name: Lightspawn
text: This minion's Attack is always equal to its Health.
flavor: Spawn of the Light? Or Pawn of the Lights?

name: Thoughtsteal
text: Copy 2 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
flavor: "What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc?  Nothing!" - Tauren joke

name: Lightwell
text: At the start of your turn, restore #3 Health to a damaged friendly character.
flavor: It isn't clear if people ignore the Lightwell, or if it is just invisible.

name: Mindgames
text:
Put a copy of
a random minion from
your opponent's deck into the battlefield.
flavor: Sometimes it feels like this is all a game.

name: Divine Favor
text: Draw cards until you have as many in hand as your opponent.
flavor: This is not just a favor, but a divine one, like helping someone move a couch with a fold out bed!

name: Prophet Velen
text: Double the damage and healing of your spells and Hero Power.
flavor: He's been exiled from his home, and all his brothers turned evil, but otherwise he doesn't have a lot to complain about.

name: Lay on Hands
text: Restore #8 Health. Draw 3 cards.
flavor: A grammatically awkward life saver.

name: Blessed Champion
text: Double a minion's Attack.
flavor: This card causes double the trouble AND double the fun.

name: Humility
text: Change a minion's Attack to 1.
flavor: This card makes something really damp.  Oh wait.  That's "Humidity."

name: Argent Protector
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Divine Shield.
flavor: "I'm not saying you can dodge fireballs.  I'm saying with this shield, you won't have to."

name: Blessing of Wisdom
text: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, draw a card.
flavor: Apparently with wisdom comes the knowledge that you should probably be attacking every turn.

name: Holy Wrath
text: Draw a card and deal damage equal to its Cost to a minion.
flavor: C'mon Molten Giant!!

name: Sword of Justice
text: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1 and this loses 1 Durability.
flavor: I dub you Sir Loin of Beef!

name: Hand of Protection
text: Give a minion Divine Shield.
flavor: This spell has been renamed so many times, even paladins don’t know what it should be called anymore.

name: Repentance
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, reduce its Health to 1.
flavor: Repentance often comes in the moment before obliteration. Curious.

name: Aldor Peacekeeper
text: Battlecry: Change an enemy minion's Attack to 1.
flavor: The Aldor hate two things: the Scryers and smooth jazz.

name: Tirion Fordring
text: Divine Shield, Taunt Deathrattle: Equip a 5/3 Ashbringer.
flavor: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

name: Avenging Wrath
text: Deal $8 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham!

name: Tauren Warrior
text: Taunt Has +3 Attack while damaged.
flavor: Tauren Warrior: Champion of Mulgore, Slayer of Quilboar, Rider of Thunderbluff Elevators.

name: Slam
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.
flavor: "Dun da dun, dun da dun": if you've heard an ogre sing this, it's too late.

name: Battle Rage
text: Draw a card for each damaged friendly character.
flavor: "You won't like me when I'm angry."

name: Amani Berserker
text: Has +3 Attack while damaged.
flavor: If an Amani berserker asks "Joo lookin' at me?!", the correct response is "Nah, mon".

name: Mogu'shan Warden
text: Taunt
flavor: All these guys ever do is talk about the Thunder King.   BOOOORRRINNG!

name: Arathi Weaponsmith
text: Battlecry: Equip a 2/2 weapon.
flavor: 50% off fist weapons, limited time only!

name: Gurubashi Berserker
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +3 Attack.
flavor: No Pain, No Gain.

name: Whirlwind
text: Deal $1 damage to ALL minions.
flavor: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

name: Armorsmith
text: Whenever a friendly minion takes damage, gain 1 Armor.
flavor: She accepts guild funds for repairs!

name: Shieldbearer
text: Taunt
flavor: Have you seen the size of the shields in this game??  This is no easy job.

name: Brawl
text: Destroy all minions except one. (chosen randomly)
flavor: Do you know the first rule of Brawl Club?

name: Mortal Strike
text: Deal $4 damage. If you have 12 or less Health, deal $6 instead.
flavor: "If you only use one ability, use Mortal Strike." - The Warrior Code, Line 6

name: Upgrade!
text: If you have a weapon, give it +1/+1. Otherwise equip a 1/3 weapon.
flavor: Easily worth 50 DKP.

name: Shield Slam
text: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each Armor you have.
flavor: "What is a better weapon? The sharp one your enemies expect, or the blunt one they ignore?" - The Art of Warrior, Chapter 9

name: Gorehowl
text: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.
flavor: Grommash Hellscream's famous axe.  Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar's possession.  Quite the mystery!

name: Raging Worgen
text: Has +1 Attack and Windfury while damaged.
flavor: If he's raging now, just wait until he gets nerfed.

name: Grommash Hellscream
text: Charge Has +6 Attack while damaged.
flavor: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes!  Maybe not his best decision.

name: Murloc Tidehunter
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Murloc Scout.
flavor: "Death will rise, from the tides!"

name: Murloc Warleader
text: Your other Murlocs have +2 Attack.
flavor: Do Murlocs ever get tired of making the same old sound?  Nope!  Mrglglrglglglglglglgl!

name: Grimscale Oracle
text: Your other Murlocs have +1 Attack.
flavor: These are the brainy murlocs.  It turns out that doesn’t mean much.

name: Murloc Tidecaller
text: Whenever you summon a Murloc, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: This guy gets crazy strong at family reunions.

name: Patient Assassin
text: Stealth Poisonous
flavor: He’s not really that patient. It just takes a while for someone to walk by that he can actually reach.

name: Scavenging Hyena
text: Whenever a friendly Beast dies, gain +2/+1.
flavor: Hyenas prefer the bones of kodos or windserpents, but they'll eat pretty much anything.  Even Brussels sprouts.

name: Misdirection
text: Secret: When an enemy attacks your hero, instead it attacks another random character.
flavor: Sometimes it's as simple as putting on a fake mustache and pointing at someone else.

name: Savannah Highmane
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Hyenas.
flavor: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion gets slowly consumed by hyenas.

name: Eaglehorn Bow
text: [x]Whenever a friendly Secret is revealed, gain +1 Durability.
flavor: First Lesson: Put the pointy end in the other guy.

name: Explosive Shot
text: Deal $5 damage to a minion and $2 damage to adjacent ones.
flavor: Pull the pin, count to 5, then shoot.  Then duck.

name: Unleash the Hounds
text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Hound with Charge.
flavor: You must read the name of this card out loud each time you play it.

name: Kill Command
text:
Deal $3 damage. If you control a Beast, deal
$5 damage instead.
flavor: "Kill!", he commanded.

name: King Krush
text: Charge
flavor: The best defense against King Krush is to have someone you don’t like standing in front of you.

name: Flare
text: All minions lose Stealth. Destroy all enemy Secrets. Draw a card.
flavor: Not only does it reveal your enemies, but it's also great for parties!

name: Bestial Wrath
text: Give a friendly Beast +2 Attack and Immune this turn.
flavor: The seething wrath is just beneath the surface.  Beneath that is wild abandon, followed by slight annoyance.

name: Snake Trap
text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon three 1/1 Snakes.
flavor: Why did it have to be snakes?

name: Harvest Golem
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 2/1 Damaged Golem.
flavor: "Overheat threshold exceeded. System failure. Wheat clog in port two. Shutting down."

name: Nat Pagle
text: At the start of your turn, you have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.
flavor: Nat Pagle, Azeroth's premier fisherman!  He invented the Auto-Angler 3000, the Extendo-Pole 3000, and the Lure-o-matic 2099 (still in testing).

name: Harrison Jones
text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and draw cards equal to its Durability.
flavor: “That belongs in the Hall of Explorers!”

name: Archmage Antonidas
text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a 'Fireball' spell to your hand.
flavor: Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor, and Jaina's mentor.  This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.

name: Nozdormu
text: Players only have 15 seconds to take their turns.
flavor: Time to write some flavor text.

name: Alexstrasza
text: Battlecry: Set a hero's remaining Health to 15.
flavor: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder brings life and hope to everyone.  Except Deathwing.  And Malygos.  And Nekros.

name: Onyxia
text: Battlecry: Summon 1/1 Whelps until your side of the battlefield is full.
flavor: Onyxia long manipulated the Stormwind Court by disguising herself as Lady Katrana Prestor.   You would have thought that the giant wings and scales would have been a giveaway.

name: Malygos
text: Spell Damage +5
flavor: Malygos hates it when mortals use magic.  He gets so mad!

name: Faceless Manipulator
text: Battlecry: Choose a minion and become a copy of it.
flavor: The Faceless Ones are servants of Yogg-Saron, and they feed on fear. Right now they are feeding on your fear of accidentally disenchanting all your good cards.
targeting_arrow_text: Become a copy of a minion.

name: Flametongue Totem
text: Adjacent minions have +2 Attack.
flavor: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems.  There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

name: Doomhammer
text: Windfury, Overload: (2)
flavor: Orgrim Doomhammer gave this legendary weapon to Thrall.  His name is a total coincidence.

name: Bite
text: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn. Gain 4 Armor.
flavor: Chew your food!

name: Force of Nature
text: Summon three 2/2 Treants.
flavor: "I think I'll just nap under these trees. Wait... AAAAAHHH!" - Blinkfizz, the Unfortunate Gnome

name: Ysera
text: At the end of your turn, get two random Dream cards.
flavor: Ysera rules the Emerald Dream.  Which is some kind of green-mirror-version of the real world, or something?

name: Cenarius
text: Choose One - Give your other minions +2/+2; or Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.
flavor: Yes, he's a demigod. No, he doesn't need to wear a shirt.

name: Mana Tide Totem
text: At the end of your turn, draw a card.
flavor: It is said that some shaman can say "Floatin' totem" 10 times, fast.

name: The Beast
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Pip Quickwit for your opponent.
flavor: He lives in Blackrock Mountain.  He eats Gnomes.  That's pretty much it.

name: Savagery
text: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to a minion.
flavor: It is true that some druids are savage, but others still enjoy a quiet moment and a spot of tea.

name: Sap
text: Return an enemy minion to your opponent's hand.
flavor: Rogues love sappy movies.

name: Dalaran Mage
text: Spell Damage +1
flavor: You don't see a lot of Dalaran warriors.

name: Priestess of Elune
text: Battlecry: Restore #4 Health to your hero.
flavor: If she threatens to "moon" you, it's not what you think.

name: Ancient Mage
text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions Spell Damage +1.
flavor: Sometimes he forgets and just wanders into someone else's game.

name: Sea Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each other minion on the battlefield.
flavor: See?  Giant.

name: Windspeaker
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Windfury.
flavor: Is there anything worse than a Windspeaker with halitosis?

name: Blood Knight
text: Battlecry: All minions lose Divine Shield. Gain +3/+3 for each Shield lost.
flavor: The Blood Knights get their holy powers from the Sunwell, which you should NOT bathe in.

name: Auchenai Soulpriest
text: Your cards and powers that restore Health now deal damage instead.
flavor: The Auchenai know the end is coming, but they're not sure when.

name: Nightblade
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Your face is the place you'd probably least like a dagger, and where rogues are most likely to deliver them.

name: Vaporize
text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, destroy it.
flavor: Rumor has it that Deathwing brought about the Cataclysm after losing a game to this card.  We may never know the truth.

name: Cult Master
text: After a friendly minion dies, draw a card.
flavor: She may be an evil cult master, but she still calls her parents once a week.

name: Demonfire
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it’s a friendly Demon, give it +2/+2 instead.
flavor: Demonfire is like regular fire except for IT NEVER STOPS BURNING HELLLPPP

name: Imp Master
text:
[x]At the end of your turn, deal
1 damage to this minion
 and summon a 1/1 Imp.
flavor: She would enjoy the job a lot more if she just could get the imps to QUIT BITING HER.

name: Cruel Taskmaster
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
flavor: "I'm going to need you to come in on Sunday." - Cruel Taskmaster

name: Frothing Berserker
text: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

name: Shield Block
text:
Gain 5 Armor.
Draw a card.
flavor: Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.

name: Inner Rage
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
flavor: They're only smiling on the outside.

name: Sorcerer's Apprentice
text: Your spells cost (1) less (but not less than 1).
flavor: Apprentices are great for bossing around.  "Conjure me some mana buns! And a coffee!  Make that a mana coffee!"

name: Snipe
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal $6 damage to it.
flavor: A great sniper hits the spot.  Just like a delicious flank of boar. Mmmmm.

name: Explosive Trap
text: Secret: When your hero is attacked, deal $2 damage to all enemies.
flavor: It traps your food AND cooks it for you!

name: Freezing Trap
text: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, return it to its owner's hand. It costs (2) more.
flavor: "Dang, that's cold." - appropriate response to Freezing Trap, or a mean joke.

name: Kirin Tor Mage
text: [x]Battlecry: The next Secret you play this turn costs (0).
flavor: The Kirin Tor reside in the floating city of Dalaran.  How do you make a Dalaran float?  Two scoops of ice cream, one scoop of Dalaran.

name: Edwin VanCleef
text: Combo: Gain +2/+2 for each other card you've played this turn.
flavor: He led the Stonemasons in the reconstruction of Stormwind, and when the nobles refused to pay, he founded the Defias Brotherhood to, well, deconstruct Stormwind.

name: Xavius
text: After you play a card, summon a 2/1 Satyr.
flavor: Xavius has grand nightmares of summoning Sargeras into this world, but a few Satyr will have to do for now.

name: Mana Wraith
text: ALL minions cost (1) more.
flavor: They come out at night to eat leftover mana crystals. "Mmmmmm," they say.

name: Deadly Shot
text: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: Our ballista operator is effective, but not picky.

name: Equality
text: Change the Health of ALL minions to 1.
flavor: We are all special unique snowflakes... with 1 Health.

name: Molten Giant
text:
Costs (1) less for
each Health your hero
is missing.
flavor: He gets terrible heartburn.  BECAUSE HE IS FULL OF LAVA.

name: Circle of Healing
text: Restore #4 Health to ALL minions.
flavor: It isn't really a circle.

name: Shadow Word: Death
text: Destroy a minion with 5 or more Attack.
flavor: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

name: Temple Enforcer
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
flavor: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

name: Holy Fire
text: Deal $5 damage. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
flavor: Often followed by Holy Smokes!

name: Shadowform
text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage.'
flavor: If a bright light shines on a priest in Shadowform… do they cast a shadow?

name: Mass Dispel
text: Silence all enemy minions. Draw a card.
flavor: It dispels buffs, powers, hopes, and dreams.

name: Spirit of the Kaldorei
text: Taunt, Lifesteal Battlecry: If you used your Hero Power this turn, gain +3/+3.
flavor: We brought magic to this world, but destruction may take it away.

name: Avatar of Destruction
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 9 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Master of all ONE element!

name: Cremate
text: Discover a minion with a Dark Gift. It costs (2) less.
flavor: Cleanup on grave plot 4.

name: Frostburn Matriarch
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a minion with a Dark Gift, summon two 4/4 Dragons with Taunt.
flavor: Her frostburn is worse than her frostbite.

name: Sigil of Cinder
text:
[x]At the start of your next
turn, deal $6 damage
randomly split among
all enemies.
flavor: It's the emblem of fire season.

name: Felfire Blaze
text:
[x]After you cast a Fel spell,
destroy this and deal 2
damage to all enemies.
flavor: Like fire, felfire, this fire in my skin.

name: Overheat
text: Give your minions +1/+1. Discard a random Nature spell to give them +1/+1 more.
flavor:
"Did you bring water?"
"I THOUGHT YOU WERE BRINGING THE WATER!"

name: Amirdrassil
text: [x]Summon a 1-Cost minion. Gain 1 Armor. Draw 1 card. Refresh 1 Mana |4(Crystal, Crystals). (Improves each use!)
flavor: The spirits burned at Teldrassil shall not be forgotten. They live on within a new world tree, the Crown of Harmony.

name: Charred Chameleon
text: Battlecry: If you've used your Hero Power this turn, give a friendly minion +1/+2 and Rush.
flavor:
Charma, charma, charma, charma, charma chameleon
You combust and glow, you combust and glow...

name: Bursting Shot
text:
Deal $2 damage to
three random enemies.
flavor: And I fired! And I missed. And I fired again! And I missed again. This went on for several hours.

name: Scorching Winds
text: Deal $3 damage. Discard a random Fire spell to deal $3 more.
flavor: It's like the old saying goes: where there's smoke, there's often fire... and where there's fire, there's often more fire.

name: Smoldering Grove
text: Draw {0} card. (Upgrades each turn, but discards after {1}!)1Draw {0} cards. (Discards this turn!)
flavor: To be clear, the grove is not SUPPOSED to be smoldering.

name: Inferno Herald
text:
[x]After you cast a Fire spell,
get a random Elemental and
reduce its Cost by (3).
flavor: Poor Inferno Herald, why so blue?

name: Smoldering Strength
text: Give a friendly minion +{0}/+{0}. (Upgrades each turn, but discards after {1}!)1Give a friendly minion +{0}/+{0}. (Discards this turn!)
flavor: You'll get it when you're smolder.

name: Smoldering Ascent
text: Deal ${0} damage to all enemy minions. (Upgrades each turn, but discards after {1}!)1Deal ${0} damage to all enemy minions. (Discards this turn!)
flavor: We all know what happens when you fly too close to the sun. But THIS is what happens when you fly straight into it.

name: Light of the New Moon
text: [x]Give a minion +3/+3. (Cast 3 spells to return this to your hand when played.)
flavor: UM ACTUALLY THAT’S A WANING CRESCENT

name: Everburning Phoenix
text: [x]Costs (1) less for each card you've played this turn. Deathrattle: At end of turn, get another Phoenix.
flavor: You'd be making that face too if you just got played for the sixteenth time.

name: Smoke Bomb
text: Discover a Combo, Battlecry, or Stealth minion with a Dark Gift.
flavor: Wow, this blew up.

name: Petal Picker
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Imbued your Hero Power twice, draw 2 cards.
flavor: She loves me... she loves me not...

name: Cindersword
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a minion with a Dark Gift, gain +3 Attack.
flavor: Where did I put de metals? It cindersword.

name: Flames of the Firelord
text:
[x]Deal $4 damage to a random
enemy minion. If you're
holding a card that costs
(8) or more, deal $8 instead.
flavor: The Firelord has been banned from chat for flaming.

name: Shadowflame Stalker
text: Battlecry: Discover a Demon with a Dark Gift. Get a copy of it.
flavor: The purple means it's stealthy. It's stealthy fire.

name: Emberscarred Whelp
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a 5-Cost card. Gain 1 Mana Crystal next turn only.
flavor: I LOVE YOU NOT!

name: Keeper of Flame
text: [x]Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +3/+3. They are destroyed in 3 turns.
flavor: "I keep it right here. Inside my hooves."

name: Living Flame
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Fire spell.
flavor: "Get a load of this guy."

name: Shadowflame Suffusion
text: [x]Deal $2 damage. Discover a Warrior minion with a Dark Gift.
flavor: One Fire and Shadow swirl, please!

name: Zaqali Flamemancer
text: Battlecry: If every card in your hand is of a different Cost, reduce their Costs by (2).
flavor: What's the difference between a pyromancer and a flamemancer? One knows their Greek roots, the other BURNS THEM DOWN!

name: Searing Reflection
text: Draw a minion. Summon an 8/8 copy of it with Divine Shield.
flavor: You never would've guessed it, but Ancients love doing the Hot Embers Challenge.

name: Volcoross
text: [x]Rush, Taunt Battlecry: Choose to spend 10, 20, or 30 Corpses to gain that many stats.
flavor: Unholy, so hot right now.

name: Scorchreaver
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a Fel spell. Reduce the Cost of Fel spells in your hand by (1).
flavor: Fel from grace about 10,000 years ago.

name: Magma Hound
text: [x]Rush. After this attacks a minion and survives, deal this minion's Attack damage split among all enemies.
flavor: Don't say T.R.E.A.T. or he'll drool lava everywhere.

name: Conflagrate
text: Deal $5 damage to a minion. Its owner draws a card.
flavor: From the ashes, a new card is drawn.

name: Emberroot Destroyer
text:
[x]Whenever your hero takes
damage on your turn,
deal 3 damage to a random
enemy minion.
flavor: Under Fyrakk's assault, even those with the purest devotion to nature shall burn.

name: Dragon Turtle
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a minion with a Dark Gift, give your hero +3 Attack this turn and 6 Armor.
flavor: If you thought evil turtles that live in lava are cool, this one's also a DRAGON!

name: Tindral Sageswift
text: [x]Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. If it's your opponent's turn, deal 4 damage instead.
flavor: He'll have you burning red.

name: Fyrakk the Blazing
text: [x]Immune to Fire spells. Battlecry: Cast 15 Mana worth of Fire spells at random enemies.
flavor: Originally devoted to snuffing out the Titans' influence, Shadowflame has twisted Fyrakk's mind into an abyss of malice. His Dreamrender now only hungers for a world of embers.

name: Tending Dragonkin
text: Battlecry: Copy the lowest Cost Beast in your hand.
flavor: Dogs are a dragon's best friend.

name: Ashleaf Pixie
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, gain Divine Shield and Lifesteal.
flavor: Why don't you make like a burning world tree and ashleave???

name: Zombie Chow
text: Deathrattle: Restore #5 Health to the enemy hero.
flavor: Zombie.  It's what's for dinner.
how_to_earn: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
how_to_earn_golden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

name: Haunted Creeper
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Spectral Spiders.

how_to_earn_golden: Crafting unlocked in The Arachnid Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

how_to_earn_golden: Crafting unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.

how_to_earn_golden: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

name: Dimensional Core

name: Starship Schematic
