name: Sha'tari Cloakfield
text: Elusive. Your first spell each turn costs (1) less. Starship Piece
flavor: The Sha'tari are the reigning champions of interdimensional hide-and-go-seek.

name: Felfire Thrusters
text: [x]Spellburst: Deal this minion's Attack damage to 2 random enemy minions. Starship Piece
flavor: The coolness factor of a fire decal is universal.

name: Shattershard Turret
text: Rush, Windfury Starship Piece
flavor: "Enemy starboard! Wait… everything's starboard!!"

name: Guiding Figure
text: [x]Spellburst: Trigger a random friendly minion's Deathrattle. Starship Piece
flavor: Nearrrr, farrrr, whereeeeeeever you are

name: Specimen Claw
text: After your opponent plays a minion, attack it. Starship Piece
flavor: Great at catching alien species. Not so much their plushies.

name: Starlight Reactor
text: After you cast an Arcane spell, recast it (targets chosen randomly). Starship Piece
flavor: 5/5 stars - my reaction.

name: Heart of the Legion
text: Lifesteal Starship Piece
flavor: It grew 3 sizes after trying to steal Winter Veil.

name: Felfused Battery
text: After this attacks, give your other minions +1 Attack. Starship Piece
flavor: Dirdra is a big believer in green energy.

name: Biopod
text: Deathrattle: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to a random enemy. Starship Piece
flavor: Do not tap the glass.

name: Soulbound Spire
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a minion with Cost equal to this minion's Attack (up to 10). Starship Piece
flavor: Ah yes, EVERY Starship needs a fragile obelisk full of dead people!

name: Airlock Breach
text: [x]Summon a 5/5 Undead with Taunt and give your hero +5 Health. Spend 5 Corpses to do it again.
flavor: Open the pod bay doors, Maladaar.

name: Eldritch Being
text: Outcast and Spellburst: Shuffle your hand.
flavor: Tor flud huth respa di blarry? Fleebletor glomdor!

name: Dirdra, Rebel Captain
text: Rush. Battlecry: Shuffle all 8 Crewmates into your deck. Deathrattle: Draw two Crewmates.
flavor: Under Velen's command, the Draenei avoid engaging with the enemy in fear of eradication. Under Dirdra's command, the Voronei fight the Legion head on in hopes of eradication.

name: Xor'toth, Breaker of Stars
text: [x]Battlecry: Add two Stars    to both sides of your hand.    When they collide, deal 5 damage to all enemies.
flavor: We started his stats at 50,000,000,000/50,000,000,000 to be lore-accurate, but it was just a nudge too powerful.

name: Emergency Meeting
text:
[x]Get two 4/4 Crewmates.
Put a random Demon
that costs (3) or less
between them.
flavor: You installed a big flashing red button on the ship and expected me NOT to press it?

name: The Exodar
text: Battlecry: If you're building a Starship, launch it and choose a Protocol!
flavor: Limitless potential! Boundless hope! Fourth rate space insurance.
how_to_earn: Earnable after collecting 30 The Great Dark Beyond cards.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the Great Dark Beyond Tavern Pass.

name: Foreboding Flame
text: [x]Battlecry: Demons that didn't start in your deck cost (1) less this game.
flavor: "I am the harbinger of the end times! Soon, destruction will reign and chaos will ensue in the culmination of your demise: waking up 15 minutes before your alarm!"

name: Infernal Stratagem
text:
[x]Give a minion +3/+3.
If it's a Demon, your
next one costs (2) less.
flavor: Archimonde INSISTS on calling it a stratagem instead of a strategy because it "sounds cooler."

name: Abduction Ray
text: Get a random Demon. Reduce its Cost by (2). Repeatable this turn.
flavor: Beam me up, Bessie!

name: Bad Omen
text: In 2 turns, summon two 6/6 Demons with Taunt. If you're building a Starship, summon them now.
flavor: What good is a sign from alien life if I CAN'T EVEN READ IT?!

name: Healthstone
text: Tradeable Restore all damage your hero has taken this turn.@ (@)
flavor: HEARTHSTONE MENTIONED- oh, never mind.

name: Black Hole
text: Destroy all minions except Demons.
flavor: That's right! The square goes in the black hole.

name: K'ara, the Dark Star
text: [x]Spellburst: Steal 2 Health from a random enemy. (Shadow spells don't remove this Spellburst.)
flavor: Velen had never seen a shooting star in real life, so when the opportunity arose…

name: Archimonde
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon every Demon you played this game that didn't start in your deck.
flavor: Archimonde joined Sargeras in search of power, and in doing so became one of the strongest forces within the Burning Legion who laid waste to countless planets… but in the end he still lost to a wisp.

name: Doommaiden
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a card from your opponent's deck. If you don't play it this turn, put it back.
flavor: You merely adopted the doom. I was maiden it.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Great Dark Beyond Reward Track.

name: Crystal Welder
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you're building a Starship, gain +2/+2.
flavor: For all you weld-heads out there, this flavor text is a deep cut.

name: Velen, Leader of the Exiled
text: [x]Taunt. Deathrattle: Trigger the Battlecries and Deathrattles of all other Draenei you played this game.
flavor: For an exiled dude, he's pretty popular!

name: Relentless Wrathguard
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to an enemy minion. If it dies, Discover a Demon.
flavor: Ugh, for the love of... could they just send a Relenting Smileguard for once!?
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Great Dark Beyond Reward Track.
targeting_arrow_text: Deal 2 damage to an enemy minion.

name: Pocket Dimension
text: Discover a spell. Repeat until you see one for the second time.
flavor: On average, this gets you around 3 cards. And none of them have Overload.

name: Arkwing Pilot
text: At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy. Spellburst: Summon an Arkwing Pilot.
flavor: Delivered in under 30 minutes, or your Arkwings are free!

name: Ingenious Artificer
text: [x]  Battlecry: The next Draenei   you play refreshes Mana Crystals equal to its Attack.
flavor: He always brags that he's at the top of the bell curve.

name: Exarch Hataaru
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell and reduce its Cost by (1). If you play it this turn, repeat this effect.
flavor: Severely outmatched by the Burning Legion, the Draenei had no hopes of survival… That changed with the invention of arkonite crystals, giving Hataaru and his Artificers new ways to empower their people.

name: Libram of Clarity
text:
Draw 2 minions.
If this costs (0), give them +2/+1.
flavor: Ah, I get it! I should play this for 0 Mana.

name: Libram of Divinity
text:
Give a minion +3/+3. If this costs (0), return this to your hand
at the end of your turn.
flavor: The sacred texts!!

name: Libram of Faith
text: Summon three 3/3 Draenei with Divine Shield. If this costs (0), give them Rush.
flavor: They used to do leaps of faith until Maraad fell into the void.

name: Celestial Aura
text: While you have exactly 1 minion in play, its Attack and Health are 10. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: Horse girls rise up!

name: Yrel, Beacon of Hope
text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Get three different Librams from an older timeline!
flavor: Yrel has a lot of overdue library books.

name: The Ceaseless Expanse
text: [x]Costs (1) less for each time a card was drawn, played, or destroyed. Battlecry: Destroy all other minions.
flavor: If you play this for its full Mana cost, you know what? You win. Good day sir!

name: Nexus-Prince Shaffar
text: [x]Spellburst: Give a minion in your hand +3/+3 and this Spellburst (unless it already has these effects).
flavor: Whatever you do, do not give him OR his ethereal parrot a magical lamp.
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a Great Dark Beyond card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the Great Dark Beyond Tavern Pass.

name: Lumia
text: [x]Lifesteal After a hero takes damage, they become Immune for the rest of the turn.
flavor:
"What's a world soul?"
"Only the most sophisticated form of life ever protected by Titans. AND it's spherical! SPHERICAL!"

name: Kil'jaeden
text: [x]Battlecry: Replace your deck with an endless portal of Demons. Each turn, they gain an additional +2/+2.
flavor: With complete control of the Burning Legion's forces, Kil'jaeden will stop at nothing until all of the traitorous Draenei have been squelched. *right clicks the enemy hero*

name: Hostile Invader
text: Battlecry, Spellburst, and Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
flavor: "And my Axe!" "And my Axe!" "And my Axe!"

name: Jettison
text: Discover a spell. Spend 2 Armor to Discover another.
flavor: Companion card to Jettidaughter.

name: Captain's Log
text:
Draw 2 cards.
Costs (1) less for each Draenei you control.
flavor: Akama loves a nice comfy log to captain on.

name: Expedition Sergeant
text: [x] Battlecry: The next Draenei  you play immediately attacks a random enemy.
flavor: Expialidocious Sergeant didn't quite fit.

name: Stalwart Avenger
text: Immune while attacking. At the end of EACH turn, swap this minion's Attack and Health.
flavor: A good defense is a good offense which is a good defense which is a good offense which is a good defense which is a good offense which is a good defense which is a good offense which is a good defense which is a good offense which is a good defense which is a good offense which is a good defense which is a good offense which is a good defense which is a good offense!

name: Crystalline Greatmace
text: After your hero attacks, give all Draenei in your hand +2 Attack.
flavor: The only difference between a mace and a greatmace is... PRESENTATION!

name: Unyielding Vindicator
text: Battlecry: The next Draenei you play gives your hero its Attack for that turn.
flavor: Strike and smash, until it is done.

name: Dwarf Planet
text:
Fill your board
with random 2-Cost minions that attack
random enemies.
flavor: Hey, who let Magni Bronzebeard, who we all know is famous for his Magni Touch, land on this planet!?

name: Spore Empress Moldara
text: Start of Game: Shuffle 7 Replicating Spores into your deck.
flavor: Sorry for not explaining the Spores in the textbox. We just didn't have that mushroom.

name: Exarch Akama
text: [x]After this attacks, all other friendly minions can attack again (except Exarch Akama).
flavor: Akama fiercely led the Vindicators in the Draenei's quest to find a new home. If only he knew what would await him on the planet of Draenor…

name: Alien Encounters
text: Summon two 2/4 Beasts with Taunt. Costs (1) less for each card you Discovered this game.
flavor: Close encounters of the cuddly kind.

name: Supernova
text: Fill your hand with random Fire spells. They cost (1).
flavor: People who enjoy the heat will say this looks like perfect weather.

name: Blazing Accretion
text: Battlecry: Destroy the top 3 cards of your deck. Any Fire spells or Elementals are drawn instead.
flavor: Much like the Draenei, this Elemental just wants a place to call home. Unlike the Draenei, it incinerates everything it touches.

name: Blasteroid
text: Battlecry: Shuffle 5 random Fire spells into your deck. They cost (2) less.
flavor: To infinity and... even further!

name: Saruun
text: [x]Battlecry: Give all Elementals in your deck Fire Spell Damage +1.
flavor:
BORN FROM THE HEAT DEATH OF COLLIDING SUPERNOVAS, SARUUN SEEKS TO INCINERATE ALL THAT WHICH REVOLVES AROUND THEM TO MERE ASHES AND STARDUST!!!!
Which is pretty neato!

name: Solar Flare
text: Deal $2 damage to all enemies. Costs (1) less for each Elemental you control.
flavor: Saruun is quite the dancer. Their pirouette is deadly.

name: Ethereal Oracle
text: Spell Damage +1 Spellburst: Draw 2 spells.
flavor: I see 2 spells in my future.

name: Deep Space Curator
text: Spellburst: Get a random minion of the spell's Cost. Set its Cost to (0).
flavor: *Gestures to empty room* "...and here is my curated collection of space."

name: Eredar Brute
text: Taunt, Lifesteal Costs (1) less for each enemy minion.
flavor: After a while, the glowing purple stress ball became ineffective at containing his rage.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Great Dark Beyond Reward Track.

name: Mutating Lifeform
text: After this survives damage, gain a random Bonus Effect.
flavor:
Who knows how many amazing discoveries are out there!
...
Never mind, I'm going home.

name: Lightfused Manasaber
text: Rush Spellburst: Gain Divine Shield.
flavor: Oh no, I ran out of fused Mana!

name: Ur'zul Rager
text: Lifesteal Spellburst: Attack a random enemy minion.
flavor: The Burning Legion is host to many horrors, but a 3 Mana 5/1 is the worst of all!

name: Splitting Spacerock
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 4/4 Splitting Boulders.
flavor:
Space rock.
*pew*
Spa ce ro ck.
*pew*
S p a c e r o c k .
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Great Dark Beyond Reward Track.

name: Space Pirate
text: Deathrattle: Your next weapon costs (1) less.
flavor: Exploring the avastness of space.

name: Star Vulpera
text: [x]Tradeable  Battlecry: Destroy an enemy  Starship or Starship Piece.
flavor: He was a star before he even flew his first ship.

name: Red Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each adjacent card played while in hand.
flavor: Lots of cards get played around it, but it's the real star.

name: Perplexing Anomaly
text: Rush, Taunt, ...Stealth?
flavor: I'm so confused... this is really a headscratcher... it doesn't make any sense... why does it cost 3 Mana?
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Great Dark Beyond Reward Track.

name: Bolide Behemoth
text: [x]Battlecry: Your Asteroids deal 1 more damage this game. Spellburst: Shuffle 3 of them into your deck.
flavor: There's only so many words that exist for rocks in space.

name: Moonstone Mauler
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Asteroids into your deck that deal 2 damage to a random enemy when drawn.
flavor: Perfect in EVOLVE Shaman!

name: Orbital Halo
text: Give a minion +1/+1 and Divine Shield. Costs (0) if you played an adjacent card this turn.
flavor: I can see your halo. HALO. Haaaalo.

name: Mystified To'cha
text: [x]Battlecry: If the combined Health of both heroes is exactly 42, set your hero's Health to 42.
flavor: We hired your elementary school math teacher to make this card.

name: Anchorite
text: Whenever another minion is Overhealed, give it that much extra Health.
flavor: A Priest is nothing without their anchor. Wait, what?

name: K'ure, the Light Beyond
text: [x]Spellburst: Summon a random 3-Cost minion. (Holy spells don't remove this Spellburst.)
flavor: The Draenei's story of survival should instill hope in you that anything is possible!! As long as you have the aid of an interdimensional manifestation of holy energy.

name: Cosmonaut
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from your deck. Reduce its Cost by (5).
flavor: It might look like they're underwater, but they're cosmo-not!

name: Planetary Navigator
text: Battlecry: The next Draenei you play costs (2) less, but has Overload: (2).
flavor: "I'm a navigator, not a doctor!"

name: Meteor Storm
text:
Deal $5 damage
to all minions.
Shuffle 5 Asteroids
into your deck.
flavor:
"Sir, the possibility of successfully drawing all of your Asteroids in a row are approximately 3,720:1!"
"Never tell me the odds!"

name: Farseer Nobundo
text: Deathrattle: Open the Galaxy's Lens. It absorbs the power of the next spell you cast.
flavor: "Someone help me! I'm stuck in a net!"

name: Murmur
text: [x]Your first Battlecry minion each turn costs (1), but immediately dies after being played.
flavor: What?

name: Ace Wayfinder
text: [x]Battlecry: Gain two random Bonus Effects. The next Draenei you play gains them as well.
flavor: She's the ace of space.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the Great Dark Beyond Tavern Pass.

name: Triangulate
text: [x]Discover a different spell from your deck. Shuffle 3 copies of it into your deck.
flavor:
"Our mission takes us to the planet of Celes, but I know not of its whereabouts."
"Captain, I saw Celes!"

name: Shield of Askara
text: Taunt Divine Shield Lifesteal
flavor: One can never have too many shields.

name: Overzealous Healer
text: Deathrattle: Restore #6 Health to the enemy hero. Spellburst: Silence this minion.
flavor: In another universe, she's Genji's best friend.

name: Askara
text: Battlecry: The next Draenei you play summons a copy of itself.
flavor: That's Askara card!

name: Spontaneous Combustion
text: Deal $4 damage to a random enemy. If you played an Elemental last turn, choose the target.
flavor: XD so random

name: Lightspeed
text: Give a minion +1/+2 and Rush. Repeatable this turn.
flavor: Speed. I am speed.

name: Divine Star
text:
Deal $3 damage
to a minion. Give a random minion in your hand +3 Health.
flavor: I could really use a wish right now.

name: Astral Vigilant
text: Battlecry: Get a copy of the last Draenei you played.
flavor: Draenei are so dedicated that they remain vigilant even in death.

name: Orbital Satellite
text: [x]Discover a Draenei. If you played an adjacent card this turn, Discover another.
flavor: Picks up all the buzz in space.

name: Troubled Mechanic
text: [x]Divine Shield Spellburst: Draw a Draenei.
flavor: In space, no one can hear you talk about your troubles.

name: Gravity Lapse
text: Set EVERY minion's Attack and Health to the lower of the two.
flavor: Did someone forget to pay the gravity bill?

name: Barrel Roll
text: [x]Deal $5 damage to an undamaged character. Costs (1) if you're building a Starship.
flavor: "We're not even close to Draenor, just do the trick! It'll be fiiiine!"

name: The Gravitational Displacer
text: [x]Starship Piece When this is launched, summon a copy of the Starship.
flavor: You ever wonder why some planets have two moons?

name: Quasar
text:
Shuffle your hand into your deck.
Reduce the Cost of cards in your deck by (3).
flavor: No one is going to believe that quasars are a real thing, Durg'tash the Sorcerer.

name: Wakener of Souls
text: Taunt, Reborn Deathrattle: Resurrect a different friendly Deathrattle minion.
flavor: The alarm again!? Wake me up in 5 more eternities.

name: Auchenai Death-Speaker
text: [x]After another friendly minion is Reborn, summon a copy of it.
flavor: He sees no evil. He hears no evil. Eh, he speaks a little evil.

name: Exarch Maladaar
text: Battlecry: The next card you play this turn costs Corpses instead of Mana.
flavor: The Auchenai order was founded to preserve the memory of Draenei that have passed. But why stop at remembrance when they can live once more?

name: Voronei Recruiter
text: [x]At the end of your turn, get a 4/4 Crewmate with a random Bonus Effect.
flavor: He has an eyepatch but isn't a Pirate. He's a Recruiter but doesn't Recruit. Smh my head.

name: Talgath
text: [x]Undamaged enemy minions take double damage. Combo: Get a Backstab.
flavor: Talgath betrayed his people by accepting Sargeras's promise of power. Talgath also saw Velen's refusal of that same power as a betrayal. I'm not convinced Talgath knows what that word means.

name: Headhunt
text: Deal $2 damage. Get a 4/4 Crewmate with a random Bonus Effect.
flavor: Even though the red lenses blurred his vision and greatly inhibited his ability to make out color and detail, he looked cool as heck.

name: Warp Drive
text: Draw 2 cards. If you're building a Starship, they cost (2) less.
flavor: WARNING: SLIPSPACE RUPTURE DETECTED!

name: Orbital Moon
text: Give a minion Taunt and Lifesteal. If you played an adjacent card this turn, also give it Reborn.
flavor: The blood moon orbits once again.

name: Suffocate
text: Destroy a minion. If you're building a Starship, also destroy a random neighbor.
flavor: He's already floating in the void of space. The shadow magic seems like overkill, idk.

name: The 8 Hands From Beyond
text: Battlecry: Destroy both players' decks EXCEPT the 8 highest Cost cards in each.
flavor: It was a one-eyed, eight-handed, giant purple planet eater.

name: Assimilating Blight
text: Discover a 3-Cost Deathrattle minion. Summon it with Reborn.
flavor: Resistance is futile.

name: Nebula
text: [x]Discover two 8-Cost minions to summon with Taunt and Elusive.
flavor: Do-re-mi-fa-so-ne-bu-la!

name: Starlight Wanderer
text: Battlecry: The next Draenei you play gains +2/+1.
flavor: Not all who wander are lost, but some most definitely are and could really use directions right about now.

name: Interstellar Wayfarer
text: Divine Shield Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of your Librams by (1) this game.
flavor: This card is way fairer than most.

name: Crimson Commander
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Give all Draenei in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: "Wait… why do I have a Deathrattle?"

name: Hologram Operator
text: Battlecry: Get 3 random Temporary Draenei.
flavor: Help me, Temporary Draenei. You're my only hope!

name: Interstellar Starslicer
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Reduce the Cost of your Librams by (1) this game.
flavor:
The universe is infinite. Ever-expanding, its sheer size is something that even the ancestors of our ancestors can only dream of knowing. And even still, across every single pocket of the galaxy, every one thing is unique.
So, no, we've never made the same flavor-text twice, IDK what you're talking about.

name: Interstellar Researcher
text: Battlecry and Spellburst: Draw a Libram.
flavor: "If only I could read Draenei!"

name: Extraterrestrial Egg
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a 3/5 Beast that attacks the lowest Health enemy.
flavor: I'll have mine starry-side up please.

name: Rangari Scout
text: After you Discover a card, get a copy of it.
flavor: Always takes credit for other people's discoveries.

name: Gorm the Worldeater
text: [x]Dormant for 5 turns. At the end of your turn, destroy the  minion to the right of this to   awaken 1 turn sooner.
flavor: His diet consists of entire WORLDS! Because moons upset his tummy.

name: Parallax Cannon
text: [x]Has +2 Attack if you've Discovered this turn. Spellburst: Your hero is Immune this turn.
flavor: Math is now cannon in the Warcraft universe.

name: Detailed Notes
text: Discover a Beast that costs (5) or more. Reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor: The Rangari Scouts pride themselves on their highly accurate notes.

name: Laser Barrage
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. If you're building a Starship, also damage its neighbors.
flavor: "I say we take off and laser barrage the entire site from orbit - it's the only way to be sure."

name: Exarch Naielle
text: Battlecry: Replace your Hero Power with Tracking (Discover a card from your deck).
flavor: The Great Dark Beyond is vast, with each world containing unknown wonders and horrors alike. To distinguish between the two, Naielle leads the Rangari in surveying all planets the Draenei set foot on.

name: Astral Phaser
text: Choose One - Deal $2 damage to two random enemy minions; or Make one Dormant for 2 turns.
flavor: Ok, Mom, in this ONE instance it IS a phase.

name: Arkonite Revelation
text: Draw a card. If it's a spell, it costs (1) less.
flavor: And if it's a rkonite, revel in it.

name: Uluu, the Everdrifter
text: [x]Each turn this is in your hand, gain two random Choose One choices.
flavor: Uluu is such a tryhard, he's carrying an entire planet!

name: Star Grazer
text: Elusive, Taunt Spellburst: Give your hero +8 Attack this turn and gain 8 Armor.
flavor: Star gazing and star grazing aren't too different. Except for the part where you eat stars.

name: Exarch Othaar
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're building a Starship, get 3 different Arcane spells and reduce their Costs by (2).
flavor: The temptation of limitless knowledge led some Eredar to join the Burning Legion. In the Sha’tari Draenei, the study of everything lives on.

name: Final Frontier
text: Discover a 10-Cost minion from the past. Set its Cost to (1).

name: Starscale Constellar
text: Spellburst: Double this minion's Attack.
flavor: You'll understand how to best make use of its effect once you connect the dots.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Great Dark Beyond Reward Track.

name: Stranded Spaceman
text: [x]Battlecry: The next Draenei you play gains +2 Health and Rush.
flavor: Would you say you're floating in a most peculiar way?

name: Galactic Crusader
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Get two random Holy spells. They cost (3) less.
flavor: The will was very specific that in the event of the Crusader's death, you were to inherit these random spells. Very odd.

name: Lunar Trailblazer
text: [x]Battlecry: Set the Cost of a random spell in your hand to this minion's Cost.
flavor: Changing legend into fact, she will ride into history.

name: First Contact
text: Summon two random 1-Cost minions. Overload: (1)
flavor: Green squid thing phone home.

name: Eredar Skulker
text: [x]Combo and Spellburst: Gain +2 Attack and Stealth.
flavor: "And I'll do it again, too!"

name: Lucky Comet
text: Discover a Combo minion. The next one you play triggers its Combo twice.
flavor:
When you wish upon a star, your dreams will take you very far.
When you wish upon a comet, your luck will make your opponent...

name: Astrobiologist
text: Battlecry: At the start of your next turn, Discover a spell.
flavor: Biologists spend a semester abroad. Astrobiologists spend a semester aboard.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Great Dark Beyond Reward Track.

name: Spacerock Collector
text: Battlecry: Your next Combo card costs (1) less.
flavor: "Space ROCKS!"

name: Scrounging Shipwright
text: Battlecry: Get a random Starship Piece from another class.
flavor: Mi Starship es tu Starship.

name: Escape Pod
text: [x]Rush  Deathrattle: Give adjacent  minions +1/+1 and Rush.
flavor: You can only have two in your deck because we are confident that the Draenei will never run into any dire situations that would warrant any more!

name: Braingill
text: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs "Deathrattle: Draw a card."
flavor: "That is highly illogigill, Captain."

name: Pressure Points
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Reduce the Cost of Combo cards in your hand by (1).
flavor: Have you ever heard of the 5 Point Palm Exploding Heart Technique?

name: Cosmic Phenomenon
text: [x]Summon three 2/3 Elementals with Taunt. If your board is full, give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: Which one you ask? Uhh, all of them.

name: Distress Signal
text:
[x]Summon two random
2-Cost minions.
Refresh 2 Mana Crystals.
flavor: HELP! HEEELP! MY OPPONENT PLAYED CARDS!

name: Ultraviolet Breaker
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to an enemy minion. Shuffle 3 Asteroids into your deck.
flavor: You're gonna need more sunscreen. Good thing we stocked up last expansion.
targeting_arrow_text: Deal 3 damage to an enemy minion.

name: Infiltrate
text:
Choose a minion.
Deal $3 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Everybody get out of here! Except you. You can stay.

name: Harth Stonebrew
text: [x]Battlecry: Replace your hand with an iconic one from Hearthstone's past. (Once per game)
flavor:
"Grab a slice by the hearth and enjoy the festivities. This celebration is for all of us!"
-Harth
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a Whizbang's Workshop card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Obtainable by purchasing in the shop.

name: Jaina's Gift
text: Discover a Temporary Frostbolt, Arcane Intellect, or Fireball.
flavor:
"On this day, my magic will bring us together."
-Jaina
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a Whizbang's Workshop card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Obtainable by participating in a special event.

flavor:

-Rexxar
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a Whizbang's Workshop card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Obtainable by participating in a special event.

-Arthas

how_to_earn_golden: Obtainable by participating in a special event.

-Uther
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a Whizbang's Workshop card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Obtainable by participating in a special event.

-Thrall

text: Discover a Temporary Execute, Shield Block, or Brawl.
flavor:
"FROM THE HORDE! AND ESPECIALLY ME!"
-Garrosh
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a Whizbang's Workshop card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Obtainable by participating in a special event.

name: Illidan's Gift
text: Discover a Temporary Fel Barrage, Chaos Strike, or Chaos Nova.
flavor:
"This gift's burden will always be yours to bear... I lost the receipt."
-Illidan
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a Whizbang's Workshop card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Obtainable by participating in a special event.

text: [x]Discover a Temporary Backstab, Deadly Poison, or Fan of Knives.
flavor:
"Here. You. Go."
-Valeera

text: Discover a Temporary Feral Rage, Wild Growth, or Swipe.
flavor:
"May this imbue you with the life of the party!"
-Malfurion
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a Whizbang's Workshop card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Obtainable by participating in a special event.
