text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of a random weapon in your hand by (2).
flavor: Having a furnace-mouth is really handy for a blacksmith.

name: Corrosive Sludge
text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon.
flavor: The result of centuries of terrible sanitation.

name: Lone Champion
text: Battlecry: If you control no other minions, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: He is a champion, with no friends. He'll keep on fighting, til the end!

name: Stoneskin Basilisk
text: Divine Shield Poisonous
flavor: He got that way from looking into a mirror.

name: Arcane Tyrant
text: Costs (0) if you've cast a spell that costs (5) or more this turn.
flavor: Tyrant is such a strong word.

name: Green Jelly
text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/2 Ooze with Taunt.
flavor: This card really breaks out of the mold.

name: Dragonslayer
text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage to a Dragon.
flavor: A pair of stout dwarves nearly averted the Cataclysm.

name: Toothy Chest
text: At the start of your turn, set this minion's Attack to 4.
flavor: Do you want to eat an adventurer?  I want to eat an adventurer!

name: Sneaky Devil
text: Stealth Your other minions have +1 Attack.
flavor: The result of a tragic accident involving a Defias Thug, a Wand of Polymorph, and a bundle of Fel Lotus.

name: Sleepy Dragon
text: Taunt
flavor: Local villagers call her "Naps Under the Mountain."

name: Hoarding Dragon
text: Deathrattle: Give your opponent two Coins.
flavor: Keeps his two cents to himself.

name: Corridor Creeper
text: Costs (1) less whenever a minion dies while this is in your hand.
flavor: It likes the smell of dead things, which is curious, as it has no visible nose.

name: Furbolg Mossbinder
text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a 6/6 Elemental.
flavor: Behold, the unstoppable power of MOSS!

name: Boisterous Bard
text: Battlecry: Give your other minions +1 Health.
flavor: As a kid, she fought with rocks.  Now she fights with ROCK!

name: Violet Wurm
text: Deathrattle: Summon seven 1/1 Grubs.
flavor: It's wurms all the way down.

name: Gravelsnout Knight
text: Battlecry: Summon a random 1-Cost minion for your opponent.
flavor: The mole of La Mancha rides again!

name: Carnivorous Cube
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion. Deathrattle: Summon 2 copies of it.
flavor: He's always grumpy until he's eaten his first barista of the morning.

name: Sonya Shadowdancer
text: After a friendly minion dies, add a 1/1 copy of it to your hand. It costs (1).
flavor: Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like a 1/1 is watching.

name: Fungalmancer
text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +2/+2.
flavor: Fungalmancy is the easy major for those who can't cut it at Waxmancy.

name: Raven Familiar
text: Battlecry: Reveal a spell in each deck. If yours costs more, draw it.
flavor: Quoth the raven, 'Does yours cost more?'

name: Dragon's Fury
text: Reveal a spell from your deck. Deal damage equal to its Cost to all minions.
flavor: “C’mon Hucklemuck. She’ll never notice if we take just one little coin.”

name: Silver Vanguard
text: Deathrattle: Recruit an 8-Cost minion.
flavor: Float like a Faerie Dragon, sting like a Hivequeen.

name: Twilight's Call
text: Summon 1/1 copies of 2 friendly Deathrattle minions that died this game.
flavor: If you’re experiencing resurrection sickness, press 1.

name: Shimmering Courser
text: Elusive on your opponent's turn.
flavor: A courser is a courser of course, of course, she's more of a unicorn than a horse...

name: Lesser Mithril Spellstone
text: Summon one 5/5 Mithril Golem. (Equip a weapon to upgrade.)
flavor:
To dwarves of stone the demon called
With promises of might, enthralled
In grasping greed they found their doom
Forever bound in mithril tombs.

name: Cheat Death
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to your hand. It costs (2) less.
flavor: Reported.

name: Dragon Soul
text: After you cast 3 spells in a turn, summon a 5/5 Dragon.
flavor: Crafted by Deathwing's goblin horde, but the dragon added the rainbow sparkles himself.

name: Sudden Betrayal
text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, instead it attacks one of its neighbors.
flavor: You thought he was your bro-bold, but turns out he's your foe-bold.

name: Elven Minstrel
text: Combo: Draw 2 minions from your deck.
flavor: "After that gig in Hamlin went south, I swore off rats."

name: Evasion
text: Secret: After your hero takes damage, become Immune this turn.
flavor: Works on weapons, missiles, and taxes.

name: Lynessa Sunsorrow
text: [x]Battlecry: Cast each spell you cast on your minions this game on this one.
flavor: A diet of pure magic is great for the complexion but wreaks havoc on one's mood.

name: To My Side!
text:
[x]Summon an Animal
Companion, or 2 if your
deck has no minions.
flavor: I hunt alone.  Well, me and Misha.  And Huffer.  And Leokk.

name: Feral Gibberer
text: After this minion attacks a hero, add a copy of it to your hand.
flavor: It's certainly not civilized gibbering.

name: Candleshot
text: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
flavor: Once called Cahn’delar, Shortbow of the Ancient Whisker.

name: Arcane Artificer
text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain Armor equal to its Cost.
flavor: Ethereal armor dissipates in 6 hours which can cause extreme awkwardness for first time buyers.

name: Cursed Disciple
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/1 Revenant.
flavor: Politer than his brother, the cursing disciple, but far more evil.

name: Dire Mole
flavor: You especially don't want to make a dire mountain out of a dire mole hill.

name: Unidentified Elixir
text: Give a minion +2/+2. Gains a bonus effect in your hand.
flavor: "Here, taste this." (Slurp) "What is it?" "I don't know, I found it in one of the labs."

name: Unidentified Shield
text:
Gain 5 Armor.
Gains a bonus effect in your hand.
flavor: The kobold stared at the bundle for a long time. “Ah hah!” he said. “It’s a shield.”

name: Unidentified Maul
text: Gains a bonus effect in your hand.
flavor: When all you have is an unidentified maul, everything else looks like an unidentified nail.

name: Shroom Brewer
text: Battlecry: Restore #4 Health.
flavor: Side effects guaranteed!

name: Possessed Lackey
text: Deathrattle: Recruit a Demon.
flavor: If you don't keep up with your payments, it'll be a repossessed lackey.

name: Oaken Summons
text:
Gain 6 Armor.
Summon a minion
from your deck that
costs (4) or less.
flavor: The Guild used oak trees until they all turned to ash.

name: Crystal Lion
text: [x]Divine Shield Costs (1) less for each Silver Hand Recruit you control.
flavor: Standard issue recruit gear: 1 silver sword, 1 Lordaeron insignia, 2 bags of crystal kibble.

name: Grizzled Guardian
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Recruit 2 minions that cost (4) or less.
flavor: Favorite sandwich? Grizzled cheese.

name: Trogg Gloomeater
text: Taunt Poisonous
flavor: His breath smells like agony and despair, which is still better than most troggs.

name: Ixlid, Fungal Lord
text: After you play a minion, summon a copy of it.
flavor: We suggest crafting Ixlid; he'll grow on you. Literally.

name: Level Up!
text: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +2/+2 and Taunt.
flavor:
Ding!
Grats.

name: Primal Talismans
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a random basic Totem."
flavor: All that remained from the first kobold colony: a single talisman and the word "Flamestrike."

name: Kobold Apprentice
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Horrible secret: The Darkness is immune to Arcane Missiles.

name: Greedy Sprite
text: Deathrattle: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavor: Sparkliest of the seven deadly sprites.

name: Psionic Probe
text: Copy a spell in your opponent's deck and add it to your hand.
flavor: She prefers calling it "Psionic Tickling."

name: Marin the Fox
text: Battlecry: Summon a 0/8 Treasure Chest for your opponent. (Break it for awesome loot!)
flavor: My name is Marin the Fox. You took my treasure. Prepare to die.
how_to_earn: Unlocked by opening a Kobolds & Catacombs pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with the BlizzCon 2017 virtual ticket.

name: Grumble, Worldshaker
text: Battlecry: Return your other minions to your hand. They cost (1).
flavor: The grumbling grew to a mighty rumbling, and out of the caverns the kobolds came tumbling.

name: Drygulch Jailor
text: Deathrattle: Add 3 Silver Hand Recruits to your hand.
flavor: Hard time: 6-10 turns for candle-nappin'.

name: Reckless Flurry
text: Spend all your Armor. Deal that much damage to all minions.
flavor: Look. Cautious Flurries will only get you so far in life.

name: Gemstudded Golem
text: Taunt Can only attack if you have 5 or more Armor.
flavor: Perfectly accessorized to attract adventurers.

name: Drywhisker Armorer
text: Battlecry: For each enemy minion, gain 2 Armor.
flavor: Kobolds use anything for armor: Pots, pans, garbage cans… even other kobolds.

name: Voidlord
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon three 1/3 Demons with Taunt.
flavor: Never let it hold your checkbook.

name: Gather Your Party
text: Recruit a minion.
flavor: Thrilling adventure! Danger guaranteed! Loot uncertain! Death optional!  Who’s with me?

name: Healing Rain
text: Restore #12 Health randomly split among all friendly characters.
flavor: It's filled with electrolytes!

name: Guild Recruiter
text: Battlecry: Recruit a minion that costs (4) or less.
flavor: The original telemarketer.

name: Woecleaver
text: After your hero attacks, Recruit a minion.
flavor: Turn that frown into TWO frowns!

name: Kobold Monk
text: Your hero is Elusive.
flavor: There is no candle.

name: Hungry Ettin
text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon a random 2-Cost minion for your opponent.
flavor: How can he be hungry… if he's Ettin!?

name: Fungal Enchanter
text: Battlecry: Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: Qualifications: Born with pointy hat.

name: Rummaging Kobold
text: Battlecry: Return one of your destroyed weapons to your hand.
flavor: "Broken longsword is brand new shortsword." - Kobold Proverb

name: Twig of the World Tree
text: Deathrattle: Refresh your Mana Crystals.
flavor: For druids who want to branch out.

name: Shrieking Shroom
text:
At the end of your turn, summon a random
1-Cost minion.
flavor: Auditioning for the next Fungal Idol.

name: Benevolent Djinn
text: At the end of your turn, restore #3 Health to your hero.
flavor: Wish #1: funnel cakes. Wish #2: funnel cakes. Wish #3: FUNNEL CAKES.

name: Duskbreaker
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Waking up at the break of dusk is just not as impressive.

name: Kobold Illusionist
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 copy of a minion from your hand.
flavor: He can make ANYTHING look like a candle.

name: Plated Beetle
text: Deathrattle: Gain 3 Armor.
flavor: "Ok, your party has defeated the beetle." "I put it on my head." "What?" "I put it on my head. Like a hat."

name: Grand Archivist
text: At the end of your turn, cast a spell from your deck (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: Qualifications: Found pointy hat.

name: Rin, the First Disciple
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Add 'The First Seal' to your hand.
flavor: Signed and sealed, she delivers oblivion.

name: Cataclysm
text: Destroy all minions. Discard 2 cards.
flavor: RUN FROM SKY CANDLES! THEY BURN! RUN!

name: Skull of the Man'ari
text: At the start of your turn, summon a Demon from your hand.
flavor: Don't trust the skull.

name: Val'anyr
text: Deathrattle: Give a minion in your hand +4/+2. When it dies, reequip this.
flavor: Recently unearthed in one of the deepest kobold caves. Traded for a large candle.

name: Lesser Onyx Spellstone
text: Destroy 1 random enemy minion. (Play 3 Deathrattle cards to upgrade.)
flavor:
The trolls of old embraced the gift
A jewel of black for daggers swift
No party lasts who finds the stone
Those wielding it soon stand alone.

name: Unstable Evolution
text: Echo Transform a friendly minion into one that costs (1) more.
flavor: They grow up so fast.

name: The Runespear
text: After your hero attacks, Discover a spell and cast it with random targets.
flavor: When asked what the runes do, the tauren smith smiled: "A little of this, a little of that..."

name: Lesser Diamond Spellstone
text: Resurrect 2 different friendly minions. (Cast 4 spells to upgrade.)
flavor:
A diamond, white, this stone the eighth
A precious jewel for those of faith
A whispered prayer restores the lost
But none among them know the cost.

name: Kathrena Winterwisp
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Recruit a Beast.
flavor: She’s not one of those treehugger elves – but she does like the occasional cuddle.

name: Zola the Gorgon
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a Golden copy of it to your hand.
flavor: Her name seems a bit cheesy.
targeting_arrow_text: Add a Golden copy to your hand.

name: Murmuring Elemental
text: Battlecry: Your next Battlecry this turn triggers twice.
flavor: Déjà Dude.

name: Windshear Stormcaller
text: Battlecry: If you control all 4 basic Totems, summon Al'Akir the Windlord.
flavor: Don't ever doubt Al'Akir's love for basic totems.

name: Geosculptor Yip
text: At the end of your turn, summon a random minion with Cost equal to your Armor (up to 10).
flavor: Once crafted a gauntlet out of earwax and pure ambition.

name: Seeping Oozeling
text: Battlecry: Gain the Deathrattle of a random minion in your deck.
flavor: Uh, you might want to get that looked at.

name: Master Oakheart
text: Battlecry: Recruit a 1, 2, and 3-Attack minion.
flavor: His adventuring party consists of Goldshire Footman, Frostwolf Grunt and Hadronox.

name: Crushing Walls
text: Destroy your opponent's left and right-most minions.
flavor: "It could be worse!" "It's worse."

name: The Darkness
text: [x]Starts Dormant. Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Candles into the enemy deck. When drawn, this awakens.
flavor: I would rather light a single candle than curse the darkness. But I'm willing to do both.

name: Twilight Acolyte
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, swap this minion's Attack with another minion's.
flavor: The dragons mostly keep him around as a snack.

name: Void Ripper
text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of all other minions.
flavor: You had to put the portable hole inside the bag of holding, didn't you?!

name: Gilded Gargoyle
text: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.
flavor: You hear a coin rattling inside the slotted gargoyle...What could it mean?

name: Dragoncaller Alanna
text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Dragon for each spell you cast this game that costs (5) or more.
flavor: Her secret is using a gentle voice and carrying a baggie of hotdogs.

name: Leyline Manipulator
text: Battlecry: If you're holding any cards that didn't start in your deck, reduce their Cost by (2).
flavor: The shortest distance between two points is a leyline.

name: Temporus
text: Battlecry: Your opponent takes two turns. Then you take two turns.
flavor: Follows adventurers, seeking the ultimate time magic: the ability to reload.

name: Spiteful Summoner
text: [x]Battlecry: Reveal a spell from your deck. Summon a random minion with the same Cost.
flavor: Sometimes she'll summon a Doomsayer. Out of spite.

name: Dragonhatcher
text: At the end of your turn, Recruit a Dragon.
flavor: Which came first?  The dragon or the dragonhatcher?

name: King Togwaggle
text: [x]Battlecry: Swap decks with your opponent. Give them a Ransom spell to swap back.
flavor: Management of the Kobold Empire requires a careful balance between a lack of social services and fiscal irresponsibility.

name: Kingsbane
text: [x]Always keeps enchantments. Deathrattle: Shuffle this into your deck.
flavor: But it has a soft spot for emperors.

name: Imp-oster
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Imp. Transform into a copy of it.
flavor: There is an imposter among us.
targeting_arrow_text: Choose a friendly Imp. Transform into a copy of it.

name: Arson Accusation
text: Choose a minion. Destroy it after your hero takes damage.
flavor: We didn't start the fire!

name: Habeas Corpses
text: Discover a friendly minion to resurrect and give it Rush. It dies at the end of turn.
flavor: Whoops, typo!

name: Totemic Evidence
text: Choose a basic Totem and summon it. Infuse (3 Totems): Summon all 4 instead.
flavor: Every totem is evidence of a tree's murder.

name: Soul Seeker
text: Battlecry: Swap this with a random minion from your opponent's deck.
flavor: The Soul Seeker's job is to look for a snitch.

name: Framester
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 'Framed' cards into the opponent's deck. When drawn, they Overload for (2).
flavor: "Who put these beans in my pocket?!" -Man With Beans in Pocket

name: Objection!
text: Secret: When your opponent plays a  minion, Counter it.
flavor: "Sire, this is a Sindy's."

name: Sightless Magistrate
text: Battlecry: Both players draw until they have 5 cards.
flavor: Does "Justice is Blind" still apply with Spectral Sight?

name: Shadehound
text: [x]Whenever this attacks, give your other Beasts +2/+2. Infuse (3 Beasts): Gain Rush.
flavor: This Shadehound wasn't just a good boy. He was the best.

name: Motion Denied
text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, deal $6 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: DO NOT PASS GO. DO NOT COLLECT 200 GOLD.

name: Defense Attorney Nathanos
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a friendly Deathrattle minion that died this game. Gain its Deathrattle and then trigger it.
flavor: "Your Honor, my client was simply trying a new tree trimming technique!"

name: All Fel Breaks Loose
text: [x]Summon a friendly Demon that died this game. Infuse (3 Demons): Summon three instead.
flavor: Maybe we should have made the bars closer together…

name: Life Sentence
text:
Remove a minion
from the game.
flavor: Also sentenced to laugh and love.

name: Prosecutor Mel'tranix
text: [x]Battlecry: Your opponent can only play their left- and right-most cards on their next turn.
flavor: "Your Honor. The Defense isn't a clown, he's the whole circus."

name: Jury Duty
text:
[x]Summon two
Silver Hand Recruits.
Give your Silver Hand
Recruits +1/+1.
flavor: The most criminal thing about paladins is that they actually like jury duty.

name: Order in the Court
text:
[x]Reorder your deck from
 highest Cost to lowest
Cost. Draw a card.
flavor: "I have nothing BUT contempt for this court!"

name: Class Action Lawyer
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, set  a minion's stats to 1/1.
flavor: "Have you or a loved one ever been injured in a Consecration?"

name: Perjury
text: [x]Secret: When your turn starts, Discover and cast a Secret from another class.
flavor: By Liar be Perjured!

name: Murder Accusation
text: Choose a minion. Destroy it after another enemy minion dies.
flavor: Quote From Man Murdered: "What are you gonna do, murder me?"

name: Scribbling Stenographer
text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each card you've played this turn.
flavor: A truly staggering 180 scribbles per minute!

name: Clear Conscience
text: Give a friendly minion +2/+3 and "Elusive on your opponent's turn."
flavor: Do you swear to give the buff, the whole buff, and nothing but the buff, so help you Kyrestia?

name: Incriminating Psychic
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Copy two random cards from your opponent's hand.
flavor: Good news: He knows Kazakus's secret identity! Bad news: Now he's here.

name: Theft Accusation
text:
[x]Choose a minion.
Destroy it after you play
a card copied from
the opponent.
flavor: Honey, where are my paaaaaaants?

name: Dew Process
text:
[x]For the rest of the game,
players draw an extra card
at the start of their turn.
flavor: All part of dewing your dew diligence.

name: Attorney-at-Maw
text: Choose One - Silence a minion; or Give a minion Immune this turn.
flavor: When the going gets tough, you don't want a criminal lawyer... you want a criminal lawyer...

name: Incarceration
text: [x]Choose a minion. It goes Dormant for 3 turns.
flavor: To Blizzard jail with you!

name: Call to the Stand
text: Your opponent summons a random minion from their hand.
flavor: Don't worry, there is a chair for you to sit in. It's very misleading.

name: Mawsworn Bailiff
text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you have 4 or more Armor, gain +4/+4.
flavor: Bailiff, bring in the dancing lobsters!

name: Weapons Expert
text: Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, give it +1/+1. Otherwise, draw a weapon.
flavor: "Yes, Your Honor, this appears to be some sort of blade."

name: Torghast Custodian
text: [x]Battlecry: For each enemy minion, randomly gain Rush, Divine Shield, or Windfury.
flavor: Why is it a common? Well we couldn't make it a LEGendary minion!

name: Afterlife Attendant
text: Your Infuse cards also Infuse while in your deck.
flavor: AH! Wrist cramp!

name: Tight-Lipped Witness
text: Secrets can't be revealed.
flavor: People keep asking for her award-winning vegetarian chili recipe, but she just can't spill the beans.

name: Sylvanas, the Accused
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy an enemy minion. Infuse (7): Take control of it instead.
flavor: Turns into 'Sylvanas, the Infused'.

name: The Jailer
text: Battlecry: Destroy your deck. This minion gains Immune.
flavor: At one point, The Jailer served as Arbiter over the souls of the Shadowlands. He was the epitome of an unbiased, righteous judge of character. WAS.

name: Contract Conjurer
text: Costs (3) less for each Secret you control.
flavor: This document looks illegally binding.

name: Toysnatching Geist
text: [x]Gigantify Battlecry: Discover an Undead. Reduce its Cost by this minion's Attack.
flavor: So THAT'S how the Geist stole Winterveil!

name: The Replicator-inator
text: [x]Miniaturize, Gigantify After you play a minion with the same Attack as this, summon a copy of it.
flavor: Dr. Boom is the greatest inventor in the Tri-Zone area!

name: Puppetmaster Dorian
text: After you draw a minion, get a 1/1 copy of it that costs (1).
flavor: Though Dorian may officially be working under Dr. Boom, we all know who's really pulling the strings...

name: Domino Effect
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Repeat to the left or right, dealing 1 more damage each time.
flavor: WHY DO THEY NEVER RUN TO THE SIDE?????

name: Helm of Humiliation
text: Give a minion -5/-5. Give a minion in your hand +5/+5.
flavor: <whispers> "...and your father was a Murloc too."

name: Foamrender
text: Whenever your hero attacks, spend 3 Corpses to gain +1 Durability.
flavor: No honey, we have Shadowmourne at home.

name: Return Policy
text: Discover a friendly Deathrattle card you've played this game. Trigger its Deathrattle.
flavor: Sorry, the Workshop has a strict 'no-takesies-backsies' policy.

name: Wilderness Pack
text: Add 5 random Beasts to your hand. They are Temporary.
flavor: Don't bother asking, "Can we keep them?" The answer is no.

name: Bargain Bin
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, spell, or weapon, draw a card of the other 2 types.
flavor: Used to contain Worgen Greaser until SOMEONE started buffing it.

name: Malfunction
text: Deal $3 damage split among all enemy minions. If your deck has no minions, deal $3 more.
flavor: Bug Report: This card works perfectly.

name: Snuggle Teddy
text: Gigantify Elusive, Lifesteal, Taunt
flavor: Someone really put their heart into making this.

name: Overgrown Beanstalk
text: Summon a 2/2 Treant. Draw a card for each Treant you control.
flavor: You'd need to be pretty jacked to climb this.

name: Buy One, Get One Freeze
text: Freeze a minion. Summon a Frozen copy of it.
flavor: That's an ice deal!

name: Darkmoon Magician
text: [x]Elusive After you cast a spell, cast a random spell that costs (1) more.
flavor:
Darkmoon Magicians pull rabbits out of their hats, and wins out of their...
hats.

name: Delayed Product
text: Discover and summon a minion that costs (8) or more. It goes Dormant for 2 turns.
flavor: Soon (TM).

name: Rocket Hopper
text: Rush Overload: (4)
flavor: Are y'all gonna ask for THIS one to be orange too!?

name: Murloc Growfin
text: [x]Gigantify Battlecry: Summon a Tinyfin with Rush and stats equal to this minion's.
flavor: Grows up to 8x its size! Just add water!

name: Explodineer
text:
[x]At the end of your turn, shuffle
a Bomb into your opponent's
deck. When drawn, it explodes
for 5 damage.
flavor: Explodineeeer... explodifaaaar... explode whereeeever you aaaaare...

name: Building-Block Golem
text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Summon three random 1-Cost minions.
flavor: I HOPE YOU STEP ON A 1-COST MINION!

name: Whack-A-Gnoll
text: Discover a Paladin weapon from the past. Give it +1/+1.
flavor: Need closure on your Hardcore WoW character dying in Westfall? Step right up!

name: Wave of Nostalgia
text: Transform ALL minions into random Legendary ones from the past.
flavor: Ja, please don't freeze my minions. No stall, ja????

name: INFERNAL!
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Set your hero's remaining Health to 15.
flavor: FLAVOR TEXT!

name: Standardized Pack
text: Add 5 random Taunt minions to your hand. They are Temporary.
flavor: TAUNT. TAUNT. TAUNT. TAUNT. TAUNT.

name: Dust Bunny
text: [x]Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a random piece of junk to your hand (a Coin, Rock, Banana, or Knife).
flavor: Worth its weight in Dust.

name: Mass Production
text: Draw 2 cards. Deal $3 damage to your hero. Shuffle 2 copies of this into your deck.
flavor: Whenever you cast this, we make a new Nemsy portrait.

name: Twisted Pack
text: Add 5 random cards from other classes to your hand. They are Temporary.
flavor: Twist it! Rip it! Play it!

name: Holy Glowsticks
text: Lifesteal Deal $4 damage to a minion. Costs (1) if you've cast a Holy spell this turn.
flavor: Somewhere there's a Naaru missing a couple of shards.

name: Sock Puppet Slitherspear
text: This minion's Attack is improved by your hero's.
flavor: The right hand of Queen Azshara is Lady Vashj. This is her left hand.

name: Safety Expert
text: Rush. Deathrattle: Shuffle three Bombs into your opponent's deck.
flavor: Remember: Always wear your helmet when strapped to a bajillion explosives.

name: Toyrantus
text: Taunt, Elusive Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, gain +7/+7.
flavor: Dr. Boom was definitely a dinosaur kid.

name: Funhouse Mirror
text:
Summon a copy
of an enemy minion.
It attacks the original.
flavor:
Funhouse mirror on the wall,
Who's the tallest gnome of all?

name: Part Scrapper
text:
Lose up to 5 Armor.
Your next Mech costs
that much less.
flavor: "Goodbye! Goodbye! Goodbye!"

name: Dubious Purchase
text: Draw 3 cards. Combo: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: Beauty is in the eye of the scorpidholder.

name: Gibbering Reject
text: After your hero attacks, summon another Gibbering Reject.
flavor: Don't get it wet or feed it after midnight.

name: Product 9
text: Battlecry: Recast every friendly Secret that triggered this game.
flavor: We're fresh out of Toyrantus right now but lemme show you something we have that's just as good!

name: Pro Gamer
text: [x]Battlecry: Challenge your opponent to a game of Rock-Paper-Scissors! The winner draws 2 cards.
flavor: Wow... who could have guessed? Another rock user ruining the meta for everyone as usual.

name: Flickering Lightbot
text: [x]Gigantify Costs (1) less for each Holy spell you've cast this game.
flavor: These bots are sent out with nearly drained batteries, for dramatic effect.

name: Puppet Theatre
text:
[x]Choose an enemy
minion. Get a 1/1 copy
of it that costs (1).
flavor: AUDIENCE PARTICIPATION TIME!

name: Sacrificial Pact
text: Destroy a friendly Demon. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
flavor: This is the reason that Demons never really become friends with Warlocks.

name: Vanish
text: Return all minions to their owner's hand.

name: Kidnapper
text: Combo: Return a minion to its owner's hand.
flavor: He just wants people to see his vacation photos.

name: Starfall
text: Choose One - Deal $5 damage to a minion; or $2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Is the sky falling?  Yes.  Yes it is.

name: Ancient of Lore
text: Choose One - Draw 2 cards; or Restore #7 Health.
flavor: Go ahead, carve your initials in him.

name: Al'Akir the Windlord
text: Charge, Divine Shield, Taunt, Windfury
flavor: He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords.  And the other three don't let him forget it.

name: Kor'kron Elite
text: Charge
flavor: The Kor'kron are the elite forces of Garrosh Hellscream. Let's just say you don't want to run into these guys while wearing a blue tabard.

name: Mana Wyrm
text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: These wyrms feed on arcane energies, and while they are generally considered a nuisance rather than a real threat, you really shouldn't leave them alone with a bucket of mana.

name: Master of Disguise
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Stealth until your next turn.
flavor: She's actually a male tauren.  People don't call him "Master of Disguise" for nothing.

name: Captain's Parrot
text: Battlecry: Draw a Pirate from your deck.
flavor: Pirates and Parrots go together like Virmen and Carrots.
how_to_earn: Unlocked when you have all the Pirates from the Legacy Set.

name: Hungry Crab
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Murloc and gain +2/+2.
flavor: Murloc.  It's what's for dinner.

name: Bloodsail Raider
text: Battlecry: Gain Attack equal to the Attack of your weapon.
flavor: "I only plunder on days that end in 'y'."

name: Knife Juggler
text:
[x]After you summon a
minion, deal 1 damage
to a random enemy.
flavor: Ambitious Knife Jugglers sometimes graduate to Bomb Jugglers.    They never last long enough to make it onto a card though.

name: Wild Pyromancer
text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to ALL minions.
flavor: BOOM BABY BOOM!  BAD IS GOOD!  DOWN WITH GOVERNMENT!

name: Doomsayer
text: At the start of your turn, destroy ALL minions.
flavor: He's almost been right so many times. He was sure it was coming during the Cataclysm.

name: Dread Corsair
text: Taunt Costs (1) less per Attack of your weapon.
flavor: "Yarrrr" is a pirate word that means "Greetings, milord."

name: Faerie Dragon
text: Elusive
flavor: Adorable.  Immune to Magic.  Doesn't pee on the rug.  The perfect pet!

name: Captain Greenskin
text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1/+1.
flavor: He was this close to piloting a massive juggernaut into Stormwind Harbor. If it weren't for those pesky kids!

name: Bloodsail Corsair
text: [x]Battlecry: Remove 1 Durability from your opponent's weapon.
flavor: Every pirate uses the same four digits to access Automated Gold Dispensers.  It's called the "Pirate's Code".

name: Violet Teacher
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Violet Apprentice.
flavor: If you don't pay attention, you may be turned into a pig.  And then you get your name on the board.

name: Southsea Captain
text: Your other Pirates have +1/+1.
flavor: When he saves enough plunder, he's going to commission an enormous captain's hat.  He has hat envy.

name: Millhouse Manastorm
text: Battlecry: Enemy spells cost (0) next turn.
flavor: "I'm gonna light you up, sweetcheeks!"

name: Deathwing
text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions and discard your hand.
flavor: Once a noble dragon known as Neltharion, Deathwing lost his mind and shattered Azeroth before finally being defeated.  Daddy issues?

name: Animal Companion
text: Summon a random Beast Companion.
flavor: You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer!  Huffer is more trouble than he's worth.

name: Commanding Shout
text: Your minions can't be reduced below 1 Health this turn. Draw a card.
flavor: "Shout! Shout! Let it all out!" - Advice to warriors-in-training

name: Master Swordsmith
text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Attack.
flavor: He's currently trying to craft a "flail-axe", but all the other swordsmiths say it can't be done.

name: Gruul
text: At the end of each turn, gain +1/+1 .
flavor: He's Gruul "the Dragonkiller".  He just wanted to cuddle them… he never meant to…

name: Hogger
text: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt.
flavor: Hogger is super powerful. If you kill him, it's because he let you.

name: Stampeding Kodo
text: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
flavor: This Kodo is so big that he can stampede by himself.

name: Tear Reality
text:
[x]Add 2 random
Mage spells from the
past to your hand.
They cost (2) less.
flavor: One time it gave me a black flower, a smiling pot, and a foil first edition Dracthyr.

name: Spectral Trainee
text:
After you cast a spell,
deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: After graduating at the top of her class from Scholomance, she was granted an eternal scholarship to study abroad in Naxxramas.

name: Whirlweaver
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast a spell last turn, Discover an Elemental.
flavor: Of all the creations from the Construct Quarter, a naga combined with water is the most intuitive.

name: Ransack
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If you've played a card from another class this turn, deal $4 instead.
flavor:
"Fred's a talking ghoul. He can do whatever he wants."
"I want to steal!"

name: Stitched Creation
text: Combo: Gain +2/+2. Infuse ({0}): Gain +3/+3. Manathirst ({1}): Gain +4/+4.
flavor: To defend Naxxramas from the oncoming adventurers, the Scourge created a monstrosity the world had never seen before: an abomination wearing clothes!!

name: Jolly Roger
text:
After your hero
attacks, summon a
1/1 Undead Pirate.
flavor: That's a great pose, Roger. But this time try happier, and with your mouth open.

name: Frostfin Chomper
text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, summon three 1/1 Murlocs.
flavor: If you want good sushi, it is important to always keep your murlocs on ice.

name: Blazing Transmutation
text: [x]Choose a minion. Discover one that costs (1) more to transform it into.
flavor: Congratulations! Your minion evolved into a Fire type!

name: Cold Storage
text: Freeze a minion. Add a copy of it to your hand.
flavor: Sapphiron's favorite treat always was popsicles.

name: Death Beetle
text: Taunt Manathirst (11): Gain +4/+4 and Charge.
flavor: Well that'll be useless next expansion. WINK WINK.

name: Life from Death
text: [x]Draw 3 cards. Infuse (6): This costs (1).
flavor: Just because you came up with a nicer name for it doesn't mean that necromancy is any more justified.

name: Rake
text:
[x]Give your hero +2 Attack
this turn. Deal damage
equal to your hero's
Attack to a minion.
flavor: When you're done shredding through your enemies, use it on your leaves!

name: ZOMBEEEES!!!
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon four 1/1 Zombees to attack it.
flavor: In your brain, in your brain, Zombees, Zombees, Zombees-ees-ees.

name: Trinket Tracker
text: Battlecry: Draw a 1-Cost spell.
flavor:
Dashing through the snow
On an undead trinket craze
Over the hills we go
Tracking all the way!

name: Faithful Companions
text: [x]Discover a Beast from your deck and summon it. Manathirst (10): Also summon a copy of it.
flavor: That's just how they cuddle!

name: Nofin's Imp-ossible
text: Give all friendly Demons and Murlocs "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Imploc."
flavor: They have faces only a morrglr could love.

name: Plague Eruption
text: Deal $2 damage to all minions. If you've discarded a card this game, deal $1 more.
flavor: Be prepared! (With tissues)

name: Rotting Necromancer
text: Battlecry: Dredge. If it's an Undead, deal 5 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: You can't spell dredge without D-E-D.

name: Mind Sear
text:
Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it dies,
deal $3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Ride or die, or both.

name: Cannibalize
text: Destroy a minion. Restore its Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: The Silvermoon health inspector has some choice words for the Lich King.

name: Knight of the Dead
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero. Manathirst (7): Restore 5 Health to your hero instead.
flavor: A Paladin will follow their oath to slay the undead, even when they count themselves among them.

name: Goldwing
text: [x]Rush Battlecry: If you're holding a Mech, gain Windfury.
flavor: This HAS to be worth more dust, right?

name: The Purator
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, draw a minion of each minion type.
flavor: With the rise of the undead, the Curator sees it as his duty to take care of them.

name: Shambling Chow
text: Rush Deathrattle: Deal 4 damage to your hero.
flavor: And step, and shamble, and step, and flip the hair!

name: Calamity's Grasp
text: Deathrattle: Add a random Outcast card to your hand.
flavor: Kel'Thuzad's personal fidget spinner.

name: Felscale Evoker
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, summon a different Demon from your deck.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: So it’s a demon and a naga, but NOT a dragon?

name: Fleshshaper
text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you have 5 or more Armor, summon a copy of this.
flavor: Even THIS is better than paper straws.

name: Hookfist-3000
text:
After your hero attacks, gain 4 Armor and
draw a card.
flavor: But wait! There's more!

name: Training Session
text: Discover a Taunt minion. If you play it this turn, repeat this.
flavor: Instructor Razuvious's training turns the Scourge's Death Knights into hardened killing machines. His merciless routines focus on breaking down his underlings until they build up a resistance to his strength.

name: Lost Exarch
text: [x]Deathrattle: Spend all your Mana. Summon that many  2/2 Zombies with Rush.
flavor: She resisted the temptation of the Burning Legion's power only to fall victim to the Scourge.

name: Thaddius, Monstrosity
text: [x]Taunt. Your odd-Cost cards cost (2) less. (Swaps polarity each turn!)
flavor: Feugen is positive that Thaddius will see play, but Stalagg seems negative about it.

name: Rivendare, Warrider
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle the other 3 Horsemen into your deck.
flavor: More like the 4 Horsemen of the "Can't Get Here On Time."

name: Rimescale Siren
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, Freeze 3 random enemy minions.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: She will freeze the Scourge dead in their tracks.

name: Construct Quarter
text: [x]Destroy a friendly minion to summon a 4/5 Undead with Rush.
flavor: It's not alive! IT'S NOT ALIIIIIVE!!!

name: Frost Queen Sindragosa
text: Colossal +2 After an enemy minion is Frozen, destroy it.
flavor: With her final breath, Sindragosa cursed her consort and all who abandoned her to die in Icecrown. When she was reborn by the hands of the Lich King, her first freezing exhale wrought only pain.

name: Suspicious Peddler
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a 1-Cost card. If your opponent guesses your   choice, they get a copy.
flavor: The best snake oil this side of Azeroth.

name: Mistake
text: This has all minion types.
flavor: We like to think of it as a happy accident.

name: Darkfallen Shadow
text: Rush Manathirst (6): Gain Reborn.
flavor: Manathirst AND Reborn?! Pick a side!

name: Vilefin Inquisitor
text: Battlecry: Your Hero Power becomes 'Summon a 1/1 Murloc.'
flavor: Nobody expects the Vilefin Inquisition!

name: Primal Fusion
text: Give a minion +1/+1 for each of your Totems.
flavor: Golce and Dabbana have a new line of Earth Totems available at vendors everywhere this holiday season.

name: Flamewreathed Faceless
text: Overload: (2)
flavor: He's on fire! Boomshakalaka!

name: Eternal Sentinel
text: Battlecry: Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals.
flavor: Just try to avoid eye contact.

name: Evolve
text: Transform your minions into random minions that cost (1) more.
flavor: So you say you want an evolution. Well, you know. We all want to change the board.

name: Thing from Below
text: [x]Taunt Costs (1) less for each Totem you've summoned this game.
flavor: Just can't resist the opportunity to hang around with a bunch of totems.

name: Hammer of Twilight
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/2 Elemental.
flavor: Stop! It's Twilight Hammer time.

name: Tentacles for Arms
text: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand.
flavor: That's right. Garrosh just slapped you to death with a tentacle.

name: Silithid Swarmer
text: Can only attack if your hero attacked this turn.
flavor: If your hero doesn't attack, it's just "Silithid Loner".

name: Y'Shaarj, Rage Unbound
text: At the end of your turn, put a minion from your deck into the battlefield.
flavor: When he's working out, he binds all that rage back into a ponytail.

name: Fandral Staghelm
text: Your Choose One cards and powers have both effects combined.
flavor: Always manages to mention "Back when I was creating the World Tree…" in EVERY conversation. Sheesh! Enough already.

name: Infest
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Add a random Beast to your hand."
flavor: The best part is the look on their face when you jump out of the cake! Err… corpse.

name: Feral Rage
text: Choose One - Give your hero +4 Attack this turn; or Gain 8 Armor.
flavor: Let's be honest. One option is a lot ragier than the other.

name: Mark of Y'Shaarj
text:
Give a minion +2/+2.
If it's a Beast, draw
a card.
flavor: Y'Shaarj had three sons: Mark, Theodore, and Chris.

name: Forbidden Ancient
text: Battlecry: Spend all your Mana. Gain +1/+1 for each Mana spent.
flavor: This Ancient was banned from the local tavern after tucking a 'Dr. Boom' up its sleeve.

name: On the Hunt
text:
Deal $1 damage.
Summon a 1/1 Mastiff.
flavor: The mastiff giggles if you don't hit any ducks.

name: Bladed Cultist
text: Combo: Gain +1/+1.
flavor: He has a poor understanding of the law of diminishing returns.

name: Journey Below
text: Discover a Deathrattle card.
flavor: Don't stop believing there's something below.

name: Thistle Tea
text: Draw a card. Add 2 extra copies of it to your hand.
flavor: Aren't Thistles prickly?  Why would you drink them? I don't get Rogues.

name: Xaril, Poisoned Mind
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a random Toxin card to your hand.
flavor: It's basically your own fault if you go around drinking weird green potions handed out by creepy mantid dudes.

name: Shatter
text: Destroy a Frozen minion.
flavor: What's cooler than being cool?

name: Evolved Kobold
text: Spell Damage +2
flavor: You no take tentacle!

name: Twilight Flamecaller
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Make sure you summon a Twilight Marshmallowcaller too! Mmmm Mmm Mmm!!

name: Demented Frostcaller
text: After you cast a spell, Freeze a random enemy.
flavor: He prefers that you refer to him by his nickname: 'Frostwaker.'

name: Forbidden Flame
text: Spend all your Mana. Deal that much damage to a minion.
flavor: WARNING: This flame is not to be used unless you are a licensed acolyte of the Old Gods.

name: Servant of Yogg-Saron
text: [x]Battlecry: Cast a random  spell that costs (5) or MORE   (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: Yogg-Saron always likes to complain about how he has too many servants and there are too many mouths to feed.

name: Cabalist's Tome
text:
Get 3 random
Mage spells.
flavor: What's in there? I bet it's cookie recipes!

name: Power Word: Tentacles
text: Give a minion +2/+6.
flavor: Because you're wrapped in a protective layer of… tentacles?

name: Twilight Darkmender
text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, restore #10 Health to your hero.
flavor: First she separates them from the lights, washes them in cold water, and hang-dries.

name: Shadow Word: Horror
text: Destroy all minions with 2 or less Attack.
flavor: It's more succinct than "Shadow Word: Suck Into Vortex."

name: Forbidden Shaping
text: Spend all your Mana. Summon a random minion that costs that much.
flavor: But the minion arrives covered in goo.

name: Darkspeaker
text: Battlecry: Swap stats with a friendly minion.
flavor: People often think that Darkspeaker is the arch nemesis of Lightspeaker, but that title actually belongs to Heavyspeaker.

name: Embrace the Shadow
text: This turn, your healing effects deal damage instead.
flavor: For when your Auchenai Soulpriests call in sick.

name: Darkshire Librarian
text: Battlecry: Discard a random card. Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavor: Do NOT be late with your overdue fines.

name: Darkshire Councilman
text:
[x]After you summon a minion,
 gain +1 Attack.
flavor: Democracy in action!

name: Forbidden Ritual
text: Spend all your Mana. Summon that many 1/1 Tentacles.
flavor: Actually, C'Thun gives his full support for this ritual.

name: Spreading Madness
text: Deal $13 damage randomly split among ALL characters.
flavor: Most citizens of Darkshire wear those surgical masks to prevent spreading Madness to tourists.

name: Renounce Darkness
text: Replace your Hero Power and Warlock cards with another class's. The cards cost (1) less.
flavor: SEE YA DARKNESS!

name: Anomalus
text: Deathrattle: Deal 8 damage to all minions.
flavor: That's short for "Anomnomnomnomalus".

name: Cho'gall
text: [x]Battlecry: Return all cards you discarded this game to your hand. They cost Health instead of Mana.
flavor: Even after all this time, Gul'dan still makes Cho'gall go get donuts and coffee.

name: Mukla, Tyrant of the Vale
text: Battlecry: Add 2 Bananas to your hand.
flavor: Pro tip: DO NOT BOGART THE BANANAS.

name: Shifter Zerus
text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a random minion.
flavor: It's like being able to play with THREE angry chickens!

name: Twin Emperor Vek'lor
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, summon another Emperor.
flavor: Do they make decisions based on age? "I'm two minutes older therefore we burn this village."

name: N'Zoth, the Corruptor
text: Battlecry: Summon your Deathrattle minions that died this game.
flavor: Has not been able to get "Under the Sea" out of his head for like FIVE THOUSAND YEARS.

name: Yogg-Saron, Hope's End
text: [x]Battlecry: Cast a random spell for each spell you've cast this game (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: I spell your doom... Y-O-U-R D-O-O-M!

name: Nerubian Prophet
text:
At the start of your turn, reduce this card's
Cost by (1).
flavor: It’s a self-reducing prophecy.

name: Faceless Behemoth
flavor: Rejected names: Forty-Foot Faceless, Big ol' No-face, Huge Creature Sans Face, Teddy.

name: Eldritch Horror
flavor: Often wonders what path his life might have taken if he wasn't named, you know, "Eldritch Horror".

name: Psych-o-Tron
text: Taunt Divine Shield
flavor: "Annoyinger-o-Tron" was just too unwieldy. And accurate.

name: Corrupted Healbot
text: Deathrattle: Restore #8 Health to the enemy hero.
flavor: Not so much "corrupted" as "has terrible aim".

name: Ravaging Ghoul
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
flavor: But goes by "Ravishing Ghoul" when he hits the club.

name: Aberrant Berserker
text: Has +2 Attack while damaged.
flavor: I berserk, therefore I am.

name: Tentacle of N'Zoth
text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavor: Because EVERYDAY is the Day of the Tentacle of N'zoth.

name: Grotesque Dragonhawk
text: Windfury
flavor: They say that "grotesque is in the eye of the beholder," but that's just because they've never seen a Grotesque Dragonhawk. Yikes!

name: Bog Creeper
text: Taunt
flavor: He's tried other things, but bog sidling, bog ambling, and bog trundling just aren't as effective as bog creeping.

name: Bilefin Tidehunter
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Ooze with Taunt.
flavor: Bile actually makes for surprisingly sturdy fins.

name: Zealous Initiate
text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +1/+1.
flavor: Ok, Initiate. You need to settle down and do your job. In this case, that means die so someone else can get a minor buff.

name: Corrupted Seer
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all non-Murloc minions.
flavor: For seers, it's very handy to have your crystal ball hanging right in front of your face.

name: Disciple of C'Thun
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage. Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is).
flavor: C’Thun’s recruiting pitch involves cookies, which is why it’s the most popular Old God.

name: Blood of The Ancient One
text:
If you control two of these
at the end of your turn, merge them into 'The Ancient One'.
flavor: Add two cups of Blood of the Ancient One to one cup of lemon juice. Add just a dash of sugar and stir. Delicious!

name: Faceless Shambler
text: Taunt Battlecry: Copy a friendly minion's Attack and Health.
flavor: "What is that thing?!" "I'm not sure, but it seems to be sort of Ysera shaped."
targeting_arrow_text: Copy a friendly minion's Attack and Health.

name: Shadow Strike
text: Deal $5 damage to an undamaged character.
flavor: It's like a backstab, only from the front. And with two more stabs.

name: Fiery Bat
text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: He'll always be our first.

name: Klaxxi Amber-Weaver
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, gain +5 Health.
flavor: Amberweaving is a specialty course at the local trade school.

name: Wisps of the Old Gods
text: Choose One - Summon seven 1/1 Wisps; or Give your minions +2/+2.
flavor: They're just normal wisps, actually. The "Of the Old Gods" bit is just marketing.

name: Forbidden Healing
text: Spend all your Mana. Restore twice that much Health.
flavor: No one's quite sure why it's forbidden. And yes, that should make you nervous.

name: Validated Doomsayer
text: At the start of your turn, set this minion's Attack to 7.
flavor: Really feels good about himself and is in a much better place now. But… he sure does miss piloting those shredders.

name: Mire Keeper
text: [x]Choose One - Summon a 2/2 Slime; or Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavor:
"Hey.... Is that Mire for sale?" 
"No.  I'm keeping it."

name: Stormcrack
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. Overload: (1)
flavor: WARNING: DO NOT TOUCH THE PURPLE BALL OF LIGHTNING

name: Faceless Summoner
text: Battlecry: Summon a random 3-Cost minion.
flavor: They never get the recognition they deserve.

name: Hallazeal the Ascended
text: Spell Damage +1 Your spells have Lifesteal.
flavor: Hallazeals all your dallazamage.

name: Call of the Wild
text: Summon all three Animal Companions.
flavor: "Hello. Misha, Leokk and Huffer aren't here right now, but if you leave a message we'll get back to you right away." BEEP.

name: Infested Wolf
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Spiders.
flavor: A little flea powder will fix that right up.

name: Bloodhoof Brave
text: Taunt Has +3 Attack while damaged.
flavor: He thought the set was called "Flippers of the Old Cods" and hungrily volunteered to be in it.  He is definitely going to get his hearing checked.

name: Malkorok
text: Battlecry: Equip a random weapon.
flavor: Garrosh's best buddy. It's true. Look it up.

name: Selfless Hero
text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield.
flavor: "Don't worry about me… I'll just be here... under these tentacles."

name: Rallying Blade
text: Battlecry: Give +1/+1 to your minions with Divine Shield.
flavor: As far as blades go, this one is pretty great in the motivation department.

name: Divine Strength
text: Give a minion +1/+2.
flavor: Every year a few paladins get disqualified from the Westfall weight lifting championship for using Divine Strength.

name: Ragnaros, Lightlord
text: At the end of your turn, restore #8 Health to a damaged friendly character.
flavor: What happens when you try and corrupt a corrupted firelord? DOUBLE NEGATIVE, INSECT!

name: Darkshire Alchemist
text: Battlecry: Restore #5 Health.
flavor: The secret ingredient: liquified funnel cake.

name: DOOM!
text: Destroy all minions. Draw a card for each.
flavor: We ran out of space for "DOOOOOOOOOOOM!!!!!"

name: Possessed Villager
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Shadowbeast.
flavor: It's like a pinata! A lame disgusting horrific pinata.

name: Twisted Worgen
text: Stealth
flavor: Sometimes the Old Gods' corruptions gives you power untold, sometimes you get +1 Attack. We can’t all be winners in the Eldritch lottery.

name: Am'gam Rager
flavor: peerc rewop

name: Infested Tauren
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Slime.
flavor: The Overmind and the Old Gods are surprisingly similar.

name: Eater of Secrets
text: Battlecry: Destroy all enemy Secrets. Gain +1/+1 for each.
flavor: You don't want to be around after it has eaten an explosive trap.  You thought Sludge Belcher was bad...

name: Doomcaller
text: Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is). If it's dead, shuffle it into your deck.
flavor: "Hello, is Doom there? No? Can I leave a message?"

name: Spawn of N'Zoth
text: Deathrattle: Give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: Who's a cute widdle N'Zoth? You are! Yes you are! Yes you're the cutest widdle N'Zoth in the whole world!!!

name: Southsea Squidface
text: Deathrattle: Give your weapon +2 Attack.
flavor: Quick! Before I drown! Let me sharpen your sword for you.

name: Scaled Nightmare
text: At the start of your turn, double this minion's Attack.
flavor: I like it because it scales.

name: Twilight Summoner
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/5 Faceless Destroyer.
flavor: If you strike him down, he shall become more powerful than you can possibly imagine.

name: Stand Against Darkness
text: Summon five 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
flavor: Or if you're too tired, you can just kind of lean against the darkness.

name: Blood Warriors
text: Add a copy of each damaged friendly minion to your hand.
flavor: They have an uneasy rivalry with the Blood Paladins.

name: C'Thun
text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: C'Thun's least favorite Hearthstone card: Eye for an Eye.
how_to_earn: Unlocked when opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Crafting unlocked after opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.

name: Beckoner of Evil
text: Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is).
flavor: Here, Evil!  C'mon boy!
how_to_earn: Unlocked when opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Crafting unlocked after opening a Whispers of the Old Gods pack.

name: Blade of C'Thun
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Add its Attack and Health to your C'Thun's (wherever it is).
flavor: C'Thun demands a sacrifice! Preferably a Deathwing.

name: C'Thun's Chosen
text: [x]Divine Shield Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +3/+3 (wherever it is).
flavor: He gave her a promise ring and everything.

name: Twilight Geomancer
text: Taunt Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +1/+1 and Taunt (wherever it is).
flavor: "Ok C'Thun, repeat after me: 'Your mother was a hamster.'"

name: Twilight Elder
text: At the end of your turn, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
flavor: Just doesn't understand those Twilight Youngsters any more - with their comic books and their rock music.

name: Ancient Harbinger
text: At the start of your turn, put a 10-Cost minion from your deck into your hand.
flavor: "honey, can u run down to the store and pick up some 10 cost minions? thx"

name: Shadowcaster
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a 1/1 copy to your hand that costs (1).
flavor: I mean, it's not creepy if you ASK before you steal their shadow to make a small replica of them to keep on your shelf.
targeting_arrow_text: Add a 1/1 copy to your hand.

name: Forlorn Stalker
text: Battlecry: Give all Deathrattle minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: He's going to leave the dying up to you, if that's cool.

name: Dark Arakkoa
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +4/+4 (wherever it is).
flavor: There's a whole gradient of Arakkoa! This one is on the darker side.

name: Cult Apothecary
text: Battlecry: For each enemy minion, restore #2 Health to your hero.
flavor: Cults need pharmacists too.

name: The Boogeymonster
text: Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, gain +2/+2.
flavor: Has 20 years of training in classical ballet, but ALLLLLL he ever gets asked to do is boogie.

name: Ancient Shieldbearer
text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, gain 10 Armor.
flavor: Back in her day, each shield weighed two tons and she had to carry four of them on each arm!

name: Usher of Souls
text: Whenever a minion dies, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
flavor: Nothing unburdens your soul like a good ushing!

name: Cult Sorcerer
text: [x]Spell Damage +1 After you cast a spell, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
flavor: No matter how many times we tell her not to, she keeps feeding C'Thun scraps under the table.

name: Giant Sand Worm
text: Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, it may attack again.
flavor: Banned from every all-you-can-eat buffet on Azeroth.

name: Princess Huhuran
text: Battlecry: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle.
flavor: She flitters around Ahn'Qiraj dreaming of the day she will meet a sweet prince, whom she can lay thousands of eggs with.

name: Steward of Darkshire
text: Whenever you summon a 1-Health minion, give it Divine Shield.
flavor: Turns out divine shields are way cheaper if you buy in bulk.

name: A Light in the Darkness
text: Discover a Paladin minion. Give it +2/+2.
flavor: Wait, how can you have a light in the dark?  If you turn on a light while it’s dark, doesn’t that mean it’s no longer dark?

name: N'Zoth's First Mate
text: Battlecry: Equip a 1/3 Rusty Hook.
flavor: Hates when N'Zoth yells "Ahoy Matey!!", but there's not really much he can do about it.

name: Addled Grizzly
text:
After you summon a
Beast, give it +1/+1.
flavor: Druids who spend too long in bear form are more susceptible to the whispers of the Old Gods.  Right now they are whispering the lyrics to "La Bamba".

name: Blood To Ichor
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If it survives, summon a 2/2 Slime.
flavor: For his next trick, he turns the ichor back to blood and stuffs it back in you.

name: Bloodsail Cultist
text: Battlecry: If you control another Pirate, give your weapon +1/+1.
flavor: They're really just in it for the Blood Parrot.

name: Herald Volazj
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 copy of each of your other minions.
flavor: His whole job is yelling "Yogg-Saron comin'!"

name: Deathwing, Dragonlord
text: Deathrattle: Put all Dragons from your hand into the battlefield.
flavor: To his credit, Deathwing really took to heart the feedback he was receiving that he needed to be "more of a team player".

name: Hogger, Doom of Elwynn
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt.
flavor: When C'thun went to sleep, he checked under his bed for Hogger.

name: Midnight Drake
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each other card in your hand.
flavor: Still fearsome in the daytime.

name: Crazed Worshipper
text: [x]Taunt Whenever this minion takes damage, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
flavor: Every month they share a pancake breakfast with the Perfectly Rational Worshippers.

name: Blackwater Pirate
text: Your weapons cost (2) less.
flavor: "Look, they fell off the back of a ship, do you want them or not? I have a meeting with Y'Shaarj in like ten minutes."

name: Polluted Hoarder
text: Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavor: Roll ‘greed’ OR THIS COULD HAPPEN TO YOU.

name: Carrion Grub
flavor: Carrion, my wayward grub.

name: Duskboar
flavor: Often excluded from dinner parties.  To be fair, he is very boaring.

name: Squirming Tentacle
text: Taunt
flavor: Yeah, I think we can agree that killing the squirming tentacle first is a good idea.

name: Master of Evolution
text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a random one that costs (1) more.
flavor: Will be really useful in the new "Hearthémon" game.

name: Undercity Huckster
text: Deathrattle: Get a random card (from your opponent's class).
flavor: Psst! Wanna buy a random class card (from your opponent's class)?

name: Hooded Acolyte
text: [x]Taunt Whenever a character is healed, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
flavor: Wait, what kind of acolyte doesn't wear a hood?

name: Shifting Shade
text: [x]Deathrattle: Copy a card from your opponent's deck  and add it to your hand.
flavor: Yeah, it's cooler in the shade, but you're also more likely to get JACKED.

name: Cyclopian Horror
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each enemy minion.
flavor: What are the qualifications for being a 'Horror?'  Just how horrible do you have to be?

name: Nat, the Darkfisher
text: At the start of your opponent's turn, they have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.
flavor: You can take away his humanity, but you will never take away his fishing pole.

name: Skeram Cultist
text: [x]Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is).
flavor: Just before he comes into play, there is an AWESOME training montage with C'Thun.

name: Soggoth the Slitherer
text: Taunt Elusive
flavor: Don't tell Soggoth, but in the future he gets totally owned by the Master's Glaive and his skull becomes a tourist attraction.

name: Onyxian Warder
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, summon two 2/1 Whelps with Rush.
flavor: Throwing more whelps at the problem might not help, but they certainly will hurt.

name: Gear Grubber
text: Taunt. If you end your turn with any unspent Mana, reduce this card's Cost by (1).
flavor: Yeah, “for off-spec,” suuuuure.

name: Whelp Bonker
text: Frenzy and Honorable Kill: Draw a card.
flavor: Bonk!

name: Raid Boss Onyxia
text: [x]Rush. Immune while you control a Whelp. Battlecry: Summon six  2/1 Whelps with Rush.
flavor: Onyxia chose her guises to manipulate mortals, but her true form? That was reserved for ending them.

name: Kazakusan
text: [x]Battlecry: If you played 4 other Dragons this game, craft a custom deck of Treasures.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: Kazakus had always seemed too clever a sort to bottle a brew that could do him any harm. Perhaps it should come as no surprise, then, that the originator of the Dragonfire Potion was a dragon himself.

name: Deep Breath
text: [x]Deal $1 damage to a minion and its neighbors. (Improved by number of  other spells in your hand.)
flavor: I SAID "RELAX!"

name: Haleh, Matron Protectorate
text: After you cast a spell, deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Oh, how do you solve a problem like Onyxia?

name: Furious Howl
text:
Draw a card.
Repeat until you have at least 3 cards.
flavor: Hunters make the worst neighbors.

name: Pet Collector
text: Battlecry: Summon a Beast from your deck that costs (5) or less.
flavor: "And I'll call you Mrs. Snugglepants, and you Bubblecuddle, and you Cutie Cakes, and you ..."

name: Dragonbane Shot
text: [x]Deal $2 damage. Honorable Kill: Add a Dragonbane Shot to your hand.
flavor: *Only effective against small dragons.

name: Don't Stand in the Fire!
text: Deal $10 damage randomly split among all enemy minions. Overload: (1)
flavor: Apparently the “Caution: Hot Surface” sign had burned up.

name: Spirit Mount
text: [x]Give a minion +1/+2 and Spell Damage +1. When it dies, summon a Spirit Raptor.
flavor: Bru'kan said his spirit would always be with us. He failed to mention that his raptor’s would be too.

name: Bracing Cold
text:
[x]Restore #5 Health to
your hero. Reduce the
Cost of a random spell
in your hand by (2).
flavor: Worst. Hug. Ever.

name: Keen Reflex
text: [x]Deal $1 damage to all minions. Honorable Kill: Gain +1 Attack this turn.
flavor: All of Onyxia's whelps were no match for Kurtrus' backflip.

name: Wings of Hate (Rank 1)
text: Summon two 1/1 Felwings. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: For one day each February, they become the Wings of Love.

name: Horn of Wrathion
text: Draw a minion. If it's a Dragon, summon two 2/1 Whelps with Rush.
flavor: You can count the rings and find out Wrathion's true age.

name: Boomkin
text: Choose One - Restore 8 Health to your hero; or Deal 4 damage.
flavor: Some Druids consider balance to be a state of harmony between the Natural and the Arcane. Others are more focused on the balance of the opponent’s life total versus their own.

name: Raid Negotiator
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a Choose One card. It has both effects combined.
flavor:
"What do you mean by aggressive negotiation tactics?"
"Negotiations in bear form."

name: Stormwind Avenger
text: After you cast a spell on this minion, it gains +2 Attack.
flavor: "I swear if you heal me I will DPS."

name: Scale of Onyxia
text: Fill your board with 2/1 Whelps with Rush.
flavor: Whelp for scale.

name: Battle Vicar
text: Battlecry: Discover a Holy spell.
flavor: She's the most down-to-earth paladin you'll ever meet... until she stands up.

name: Hit It Very Hard
text: Gain +10 Attack and "Can't attack heroes" this turn.
flavor: "...and very fast."

name: Onyxian Drake
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Deal damage equal to your Armor to an enemy minion.
flavor: The best offense is a great defense.
targeting_arrow_text: Deal damage equal to your Armor to an enemy minion.

name: Shoulder Check
text: Tradeable Give a minion +2/+1 and Rush.
flavor: One... two... yeah, all present and correct.

name: Lightmaw Netherdrake
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Holy and a Shadow spell, deal 3 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Do you think it's a glass half full kind of Netherdrake, or a glass half empty, inescapable void kind of Netherdrake?

name: Ring of Courage
text: Tradeable Give a minion +1/+1. Repeat for each enemy minion.
flavor: Now to find the Ring of Wisdom and Ring of Power.

name: Mi'da, Pure Light
text: [x]Divine Shield, Lifesteal Deathrattle: Shuffle a Fragment into your deck that resummons Mi'da when drawn.
flavor: Unfortunately, Mi’da’s touch will not turn things to gold.

name: Drakefire Amulet
text: Tradeable Discover 2 Dragons. Summon them.
flavor: "...and I only had to climb up the mountains in Winterspring 50 times!"

name: SI:7 Smuggler
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a random 1-Cost minion. (Upgraded for each other SI:7 card you  have played this game.)
flavor: After a while, Onyxia's regurgitated rats start to taste pretty good.

name: Smokescreen
text: [x]Draw 5 cards. Trigger any Deathrattles drawn.
flavor: Pocket smoke!

name: Tooth of Nefarian
text: [x]Deal $3 damage. Honorable Kill: Discover a spell from another class.
flavor: Nefarian: Lord of Blackrock, creator of the chromatic dragonflight, victim of several root canals.

name: Impfestation
text:
Summon a 3/3
Dread Imp to attack each enemy minion.
flavor: Call the imp-sterminator!

name: Curse of Agony
text:
[x]Shuffle three Agonies
into the opponent's deck.
They deal Fatigue damage
when drawn.
flavor: Now, fools, you shall all understand my back pain!

name: Spawn of Deathwing
text: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy minion. Discard a random card.
flavor: Aww, who’s the most dangerous threat to the world? You are!

name: Razorglaive Sentinel
text: After you play the left or right-most card in your hand, draw a card.
flavor: For the worgen that has everything: more claws.

name: Elite Tauren Chieftain
text: Battlecry: Give both players the power to ROCK! (with a Power Chord card)
flavor: He's looking for a drummer.  The current candidates are: Novice Engineer, Sen'jin Shieldmasta', and Ragnaros the Firelord.
how_to_earn_golden: Awarded at BlizzCon 2013.

name: Suspicious Alchemist
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell. If your opponent guesses your choice, they get a copy.
flavor: Side effects may include feeling totally fine! Don't even worry about it.

name: Suspicious Usher
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a Legendary minion. If your opponent guesses your   choice, they get a copy.
flavor: "Oh please, let me take your jacket, luggage, and absurdly large shoulder pads."

name: Suspicious Pirate
text: Battlecry: Discover a weapon. If your opponent guesses your choice, they get a copy.
flavor: EVERY party should be a costume party.

name: The Harvester of Envy
text: After you play a card copied from the opponent, steal the original.
flavor: "Ah, permission shmermission! You can borrow anything you want, anytime, as long as if you give it back before it's missed. Everyone knows that! Right?"

name: Bog Beast
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 2/4 Muckmare with Taunt.
flavor: I'm sure at least one of those bones is from an actual beast.

name: Stoneborn Accuser
text: [x]Infuse (5): Gain "Battlecry: Deal 5 damage."
flavor: "I SAW THEM VENT, I SWEAR!"

name: Red Herring
text: [x]Taunt Your non-Red Herring minions have Stealth.
flavor: He's got gill-ty written all over him!

name: Masked Reveler
text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 copy of another minion in your deck.
flavor: "It's party time! P-A-R-T-Why? Because I gotta!"

name: Crooked Cook
text:
[x]At the end of your turn, 
if you dealt 3 or more 
damage to the enemy 
hero, draw a card.
flavor: There are many things not called poison which can kill a man. But in this case, it is poison.

name: Insatiable Devourer
text: [x]Battlecry: Devour an enemy minion and gain its stats.  Infuse (5): And its neighbors.
flavor: You're not you when you're anima-starved.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the Murder at Castle Nathria Tavern Pass.
targeting_arrow_text: Devour an enemy minion and gain its stats.

name: Prince Renathal
text:
Your deck size and
starting Health are 40.
flavor: A lot of kids go through a rebellious phase, but Prince Renathal's was a bit extreme.
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a Murder at Castle Nathria card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the Murder at Castle Nathria Tavern Pass.

name: Famished Fool
text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Infuse (4): Draw 3 instead.
flavor: He's not hungry for food, he's starving for attention!
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Stop! Infuse Time!" Achievement.

name: Dinner Performer
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a random minion from your deck that you can afford to play.
flavor: BANG!

name: Kael'thas Sinstrider
text: Every third minion you play each turn costs (0).
flavor: You heard about Kael'thas? That's messed up, right?

name: Murloc Holmes
text: [x]Battlecry: Solve 3 Clues about your opponent's cards to get copies of them.
flavor: When you have eliminated the imfroggable, whatever remains, however uncroakable, must be the truth.

name: Demolition Renovator
text: Tradeable Battlecry: Destroy an enemy location.
flavor: "Look, the Sire said he wanted something more open concept..."
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Location, Location, Location!" Achievement.

name: Theotar, the Mad Duke
text: Battlecry: Discover a card in each player's hand and swap them.
flavor: "I'm afraid you've gone mad! You're entirely bonkers. But I'll tell you a secret. All the best souls are."

name: Suffocating Shadows
text:
[x]When you play or 
discard this, destroy a 
random enemy minion.
flavor: "Reading is good for you," they said.

name: Tome Tampering
text:
[x]Shuffle 1-Cost 
copies of cards in your 
hand into your deck, 
then discard your hand.
flavor: An overdue book calls for a do-over.

name: Flustered Librarian
text:
Has +1 Attack for each
Imp you control.
flavor: A fairly sIMPle card.

name: Mischievous Imp
text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this. Infuse (3): Summon two copies instead.
flavor: Why is it when something happens, it is always you three?

name: Impending Catastrophe
text: Draw a card. Repeat for each Imp you control.
flavor: The imps end you, and the cats... well, they astrophe.

name: Mysterious Visitor
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of cards copied from your opponent by (3).
flavor: Dave, we can tell this letter is fake - it's in your handwriting. And take off that stupid hood, you're embarrassing us.

name: Partner in Crime
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a copy of this minion at the end of your turn.
flavor: "You know what we need? Some rope." "That's stupid. Name one thing you'd need a rope for."

name: Boon of the Ascended
text: Give a minion +2 Health. Summon a Kyrian with its stats and Taunt.
flavor: Ascension is not some external power granted to you, it is the power you find within yourself.

name: The Light! It Burns!
text:
[x]Deal damage to a minion
 equal to its Attack.
flavor: Wait, if you're over there, then who's messing with the lights?!

name: Pelagos
text:
[x]After you cast a spell 
on a friendly minion, set 
its Attack and Health to 
the higher of the two.
flavor: He's a great judge of character.

name: Sinrunner
text: Deathrattle: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: Blanchy was said to be an affectionate and well-behaved horse in life. How she ended up in Revendreth? We're too afraid to ask.

name: Clean the Scene
text: Destroy all minions with 3 or less Attack. Infuse (3): 6 or less.
flavor: Not even the holy Light can get anima out of white silk.

name: Identity Theft
text: Discover a copy of a card from your opponent's hand and deck.
flavor: Identity theft is not a joke, Jim!

name: Cathedral of Atonement
text: Give a minion +2/+1 and draw a card.
flavor: You'll actually find more than one tonement here.

name: Natural Causes
text: Deal $2 damage. Summon a 2/2 Treant.
flavor: What if the suspect was framed? What if the murder weapon was... a plant?

name: Maze Guide
text: Battlecry: Summon a random 2-Cost minion.
flavor: "And if you look to your left, you'll see an even larger statue of Sire Denathrius!"
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Need a Map?" Achievement.

name: Death Blossom Whomper
text: Battlecry: Draw a Deathrattle minion and gain its Deathrattle.
flavor: We call her Audrey II. She was named after her mother.

name: Nightshade Bud
text: Choose One - Discover a minion from your deck to summon; or a spell to cast.
flavor: It actually thrives in partial sunlight.

name: Planted Evidence
text: Discover a spell. It costs (2) less this turn.
flavor: So you're telling me this wasn't Natural Causes?

name: Topior the Shrubbagazzor
text: [x]Battlecry: For the rest of the game, after you cast a Nature spell, summon a 3/3 Whelp with Rush.
flavor: They got a dragon that burns 1000 gallons of anima a week.

name: Remornia, Living Blade
text: Rush After this attacks, equip it.
flavor: Was it the lead pipe... the candlestick... or the unhinged, sentient, bloodthirsty sword?

name: Widowbloom Seedsman
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a Nature spell. Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavor: Sometimes a blue thumb is better than a green one.

name: Sesselie of the Fae Court
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Draw a minion. Reduce its Cost by (8).
flavor: They claim they're from the Fae Court, but that might be a Fae Kout.

name: Anima Extractor
text:
[x]Whenever a friendly
minion takes damage,
give a random minion in
your hand +1/+1.
flavor: After we are done you're welcome to help yourself to cookies and apple juice. Thank you for your donation!

name: Hedge Maze
text: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle.
flavor: If you keep seeing a statue of the Sire, you’re not going in circles. There’s just so many of them.

name: Burden of Pride
text: [x]Summon three 1/3 Jailers with Taunt. If you have 20 or less Health, give them +1/+1.
flavor: A group of burdens is called a pride.

name: Plot of Sin
text: [x]Summon two 2/2 Treants. Infuse (5): Two 5/5 Ancients instead.
flavor: It's a great plot, but it's riddled with holes.

name: Riot!
text:
[x]Your minions can't be 
reduced below 1 Health 
this turn. They each attack 
a random enemy minion.
flavor: No, Blizzard!

name: Dredger Staff
text: [x]Battlecry: Give minions in your hand +1 Health.
flavor: The dredger staff held the dredger knife and said, "Dredger bow before the Sire!"

name: Frenzied Fangs
text: Summon two 2/1 Bats. Infuse (3): Give them +1/+2.
flavor: That's one stylish bat.

name: Roosting Gargoyle
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2 Attack.
flavor: Jalapeñas!

name: Stonebound Gargon
text: [x]Rush Infuse (3): Also damages the minions next to   whomever this attacks.
flavor: Really good at "stay."

name: Huntsman Altimor
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a Gargon Companion. Infuse ({0}): Summon another.  Infuse ({1}): And another!
flavor: He loves all his Gargons equally. (Hecutis is his favorite and it's not close.)

name: Batty Guest
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 2/1 Bat.
flavor: His favorite food is chocolate cereal.

name: Spirit Poacher
text: Battlecry: Summon a random Dormant Wildseed.
flavor: Always poach from your local spirit shelter.

name: Wild Spirits
text: [x]Summon two different Dormant Wildseeds. Make your Wildseeds awaken 1 turn sooner.
flavor: Wait, this card just released! It should be Standard Spirits!

name: Castle Kennels
text: [x]Give a friendly minion +2 Attack. If it's a Beast, give it Rush.
flavor: Play dead! Oh…

name: Ara'lon
text: Battlecry: Summon one of each Dormant Wildseed.
flavor: If I had a nickel for every time a Hunter Legendary minion in Castle Nathria summoned three different companions, I'd have two nickels - which isn't a lot, but it's weird that it happened twice.

name: Stag Charge
text: Deal $3 damage. Summon a random Dormant Wildseed.
flavor: Stag! You’re it!

name: Convoke the Spirits
text: [x]Cast 8 random Druid spells (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: The spirits prefer to convoke when there's some hot gossip to discuss.

name: Collateral Damage
text:
[x]Deal $6 damage to three 
random enemy minions. 
Excess damage hits 
the enemy hero.

name: Party Crasher
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Throw a random minion from your hand at it.
flavor: "Do you ever wonder why you don't get invited anywhere?" "… no, not really."
targeting_arrow_text: Choose an enemy minion. Throw a random minion from your hand at it.

name: Vile Library
text: Give a friendly minion +1/+1. Repeat for each Imp you control.
flavor: What type of vial library has 0 vials in it!?

name: Shadow Waltz
text: Summon a 3/5 Shadow with Taunt. If a minion died this turn, summon another.
flavor: They're dancing to one of Rin's demonic symphonies. Her music might not be famous now, but just you wait!

name: Lady Darkvein
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 2/1 Shades. Each gains a Deathrattle to cast your last Shadow spell.
flavor: You're so vein. I bet you think this flavor text is about you.

name: Shadowborn
text: Deathrattle: Reduce the Cost of the highest Cost Shadow spell in your hand by (3).
flavor: You merely adopted the shadows; I was born in them!

name: Stoneborn General
text: [x]Rush   Deathrattle: Summon an    8/8 Gravewing with Rush.

name: Invitation Courier
text: After a card is added to your hand from another class, copy it.
flavor: Sending mail via steward is soooo old school.

name: Forensic Duster
text: [x]Battlecry: Your opponent's minions cost (1) more next turn.
flavor: He had plenty of experience with dusting things from his time as a butler, so when a murder was committed he saw a real job opportunity!

name: Solid Alibi
text: Until your next turn, your hero can only take 1 damage at a time.

name: Cold Case
text: Summon two 2/2 Volatile Skeletons. Gain 4 Armor.

name: Sinful Brand
text:
[x]Brand an enemy minion.
Whenever it takes
damage, deal 1 damage
to the enemy hero.

name: Dispose of Evidence
text: Give your hero +3 Attack this turn. Choose a card in your hand to shuffle into your deck.
flavor: Just because you did it doesn't mean you have to be guilty.

name: Relic of Dimensions
text:
[x]Draw two cards 
and reduce their Cost 
by (1). Improve your 
future Relics.
flavor: A glaive is a glaive, but a mystery box could be anything! It could even be a glaive!

name: Magnifying Glaive
text:
[x]After your hero attacks,
draw until you have
3 cards.

name: Kryxis the Voracious
text: [x]Battlecry: Discard your hand. Deathrattle: Draw 3 cards.

name: Bibliomite
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a card in your hand to shuffle into your deck.
flavor: He did NOT want to cast a spell.

name: Chatty Bartender
text: [x]At the end of your turn, if you control a Secret, deal 2 damage to all enemies.
