name: Kel'Thuzad, the Inevitable
text: [x]Battlecry: Resurrect your Volatile Skeletons. Any that can't fit on the battlefield instantly explode! 0
flavor: Looks like Kel'Thuzad is borrowing some of Mr. Bigglesworth's nine lives.

name: Orion, Mansion Manager
text: After a friendly Secret is revealed, cast a different Mage Secret and gain +2/+2.
flavor: The secrets of the universe are vast... and will be revealed sometime later this game.

name: Vengeful Visage
text: [x]Secret: After an enemy minion attacks your hero, summon a copy of it to attack the enemy hero.
flavor: The mirror shows us nothing less than the deepest, darkest desire of our hearts: to go face.

name: Criminal Lineup
text: [x]Choose a friendly minion. Summon 3 copies of it. Overload: (2)
flavor: Number 1, could you please sing the opening to "I Want It That Way"?

name: Frozen Touch
text: Deal $3 damage. Infuse (3): Add a Frozen Touch to your hand.

name: Nightcloak Sanctum
text: Freeze a minion. Summon a 2/2 Volatile Skeleton.
flavor: For VIPs only. (Very Infused Person)

name: Double Cross
text: Secret: When your opponent spends all their Mana, draw two cards.
flavor: Valeera revealed herself to be a double agent. At which point Maiev felt comfortable revealing that she also was a double agent. And then Scabbs announced to everybody that - get this - he was a double agent.

name: Private Eye
text: [x]Battlecry: Cast a Secret from your deck.  Combo: Cast 2 instead.
flavor: Eye see what you did there.

name: Sticky Situation

flavor: "Now this is what I'd call..." "...just shut up."

name: Kidnap

flavor: Check your coat, but don't check the coat closet.

name: Halkias
text: [x]Stealth. Deathrattle: Store Halkias's soul inside of a friendly Secret. It resummons Halkias when triggered.
flavor: Everybody tough until the sinstones start walking.

name: Relic of Extinction

name: Imp King Rafaam

name: Muck Plumber
text: ALL minions cost (2) more.

name: Gigantotem
text: Costs (1) less for each Totem you've summoned this game.

name: Sinstone Totem
text: At the end of your turn, gain +1 Health.

name: Deathborne
text:
Deal $2 damage to all minions. Summon a 2/2 Volatile Skeleton 
for each killed.
flavor: Kel'Thuzad thinks adding a silent 'e' at the end of words makes them sound cooler.

name: Anonymous Informant
text: Battlecry: The next Secret you play costs (0).

name: Promotion

name: Sinfueled Golem

name: Volatile Skeleton

name: Scuttlebutt Ghoul

name: Dispossessed Soul

name: Sire Denathrius
text: Lifesteal. Battlecry: Deal 5 damage amongst enemies. Endlessly Infuse (2): Deal 1 more.
flavor: History has a way of altering villains so that we can no longer see ourselves in them. Unfortunately for the Venthyr, they all look like Sire Denathrius.
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a Murder at Castle Nathria card pack.

name: Creepy Painting
text: After another minion dies, become a copy of it.
flavor: I do not like this painting, Harth. Its smug aura mocks me.

name: Carving Chisel
text: After your hero attacks, summon a random basic Totem.
flavor: Look at your stone. Visualize the totem within. Then gently...

name: Convincing Disguise
text: [x]Transform a friendly minion into one that costs (2) more. Infuse (4): Transform all friendly minions instead.
flavor: Okay gang, let's see who's really under the mask… *gasp* Old Man Bru'kan!?

name: The Stonewright
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Totems have +2 Attack.
flavor: She wrights stone better than she reads it.

name: Muck Pools
text: Transform a friendly minion into one that costs (1) more.
flavor: Making a dredger is easier than you'd think. You don't need to worry about mucking it up!

name: Primordial Wave
text:
[x]Transform enemy minions 
into ones that cost (1) less 
and friendly minions into 
ones that cost (1) more.

name: Baroness Vashj
text:
[x]If this would transform
into a minion, summon
that minion instead.
flavor: Vashj was supposed to make an appearance in "The Sunken City," but after a freak accident in "Ashes of Outland," she ended up here.

name: Crazed Wretch
text: Has +2 Attack and Charge while damaged.
flavor: Enrage is all the rage.

name: Conqueror's Banner
text: Reveal a card from each player's deck, three times. Draw any of yours that cost more.
flavor: Olgra, I love your new tapestry! Where did you get it?

name: Imbued Axe
text: [x]After your hero attacks, give your damaged minions +1/+2. Infuse (2): +2/+2 instead.
flavor: Technically it's a Yet-to-be-Imbued Axe.

name: Decimator Olgra
flavor: FOUND HER!

name: Party Favor Totem
text: [x]At the end of your turn, summon a random basic Totem. Infuse (2): Summon two instead.
flavor: It's the gift (totem) that keeps on giving (totems)!

name: Crud Caretaker
text: Battlecry: Summon a 3/5 Elemental with Taunt.
flavor: All it takes is a little love and a LOT of junk!

name: Artificer Xy'mox
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover and cast a Relic. Infuse (5): Cast all three instead.
flavor: "The anticipation to use this relic is killing me! Though, it will more likely kill you."

name: Door of Shadows
text: [x]Draw a spell. Infuse (2): Add a Temporary copy of it to your hand.
flavor: Upon arrival, please ring the doorbell of shadows, and wipe your shoes on the doormat of shadows before entering.

name: Serrated Bone Spike
text:
[x]Deal $3 damage to a 
minion. If it dies, your 
next card this turn 
costs (2) less.

name: Necrolord Draka
text: [x]Battlecry: Equip a 1/3 Dagger. (+1 Attack for each other card you played this turn, up to 10!)

name: Relic Vault
text: The next Relic you play this turn casts twice.

name: Relic of Phantasms
text:
Summon two 1/1
Spirits. Improve your future Relics.

name: Sketchy Stranger
text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret from another class.
flavor: More of a 'Painted Stranger' if you ask me.

name: Steamcleaner
text: Battlecry: Destroy ALL cards in both players' decks that didn't start there.

how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Murder at Castle Nathria Reward Track.

name: Muckborn Servant
text: Taunt Battlecry: Discover a Paladin card.

name: Service Bell
text: Discover a Class card from your deck and draw all copies of it.

text:
[x]Shoot 5 rays at random
minions. They give friendly
minions +2/+2, and deal $2
damage to enemy minions.

name: The Countess

flavor: 3 Legendary Invitations, AH AH AH!

name: Sinful Sous Chef

name: Stewart the Steward
text: [x]Deathrattle: Give the next Silver Hand Recruit you summon +3/+3 and this Deathrattle.

name: Priest of the Deceased

name: Murlocula

name: Buffet Biggun
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two Silver Hand Recruits. Infuse (3): Give them +2 Attack and Divine Shield.
flavor: "Look, I just want to know what kind of monster put raisins in this."

name: Ghastly Gravedigger
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a Secret, choose a card in your opponent's hand to  shuffle into their deck.
flavor: Some people take their secrets to the grave.

name: Ashen Elemental
text: [x]Battlecry: Whenever your opponent draws a card next turn, they take 2 damage.
flavor: "The castle was nice but the fireplaces were too small - 2/5 stars"

name: Elitist Snob
text: [x]Battlecry: For each Paladin card in your hand, randomly gain Divine Shield, Lifesteal, Rush, or Taunt.

name: Great Hall
text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.

name: Sanguine Depths
text:
[x]Deal 1 damage to a 
minion and give it 
+2 Attack.

name: Howling Blast

name: Plague Strike

name: Death Strike

name: Frost Strike

name: Shatterskin Gargoyle

text:
[x]Choose an enemy minion.

name: Corrupted Ashbringer
text: Lifesteal

name: Infected Peasant

Undead died after

flavor: Grave digging as a profession has high turnover; it's important to maintain headcount.

name: Flesh Behemoth
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Draw another Undead and summon a copy of it.
flavor: Perfect for fleshing out your Undead deck.

name: Plaguespreader
text: Deathrattle: Transform a random minion in your opponent's hand into a Plaguespreader.
flavor: What do they mean by Patient Zero? I'm very patient!
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Cheese Touch" Achievement.

name: High Cultist Basaleph
text: Battlecry: Resurrect all friendly Undead that died after your last turn.
flavor: "It's not a cult! It's a collection of like-minded individuals that enjoy undead. And rituals. And doing what I say. "

name: Foul Egg
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Undead Chicken.
flavor: Definitely expired.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Look at All Those Chickens!" Achievement.

name: Nerubian Vizier
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell. If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, it costs (2) less.
flavor: One of the essential constructors of the Northrend wide web.

name: Arcane Bolt
text: Deal $2 damage. Manathirst (8): Deal $3 damage instead.
flavor: Just you wait until I have 8 mana!

name: Mind Eater
text: Deathrattle: Add a copy of a card in your opponent's deck to your hand.
flavor: Watch out brain, she'll chew you up! She's a Mind Eater!

name: Vrykul Necrolyte
text: [x]Battlecry: Give a friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Zombie with Rush."
flavor: If at first you don't succeed, vry, vry again.
targeting_arrow_text: Give a friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Zombie with Rush."

name: Scourge Rager
text: Reborn Battlecry: Die.
flavor: Why's he so mad? Well you'd be mad too if you were created as a joke!
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Raged Too Hard" Achievement.

name: Deathweaver Aura
text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Summon two 3/2 Zombies." Overload: (1)
flavor: Knitting is a harmless hobby. Weaving, though...

name: Shadow Suffusion
text: [x]Give your minions "Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy."
flavor: Be honest - you had to look up what that means.

name: From De Other Side
text:
Summon a copy of each minion in your hand.
They attack random enemy minions, then die.
flavor: Why did Drakuru cross the road?

name: Scourge Troll
text: Deathrattles given to this minion trigger twice.
flavor: This is where I'd put my Deathrattle - IF I HAD ONE!

name: Overlord Drakuru
text: [x]Rush, Windfury After this attacks and kills a minion, resurrect it on your side.
flavor: Overlord: (1)

name: Umbral Geist
text: [x]Deathrattle: Add a random Shadow spell to your hand.
flavor: “After all, one can't leave his shadow lying about and not miss it sooner or later, don't you agree?”

name: Amber Whelp
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage.
flavor: What is a Bronze Whelp's favorite garnish? A little thyme!

name: Daring Drake
text: [x]Rush Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1/+1.
flavor: First of all, how dare you? Second of all, how dare you!

name: Flight of the Bronze
text: [x]Discover a Dragon. Manathirst (7): Summon a 5/5 Drake with Taunt.
flavor: You're telling me Hearthstone will make a 1 Mana 5/5 with Taunt? Maybe when bronze flies!

name: For Quel'Thalas!
text:
[x]Give a friendly minion
+3 Attack. Give your hero
+2 Attack this turn.
flavor: For kwell-kell.. for kell… for kwee- for the city!

name: Anachronos
text: [x]Battlecry: Send all other minions 2 turns into the future.
flavor: "That's it, you're all in time out!"

name: Sanguine Soldier
text: Divine Shield Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to your hero.
flavor: They just need someone to ouch for them.

name: Seal of Blood
text: Give a minion +3/+3 and Divine Shield. Deal $3 damage to your hero.
flavor: Don't hate! Coagulate!

name: Feast and Famine
text: Give your hero +3 Attack this turn. Manathirst (4): And Lifesteal.
flavor: Please sir, may I have some armor?

name: Blood Matriarch Liadrin
text: After you summon a minion with less Attack than this, give it Divine Shield and Rush.
flavor: All's fair in blood and war.

name: Bloodied Knight
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
deal 2 damage to
your hero.
flavor: Chillwind Yeti would NEVER betray you like this.

name: Blood Crusader
text: [x]Battlecry: Your next Paladin minion this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
flavor: Defending Silvermoon takes a lot of blood, sweat, tears, and blood.

name: Translocation Instructor
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Swap it with a random one in their deck.
flavor: *Translocates behind you* psssh... nothin personnel, kid.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "No Swapsies Backsies" Achievement.
targeting_arrow_text: Choose an enemy minion. Swap it with a random one in their deck.

name: Coroner
text: Battlecry: Freeze an enemy minion. Manathirst (6): Silence it first.
flavor: It was at this moment the Coroner decided to become a farmer instead.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Crystal Springs" Achievement.

name: Enchanter
text: Enemy minions take double damage during your turn.
flavor: "I know Scourgebane! Your materials and tips appreciated!"
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the March of the Lich King Tavern Pass.

name: Silvermoon Armorer
text: [x]Rush Manathirst (7): Gain +2/+2.
flavor: All that glitters is silver.

name: Nerubian Flyer
text: [x]Battlecry: If a friendly Undead died after your last turn, summon a 2/2 Nerubian.
flavor: Undead Air Miles only cover Northrend and the surrounding coast.

name: Wailing Banshee
text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly Undead +2/+1.
flavor: :O
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Blight of the Scourge" Achievement.

name: Skeletal Sidekick
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Undead +2 Attack.
flavor: He's got your back. And your arm.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Death Knight.

name: Embers of Strength
text: [x]Summon two 1/2 Guards with Taunt. Manathirst (6): Give them +1/+2.
flavor: Remember, remember, the 1/2's of Ember.

name: Hawkstrider Rancher
text: [x]Whenever you play a minion, give it +1/+1 and "Deathrattle: Summon a  1/1 Hawkstrider."
flavor: I prefer the Hawkstrider Nacho Cheeser.

name: Spawning Pool
text: [x]Get a 1/1 Zergling. Deathrattle: Your Zerg minions have Rush this turn.
flavor: Looks more like a spawning hot tub to me, just based on the size.

name: Baneling Barrage
text:
[x]Get a 1/1 Baneling
that explodes. If you
control a Zerg minion,
get another Baneling.
flavor: Banelings, banelings, banelings OHHHH!

name: Infestor
text: [x]Deathrattle: Your Zerg minions have +1 Attack for the rest of the game.
flavor: Even if you survive its neural parasite, you will never live it down.

name: Hive Queen
text:
[x]At the end of your turn, get
a Larva that transforms into
random Zerg minions.
flavor: Her favorite game is "The Floor is Larva."

name: Kerrigan, Queen of Blades
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 2/5 Hive Queens. Deal 3 damage to all enemies.
flavor: Betrayed by the terrans, she is determined to use the power of the zerg Swarm for her revenge.

name: Hydralisk
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy. Repeat for each other Zerg minion you control.
flavor: *tsst* *tsst* *tsst* *tsst* *tsst* *tsst*

name: Lurker
text: [x]After a friendly minion attacks, deal 1 damage to a random enemy (or 2 if your minion is a Zerg).
flavor: Never typed in chat. Subscribed for 40 months. The perfect viewer.

name: Zergling
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Zergling.
flavor: It's all fun and games until 8 of these show up at your door at the 2 minute mark.

name: Creep Tumor
text: Your Zerg minions have +1 Attack and Rush. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: "If you spot one of these, back away or burn it to hell. Never fight on their turf."

name: Roach
text: When you draw this, get a copy of it. Battlecry: If you control another Zerg minion, gain +1/+2.
flavor: These still aren't as bad as the ones in my old apartment complex.

name: Grunty
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon four random Murlocs, then shoot them at enemy minions.  (You pick the targets!)
flavor: <Mrrglglg, it's about time.>

name: Nydus Worm
text: Draw two Zerg cards. They cost (1) less.
flavor: How did they fit an ultralisk in there!?

name: Viper
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a minion from your opponent's hand. Your other Zerg minions gain Reborn and attack it.
flavor: No viping!

name: Ultralisk Cavern
text: [x]Deal 1 damage to all enemies. Deathrattle: Summon an 8/8 Ultralisk with Rush.
flavor: Don't let your ultralisk get stuck on a ramp.

name: Consume
text:
[x]Remove 1 Durability
from a friendly location
to restore #8 Health to
your hero.
flavor: What are you looking at? This isn't a mukbang.

name: Evolution Chamber
text: Give your minions +1 Attack. Give your Zerg an extra +1/+1.
flavor: "Survival of Swarm dependent on evolution, iteration. Trust process, trust sequences. Swarm will not fail." - Abathur

name: Mutalisk
text: [x]Also damages minions next to whomever this attacks (and the enemy hero if a neighbor is missing).
flavor: A flock of seagulls. A murder of crows. A ball of mutalisks.

name: Spine Crawler
text: [x]Taunt. Can't attack. Has +3 Attack if you control a location.
flavor:
Give him one second, he's rooting!
...
Ok give him one more second he's almost done!

name: Jim Raynor
text: [x]Battlecry: Relaunch every Starship that you launched this game.
flavor: He’s lost his faith, his friends, and his beloved, but he still believes that one day, he can make things right again.

name: SCV
text: Battlecry: Your next Starship launch costs (2) less.
flavor: They're called SCVs because they're Super Cool (Very).

name: Starport
text: [x]Summon a 2/1 Starship Piece with an effect when launched.
flavor: Make sure to arrive 3 light-years early for any intergalactic flights.

name: Salvage the Bunker
text: Summon two 2/2 Marines with Taunt. Your next Starship launch costs (2) less.
flavor: You just HAD to go with the cheap sheet metal didn't you?

name: Ultra-Capacitor
text: [x]Starship Piece Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for   each other friendly minion.   Also triggers on launch.
flavor: If my calculations are correct, when this baby hits 88 miles per hour...

name: Yamato Cannon
text: [x]Starship Piece Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy minion. Also triggers on launch.
flavor: Ya-may-to, Ya-mah-to

name: Lock On
text: Set a minion’s Health to 1. Your next Starship launch costs (2) less.
flavor: Time to lock in. *ahem* I mean lock on.

name: Ghost
text: [x]Stealth. Battlecry: If you're building a Starship, destroy the lowest-Cost card in your opponent's hand.
flavor: Busters!

name: Missile Pod
text: [x]Starship Piece Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. Also triggers on launch.
flavor: Welcome to the Missile Pod, your one-stop shop for all things missile-related. Tune in each week for developments in the world of missiles.

name: Lift Off
text: Draw 2 Terran cards. Summon a 2/1 Starship Piece with an effect when launched.
flavor: It's a bird! It's a plane! It's a burning command center slowly moving to the corner of the map!

name: Concussive Shells
text: Deal $2 damage and gain 2 Armor. Your next Starship launch costs (2) less.
flavor: Zerg patients rated these a solid 7 on the pain chart.

name: Hellion
text: [x]Your other minions have +1 Attack. (Transforms if you launched a Starship this game.)
flavor: Let's upgrade to the non-flammable tires next time.

name: Siege Tank
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 10 damage to a random enemy minion. (Transforms if you launched a Starship this game.)
flavor: Pretty decent as an off tank, but incredible as a main tank.

name: Thor
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 5 damage. (Transforms if you launched a Starship this game.)
flavor: "I need your clothes, your boots and your chitinous exoskeleton."

name: Chrono Boost
text: Draw 2 Protoss cards. Summon a 3/4 Zealot with Charge.
flavor: Just think of all the tempests I can make! ...Ah, who am I kidding? I'm just going to use this on probes.

name: Warp Gate
text: Your next Protoss minion costs (3) less.
flavor: This is gonna be really meta-warping.

name: Dark Templar
text: [x]Stealth. Battlecry: Destroy an enemy minion. Play another Templar to merge into an Archon!
flavor:
*stab*
*stab*
*stab*
"Hey, where'd my SCVs go?"

name: Photon Cannon
text:
Deal $3 damage.
If this kills a minion, your Protoss minions cost (1) less this game.
flavor: If this card were a minion, it would have Rush.

name: Artanis
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 3/4 Zealots with Charge. Your Protoss minions cost (2) less this game.

name: Construct Pylons
text: Your next Protoss card this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: You must... y'know...

name: Carrier
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
summon four 4/1
Interceptors that attack
random enemies.
flavor: Yeah, my teammates always call me this.

name: Hallucination
text:
Summon a copy of a
friendly Protoss minion.
It takes double damage.
flavor: "Protoss? In our base? I think you're seeing things."

name: Colossus
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemies, twice. (Improved by Protoss spells you cast this game!)
flavor: How's the weather up there?

name: Shield Battery
text:
Gain 6 Armor.
Your next Protoss spell costs (2) less.
flavor: Hey Artanis, can I use your charger?

name: Resonance Coil
text: Deal $5 damage to a minion. Get a random Protoss spell.
flavor: This thing can snipe minions three screens away!

name: Blink
text: [x]Draw a Protoss minion. Combo: It costs (2) less.
flavor: Highly mobile. Solid range. Awful at staring contests.

name: Mothership
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry and Deathrattle: Get two random Protoss minions.
flavor: You talk to your mothership with that mouth!?

name: Immortal
text: [x]Taunt, Divine Shield Battlecry: Spend 4 Mana to double this minion's stats.
flavor: Hi Mortal, I'm Dad.

name: Sentry
text: Lifesteal. Deathrattle: Your Protoss minions cost (1) less this game.
flavor: Need a dispenser here!

name: High Templar
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all enemies. Play another Templar to merge into an Archon!
flavor: If this job doesn't work out, I can always fall back on being a Psionic Storm Chaser.

name: Void Ray
text: Rush, Divine Shield Battlecry: If this costs (0), gain +2/+2.
flavor: Raymond just had this empty feeling.

name: Cabal Acolyte
text: [x]Taunt Spellburst: Gain control of a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.

name: Disciplinarian Gandling
text:
[x]After you play a minion,
destroy it and summon a
4/4 Failed Student.

name: Wolpertinger
text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this.
flavor: Scholomance student Brewfest prank gone awry.

name: Turalyon, the Tenured
text: [x]Rush. Whenever this attacks a minion, set the defender's Attack and Health to 3.
flavor: "Let evil flee before righteousness; let the innocent live in peace. Let the day come when none need fear. For that day, I give my life gladly."

name: Power Word: Feast
text: Give a minion +2/+2. Restore it to full Health at the end of this turn.
flavor: Some people are here for the stellar, world-renowned academic program. Others are here for the buffet.

name: Frazzled Freshman
flavor: "Late to bed, early to rise, makes a student unable to open her eyes."

name: Blessing of Authority
text: Give a minion +8/+8. It can't attack heroes this turn.
flavor: A paladin fights with honor! We don't go face... until next turn!

name: Devout Pupil
text: [x]Divine Shield, Taunt Costs (1) less for each spell you've cast on friendly characters this game.
flavor: He considers textbooks Light reading.

name: Flesh Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each time your hero's Health changed during your turns.
flavor: "A BIG mistake."

name: High Abbess Alura
text: Spellburst: Cast a spell from your deck (targets this if possible).
flavor: She's all about hitting the books. Literally.

name: Voracious Reader
text: At the end of your turn, draw until you have 3 cards.
flavor: But how much of it is skimming?

name: Divine Rager
text: Divine Shield
flavor: For when you need to rage, rage against the dying of the Light.

name: Desk Imp
flavor: "I feel inky!"

name: Robes of Protection
text: Your minions have Elusive.
flavor: Warning: Robes of Protection are intended for targeted effects only and are not an effective defense against Flamestrike, Twisting Nether, or other AOE attacks.

name: Boneweb Egg
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon two 2/1 Spiders. If you discard this, trigger its Deathrattle.
flavor: Noblegarden is going to be really exciting this year!

name: Argent Braggart
text: [x]Battlecry: Set this minion's Attack and Health to the highest in the battlefield.
flavor: Not sure why he's bragging, he's got the same stats as the next guy.

name: Enchanted Cauldron
text: Spellburst: Cast a random spell of the same Cost.
flavor: Do you smell what the cauldron is cooking? If so, we apologize.

name: Demonic Studies
text: Discover a Demon. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: "Do you wanna summon a demon? I wanna summon a demon!"

name: Mindrender Illucia
text: [x]Battlecry: Replace your hand with a copy of your opponent's until end of turn.
flavor: "…and that's how I ended up with a Murloc Cultural Studies major."

name: Wandmaker
text: Battlecry: Add a 1-Cost spell from your class to your hand.
flavor: She creates incredibly affordable wands of all shapes and sizes. But not owls. The owl is all-natural.

name: Vectus
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps. Each gains a Deathrattle from your minions that died this game.
flavor: Don’t let that dark magic worry you. He’ll ensure they hatch without a scratch.

name: Archwitch Willow
text: Battlecry: Summon a random Demon from your hand and deck.
flavor: One of the demons will do all the work while the other gets the same grade.

name: Speaker Gidra
text: [x]Rush, Windfury Spellburst: Gain Attack and Health equal to the spell's Cost.
flavor: If a teacher lectures in a forest, does she even make a sound?

name: Transfer Student
text: This has different effects based on which game board you're on.
flavor:
Oh, the places you'll go!
There is so much to fight!
There are boards to be explored.
There are dreams to take flight.
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a Scholomance Academy card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Solve the mystery of Transfer Student's origins.

name: Headmaster Kel'Thuzad
text: Spellburst: If the spell destroys any minions, summon them.
flavor: "You wish to know my secrets, hmm? I carry little bits of tuna in the sleeves of my robe, he loves that. Oh, you meant the risen dead? That was trivial, trivial."

name: Onyx Magescribe
text: Spellburst: Add 2 random spells from your class to your hand.
flavor: Sometimes you gotta spend spells to earn spells.

name: Intrepid Initiate
text: Spellburst: Gain +2 Attack.
flavor: How you like them apples?

name: Crimson Hothead
text: Spellburst: Gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
flavor: Has a real passion for spelling.

name: Draconic Studies
text: [x]Discover a Dragon. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: Our Draconic Studies program has a high rate of burnout.

name: Shifty Sophomore
text: Stealth Spellburst: Add a Combo card to your hand.
flavor: Experienced enough to do crimes, inexperienced enough to be super obvious about it.

name: Devolving Missiles
text:
[x]Shoot three missiles
at random enemy minions
that transform them into
ones that cost (1) less.
flavor: Most intermural spell-dueling contests end with a field of wisps.

name: Diligent Notetaker
text: Spellburst: Return the spell to your hand.
flavor: You never know what cards are going to be on the test.

name: Athletic Studies
text: Discover a Rush minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: It's a quick read.

name: Reaper's Scythe
text: [x]Spellburst: Also damages adjacent minions this turn.
flavor: Die. Die. Die.

name: Krolusk Barkstripper
text: Spellburst: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: My friend went krolusk tipping once… once!

name: Firebrand
text: Spellburst: Deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemy minions.
flavor: Too cool for school, too hot for thought.

name: Gibberling
text: Spellburst: Summon a Gibberling.
flavor: "As a Linguistics student I have studied the Gibberlings. I have determined they are speaking Gibberish."

name: Wyrm Weaver
text: Spellburst: Summon two 1/3 Mana Wyrms.
flavor: Studied basket weaving as an undergrad.

name: Teacher's Pet
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a random 3-Cost Beast.
flavor: Really goes the extra mile to get the Hay+.

name: Steward of Scrolls
text: Spell Damage +1 Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavor: Oh dang it, I spilled ink elemental all over my essay!

name: First Day of School
text: Add 2 random 1-Cost minions to your hand.
flavor: "Report to the bookstore to buy your books, the alchemist to buy your potions, and then get your wands at the… wandryroom?"

name: Pen Flinger
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion. Spellburst: Return this to your hand.
flavor: The pen is also a more aerodynamic short-range projectile than the sword.

name: Wave of Apathy
text: Set the Attack of all enemy minions to 1 until your next turn.
flavor: "Flavor text? Eh. Can’t be bothered."

name: Marrowslicer
text: Battlecry: Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
flavor: Perfect for killing the first boss in Icecrown Citadel.

name: Cycle of Hatred
text: Deal $3 damage to all minions. Summon a 3/3 Spirit for every minion killed.
flavor: If you run 2 of these, would that make it the bi-cycle of hatred?

name: Sphere of Sapience
text:
[x]At the start of your turn,
look at your top card. You
can put it on the bottom
 and lose 1 Durability.
flavor: This is what it sounds like when spheres scry.

name: Primordial Studies
text: Discover a Spell Damage minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: A long forgotten tome whose very essence seeps of magic. 40 dust, used.

name: Molten Blast
text: Deal $2 damage. Summon that many 1/1 Elementals.
flavor: Well, how would YOU celebrate after finals week?!

name: Ras Frostwhisper
text: At the end of your turn, deal $1 damage to all enemies (improved by Spell Damage).
flavor: Always the favorite of Headmaster Kel'Thuzad, Ras nonetheless received a chilly reception from the other faculty.

name: Magehunter
text: Rush Whenever this attacks a minion, Silence it.
flavor: Hates waiting. Abhors chit chat. Fond of the color purple.

name: Trueaim Crescent
text: After your Hero attacks a minion, your minions attack it too.
flavor: You could have just pointed.

name: Manafeeder Panthara
text: Battlecry: If you've used your Hero Power this turn, draw a card.
flavor: Feeds on mana, crystal kibble, and whatever it was you were just snacking on.

name: Carrion Studies
text: Discover a Deathrattle minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: A good read but a little too much fluff.

name: Rune Dagger
text: After your hero attacks, gain Spell Damage +1 this turn.
flavor: Turns out being stabbed makes you more vulnerable to magic.

name: Gift of Luminance
text: Give a minion Divine Shield, then summon a 1/1 copy of it.
flavor: You get a small version of yourself in a snow globe to remember the moment.

name: Secret Passage
text: Replace your hand with 4 cards from your deck. Swap back next turn.
flavor: I use this to sneak out at night and do some villainous baking in the kitchen.

name: School Spirits
text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to all
minions. Shuffle 2 Soul
Fragments into your deck.
flavor: "B-E A-G-G-R-E-S-S-I-V-E!"

name: Lab Partner
text: Spell Damage +1
flavor: "Professor, a gnome burned my homework!"

name: Animated Broomstick
text: Rush Battlecry: Give your other minions Rush.
flavor: "Blimey, that's a Stratocumulus 1000!"

name: Tour Guide
text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power costs (0).
flavor: "Here is the original blueprint for the Academy grounds! Don't mind those so-called dark chambers… They'll be at the end of the tour."

name: Wretched Tutor
text: Spellburst: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
flavor: "If you like my tutoring, you'll love my sister the art therapist, my father the driver, and my mother the housekeeper."

name: Playmaker
text: [x]After you play a Rush minion, summon a copy  with 1 Health remaining.
flavor: "Here's the plan: you go left, I go right, and the wounded guy takes the hit."

name: Nature Studies
text: Discover a spell. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: "I have a first edition! Go ahead, count the rings."

name: Troublemaker
text: At the end of your turn, summon two 3/3 Ruffians that attack random enemies.
flavor:
"Prepare for trouble!"
"Make it double!"

name: Bloated Python
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/4 Hapless Handler.
flavor: This is why Scholomance engineering students prefer C++.

name: Void Drinker
text: [x]Taunt. Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to gain +3/+3.
flavor: It has no taste.

name: Combustion
text:
[x]Deal $4 damage to
a minion. Any excess
damages both neighbors.
flavor: Sally is friends with three Silverhand Recruits conveniently standing in a line. After casting this spell, how many friends does she have left? (Show your work.)

name: Wand Thief
text: Combo: Discover a Mage spell.
flavor: "What’re ya buyin’?”

name: Jandice Barov
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two random 5-Cost minions. Secretly pick one that dies  when it takes damage.
flavor: Her parents own Scholomance. Of course she's going to play tricks on the students!

name: Potion of Illusion
text: Add 1/1 copies of your minions to your hand. They cost (1).
flavor: Unfortunately, there's no potion that can make you unsee all the faces in that bottle.

name: Cram Session
text: Draw $1 cards (improved by Spell Damage).
flavor: The font of the arcane gives nearly limitless access to power and energy! But it can't keep you awake, for that we still use coffee.

name: Ancient Void Hound
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
steal 1 Attack and Health
from all enemy minions.
flavor: What happened to my 1/1 Void Pup? And the glee club?!

name: Shardshatter Mystic
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to deal 3 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Enjoys a good soul-crushing defeat.

name: Glide
text: [x]Shuffle your hand into your deck. Draw 4 cards. Outcast: Your opponent does the same.
flavor: "Come with me, and you'll see, a whole new hand of possibly the same cards."

name: Fel Guardians
text: Summon three 1/2 Demons with Taunt. Costs (1) less whenever a friendly minion dies.
flavor: What happened after the guardians tripped? They Fel.

name: Mozaki, Master Duelist
text: After you cast a spell, gain Spell Damage +1.
flavor: Treats her students like her peers, which means defeating them in one-sided duels all day long.

name: Double Jump
text: Draw an Outcast card from your deck.
flavor: The key to every speed run.

name: Doctor Krastinov
text: Rush Whenever this attacks, give your weapon +1/+1.
flavor: He is not a medical doctor.

name: Infiltrator Lilian
text: [x]Stealth Deathrattle: Summon a 4/2 Forsaken Lilian that attacks a random enemy.
flavor: She'll get to the bottom of this even if it kills her. Twice!

name: Lightning Bloom
text: Refresh 2 Mana Crystals. Overload: (2)
flavor: Curiously, this plant never blooms in the same place twice.

name: Lorekeeper Polkelt
text: [x]Battlecry: Reorder your deck from the highest Cost card to the lowest Cost card.
flavor: quicksort [] = [] quicksort (x:xs) = quicksort small ++ (x : quicksort large) where small = [y | y <- xs, y <= x] large = [y | y <- xs, y > x]

name: Instructor Fireheart
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell that costs (1) or more. If you play it this turn, repeat this effect.
flavor: When you have fire in your heart, even death can't stop you.

name: Brain Freeze
text: Freeze a minion. Combo: Also deal $3 damage to it.
flavor: "The professor called on me, and I totally froze!"

name: Initiation
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. If that kills it, summon a new copy.
flavor: The things a murloc's gotta go through to graduate from Scholomance…

name: Brittlebone Destroyer
text: [x]Battlecry: If your hero's Health changed this turn, destroy a minion.
flavor: Broke many a leg in drama class.

name: Raise Dead
text: Deal $3 damage to your hero. Return two friendly minions that died this game to your hand.
flavor: Technically, it’s just really late healing.

name: Shadowlight Scholar
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to deal 3 damage.
flavor: Imagine having the power of soul magic and using it as a reading light.

name: Vulpera Toxinblade
text: Your weapon has +2 Attack.
flavor: The blade works well enough on its own… but this is just in case.

name: Coerce
text: Destroy a damaged minion. Combo: Destroy any minion.
flavor: "Give me your lunch money, or the sandwich gets it!"

name: Steeldancer
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a random minion with Cost equal to your weapon's Attack.
flavor: Pretty powerful if you blade your cards right.

name: Ceremonial Maul
text: Spellburst: Summon a Student with Taunt and stats equal to the spell's Cost.
flavor: For the most discerning of hall monitors.

name: Shield of Honor
text: Give a damaged minion +3 Attack and Divine Shield.
flavor: "Sir, this shield would've been more helpful last turn!"

name: In Formation!
text: Add 2 random Taunt minions to your hand.
flavor: None can doubt the strength of the Scholomance student body.

name: Lord Barov
text: [x]Battlecry: Set the Health of all other minions to 1. Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavor: Alexei Barov stayed at Scholomance despite leasing it to Kel’Thuzad. He says it’s for "supervision."

name: Sorcerous Substitute
text: Battlecry: If you have Spell Damage, summon a copy of this.
flavor: This substitute's substitution is a dangerous institution.

name: Goody Two-Shields
text: Divine Shield Spellburst: Gain Divine Shield.
flavor: These are my shields. There are at least two like them, and both are mine.

name: Commencement
text: Summon a minion from your deck. Give it Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: "Remember, graduates—you carry a heavy weight on your shoulders now."

name: Tidal Wave
text: Lifesteal Deal $3 damage to all minions.
flavor: "Hang Four, mon!"

name: Trick Totem
text: At the end of your turn, cast a random spell that costs (3) or less.
flavor: It knows how to sit still and do tricks. Still working on rolling over, though.

name: Ace Hunter Kreen
text: Your other characters are Immune while attacking.
flavor: This grandmaster marksman loves winning tournaments and eating a bit of ice cream.

name: Professor Slate
text: Your spells are Poisonous.
flavor: "Don’t worry, this will be over in a second. It might FEEL like an eternity, but I assure you, it’s quite quick!"

name: Demon Companion
text: Summon a random Demon Companion.
flavor: Owning a pet can be real hell at times.

name: Star Student Stelina
text: [x]Outcast: Look at 3 cards in your opponent's hand. Shuffle one of them into their deck.
flavor: Cheating is just using your resources wisely.

name: Overwhelm
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Deal one more damage for each Beast you control.
flavor: Scholomance student Brewfest prank gone terribly, terribly awry.

name: Lake Thresher
text:
Also damages the minions next to whomever
this attacks.
flavor:
"There’s a monster in the lake?!" 
"That’s not a monster, that’s Gary."

name: Partner Assignment
text: Add a random 2-Cost and 3-Cost Beast to your hand.
flavor: In every group assignment, someone does all the legwork.

name: Shan'do Wildclaw
text: [x]Choose One - Give Beasts in your deck +1/+1; or Transform into a copy of a friendly Beast.
flavor: She holds both an academic post and a scratching post.

name: Survival of the Fittest
text: Give +4/+4 to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavor: Sometimes the fittest is the one smart enough to not start a fight with seven 6/6 Treants.

name: Guardian Animals
text: Summon two Beasts that cost (5) or less from your deck. Give them Rush.
flavor: The guidelines specifically state: "Students may also bring an ironbeak owl OR an alleycat OR a toad." They never said how big.

name: Runic Carvings
text: Choose One - Summon four 2/2 Treant Totems; or Overload: (2) to summon them with Rush.
flavor: "That totem was beautiful… and you runed it!"

name: Groundskeeper
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, restore 5 Health.
flavor: It’s tricky for dryads to tend the garden without trampling the flowers.

name: Forest Warden Omu
text: Spellburst: Refresh your Mana Crystals.
flavor: She wishes all things could grow and flourish at Scholomance. If only she knew…

name: Totem Goliath
text: Deathrattle: Summon all four basic Totems. Overload: (1)
flavor: It was an art project, and nobody knew when to stop.

name: Twilight Runner
text: Stealth Whenever this attacks, draw 2 cards.
flavor: Every morning you find two dead cards at your doorstep.

name: Adorable Infestation
text: Give a minion +1/+1. Summon a 1/1 Cub. Add a Cub to your hand.
flavor: Some cards are strong by sheer power; others draw strength from love.

name: Blood Herald
text: Whenever a friendly minion dies while this is in your hand, gain +1/+1.
flavor: "Red Blood, it gives you wings."

name: Rattlegore
text: Deathrattle: Resummon this with -1/-1.
flavor: He looks bad now, but he was pretty handsome in his 20/20s.

name: Self-Sharpening Sword
text: After your hero attacks, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: You no longer have to bring a stack of #2 swords to a test!

name: Cutting Class
text:
[x]Draw 2 cards.
Costs (1) less per Attack
of your weapon.
flavor: When you actually are the sharpest tool in the shed.

name: Spirit Jailer
text: Battlecry: Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
flavor: "Sure, they're in your deck, but the mind is like, the REAL prison."

name: Soul Shear
text:
[x]Deal $3 damage to a
minion. Shuffle 2 Soul
Fragments into your deck.
flavor: "Just a little off the sides please."

name: Felosophy
text: [x]Copy the lowest Cost Demon in your hand. Outcast: Give both +1/+1.
flavor: "Like, isn't evil subjective man?"

name: Soulciologist Malicia
text: Battlecry: For each Soul Fragment in your deck, summon a 3/3 Soul with Rush.@ (@)
flavor: If you value your life, don't call it a "soft science."

name: Soulshard Lapidary
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a Soul Fragment in your deck to give your hero +5 Attack this turn.
flavor: Also known as a soul sequincer.

name: Vilefiend Trainer
text: Outcast: Summon two 1/1 Demons.
flavor: My Vilefiend Trainers give me a much better sprint than my Air Gul'dans.

name: Plagiarize
text: Secret: At the end of your opponent's turn, add copies of the cards they played to your hand.
flavor: Copying is just using your resources wisely.

name: Fishy Flyer
text: Rush. Deathrattle: Add a 4/3 Ghost with Rush to your hand.
flavor: Like a fish out of water.

name: Sneaky Delinquent
text: Stealth. Deathrattle: Add a 3/1 Ghost with Stealth to your hand.
flavor: All right, now open your lid and say "Ahh!"

name: Smug Senior
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Add a 5/7 Ghost with Taunt to your hand.
flavor: You want to see something funny? Go visit him in five years.

name: Ogremancer
text: [x]Whenever your opponent casts a spell, summon a 2/2 Skeleton with Taunt.
flavor: After their third attempt, Tharg began to suspect that Krul was summoning the skeletons on purpose.

name: Plagued Protodrake
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 7-Cost minion.
flavor: "What’s in the drake?! WHAT’S IN THE DRAKE?"

name: Judicious Junior
text: Lifesteal
flavor: She's judge, jury, and junior!

name: Cult Neophyte
text: Battlecry: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more next turn.
flavor: Make a new recruit's deficiencies your efficiencies.

name: Educated Elekk
text: [x]Whenever a spell is played, this minion remembers it. Deathrattle: Shuffle the spells into your deck.
flavor: "This reminds me of a saying. 'An elekk never…' something. I can't remember."

name: Keymaster Alabaster
text:
[x]Whenever your opponent
 draws a card, add a copy to 
 your hand that costs (1).
flavor: The key to his mastery is a solid stack of backup copies.

name: Celestial Ink Set
text:
[x]After you spend 5 Mana on
spells, reduce the Cost of a
spell in your hand by (5).
Lose 1 Durability.
flavor:
"Dear Mother,
I have a lot of spells and burst in my hand. You should maybe run more armor and healing next time.
Cordially,
Your child"

name: Runed Mithril Rod
text:
[x]After you draw 4 cards,
reduce the Cost of cards
in your hand by (1).
Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: "Please, I need these greens to disenchant them." —Every Enchanter Ever

name: Stubborn Suspect
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 3-Cost minion.
flavor: He keeps saying "I'll never talk," but no one has actually asked him anything.

name: Shadowcloth Needle
text:
[x]After you cast a Shadow
spell, deal 1 damage
to all enemies.
Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: Makes light of the darkest repair jobs.

name: Cowardly Grunt
text: Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your deck.
flavor: Cowardice is the wisest part of valor.

name: Provoke
text: [x]Tradeable Choose a friendly minion. Enemy minions attack it.
flavor: "Heh, Greetings. Heh, Greetings. Heh, Greetings. I will crush you!"

name: Lothar
text: At the end of your turn, attack a random enemy minion. If it dies, gain +3/+3.
flavor: Has been around since before there were paladins and those newfangled paladin mechs.

name: Auctionhouse Gavel
text: [x]After your hero attacks, reduce the Cost of a Battlecry minion in your hand by (1).
flavor: "I want to be a judge! Or an auctioneer! Look, all I want is one of those sweet, tiny hammers."

name: Spirit Alpha
text: [x]After you play a card with Overload, summon a 2/3 Spirit Wolf with Taunt.
flavor: Just like in the natural world, the alpha of the species is bright purple.

name: Shiver Their Timbers!
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If you control a Pirate, deal $5 instead.
flavor: Who knew there was overlap between pirates and lumberjacks?

name: Raid the Docks
text: [x]Questline: Play 3 Pirates. Reward: Draw a weapon.
flavor: Winning the annual Ratchet Regatta really went to their heads.

name: Harbor Scamp
text: Battlecry: Draw a Pirate.
flavor: Hey, that gnome looks awfully fishy…

name: Cargo Guard
text: At the end of your turn, gain 3 Armor.
flavor: *Arrrrrmor

name: Command the Elements
text: [x]Questline: Play 3 cards with Overload. Reward: Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals.
flavor: What, you expected a shaman to have trouble with a place called STORMWIND?

name: Granite Forgeborn
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Elementals in your hand and deck by (1).
flavor: If he stops being useful, just turn him into a kitchen countertop.

name: Canal Slogger
text: Rush, Lifesteal Overload: (1)
flavor: "Another Monday in the canals huh? What a slog."

name: Tiny Toys
text:
Summon four random 5-Cost minions.
Make them 2/2.
flavor: Mom, they're action figures!

name: Charged Call
text: [x]Discover a 1-Cost minion and summon it. (Upgraded for each Overload card you played this game!)
flavor: You have a collect call from "AL'AKIR, LORD OF AIR AND THE FOUR WINDS." Do you accept these charges?

name: Two-Faced Investor
text: [x]At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of a card in your hand by (1). (50% chance to increase.)
flavor: Should never have opened that joint account...

name: Irebound Brute
text: [x]Taunt Costs (1) less for each card drawn this turn.
flavor: "You don't understand… ogres are an untapped market for vengeance and hatred!"

name: Final Showdown
text: Questline: Draw 4 cards in one turn. Reward: Reduce the Cost of the cards drawn by (1).
flavor: Finally. The last Hearthstone card.

name: Fel Barrage
text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to
the lowest Health
enemy, twice.
flavor: Kurtrus leapt over a tombstone towards the demonic invaders, yelling "PEW! PEW!" as he shot them down with fel magic.

name: Sigil of Alacrity
text:
[x]At the start of your next
turn, draw a card and
 reduce its Cost by (1).
flavor: Red means stop. Purple means GO REALLY FAST.

name: Persistent Peddler
text: Tradeable Deathrattle: Summon a Persistent Peddler from your deck.
flavor: Loves pyramid schemes and bike rides.

name: Felgorger
text: Battlecry: Draw a Fel spell. Reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor: The 'everything green' diet.

name: Jace Darkweaver
text: Battlecry: Cast all Fel spells you've played this game (targets enemies if possible).
flavor: As a former mage, making the transition from fire to felfire was quite easy.

name: Auctioneer Jaxon
text: [x]Whenever you Trade, Discover a card from your  deck to draw instead.
flavor: "Who's up for a brand-new wisp? This thing's in perfect condition, folks! Never been played..."

name: City Tax
text: [x]Tradeable Lifesteal. Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: "Look pal, I don't care what kind of legion you saved the world from, pay up or else."

name: Highlord Fordragon
text: [x]Divine Shield After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, give a minion   in your hand +5/+5.
flavor: "Through my faith and my courage, I shall be protected. And through my honor and sacrifice, another will rise in my place."

name: Prismatic Jewel Kit
text: [x]After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, give minions in your hand +1/+1. Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: The divine trick to jewelcrafting is tumbling your own rocks.

name: Blessed Goods
text: Discover a Secret, weapon, or Divine Shield minion.
flavor: Guaranteed to contain no haunted dolls, cursed rings, or corrupted runeblades, or your money back.

name: Maestra of the Masquerade
text: You start the game as a different class until you play a Rogue card.
flavor: She doesn't drop character until after the DVD commentary.

name: Find the Imposter
text: Questline: Play 2 SI:7 cards. Reward: Add a Spy Gizmo to your hand.
flavor: My money is on the evil advisor to the king.

name: Stormwind Guard
text: Taunt Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1.
flavor: 1% Guarding, 99% providing directions.

name: Impatient Shopkeep
text: Tradeable Rush
flavor: "Oi! This ain't a museum, lady."

name: Spice Bread Baker
text: Battlecry: Restore Health to your hero equal to your hand size.
flavor: The secret ingredient is love. And a LOT of butter.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Butter My Biscuits!" Achievement.

name: Package Runner
text: Can only attack if you have at least 8 cards in hand.
flavor: He could go... all... the... way!

name: Deeprun Engineer
text: Battlecry: Discover a Mech. It costs (1) less.
flavor: Deeprun Tram instructions: 300,000 pieces, 600,000 steps.

name: Florist
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
reduce the Cost of a Nature
 spell in your hand by (1).
flavor:
Trade district.
Trade district a shop.
Color Legendary.
Color Legendary golden.
Rose is a rose is a rose is a rose.

name: Guild Trader
text: Tradeable Spell Damage +2
flavor: Somehow, she manages six different professions.

name: Goldshire Gnoll
text: [x]Rush Costs (1) less for each   other card in your hand.
flavor: They're searching for one ring. They're pretty sure someone said Goldshire.

name: Battleground Battlemaster
text: Adjacent minions have Windfury.
flavor: Farm! No wait… Mine! No wait… 3 to Smith—they're taking Farm. Get there now!

name: Northshire Farmer
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Beast. Shuffle three 3/3 copies into your deck.
flavor: Dual-classed into Farmer/Rancher.

name: Pandaren Importer
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell that didn't start in your deck.
flavor: She carries everything you didn't want and more!
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Forgot This At Home" Achievement.

name: Royal Librarian
text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Silence a minion.
flavor: Books on how to flip the Auction House are down that way.

name: Stockades Guard
text: [x]Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Taunt.
flavor: "You there! Defend this prison with your life. It's my break."

name: Mo'arg Forgefiend
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Gain 8 Armor.
flavor: Enraged not by fel energies, but by an itchy nose he cannot scratch.

name: Enthusiastic Banker
text: [x]At the end of your turn, store a card from your deck. Deathrattle: Add the stored cards to your hand.
flavor: She offers 0% interest.

name: Mailbox Dancer
text: [x]Battlecry: Add a Coin to your hand. Deathrattle: Give your opponent one.
flavor: He is the reason why we have 7 mailboxes in this district.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Toss a Coin to Your Dancer" Achievement.

name: Lion's Guard
text: [x]Battlecry: If you have 15 or less Health, gain +2/+4 and Taunt.
flavor: She takes the lion's share of the credit, too.

name: Rustrot Viper
text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon.
flavor: Poisonous to weapons.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Snakes on a Blade" Achievement.

name: Cheesemonger
text:
[x]Whenever your opponent
casts a spell, add a random
spell with the same Cost
to your hand.
flavor: Secretly, the Big Cheese of SI:7.

name: Nobleman
text: Battlecry: Create a Golden copy of a random card in your hand.
flavor: What class are you? 'Upper.'

name: Elwynn Boar
text: [x]Deathrattle: If you had 7 Elwynn Boars die this game, equip a 15/3 Sword of a    Thousand Truths.@ (@/7)
flavor: Be grateful we lowered the requirement from 65,340,285.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "That Which Has No Life" Achievement.

name: City Architect
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 0/5 Castle Walls with Taunt.
flavor: "Oh, wait, I had this turned the wrong way. This was supposed to be a tower."

name: Stockades Prisoner
text: [x]Starts Dormant. After you play 3 cards, this awakens.
flavor: She was arrested for lockpicking. Her imprisonment was not well thought out.

name: Lady Prestor
text: [x]Battlecry: Transform minions in your deck into random Dragons. (They keep their   original stats and Cost.)
flavor: To her credit, the best bodyguard for the king WOULD be a dragon in disguise.
how_to_earn: Unlocked when opening a United in Stormwind pack.

name: Flightmaster Dungar
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a flightpath and go Dormant. Awaken with a bonus   when you complete it!
flavor: Flight’s a little bumpy, but there’s plenty of legroom.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlockable after purchasing the United in Stormwind Tavern Pass.

name: Cornelius Roame
text:
[x]At the start and end
 of each player's turn,
draw a card.
flavor: Raised two perfectly normal daughters. Then one died and brought doom to Stormwind.

name: Varian, King of Stormwind
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion to gain Rush. Repeat for Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: Man, this guy is so cool. Sure hope nothing happens to him.

name: Bloodbound Imp
text: Whenever this attacks, deal 2 damage to your hero.
flavor: ALWAYS read the terms and conditions.

name: Dark Alley Pact
text: Summon a Fiend with Taunt and stats equal to your hand size.
flavor: "With your help, I can finally install some proper lighting in this alley."

name: Shady Bartender
text: Tradeable Battlecry: Give your Demons +2/+2.
flavor: One sin and tonic, coming right up.

name: Dreaded Mount
text:
[x]Give a minion +1/+1.
When it dies, summon
an endless Dreadsteed.
flavor: This is the summoning that never ends, and it goes on and on my friends...

name: Demonic Assault
text: [x]Deal $3 damage. Summon two 1/3 Voidwalkers with Taunt.
flavor: Right next to the demonic pepper.

name: Entitled Customer
text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to your hand size to all other minions.
flavor: "Do you have any idea how much mana I've spent at your store? 6."

name: Touch of the Nathrezim
text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to a
minion. If it dies, restore
3 Health to your hero.
flavor: "You're giving your soul to me? I'm touched."

name: The Demon Seed
text: [x]Questline: Take 12 damage on your turns. Reward: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Just need some elbow grease to get this working. Oh, and your soul.

name: Anetheron
text: [x]Costs (1) if your hand is full.
flavor: Leads every demonic invasion. Hopefully this one turns out better than the World Tree.

name: Stormwind Freebooter
text: Battlecry: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn.
flavor: "Just don't stab the ankles! I want his boots!"

name: Heavy Plate
text: Tradeable Gain 8 Armor.
flavor: "You asked for unbendable, unwavering armor–I don't see why you're upset."

name: Investment Opportunity
text: [x]Draw an Overload card.
flavor: "It's a real fixer-upper. I mean a REAL fixer upper."

name: Remote-Controlled Golem
text:
[x]After this takes damage,
shuffle two Golem Parts into
your deck. When drawn,
  summon a 2/1 Mech.
flavor: Someone got a little too excited inventing a can opener.

name: Fire Sale
text: Tradeable Deal $3 damage to all minions.
flavor: Everything is 50% off now that our warehouse burned down.

name: First Flame
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Add a Second Flame to your hand.
flavor: You never forget your first love: fire.

name: Clumsy Courier
text: Battlecry: Cast the highest Cost spell from your hand.
flavor: Not the nacho cheese!

name: Ignite
text:
Deal $2 damage. Shuffle an Ignite into
your deck that deals
one more damage.
flavor: "So there I was in the Deadmines, I had VanCleef by the throat, and I was just about to let him have it when... <sniff> What's that smell?"

name: Sanctum Chandler
text: After you cast a Fire spell, draw a spell.
flavor: Has been burning at both ends to keep the place illuminated.

name: Prestor's Pyromancer
text: Battlecry: Your next Fire spell has Spell Damage +2.
flavor: Ah, yeah. This guy. Definitely not an evil dragon in disguise either.

name: Grand Magus Antonidas
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast a Fire spell on each of your last three turns, cast 3 Fireballs at    random enemies.@ (@/3)
flavor: He's really disappointed Jaina became a frost mage.

name: Overdraft
text: [x]Tradeable Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals to deal that much damage.
flavor: Wait. It costs mana to be out of mana?!

name: Bolner Hammerbeak
text: [x]After you play a Battlecry minion, repeat the first   Battlecry played this turn.
flavor: Show him how to do something once, and he can do it a thousand times. This turn.

name: First Blade of Wrynn
text: [x]Divine Shield Battlecry: Gain Rush if this has at least 4 Attack.
flavor: Valedictorian of knight school.

name: Encumbered Pack Mule
text: [x]Taunt When you draw this, add a  copy of it to your hand.
flavor: "Now I can pick up EVERY knick-knack."
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "They Carry My Potions" Achievement.

name: Traveling Merchant
text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly  minion you control.
flavor: Northrend's greatest export: funnel cakes.

name: Counterfeit Blade
text: [x]Battlecry: Get a copy of a random friendly Deathrattle minion that died this game.
flavor: Don't worry, the blade retracts into the handle!

name: Garrote
text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to the
enemy hero. Shuffle 3
Bleeds into your deck that
deal $2 more when drawn.
flavor: "I don't have money… but what I do have is a particular set of skills."

name: Rise to the Occasion
text: Questline: Play 3 different 1-Cost cards. Reward: Equip a 1/4 Light's Justice.
flavor: Faith is never lost, only repurposed.

name: Lightbringer's Hammer
text: Lifesteal Can't attack heroes.
flavor: This entire city must be purged. Or at least just the minions.

name: Alliance Bannerman
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a minion. Give minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Back in my day, we had to carry our inspiration uphill both ways to war.

name: Noble Mount
text: G[x]ive a minion +1/+1 and Divine Shield. When it dies, summon a Warhorse.
flavor: The Horde rued the day that Cariel was allowed to take her pet to work.

name: Catacomb Guard
text: [x]Lifesteal Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to an enemy minion.
flavor: A little dark down here. So much for "serving the Light."
targeting_arrow_text: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack to an enemy minion.

name: Peasant
text: At the start of your turn, draw a card.
flavor: Better pay them, or they'll join the Defias.

name: Rats of Extraordinary Size
text:
[x]Summon seven 1/1
Rats. Any that can't fit
on the battlefield go to
your hand with +4/+4.
flavor: They don't care if you believe they exist.

name: Aimed Shot
text: Deal $3 damage. Your next Hero Power deals 2 more damage.
flavor: Wait, you WEREN'T aiming before?!

name: Defend the Dwarven District
text: Questline: Deal damage with 3 spells. Reward: Your Hero Power can target minions.
flavor: Don't shoot until you see the purples of their eyes.

name: The Rat King
text: [x]Rush. Deathrattle: Go Dormant. Revive after 5 friendly minions die.
flavor: "I'm the giant rat that makes all of da rules!"

name: Entrapped Sorceress
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a  Quest, Discover a spell.
flavor: "If you're a city guard, you have to tell me. Otherwise, it's entrapment."
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Inside Sources" Achievement.

name: Sketchy Information
text: [x]Draw a Deathrattle card that costs (4) or less. Trigger its Deathrattle.
flavor: "I trust the Forsaken as far as I can smell them. Which, I guess is actually pretty far."

name: SI:7 Informant
text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other SI:7 card you've played this game.
flavor: Sitting in a tavern all day and looking scary is hard work, but somebody has to do it.

name: SI:7 Extortion
text: Tradeable Deal $3 damage to an undamaged character.
flavor: "It's a dangerous world out there. It'd be a shame if your protection insurance were to suddenly run out…"

name: SI:7 Operative
text: Rush After this attacks a minion, gain Stealth.
flavor: What do you mean you're out of ponies?

name: SI:7 Assassin
text: [x]Costs (1) less for each SI:7 card you've played this game. Combo: Destroy an enemy minion.
flavor: You can't keep the streets clean if you're afraid to get your hands dirty.

name: SI:7 Skulker
text: [x]Stealth Battlecry: The next card   you draw costs (1) less.
flavor: Burying bones and calling it skullduggery.

name: Oracle of Elune
text:
[x]After you play a minion
that costs (2) or less,
summon a copy of it.
flavor: Even the moon goddess needs to back up her databases.

name: Sow the Soil
text: Choose One - Give your minions +1 Attack; or  Summon a 2/2 Treant.
flavor: "I'M NOT A TAILOR!"

name: Lost in the Park
text: Questline: Gain 4 Attack with your hero. Reward: Gain 5 Armor.
flavor: Mister, have you seen my Archdruid?

name: Best in Shell
text: [x]Tradeable Summon two 2/7  Turtles with Taunt.
flavor: The agility course takes a while.

name: Park Panther
text: [x]Rush. Whenever this attacks, give your hero +3 Attack this turn.
flavor: Somebody called animal control once. It didn't work out very well for anybody.

name: Kodo Mount
text: Give a minion +4/+2 and Rush. When it dies, summon a Kodo.
flavor: No matter how big they are or how many times you tell them no, they STILL won't stay off the couch.

name: Seek Guidance
text: [x]Questline: Play a 2, 3, and 4-Cost card. Reward: Discover a card from your deck.
flavor: Xyrella was looking for spiritual guidance but found deck-building tips instead.

name: Loan Shark
text: [x]Battlecry: Give your opponent a Coin.   Deathrattle: You get two.
flavor: Pay up or you'll be swimming with the fishes.

name: Wickerclaw
text:
After your hero gains Attack, this minion
gains +2 Attack.
flavor: They say pets tend to look like their owners.

name: Composting
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Draw   a card."
flavor: The Treants really give their bodies to the cause.

name: Vibrant Squirrel
text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle 4 Acorns into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/1 Squirrel.
flavor: Oh, they're cute now. Just wait till they unleash a Savage Roar.

name: Call of the Grave
text: [x]Discover a Deathrattle minion. If you have enough Mana to play it, trigger its Deathrattle.
flavor: Necromancy is motivational speaking for the dead.

name: Shard of the Naaru
text: Tradeable Silence all enemy minions.
flavor: Fell from the sky, huh? I'll give you ten gold.

name: Void Shard
text: Lifesteal Deal $4 damage.
flavor: Light's easy. Void's hard.

name: Elekk Mount
text: Give a minion +4/+7 and Taunt. When it dies, summon an Elekk.
flavor: Pink Elekks are on parade!

name: Twilight Deceptor
text: Battlecry: If any hero took damage this turn, draw a Shadow spell.
flavor: Nobody asks questions if you're carrying a clipboard.

name: Psyfiend
text: After you cast a Shadow spell, deal 2 damage to each hero.
flavor: Listens to a LOT of K-pop.

name: Voidtouched Attendant
text: Both heroes take one extra damage from all sources.
flavor: Don't TOUCH the Void. You don't know where it's been.

name: Sheldras Moontree
text: [x]Battlecry: The next 3 spells you draw are Cast When Drawn.
flavor: Sheldras really went to the park for his pilgrimage.

name: Darkbishop Benedictus
text: Start of Game: If the spells in your deck are all Shadow, enter Shadowform.
flavor: Dark Bishop takes Light Pawn, check.

name: Sorcerer's Gambit
text: Questline: Cast a Fire, Frost, and Arcane spell. Reward: Draw a spell.
flavor: After "the incident," the Stockades really had to reevaluate their anti-mage protocols.

name: Metamorfin
text: Taunt Battlecry: If you've cast a Fel spell this turn, gain +2/+2.
flavor: Always wanted to be the green ranger.

name: Chaos Leech
text: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to a minion. Outcast: Deal $5 instead.
flavor: Otherwise known as a nematode.

name: Lion's Frenzy
text: Has Attack equal to the number of cards you've drawn this turn.
flavor: Only as sharp as your draw.

name: Rodent Nest
text: Deathrattle: Summon five 1/1 Rats.
flavor: Pig sty? No, this is a rat's nest.

name: Leatherworking Kit
text:
[x]After three friendly
Beasts die, draw a Beast
and give it +1/+1.
Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: Combining taxidermy and tailoring.

name: Ramming Mount
text: [x]Give a minion +2/+2 and Immune while attacking. When it dies, summon a Ram.
flavor: Tavish has some road rage issues to work through.

name: Stormwind Piper
text:
After this minion attacks,
give your Beasts +1/+1.
flavor: Throws crazy parties with the Rat King—except when it's raining.

name: Devouring Swarm
text:
[x]Choose an enemy minion.
Your minions attack it,
then return any that die
 to your hand.
flavor: Collect… essence.

name: Hot Streak
text: Your next Fire spell this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: It's easy to catch fire when you're on fire.

name: Imported Tarantula
text: [x]Tradeable Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Spiders with Poisonous and Rush.
flavor: Which forbidden forest did you get this from?

name: Spirit of the Tides
text:
[x]If you have any unspent
Mana at the end of
 your turn, gain +1/+2.
flavor: Cleans the ocean better than any store-brand competitor - guaranteed or your Mana back!

name: Moonbeam
text: Deal $1 damage to an enemy, twice.
flavor: The light of the moon may have disappeared from Zin-Azshari after the Sundering, but not its power.

name: Herald of Nature
text: Battlecry: If you've cast a Nature spell while holding this, give your other minions +1/+1.
flavor: A mother of plants in mother of pearl.

name: Tidelost Burrower
text: Battlecry: Dredge. If it's a Murloc, summon a 2/2 copy of it.
flavor: Burrowing may not be for everyone, but I dig it.

name: Clownfish
text: Battlecry: Your next two Murlocs cost (2) less.
flavor: His jokes are hilarious if you know Nerglish.

name: Command of Neptulon
text: Summon two 5/4 Elementals with Rush. Overload: (1)
flavor: "REVENANT TO F6. CHECKMATE, OZUMAT!"

name: Ancient Krakenbane
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, deal 5 damage.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: "Call me Fishmael."

name: Shellshot
text:
[x]Deal $3 damage to a
random enemy minion.
Repeat this with 1
less damage.
flavor: Precision over accuracy.

name: Lightray
text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each Paladin card you've played this game.
flavor: Lightrays, much like rays of light, tend to be seen closer to the surface.

name: Shattershambler
text: [x]Battlecry: Your next Deathrattle minion costs (1)  less, but immediately dies when played.
flavor: Someone didn’t realize the ‘cold, black heart’ thing was supposed to be a metaphor.

name: Inkveil Ambusher
text: Stealth Has +3 Attack and Immune while attacking.
flavor: You’ve got it wrong. She releases ink when you’re scared.

name: Herald of Light
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast a Holy spell while holding this, restore #6 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: Wake up! No sleeping in with the fishes!

name: Myrmidon
text: After you cast a spell on this minion, draw a card.
flavor: He didn't have time to Myrmidon the other half of his armor before combat started.

name: K9-0tron
text: [x]Battlecry: Dredge. If it's a 1-Cost minion, summon it.
flavor: You merely adopted the Battlegrounds. I was born in it. Molded by it.

name: Disarming Elemental
text: [x]Battlecry: Dredge for your opponent. Set its Cost to (6).
flavor: "You can have these back when you learn to play nice."

name: Topple the Idol
text: [x]Dredge. Reveal it and deal damage equal to  its Cost to all minions.
flavor: No Old Gods or Kings, only Naga.

name: Fossil Fanatic
text: After your hero attacks, draw a Fel spell.
flavor: Praise Lord Helix!

name: Herald of Chaos
text: [x]Lifesteal Battlecry: If you've cast a Fel spell while holding this, gain Rush.
flavor: They used to be called the Heralds of Order before all of this silly Sundering nonsense.

name: Submerged Spacerock
text: [x]Deathrattle: Add two Arcane Mage spells to your hand. They are Temporary.
flavor: Time for some out of this world RNG.

name: Polymorph: Jellyfish
text: Transform a minion into a 4/1 Jellyfish with Spell Damage +2.
flavor: While Ini’s first use of the Spontaneous Gelatin Transmalgamizer may have gotten her banned from the Gnomish Cooking Convention, she’s never one to throw away a new invention.

name: Lady Naz'jar
text:
[x]While in your hand, this
   transforms after you cast a   
Fire, Frost, or Arcane spell.
flavor: Talk about an identity crisis.

name: Snapdragon
text: [x]Battlecry: Give all Battlecry minions in your deck +1/+1.
flavor: Good synergy with Crackledragon, not so much with Popdragon.

name: Ozumat
text: [x]Colossal +6 Deathrattle: For each of Ozumat's Tentacles, destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: Deathrattle: You'll be octo-sorry.

name: Neptulon the Tidehunter
text: [x]Colossal +2, Rush, Windfury Whenever Neptulon attacks, if you control any Hands, they attack instead.
flavor: Neptulon, tired of filling hands, is now throwing hands.

name: Bubbler
text: [x]After this minion takes exactly one damage, destroy it. (Pop!)
flavor: Prefers regular over diet shampoo.

name: Igneous Lavagorger
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Dredge. Gain  Armor equal to its Cost.
flavor: Lava shark, doo doo doo doo doo doo.

name: Clash of the Colossals
text: Add a random Colossal minion to both players' hands. Yours costs (2) less.
flavor: Don’t let this distract you from the fact that in 1998, Ozumat threw Neptulon off Shell in a Cell, and plummeted 16 fathoms through an announcer’s table.

name: Tidal Revenant
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage. Gain 8 Armor.
flavor: A big minion that clears the board and gains Armor? Wow, Warrior is really in their element now.

name: Herald of Shadows
text: Battlecry: If you've cast a Shadow spell while holding this, steal 2 Health from a minion.
flavor: “IT’S NOT A PHASE, MOM!”

name: Immolate
text:
Light every card in the opponent's hand on fire. In 3 turns, any still
in hand are destroyed!
flavor: "Well if you cared about those cards so much, why didn't you play them?"

name: Commander Ulthok
text: Battlecry: Your opponent's cards cost Health instead of Mana next turn.
flavor: He likes to spend his free time in his garden, growing Bloodradish, Bloodcabbage, and his favorite, Bloodbloom.

name: Coilfang Constrictor
text: [x]Battlecry: Look at 3 cards in your opponent's hand and choose one. It can't be played next turn.
flavor: How do you know when someone has a crush on you? They take your breath away.

name: Drown
text: Put an enemy minion on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: If you play it on a Naga, they drown in their sorrows instead.

name: Jackpot!
text:
Add two random
spells from other classes
that cost (5) or more
to your hand.
flavor: Find someone who looks at you the way Hooktusk looks at loot.

name: Front Lines
text:
[x]Summon a minion
from each player's deck.
Repeat until either side
of the battlefield is full.
flavor: With the line in the sand crossed, the battle for the Throne of Tides had begun.

name: Semi-Stable Portal
text: Rewind Add a random minion to your hand. It costs (3) less.
flavor: Portal technology has advanced so much! We're down to spending only 29% of GDP on upkeep.
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening an Across the Timeways card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after opening a golden Across the Timeways card pack.

name: Chrono Daggers
text: Rewind Throw 3 knives at random enemies that deal $2 damage each.
flavor:
Ow. Ow. Ow.
No no not again!
Ow. Ow. Ow.

name: Aeon Wizard
text: [x]Rewind Battlecry: Get 2 random spells from your class.
flavor: The odds of getting four Wheels of DEATH!!! are astronomically low. You should consider yourself lucky!

name: Portal Vanguard
text: [x]Rewind Battlecry: Draw a random minion. Give it +2/+2.
flavor: "Not Weasel Tunneler AGAIN!"
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening an Across the Timeways card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after opening a golden Across the Timeways card pack.

name: Conflux Crasher
text: Rewind Battlecry: Deal 7 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: Conflexing on my haters.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Across the Timeways Tavern Pass.

name: Timethief Rafaam
text: [x]Fabled+. Your deck size is 40, but has 10 Rafaams! Battlecry: If you played the rest, destroy the enemy hero.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: Timethief Rafaam has recruited himself from every universe to RULE ALL OF TIME! Murozond is just a temporary obstacle…

name: Mirror Dimension
text: Summon a 0/4 minion with Taunt. If you are holding a Dragon, summon another.
flavor: Also summons two 4/0s.

name: Bygone Doomspeaker
text: [x]Rewind Battlecry: Both players  discard a random card.
flavor: Let bygones be Doomspeakers.

name: Gelbin of Tomorrow
text: [x]Fabled Battlecry: Put one of each Aura from your deck into the battlefield.
flavor: In one future, Gelbin invents a way to preserve his brain in a suit of robotic armor, and leads the gnomes into a bright future powered by the Holy Light.

name: Farseer Wo
text: [x]Elusive After you cast a spell, Discover a Nature spell from the past.
flavor: For two weeks, she meditated in silence, undisturbed as she peered into the endless, unfolding facets of the universe. No pathway lay unexplored, no stone left unturned. When she finally snapped from her fugue, she uttered a single word: "Woah."

name: Instant Multiverse
text: Rewind Summon 12 Mana worth of random minions. Overload: (3)
flavor: Well, this is orcward…

name: Hardlight Protector
text: [x]Divine Shield Battlecry: Restore #3 Health to your hero and give them Divine Shield.
flavor: Fights for a brighter tomorrow.

name: Neon Innovation
text: Discover a Paladin Mech from the past. Give it +5/+5.
flavor: "This is the third time this week you've brought Shielded Minibot to class."

name: Tankgineer
text: [x]Divine Shield Deathrattle: Summon a 7/7 Tank with Divine Shield.
flavor: They can fix anything, as long as it's a tank.

name: Mend the Timeline
text: Rewind Get 2 random Holy spells. Restore Health to your hero equal to their Costs.
flavor: Time heals all wounds.

name: Manifested Timeways
text: Battlecry: If you control an Aura, deal 3 damage to all enemies.
flavor: Hold on, I'm manifesting my Aura.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Across the Timeways Tavern Pass.

name: Broxigar
text: [x]Fabled, Charge Start of Game: Disappear. Kill all 4 Demons from Argus to reappear in hand.
flavor: The wound Broxigar dealt to Sargeras during his last stand is a glory no other orcish hero has ever achieved.

name: Doomsday Prepper
text: Outcast: Your hero is Immune until your next turn.
flavor: I gave up my pantry space for miscellaneous non-perishable goods. What have YOU sacrificed?

name: Perennial Serpent
text: [x]Rush Costs (4) less if a minion is Dormant.
flavor: Given the choice, I prefer the seasonal variety of giant serpent for my garden.

name: Contingency
text: Draw the bottom two cards from your deck.
flavor: Straight to Plan Z!

name: Murozond, Unbounded
text: Battlecry: At the start of your next turn, set this minion's Attack to INFINITY!
flavor: Oh yeah?? Well, next turn I hit for Infinity +1!

name: Twilight Timehopper
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 2 Shreds of Time into your deck. When drawn, deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavor: Just a timehop, timeskip, and a timejump away.

name: Entropic Continuity
text:
[x]Give your minions +1/+1.
Shuffle 2 Shreds of Time
into your deck.
flavor: I thought I signed up to go to the Tropic Continuity...

name: Tachyon Barrage
text: Deal $6 damage split among all enemies. Shuffle 2 Shreds of Time into your deck.
flavor: Kinda tachy if you ask me.

name: Fatebreaker
text: [x]Lifesteal Battlecry: Cast a Shred of Time from your deck to gain +3/+3.
flavor: If ye had the chance to break yer fate, wooja?

name: Ruinous Velocidrake
text: [x]Rush Battlecry: Cast a Shred  of Time from your deck to    summon a copy of this.
flavor: Time slows down as your Velocidrake approaches the speed of light.

name: Divergence
text:
Split a random
minion in your hand into two halves.
flavor: They really are my other half.

name: RAFAAM LADDER!!
text: Draw 3 cards of different Costs.
flavor: Rafaam doesn't need a ladder. Rafaam has RAFAAMS!

name: Chronogor
text: [x]Battlecry: You draw your 2 highest Cost cards. Your opponent draws your 2 lowest Cost cards.
flavor:
"I'm flight-ready!"
"I'm not flight-ready!"

name: Druid of Regrowth
text: Rewind Battlecry: Cast 2 random Nature spells.
flavor: Seems cool until you realize it's an invasive species.

name: Stadium Announcer
text: [x]Rewind Battlecry: Both players equip a random weapon. Give yours +1/+1.
flavor:
"ATTENTION!"
"CANNONBALL!"

name: Time Machine
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Get a random Rewind card.
flavor: Doc, you made a time machine... out of a refrigerator?
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Across the Timeways Tavern Pass.

name: Royal Informant
text: [x]Battlecry: Look at the right- most card in your opponent's hand. Either get a copy of it or increase its Cost by (2).
flavor: "Psst... that person wearing the crown is the King."

name: Disciple of the Dove
text: Battlecry: Draw a minion. Give minions in your hand +2 Health.
flavor: She was almost a Priest of the Pigeon.

name: Mister Clocksworth
text: [x]Rewind, Rewind, Rewind Battlecry: Summon 2 random Legendary minions.
flavor:
"Hey Mister, what're your clocks worth?"
"Depends on the hour, my boy."
how_to_earn: Unlocked after completing the starter quests.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the Across the Timeways Tavern Pass.

name: Deja Vu
text: Discover a copy of a card in your opponent's hand. It costs (1) less.
flavor: "I've played this game before!"
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Across the Timeways Tavern Pass.

name: Fading Memory
text: Deathrattle: Get a random 5-Cost minion from the past.
flavor: I had the best idea for flavor text! …what was it again?

name: Futuristic Forefather
text: [x]Taunt. Battlecry: Look at 3 cards. Guess which one is in your opponent's hand to gain +4 Health.
flavor: Be careful or else you'll end up your own forefather.

name: King Maluk
text: Battlecry: Discard your hand. Get an Infinite Banana.
flavor: Discard hand. Return to Monke.

name: PMM Infinitizer
text: Battlecry: Set a friendly minion's Attack and Health to 8. It can't attack heroes this turn.
flavor: Nobody knows what PMM stands for.

name: Past Gnomeregan
text: [x]Give a minion +2/+1. Advance to the present!
flavor: Before the trogg invasion, Gnomeregan was a thriving, high-tech metropolis.

name: Whelp of the Infinite
text: Poisonous Reborn
flavor: .eip eituc a tahW

name: Cyborg Patriarch
text: Dormant for 3 turns. Taunt
flavor: We have the technology. We have the bananas. We can rebuild him.

name: Devious Coyote
text: [x]Stealth. Costs (1) less for each time the enemy hero took damage this turn.
flavor: Something's fishy about this.

name: Clockwork Rager
