text: [x]Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each turn you've taken this game.@ (@ turns)
flavor: "BY MY CALCULATIONS YOU ARE TWO MINUTES LATE!!!"

name: Dangerous Variant
text: At the start of your turn, transform into a random 5-Cost minion.
flavor: I prefer to think of myself as the improved variant.

name: Sentient Hourglass
text: [x]Rush After this minion survives damage, swap its stats.
flavor: Everyone asks, "What is the time?" but never "How is the time?"

name: Soldier of the Infinite
text: Rush Battlecry: Double this minion's Attack.
flavor: This is what a century of infinitizer does to you.

name: Amber Warden
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a random minion from the past.
flavor: For Amber Warden, this was the most important moment in their life. For me, it was turn eight.

name: Sandmaw
flavor: Its favorite flavor: vanilla.

name: Time Skipper
text: At the end of each player's turn, give them a Coin.
flavor: Eh, I'm fast forwarding this century, I don't think anything interesting happens.

name: Unknown Voyager
text: After this survives damage, transform into a random 7-Cost minion.
flavor: If you think about it, we're all time travelers from the past.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Across the Timeways Tavern Pass.

name: Whelp of the Bronze
text: Lifesteal Divine Shield
flavor: What a cutie pie.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Across the Timeways Tavern Pass.

name: Wizened Truthseeker
text: Battlecry: Set the Cost of every card in both player's hands back to their original Costs.
flavor: All his stories start with "Back in my day..."

name: Paltry Flutterwing
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a random 2-Cost minion that is Dormant for 2 turns.
flavor: Beware! The Flutterwing Effect is even more dangerous.

name: Living Paradox
text: Elusive Battlecry: Summon two 2/1 Living Paradoxes with Elusive.
flavor: We just need to find the right clone to pin this all on.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Across the Timeways Tavern Pass.

name: Quantum Destabilizer
text: This minion takes double damage from all sources.
flavor: No fair! You changed the outcome by measuring it!

name: Timeless Causality
text: Battlecry: Reverse the order of your deck.
flavor: Never confuse Timeless Correlation with Timeless Causality.

name: Chronicle Keeper
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: No retcon required!

name: Timelord Nozdormu
text: [x]Dormant for 5 turns. Rush. After you play a card from the newest expansion,  awaken 1 turn sooner.
flavor: We tried Dormant for 15 seconds, but that was a bit too quick.

name: Chrono-Lord Deios
text: [x]Your Battlecries, Deathrattles, Hero Power, and end of turn effects trigger twice.
flavor: Deiiiiios. Deiiii eiiii eiii os.
how_to_earn: Earnable on Across the Timeways Reward Track.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the Across the Timeways Tavern Pass.

name: Hourglass Attendant
text: [x]Divine Shield At the end of your turn, give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Works hard to maintain his hourglass figure.

name: Misplaced Pyromancer
text: Whenever you Shatter a card, deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Oh no! The timeline's Shattered!

name: Circadiamancer
text: [x]Battlecry: Add a random 8-Cost minion to your hand. At the start of your turns, reduce its Cost by (1).
flavor: "I'm my OWN alarm clock."
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the Across the Timeways Tavern Pass.

name: Chromie
text: Deathrattle: Draw another copy of cards you've played this game.@ (@ cards)
flavor: Chromie searched far and wide, but there just wasn’t a group of heroes with the strength to take down Murozond. In this timeline, at least…

name: Muradin, High King
text: [x]Fabled, Rush. Battlecry: Bring the High King's Hammer to ME! Deathrattle: Add it to your hand.
flavor: There is no story more tragic in Irongforge history than that of King Muradin slaying the corrupted Prince Arthas. The Lich King never rose to power, the Stormriders united, but the boy's death created fractures in the Alliance that would never repair.

name: Lady Azshara
text: [x]Fabled. Choose One - Empower Zin-Azshari; or The Well of Eternity. (The   other gets destroyed!)
flavor: There was a time when Azshara was a benevolent queen to the Kaldorei. There is a timeline where she even stayed one.

name: Lightning Rod
text: Deal $2 damage to a friendly minion to deal $4 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor: Rodney despised his nickname, but took comfort in knowing none doubted his power.

name: Primordial Overseer
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast a Nature spell while holding this, gain +1/+1 and draw a card.
flavor: In this timeline, dwarves got very creative with their totem carvings.

name: Flux Revenant
text: [x]Taunt Whenever you would damage this with a Nature spell, it gains +2/+1 instead.
flavor: "Now where did I leave that capacitor…"

name: Thunderquake
text:
[x]Deal $1 damage
to all minions.
Get a Static Shock.
flavor: Would you like to see my muscles? Catchphrase! Catchphrase! Hammer down!

name: Nascent Bolt
text: Deal $5 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw 2 cards.
flavor: Let's wait until it matures into a full blast.

name: Stormrook
text:
[x]Whenever you would
damage this with a Nature
spell, summon a random
  5-Cost minion instead.
flavor: A dwarf and their rook have a special bond, which cannot be broken by forge nor fire.

name: Static Shock
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. Give your hero +1 Attack this turn.
flavor: Spent hours shuffling his feet on the rug before going into battle.

name: Cleansing Lightspawn
text: [x]Lifesteal Battlecry: Deal damage to an enemy minion equal    to this minion's Health.
flavor: To get out the toughest stains, mix baking soda, vinegar, and the scorching rays of atonement.
targeting_arrow_text: Deal damage equal to this minion's Health.

name: Yesterloc
text: At the end of your turn, give your other minions +1 Health.
flavor: *nostalgic mrrgls*

name: Divine Augur
text: [x]Battlecry: Set the Attack and Health of every minion in your hand to the higher of the two stats.
flavor: To achieve true holiness you must drill into the heart of divinity.

name: Amber Priestess
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Restore Health to a character equal to this minion's Health.
flavor: "My strength is yours. And I'm YOKED!"
targeting_arrow_text: Restore Health equal to this minion's Health.

name: Intertwined Fate
text: Discover a copy of a card from your deck and one from your opponent's.
flavor: Just imagine… DRAGONS!

name: Cease to Exist
text: Rewind Silence and destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.

name: Temporal Traveler
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a 4/1 Shadow that attacks a random enemy minion.
flavor: Note to past self: remember to avenge my imminent death.

name: Eternus
text: [x]Battlecry: Take control of an enemy minion with this   minion's Health or less.
flavor:
"I can't believe Eternus would turn on us!"
-Infinite Dragonflight
targeting_arrow_text: Take control of minion with less Health.

name: Past Conflux
text: [x]Summon a random Dragon that costs (5) or more. Advance to the present!
flavor: For millennia, magic shrouded the Temporal Conflux and the rest of the Dragon Isles from all of Azeroth — even the dragonflights themselves.

name: Aeon Rend
text: Rewind Deal $4 damage to two random enemies.
flavor: Rewinding just to miss lethal again is soooo Illidan.

name: Timeway Warden
text: [x]Battlecry: Imprison an enemy minion. It goes Dormant for 10,000 turns.    Deathrattle: Awaken it.
flavor: You can get some turns reduced for good behavior.
targeting_arrow_text: Imprison an enemy minion for 10,000 turns.

name: Hounds of Fury
text:
[x]Summon two 3/3
Demons. If your deck has
no minions, they attack
the lowest Health enemy.
flavor: No, you can't pet the dogs.

name: Time-Lost Glaive
text: Deathrattle: Get a random Demon from the past.
flavor: Oh, that's when I left it!

name: The Eternal Hold
text:
[x]Get a Demon that costs
(5) or more. If your deck
has no minions, your
next one costs (0).
flavor: "...stay on the line, our customer service representative will speak with you soon..."

name: Power Word: Barrier
text: Give a character Divine Shield. Give minions in your hand +2 Health.
flavor: Nothing says teamwork like hiding under a yellow bubble and pretending mechanics don't exist.

name: Solitude
text: [x]Discover a minion. If your deck has no minions, reduce the Cost of any in your hand by (2).
flavor: Me time.

name: Lasting Legacy
text:
[x]Give your hero
+4 Attack this turn. If your
deck has no minions, give
any in hand +4 Attack.
flavor: My father had +4 Attack and his father before him had +4 Attack.

name: Precise Shot
text:
Deal $3 damage.
If this is EXACTLY in the center of your hand,
deal $5 instead.
flavor: I never promised it would be accurate.

name: Arrow Retriever
text: Battlecry: Draw until you have 3 cards.
flavor: And he'll never tell how many times you missed.

name: Wormhole
text: Rewind Summon a random 3-Cost Beast. It attacks a random enemy.
flavor: Worms sourced cruelty free from Gigantic Sam's Bait Shoppe.

name: Ticking Timebomb
text: Deathrattle: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: Trust me, the timer always stops at 0 seconds.

name: Epoch Stalker
text: Rush, Elusive Battlecry: Summon a copy of this.
flavor: Look out! It's at your 6 o'clock!

name: Quel'dorei Fletcher
text:
Your Hero Power costs
(0) while your hand has
3 or less cards.
flavor: Time flies when you're going face.

name: Ranger General Sylvanas
text: [x]Fabled. Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.     If you've played Alleria or       Vereesa, repeat for each.
flavor: Whatever she would later become, no hero fought the Lich King so courageously as the Ranger General of Silvermoon.

name: Shadows of Yesterday
text: Rewind Summon four 3/2 Shades. They each gain two random Bonus Effects.
flavor: Our actions today haunt us tomorrow. Like choosing to Rewind.

name: Timestop
text: Deal $3 damage. Freeze two random enemy minions.
flavor: A broken clock is right twice an eternity.

name: Blood Draw
text: Discover a spell. This costs Health instead of Mana.
flavor: Comes with some moonberry juice so you don't pass out.

name: Cryofrozen Champion
text: Deathrattle: Get a random Legendary minion. Reduce its Cost by (1).
flavor: If you keep making that face it's going to freeze like that.

name: Liferender
text: Battlecry: If your hero's Health changed this turn, deal 6 damage to an enemy minion.
flavor: Redirect your pain into a healthier outlet: your opponent.
targeting_arrow_text: Deal 6 damage to an enemy minion.

name: Forgotten Millennium
text:
Fill your hand with random Undead.
They cost Health instead of Mana this turn.
flavor: We don't talk about it.

name: Memoriam Manifest
text: Summon the highest Cost friendly Undead that died this game.
flavor: "Just let me die already!"

name: Chronochiller
text: You no longer draw a card at the start of your turn.
flavor: Time always seems to pass quickly when you just want to chill.

name: Husk, Eternal Reaper
text: [x]Battlecry: Give your hero "Deathrattle: Spend up to 20 Corpses to resurrect with that much Health."
flavor: It is to Husk's eternal amusement that the second life is often wasted.

name: Talanji of the Graves
text: [x]Fabled. Battlecry: Draw Bwonsamdi (or resurrect him if he has died). Choose a Boon to give him.
flavor: In one dark timeline, Talanji was struck down and raised again as a death knight. But even death can't stop her from protecting the Zandalari.

name: Untimely Death
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies the turn after being played, resummon it.
flavor: The hourglass gets one every year....

name: Chronological Aura
text: At the end of your turn, summon a 3/5 Dragon with Taunt. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: We need to find the missing dragon link!

name: Waveshaping
text: Discover a card from your deck. The others get put on the bottom.
flavor: I wave in squares.

name: Ebb and Flow
text:
Deal $3 damage.
If you played a minion while holding this,
gain 5 Armor.
flavor: Go with the Ebb.

name: Endangered Dodo
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you have 10 or less Health, gain +5/+5 and    summon a copy of this.
flavor: The reports of my imminent demise have been greatly exagger-

name: Highborne Mentor
text: [x]Battlecry: Get a 2/2 Pupil. Discover a spell that costs (7) or more from the past to teach it.
flavor: Always gives pop quizzes about the most obscure subjects.

name: Krona, Keeper of Eons
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Set the Costs of the bottom 5 cards of your deck to (1).
flavor: We spent an eon deciding what flavor text to put here.

name: The Fins Beyond Time
text: [x]Battlecry: Replace your hand with your starting hand. Swap back at the end of your turn.
flavor: Cards? Where we're going we don't need cards.

name: Alternate Reality
text: [x]Replace your hand and deck with random Choose One cards from the past. They cost (1) less.
flavor: I reject your reality and substitute my own!

name: Troubled Double
text: Stealth Combo: Summon a copy of this.
flavor:
"Concede now!"
"Or prepare to fight!"

name: Flashback
text: Summon two random 1-Cost minions from the past. Combo: With +1 Attack.
flavor: Brings me back. To the card I played right before this.

name: Dethrone
text: Destroy a minion. Combo: Summon a random 8-Cost minion.
flavor: and decrown are mine!

name: Time Adm'ral Hooktail
text: Battlecry: Summon a 0/8 Chest for your opponent. It's FULL of Coins!
flavor: A pirate dragon's favorite workout? Treasure chest day.

name: Chrono-Lord Epoch
text: Battlecry: Destroy all minions that your opponent played last turn.
flavor: Epoch? But he's Legendary!

name: For Glory!
text:
Draw 2 cards. Costs
(1) less for each minion your opponent controls.
flavor: It turns out they WERE entertained.

name: Slow Motion
text: Your opponent's cards cost (1) more next turn.
flavor: You are now playing in Tortollan Mode.

name: Soldier of the Bronze
text: Taunt Battlecry: Double this minion's Health.
flavor: This is what a century of bronzer does to you.

name: Kaldorei Cultivator
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover 2 Beasts. Put them on the bottom of your deck with +5/+5.
flavor: It's a bad sign when they float to the top of your deck.

name: Precursory Strike
text:
Deal $3 damage.
If you're holding a minion that costs (5) or more, draw a minion.
flavor: Three Precursory Strikes and you're out before you even get to the plate.

name: Fast Forward
text:
Draw 2 cards.
Pick one to have its Cost reduced by (2).
flavor: x2, x4, x8, x16, NO WAIT GO BACK!!

name: Past Silvermoon
text: [x]Deal 5 damage to a random enemy minion. Advance to the present!
flavor: For nearly seven thousand years, Silvermoon stood unblemished as the crown jewel of Quel'Thalas. But that was before the Lich King came.

name: Lo'Gosh, Blood Fighter
text: [x]Fabled, Rush. Deathrattle: Summon a Blood Fighter from your hand. It gains +5/+5 and attacks a random enemy.
flavor: In the Crimson Ring they call him Lo'gosh, the Ghost Wolf. He's forgotten the time when he was called by another name: Varian Wrynn, King of Stormwind.

name: Azure Queen Sindragosa
text: [x]Fabled If you control another Dragon, your Arcane spells cost (2) less.
flavor: Once Malygos' beloved mate, Sindragosa was among the first to suspect the corruption that had overtaken Neltharion. She came to regret not trusting her suspicions.

name: Arcane Barrage
text: Deal $3 damage to an enemy and $2 damage to two other random ones.
flavor: Arrrrrr I got me cane and I'm gonna barrage you with it!

name: Algeth'ar Instructor
text: Spell Damage +2
flavor: For my first lesson, spell "damage."

name: Alter Time
text: Discover two Arcane spells from the past. They cost (2) less.
flavor: Spells from the past and future are adjusted for inflation.

name: Temporal Construct
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to an enemy minion. Draw cards equal to the excess damage.
flavor: Time is a construct. Here it is.
targeting_arrow_text: Deal 5 damage to an enemy minion.

name: Anomalize
text:
Summon a random
10 and 1-Cost minion. Scramble their stats.
flavor: Only nominally anomalous.

name: Faceless Enigma
text: [x]Battlecry: Look at 2 random Secrets. Pick one to cast for yourself. The other casts for your opponent.
flavor: I only share secrets with my most intimate friends and enemies.

name: Timelooper Toki
text: [x]Battlecry: Get 4 random spells from the past. When you play ALL 4, get another Timelooper Toki.
flavor: Well this loop's a wash. Let's meditate until the next one.

name: Gladiatorial Combat
text: [x]Summon a random minion from your deck. Summon a 5/5 Tiger with Stealth for your opponent.
flavor: I could win this fight with one head tied behind my back!

name: Heir of Hereafter
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Gain +2/+2 for each damaged minion.
flavor: Heir today, heregone tomorrow.

name: Undefeated Champion
text: [x]Rush. Battlecry: Fill your opponent's board with   random 1-Cost minions.
flavor: Like ripe tomatoes, a temporary title at best.

name: Unleash the Crocolisks
text:
Gain 10 Armor.
Summon two 2/3 Beasts for your opponent.
flavor: Spare me your crocolisk tears.

name: Garona Halforcen
text: [x]Fabled. Battlecry: If your opponent is holding King Llane, destroy him and cut their Health in half.
flavor: Garona made her mark that day. No longer was she simply the assassin of the Horde. She was now the liberator of the dictatorship of Lordaeron.

name: Shapeshifter
text:
[x]Each turn this is in your
hand, transform into a
random minion in your
opponent's hand.
flavor: Square! Circle! Rhombus!

name: Medivh the Hallowed
text: [x]Fabled. Costs (0) if you control Karazhan. Battlecry: Silence and destroy all other minions.
flavor: In our timeline, Medivh tells himself he never had the chance to reject Sargeras' dark influence. But there's a timeline where he did.

name: Welcome Home!
text: Reopen a location. Give it "Deathrattle: Summon a random 3-Cost minion."
flavor: Kick off your boots, light the hearth, and deal a fresh hand!
how_to_earn: Earnable by participating in a special event.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable by participating in a special event.

name: Runi, Temporal Guardian
text: [x]Battlecry: Send all minions in your hand 2 turns into the future. They return with +5/+5.
flavor: In her timeline, Runi stood as the last living Paladin and assumed the mantle of Temporal Guardian. Blessed by Mi'da, she now commands the power to guide the threads of fate, placing them precisely where and when they are needed.
how_to_earn: Earnable in The Rafaams of Winter Veil special event.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable in The Rafaams of Winter Veil special event.

name: Elise the Navigator
text: Battlecry: If your deck started with 10 cards of different Costs, craft a custom location.
flavor: "I've seen that stump before. We must be getting close!"

name: Undercover Cultist
text: Taunt, Reborn Has +3 Attack while damaged.
flavor: Don't be suspicious, don't be suspicious.

name: Torga
text: Battlecry: Draw a Kindred card and another card that activates it.
flavor: Torga was killed, eaten, used to summon the undead and then used as a loudspeaker for spirits. But at least he's got a hell of a story to tell.

name: Endbringer Umbra
text: [x]Battlecry: Trigger the Deathrattles of 5 friendly minions that died this game.
flavor: After many years of exile, Umbra is so close to returning to her city. When she arrives, she will make sure the Tortollans get what they deserve...
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a The Lost City of Un'Goro card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the The Lost City of Un'Goro Tavern Pass.

name: Stormbrewer
text: Whenever this attacks, deal 3 damage to the target first. Kindred: Gain Rush.
flavor: It was a dark and stormy Elemental...
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on The Lost City of Un'Goro Reward Track.

name: Relic Miner
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy the top card of your deck. Discover a card of the same Rarity.
flavor: "I struck gold! NOOOOOOOO!"

name: City Chief Esho
text: [x]Battlecry: If every minion in your deck shares a minion type, give your other minions +2/+2 (wherever they are).
flavor: "Let me esho you around!"
how_to_earn: Earnable on The Lost City of Un'Goro Reward Track.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the The Lost City of Un'Goro Tavern Pass.

name: Windswept Pageturner
text:
[x]After you summon an
Elemental, deal 3 damage
to a random enemy.
flavor: This story will blow you away.

name: Sizzling Swarm
text:
Deal $3 damage.
Summon that many 2/1 Sizzling Cinders.
flavor: Can someone open a window? It's a little swarm in here!

name: Flight of the Firehawk
text: Draw two minions of different minion types. Give them +2/+2.
flavor: Also the name of a famous Tortollan orchestral arrangement.

name: Volcanic Thrasher
text: Battlecry: Draw a Fire spell. Kindred: Give it Spell Damage +2.
flavor: Very friendly, but be careful when it asks to play fetch.

name: Mechanized Magma
text:
Whenever you play a
Fire spell, gain stats
equal to its Cost.
flavor: Its volcanic strength powers its mechanical arm... and also its normal arm.

name: Cinderfin
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 2/1 Sizzling Cinder.
flavor:
"Don't play with fire."
"But they're my friends!"

name: Conjured Bookkeeper
text: Deathrattle: Draw a spell. Kindred: Summon a copy of this.
flavor: In charge of cleaning up after the Library Rager.

name: Lava Flow
text: Deal $2 damage to the lowest Health enemy, three times. Overload: (1)
flavor: The lava must flow.

name: Bralma Searstone
text:
Your Elementals deal
1 extra damage.
flavor: She makes a mean molten lava cake.

name: Spirit of the Mountain
text: Quest: Play 6 minions of unique types. Reward: Ashalon.
flavor: Day 10. A Tortollan named Bralma took Niri, Elise, and I deep into the mountain. She showed us how the Tortollans move lava up from the base of the volcano through a system of “lavaqueducts.” I was shocked to find a pack of Volcanosaurs living there!

name: TREEEES!!!
text: Choose a minion. Summon four 2/2 Treants that attack it.
flavor: Photo synth THIS, fool!

name: Story of Barnabus
text:
Draw a minion.
If it has 5 or more Attack, give it +5 Health and gain 5 Armor.
flavor: "Once there was a giant dinosaur. He was so giant that everyone died. The end."

name: Ravenous Flock
text: At the start of your next turn, summon three 2/1 Hatchlings.
flavor: It's a flock of screamgulls!

name: Hatchery Helper
text: [x]Battlecry: Give your other minions with 2 or less Attack +1/+2 and Taunt.
flavor: Yeah, painting patterns on the eggs is SUPER helpful J'an.

name: Eternal Bloodpetal
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 0/1 Eternal Seedling.
flavor: The crab grass of Un'Goro.

name: Life Cycle
text:
Destroy a minion. Summon a random minion of the same
Cost to replace it.
flavor: It's the cyyyyyycle of liiiiiife.

name: Hybridization
text: Draw a 1, 2, 3, and 4-Cost minion. Kindred: They cost (1) less.
flavor: You take the blue flower -- the story ends, you wake up in the inn and believe whatever you want to believe. You take the red flower -- you stay in Un'Goro, and I show you how deep the Gorishi tunnel goes.

name: Skyscreamer Eggs
text: Deathrattle: Summon four 2/1 Hatchlings.
flavor: Aaaaaaaaaaahmlette

name: Restore the Wild
text: Quest: Fill your board on 3 of your turns. Reward: The Everbloom.
flavor: Day 3. We happened upon a clearing filled with dangerous Bloodpetals. As I was noting our findings, the world went dark. My vision is perfect of course, but it appeared as though a large flying shape was blocking out the sun! Confounding indeed.

name: Tyrannogill
text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Summon three 2/1 Murlocs. Give them each a random Bonus Effect.
flavor: There's something fishy about that dinosaur...

name: Ido of the Threshfleet
text: [x]While this is alive, you get a 2-Cost Holy spell that gives a minion +2/+2 and Divine Shield.
flavor: Ido, therefore I am.

name: Ancient Stegodon
text: Battlecry: Choose to gain Taunt, Poisonous, or +1/+1.
flavor: I'm 30 years old.

name: Whirling Stormdrake
text: Rush, Windfury Kindred: Gain Immune this turn.
flavor: Summons storms. Breathes fire. But first, does a sick loop-de-loop.

name: Curious Explorer
text: [x]Deathrattle: Reduce the Cost of a minion in your  opponent's hand by (2).
flavor: "Wow, this flower's mouth is perfectly head-shaped."

name: Ancient Raptor
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose to gain +3 Attack, Divine Shield, or "Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Plants."
flavor: It prefers "Experienced."

name: Ancient Pterrordax
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose to gain Stealth until your next turn, Elusive, or Windfury.
flavor: What's that sound? He's a terrible conductor.

name: Primal Sabretooth
text: [x]Stealth After this attacks and kills a minion, get a copy of it.
flavor: 100 dino birds versus 1 sabretooth. Who would win?

name: Ultragigasaur
flavor: Ultrasaur for scale.

name: Sizzling Cinder
text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: "Hey, I'm sizzlin' here!"

name: Crater Gator
text: [x]Battlecry: Until the start of your next turn, the enemy hero can't be healed.
flavor: See ya later Crater Gator!

name: Primalfin Challenger
text: Battlecry: Your next Kindred triggers twice.
flavor: "MURGRGLGLLGLLRRRG!!!!!!" There were no survivors.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on The Lost City of Un'Goro Reward Track.

name: Dissolving Ooze
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion. Spit out the Bones of its Attack and Health into your hand.
flavor:
Ooze
Ooz
Oo
O
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a The Lost City of Un'Goro card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after opening a golden The Lost City of Un'Goro card pack.

name: Petrified Ogre
text: [x]Starts Dormant. While Dormant, gain +2/+2 at the start of your turn. (50% chance to awaken instead.)
flavor: First, he was afraid...

name: Tortollan Storyteller
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
give +1/+1 to each friendly
minion of a different type.
flavor: "And then a turtle made it to the water!"

name: Crystal Tender
text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Gain empty Mana Crystals until both players have the same Mana.
flavor: "Hands off my tendies!"

name: Marshland Thresher
text: After you cast a spell, gain Divine Shield.
flavor: "Just remember, when we pose for pictures, look very shadowy and grainy."

name: Loh, the Living Legend
text: Battlecry: Your minions cost (5) this game.
flavor: Pretty spry for a 4217 year old.

name: Relic of Kings
text: Discover a spell from any class that costs (8) or more. It costs (1).
flavor: "Whoa, found a big plate!"

name: Story of the Waygate
text:
[x]Reduce the Cost of cards
in your hand that didn't
start in your deck by (1).
flavor: "...and then a lot of people got mad."

name: Storage Scuffle
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Costs (0) if you've Discovered this turn.
flavor:
Flip and file!
Mix and shuffle!
Sort and swap!
Do the Storage Scuffle!

name: Pterrorwing Ravager
text: Rush Kindred: Costs (2) less.
flavor: Turns out most things are skyscreamers if you drop them from high enough.

name: Bonechill Stegodon
text: Deathrattle: Deal 6 damage to three random enemies.
flavor: Cold blooded. Bad to the bone. Needs a sweater.

name: Dive the Golakka Depths
text: Repeatable Quest: Summon 6 Murlocs. Reward: Murlocs you summon gain +1/+1.
flavor: Day 5. Elise had a hunch that the Lost City may be hidden deep beneath the Golakka Hot Springs. Niri swam down and discovered a beautiful cavern! The Murlocs may not be hiding an entrance to the city, but it seems they do have a few secrets.

name: Rockskipper
text: Battlecry: Get a 1-Cost Rock that deals $3 damage.
flavor: Don't step on a stream or you'll break your mama's spleen.

name: Hot Spring Glider
text: Battlecry: Your next Murloc costs (1) less. Kindred: And gains Divine Shield.
flavor: It's an important survival instinct to keep a low profile in Un'Goro Crater. Gargl will not survive long.

name: Steamfin Thief
text: Kindred: Summon two 1/1 Murlocs with Rush.
flavor: Dial M for Murlocs.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on The Lost City of Un'Goro Reward Track.

name: Creature of the Sacred Cave
text: [x]At the end of your turn, recast a random Holy spell you cast this turn (targets this if possible).
flavor: Really likes being read to.

name: Dread Raptor
text: Battlecry: Draw a Deathrattle minion that costs (3) or less. Kindred: It costs (0).
flavor: "I AM THE CLAW!"

name: Reanimate the Terror
text: [x]Quest: Spend 15 Corpses. Reward: Tyrax, Bone Terror.
flavor: Day 11. We’ve been betrayed! Umbra has been meeting secretly with the Cult of the Damned to plan a coup. She and High Cultist Herenn used shadow magic to raise an undead dinosaur army! Tortolla preserve us, the fate of the Lost City rests in our hands.

name: Paleomancy
text: Discover an Undead. Spend 5 Corpses to keep all 3 instead.
flavor: Death finds a way.

name: Crypt Map
text: Discover a Frost Rune card. If you play it this turn, also pick one of the others.
flavor: Solving a maze is easy. Just hug the left wall and don't get eaten by dinosaurs!

name: Reanimated Pterrordax
text: Rush, Lifesteal Costs Corpses instead of Mana.
flavor: Ptruly pterrifying.

name: Violet Treasuregill
text: [x]Battlecry: Cast a random spell from your deck that costs (2) or less (targets this if possible).
flavor: His brother Violent was banned from the colony.

name: Wave of Tar
text:
Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions. Enemy minions cost
(2) more next turn.
flavor: "Watch out for my WAVE OF TAR!!! Just... stand still for a minute."

name: Cryosleep
text: Deal $4 damage and draw a card. Kindred: Draw another.
flavor: You mad? Cryobout it.

name: Ready the Fleet
text: Give +1/+2 to a friendly minion and your other minions that share a type with it.
flavor: The Fleet is on fleek.

name: Submerged Map
text: [x]Discover a Murloc. If you play it this turn, also pick one of the others.
flavor: Sure, it leads straight to Latorvia. How long can you hold your breath?

name: Reluctant Wrangler
text: [x]Reborn Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Undead Beast with Taunt.
flavor: "It's not that I never wanted a pet. I didn't want THIS pet."

name: Story of Galvadon
text: Give a minion three random Bonus Effects.
flavor: "...so I gave him +12 Attack and Windfury -- and you won't believe this -- he LIVED."

name: Escape the Underfel
text: Quest: Play 6 Temporary cards. Reward: Underfel Rift.
flavor: Day 7. A terrible day! The ground opened beneath us, and we fell head over shell into an accursed rift! Fel choked my keen senses, and demonic beasts emerged from the fog. Thank goodness Umbra was able to use her magic to ward them off while we escaped.

name: Caustic Fumes
text: Destroy an enemy minion. Kindred: Deal $2 damage to all minions.
flavor: If the fumes don't get them, the fumes might.

name: Bloodpetal Biome
text: Discover a Temporary 1-Cost minion.
flavor: The rash doesn't FEEL temporary.

name: Spelunker
text: Battlecry: Your next Temporary card costs (2) less.
flavor: Echo... echo... repeatable this turn...

name: Cursed Catacombs
text: Discover another card from your deck. Make it Temporary.
flavor: The minion is now permanently cursed. Temporarily.

name: Titanographer Osk
text: Gains a random Titan ability in your hand that changes each turn.
flavor: Look at this Titangraph.

name: Scalehide Kodo
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy the lowest Attack enemy minion. Kindred: The highest Attack instead.
flavor: Little Eeep and his pal Stomp are off to see the wonders of Un'Goro. First stop, Underfel!

name: The Forbidden Sequence
text: [x]Quest: Discover 7 cards. Reward: The Origin Stone.
flavor: Day 9. We were not welcomed with open arms, but with spears! Fortunately, Chief Esho took pity on us and called off the guards. Learning of Elise's expertise, a Titanographer whisked her away to the library. Umbra disappeared in the twisting streets...

name: Scrappy Scavenger
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a card with Cost equal to your remaining Mana Crystals.
flavor: "One second, I'm stashing this Ultragigasaur in my little satchel."

name: Unearthed Artifacts
text: [x]Summon a random 2-Cost minion. If you've Discovered this turn, summon a random 4-Cost minion instead.
flavor: The Tortollans live so long they're unearthing their OWN artifacts!

name: Razidir
text: [x]Battlecry: Discard a random card from your hand. Kindred: Your opponent's hand instead.
flavor: Be prepaaaaaaaaared! (by playing a Demon or Beast the previous turn.)

name: Mountain Map
text: [x]Discover a minion with a type you haven't played. If you play it this turn, also pick one of the others.
flavor: See that part at the top? That's the top.

name: Stranglevine
text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion a random Bonus Effect and this Deathrattle.
flavor: "Wow, this human's head is perfectly mouth-shaped."
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on The Lost City of Un'Goro Reward Track.

name: Story of Lakkari
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
discard a card and fill
your board with 3/2 Imps.
Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: Wow, the Tortollans really embellish these stories.

name: Whispering Stone
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Get 2 random Fel spells. They cost Health instead of Mana.

name: Blob of Tar
text: [x]Poisonous, Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 1/2 Blob with Poisonous and a 1/2 Blob with Taunt.
flavor: A tar is born.
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a The Lost City of Un'Goro card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after opening a golden The Lost City of Un'Goro card pack.

name: Tunnel Terror
text: Deathrattle: Get two random Temporary 2-Cost minions.
flavor: And a tiny soul patch to match.

name: Threshrider's Blessing
text: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 and "Deathrattle: Summon a random 4-Cost minion."
flavor: #Blessed

name: Axe of the Forefathers
text: After your hero attacks, deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavor: ...and the axe of the beforefathers before the forefathers before him.

name: Deathrot Maw
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a random Fel Beast.
flavor: Oh, don't worry, Deathy doesn't bite.

name: Krog, Crater King
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
set the Attack and Health of
all enemy minions to 1.
flavor: Who died and made him King of anything?

name: Slagclaw
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 2/1 Sizzling Cinders. Kindred: Trigger your Sizzling Cinders' Deathrattles.
flavor: You can't just have the sizzle, you gotta have the cinders.

name: Vault Breaker
text: After you Discover a card, reduce its Cost by (1).
flavor: I've already told him 3 times to PUSH.

name: Lie in Wait
text: [x]Quest: Shuffle cards into your deck, 5 times. Reward: Master Dusk.
flavor: Day 2. Our first night in the Crater was a tad rough on this old shell. I can’t shake the feeling that we’re being watched. I swear I saw a glint of shining silver in the dark. I was going to ask Umbra about it at breakfast, but she never turned up.

name: Merchant of Legend
text: Battlecry: Discover a Legendary minion. Shuffle the other two into your deck.
flavor: "Tortollan has knives if you have coin."

name: Cultist Map
text: Discover a card from your deck. If you play it this turn, also pick one of the others.
flavor: Are the Shrouded Shells actually great trackers, or are the Cult of the Damned just REALLY bad about leaving secret maps lying around?

name: Neferset Weaponsmith
text: [x]Battlecry: Get a random weapon from another class. Combo: Give it +2 Attack.
flavor: Neferset your drink on the table without a coaster.

name: Knockback
text: [x]Deal $1 damage to a minion (improved for each time you've shuffled cards into your deck).
flavor: Every day he's scufflin'

name: Interrogation
text: Shuffle three 3/3 Ninjas with Stealth into your deck that are Summoned When Drawn.
flavor: "Spill the tea or I'll end your entire career, sis."

name: Ambush Predators
text: Summon a 1/1 Spitter with Stealth and Poisonous. Kindred: Do it again.
flavor: Ah, no wonder YOU'RE extinct.

name: Underbrush Tracker
text: [x]Rush Costs (1) less for each time you've shuffled cards into your deck.
flavor: An expert at tracking the elusive Adaptive Amalgam.

name: Eyes in the Sky
text: [x]Battlecry: Look at 3 cards in your enemy's deck. Pick one to put on top.
flavor: "I got eyes on Umbra's unstoppable undead army. I'll uh... stay wayyy up here."

name: Opu the Unseen
text: Stealth. Battlecry, Combo, and Deathrattle: Cast 'Fan of Knives'.
flavor: This is allegedly what Opu looks like. We will confirm if we ever see him.

name: Windpeak Wyrm
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 5 damage and gain 5 Armor. Kindred: Costs (3) less.
flavor: He's so anxious. Always winds up in knots.

name: Shellnado
text: Spend up to 5 Armor. For each spent, deal $1 damage to all minions.
flavor: Spin to win!

name: Enter the Lost City
text: [x]Quest: Survive 10 turns. Reward: Latorvius, Gaze of the City.
flavor: Day 8. We’ve done it! As night fell, we came upon a brilliantly glowing tunnel guarded by two slumbering Tol’vir. With silent footsteps, we walked through and emerged into the heart of the Lost City! I’m sure my people will welcome us with open arms.

name: Platysaur
text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Deathrattle: Discard it.
flavor: "Yup yup yup!"
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on The Lost City of Un'Goro Reward Track.

name: Tar Tyrant
text: [x]Taunt, Lifesteal Has +6 Attack during your opponent's turn.
flavor: Why would they put a waterfall here if there wasn't something cool behind it?

name: Latorvian Armorer
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to an enemy minion. If it dies, gain 5 Armor.
flavor: All it needs now is a nice coat of blue paint!
targeting_arrow_text: Deal 2 damage to an enemy minion.

name: Fortify
text:
[x]Gain 3 Armor.
Deal damage equal
to your Armor to an
enemy minion.
flavor: With vitamins and minerals!

name: Willful Watcher
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Destroy the  top 3 cards of your deck.
flavor: I still don't know why he has a sword. Despite being in many battles, he really just watches.

name: City Defenses
text: Summon two 0/6 Security with Taunt. They gain +1 Attack when damaged.
flavor: These 0/6 Taunts have kept invaders out for centuries.

name: Stonecarver
text: At the end of your turn, give a random friendly damaged minion +2/+2.
flavor:
*clink*
*clink*
*clink*
*"D'oh!"

name: Nablya, the Watcher
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon copies of your damaged minions. Give the copies Rush.
flavor: Of course the Titans trust the Tortollans to take care of Un'Goro Crater. Nablya is just there as insurance.

name: Gorishi Wasp
text: Rush. Whenever this takes damage, get a 1-Cost Gorishi Stinger.
flavor: This card is the wasp's elbows!

name: Unleash the Colossus
text: Quest: Deal exactly 2 damage to an enemy on your turn, 12 times. Reward: Gorishi Colossus.
flavor: Day 4. I am dismayed to report that we thought we'd found a hidden entrance to the Lost City, but in fact it was a Silithid Hive! We high-tailed it out of there faster than a goblin wearing rocket boots. I am not terribly fond of bugs.

name: Story of Sulfuras
text:
[x]Swap your Hero Power
to "Deal 8 damage
to a random enemy."
After 2 uses, swap back.
flavor: "...and there were seven minions on board, and it STILL hit the enemy hero!"

name: Bugsquasher
text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage to an enemy minion with a minion type.
flavor: The Tortollans would be nothing without their QA department.
targeting_arrow_text: Deal 6 damage to an enemy with a minion type.

name: High Cultist Herenn
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two Deathrattle minions from your deck. They fight!
flavor: "Hello." - Cultist Herenn

name: Archaios
text:
[x]Whenever another
friendly minion attacks,
set its Health equal to
this minion's Health.
flavor: She's a health influencer.

name: Twilight Mender
text: Deathrattle: Get a random Holy and Shadow spell.
flavor: The Gravedawn Glade is FULL of indecisive Priests.

name: Gravedawn Voidbulb
text: Summon a random 4-Cost minion and give it Taunt. Kindred: Do it again.
flavor: How many Gravedawns does it take to screw in a Voidbulb?

name: Gravedawn Sunbloom
text: Draw 2 cards. Kindred: This costs (2) less.
flavor: So holy it photosynthesizes itself!

name: Reach Equilibrium
text: [x]Quest: Cast 4 Holy spells Reward: Life's Breath. Quest: Cast 4 Shadow spells. Reward: Death's Touch.
flavor: Day 6. Today we found ourselves in a glade tormented by conflicting Holy and Shadow magic. At its center were two enormous Elementals, like opposite sides of the same coin. I hope one day we'll return here to see this broken place restored to peace.

name: Resuscitate
text: Resurrect a 1, 2, and 3-Cost minion. Give them Reborn.
flavor: This mud bath really does make you feel reborn.

name: Gladesong Siren
text: Lifesteal Costs (1) if you've played a Holy and Shadow spell this turn.
flavor: When she shifts into minor key she really throws the void-holy balance out of whack.

name: Glade Ecologist
text: [x]Deathrattle: Get a 1-Cost Holy spell that gives a minion +2 or -2 Health.
flavor: The dude minored in Underfel Biology. Now that's a renaissance Tortollan!

name: Wilted Shadow
text: [x]Lifesteal Whenever you heal an enemy, this attacks it.
flavor: The shadow shall burn you!

name: Dinositter
text:
[x]At the end of your
turn, reduce the Cost
of a random Beast in
your hand by (1).
flavor: "You aren't leaving this log until you finish your greens."

name: Cower in Fear
text:
Deal $3 damage
to a minion. The next
Beast you play this
turn costs (2) less.
flavor: Mother Duck's fourth duckling got lost in Un'Goro Crater.

name: Odd Map
text: [x]Discover an odd-Attack Beast. If you play it this turn, also pick one of the others.
flavor: I don't EVEN know where this goes!

name: Ravasaur Matriarch
text: [x]Kindred: Deal damage to an enemy minion equal to this minion's Attack.
flavor: The female Ravasaur is 30% larger than the male. And 100% more aggressive.
targeting_arrow_text: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack.

name: Story of Carnassa
text: Shuffle ten 1-Cost 3/2 Raptors into your deck with "Battlecry: Draw a card."
flavor: "... and ALL TEN Raptors were at the top of the deck!"

name: Grazing Stegodon
text: At the end of your turn, gain +1 Attack (even while in hand or deck).
flavor: He's a growing boy. :)

name: Supreme Dinomancy
text: Give +2/+2 to all Beasts in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavor: Not anyone can be a great dinomancer. But a great dinomancer can come from anywhere.

name: Ravenous Devilsaur
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Kindred: Gain its stats.
flavor: You're not you when you're ravenous.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the The Lost City of Un'Goro Tavern Pass.

name: The Food Chain
text: Quest: Play a 1, 3, 5, and 7-Attack Beast. Reward: Shokk.
flavor: Day 1. The search begins! I joined Elise Starseeker at the outskirts of the Crater, as well as a Tortollan named Umbra and a most curious gnome named Niri. Embarking into the jungle, we stumbled upon the largest tracks I’ve ever laid eyes on!

name: Pterrordax Egg
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Pterrordax that steals 1 Health from all other minions.
flavor: When you crack this egg, it cracks you right back.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on The Lost City of Un'Goro Reward Track.

name: Insect Claw
text: After your hero attacks, summon a 2/1 Grub with Rush.
flavor: Get your grubby claws off me!

name: Story of Amara
text:
Set your hero's
Health to 40.
flavor: "Once upon a time... ok how about we just skip to the end?"

name: Niri of the Crater
text:
[x]Whenever you play a 1-Cost
minion, double its stats.
Whenever you cast a 1-Cost
spell, cast it twice.
flavor: Niri, Niri, Niri of the Crater, strong as they can be! HAAAAAEEHOOOOHEHOOOEAAAAAAAA!!!! Watch out for that tree!

name: Gorishi Tunneler
text: Stealth After this attacks, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor:
"This card is really boring."
"Nah, I really dig this card."

name: Entomologist Toru
text: [x]Battlecry: Put each minion in your hand into 0/1 Jars  that cost (1). Break them   to release the minions!
flavor: The lid. The lid. The lid. The lid. The lid. The lid.

name: Cloud Serpent
text: [x]Battlecry: Get a copy of another Elemental or Dragon in your hand.
flavor: Cloudy with a chance of Quest Rewards.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on The Lost City of Un'Goro Reward Track.

name: Hive Map
text: [x]Discover a Fel spell. If you play it this turn, also pick one of the others.
flavor: The perfect map of where to never ever ever ever ever go.

name: Fumigate
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion and all others of the same minion type.
flavor: Stink bomb go!

name: Infestation
text: [x]Get two 1-Cost Gorishi Stingers. Each one deals $2 damage and summons a 2/1 Grub with Rush.
flavor: NOT THE WASPS!

name: Silithid Queen
text: Rush Kindred: Give your hero +5 Attack this turn.
flavor: Yaaaaaaass Silithid Queen, stiiiing.

name: Questing Assistant
text: [x]Battlecry: If you played a Quest this game, deal 3 damage to an enemy minion.
flavor: Forget the Quest. Our new Quest is to make sure no harm ever comes to him.
targeting_arrow_text: Deal 3 damage to an enemy minion.

name: Storm the Gates
text: [x]Sidequest: Play 3 Beasts or Undead. Reward: Craft a custom Zombeast. It costs (3) less.
flavor: Have fun storming the Lost City!
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a The Lost City of Un'Goro card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after opening a golden The Lost City of Un'Goro card pack.

name: Staff of the Endbringer
text: Deathrattle: Destroy all minions.
flavor: Finally, the loot I wanted off the boss! Too bad I'm on an alt...
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a Lost City of Un'Goro card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after opening a golden Lost City of Un'Goro card pack.

name: Tar Slime
text: Taunt Has +2 Attack during your opponent's turn.
flavor: Too cute to be contained!

name: Scarab Keychain
text: Battlecry: Discover a 2-Cost card.
flavor: "How do you keep losing your keys!? They couldn't have just gotten up and walked away!"

name: Spirit of the Team
text: Stealth for 1 turn. Your hero has +2 Attack on your turn.
flavor: Horrible call! BOOOOoo00oO0o0OO0oo0oO!

name: Hidden Objects
text: Discover a Secret. Set its Cost to (1).
flavor: There are 99 gnomes in this picture. Can YOU find them all?

name: Incredible Value
text: Discover a 4-Cost minion. Set its Attack and Health to 7.
flavor: Now with expedited Overload!

name: Card Grader
text: Battlecry: If you've cast a spell while holding this, Discover a card from your deck.
flavor: "Uncentered gem, fractured frame, folded corner... 10/10!"

name: Gnomelia, S.A.F.E. Pilot
text: [x]Rush. Also damages minions next to whomever this attacks. Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
flavor: Never learned how to L.A.N.D.

name: Night Elf Huntress
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to three different enemies. (You pick the targets!)
flavor: A triple threat, all on her own.

name: Footman
text: Taunt Adjacent minions are Immune while attacking.
flavor: Ha ha HAAAH huHAH!

name: Warsong Grunt
text: Rush. After this attacks and kills a minion, it may attack again.
flavor: Where do you think the chickens learned to be angry?

name: Sweetened Snowflurry
text: [x]Miniaturize Battlecry: Get 2 random Temporary Frost spells.
flavor: "You want a piece of me!? Will that be one scoop or two?"

name: Nostalgic Gnome
text: [x]Miniaturize Rush. After this minion deals exact lethal damage on your turn, draw a card.
flavor: She remembers Alterac Valley like it was 833 days ago.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Whizbang's Workshop Reward Track.

name: Zilliax Deluxe 3000
text:
While building your deck,
customize your very own
Zilliax Deluxe 3000!
flavor: It only took us 2998 prototypes to figure out how to make the perfect card... by having YOU do it!

name: Nostalgic Initiate
text: Miniaturize The first time you cast a spell, gain +2/+2.
flavor:
Nostalgic Initiate: "Man I wish I could relive my college days..."
Kel'thuzad: "Say no more."
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Whizbang's Workshop Reward Track.

name: Nostalgic Clown
text: [x]Miniaturize Battlecry: If you've played a higher Cost card while holding this, deal 4 damage.
flavor: He used to be kind of corrupt, but now he performs purely for the fun of it.

name: Painted Canvasaur
text: Battlecry: Give each other friendly Beast a random Bonus Effect.
flavor: Oh this is a present? Would you like that gift raptor not?

name: Mystery Egg
text: [x]Miniaturize Deathrattle: Get a copy of a random Beast in your deck. It costs (3) less.
flavor: Which came first, the Mukla or the egg?

name: Fetch!
text: Draw a minion. If it's a Beast, draw a spell.
flavor: We made fetch happen.

name: Patchwork Pals
text:
Get all 3 Animal Companions. They
cost (1) less.
flavor: "I'll name you Misha, you Huffer, and you can be the third one."

name: R.C. Rampage
text: Summon six 1/1 Hounds. Any that can't fit give the others +1/+1.
flavor: This place has really gone to the dogs.

name: Hemet, Foam Marksman
text: After a friendly Beast dies, get a random Legendary Beast from the past. It costs (2) less.
flavor: So THIS is who's been lowering the power level of all those Hearthstone cards in a foamly fashion.

name: Toyrannosaurus
text: Rush Deathrattle: Deal 7 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: This toy WRECKS.

name: King Plush
text: [x]Battlecry: If your opponent has 15 or less health, return all other minions to their owner's decks and gain Charge.
flavor: He's so fluffy you're gonna DIE!

name: Remote Control
text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Hound.
flavor: For some reason, my dog keeps trying to eat this.

name: Jungle Gym
text:
[x]Deal 1 damage to a
random enemy. Repeat
for each friendly Beast.
flavor: Yeah, I work out at the gym. The one with all the plushies and toys.

name: Triplewick Trickster
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy, three times.
flavor: You no take candle! Or second candle. You can take third candle though.

name: Manufacturing Error
text: Draw 3 cards. If your deck has no minions, they cost (3) less.
flavor: You thought the 9-piece puzzle would be easy, didn't you?

name: Yogg in the Box
text: Cast 5 random spells. If your deck has no minions, the spells cast cost (5) or more.
flavor: POP! Goes the Old God!

name: Puzzlemaster Khadgar
text: [x]Battlecry: Equip a 0/6 Wisdomball that casts helpful Mage spells!
flavor: Khadgar Khadgar in the ball, who is the smartest white-haired, tall, handsome mage of them all?

name: Spot the Difference
text: Discover a 3-Cost minion to summon. If your deck has no minions, repeat this.
flavor: Ah, I see now! One of them is a picture of a Chillwind Yeti, and the other is a Blood Elf.

name: Sleet Skater
text: Miniaturize Battlecry: Freeze an enemy minion. Gain Armor equal to its Attack.
flavor: How do you do, fellow Ice Elementals?

name: Watercolor Artist
text: Battlecry: Draw a Frost spell. At the start of your turns, reduce its Cost by (1).
flavor: They've amassed a largely aquatic body of work, painting lakes, rivers and self portraits.

name: Frost Lich Cross-Stitch
text: Deal $3 damage to a character. If it dies, summon a 3/6 Water Elemental that Freezes.
flavor: Do not fear power... Fear those who SEW IT!

name: The Galactic Projection Orb
text: Recast a random spell of each Cost you've cast this game (targets enemies if possible).
flavor: Look closely in the ball and you'll see the expansion of space and time itself. Or their projections, anyway.

name: Clay Matriarch
text: [x]Miniaturize Taunt. Deathrattle: Summon a 4/4 Whelp with Elusive.
flavor: I hope you didn't need all that purple clay.

name: Papercraft Angel
text: Your Hero Power costs (0).
flavor: Warcraft. StarCraft. And now, Papercraft!

name: Careless Crafter
text: Deathrattle: Get two 0-Cost Bandages that restore 3 Health.
flavor: How about YOU try folding paper with only three fingers!?

name: Raza the Resealed
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle copies of 5 random friendly minions that died this game into your deck. They cost (0).
flavor: The 10th anniversary edition of a classic bestseller!

name: Purifying Power
text: Silence all friendly minions, then give them +1/+2.
flavor: I sure do love making my minions better!

name: Timewinder Zarimi
text: [x]Battlecry: Once per game, if you've played 8 other Dragons, take an extra turn.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: With how generous Whizbang's return policy is, Zarimi has never been busier.

name: Giftwrapped Whelp
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, give it and this minion +1/+1.
flavor: Don't forget to poke fire-breathing holes in the box!

name: Scale Replica
text: Draw your lowest and highest Cost Dragon.
flavor: Get it!?! It's because dragons have hides - commonly known as scales - and this is a model of a dragon on a smaller level, also known as a scale. IT'S THE SAME WORD!

name: Chalk Artist
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a minion. Transform it into a random  Legendary one (keeping its   original stats and Cost).
flavor: Well it's either a dragon or a dinosaur - chalk it up to art style.

name: Clearance Promoter
text: Deathrattle: Reduce the Cost of two spells in your hand by (1).
flavor: "Sorry, we just sold our last Worgen Greaser figure."

name: Caricature Artist
text: Battlecry: Draw a minion that costs (5) or more. Give it a funny mustache!
flavor: "Pfffft…. You look RIDICULOUS! And I haven't even drawn the mustache yet!"
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Whizbang's Workshop Reward Track.

name: Baking Soda Volcano
text: Lifesteal. Deal $10 damage randomly split among all minions. Overload: (1)
flavor: Science rules.

name: Shudderblock
text: [x]Miniaturize Battlecry: Your next Battlecry triggers 3 times, but can't  damage the enemy hero.
flavor: Beware the hinges that pinch, the scales that splinter!

name: Shining Sentinel
text: Taunt, Elusive Battlecry: Summon a copy of this.
flavor: OMG, I FINALLY GOT A SHINING SENTINEL AFTER 3 PHASES AND 8192 RESETS!!!!!

name: Hagatha the Fabled
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw 2 spells that cost (5) or more. Transform them into Slimes that cast the spells.
flavor: Soup's on!

name: Toy Boat
text: After you summon a Pirate, draw a card.
flavor: Try playing seven of these in one turn fast.

name: Once Upon a Time...
text:
Summon a random
3-Cost Beast, Dragon,
Elemental, and Murloc.
flavor: ...There was a humble little squirrel on a quest to defeat an evil dragon. With the help of its earthen friend, it saved the murloc princess from danger. The end.

name: Fairy Tale Forest
text: [x]Draw a Battlecry minion. It costs (1) less.
flavor: Man, I wish fairy tales were real, Durg'tash the Sorcerer.

name: Pop-Up Book
text: Deal $2 damage. Summon two 0/1 Frogs with Taunt.
flavor: What's up-book?

name: Wind-Up Musician
text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. (Trade to upgrade!)
flavor: Sure to wind up your opponents.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Whizbang's Workshop Reward Track.

name: Dig for Treasure
text: Draw a minion. If it's a Pirate, get a Coin.
flavor: "Woohoo! I'm so glad I dug up a pirate!"

name: Shoplifter Goldbeard
text:
[x]After you summon a
Pirate, summon a copy of
it that attacks a random
enemy, then dies.
flavor: "Arr, this plunder be great for Cap'n Fourteeth's baby shower!"

name: The Crystal Cove
text:
[x]The next minion you
summon this turn has
its stats set to 4/4.
flavor: For some strange reason, everyone that hangs out at the Crystal Cove has the same name...

name: Sand Art Elemental
text: [x]Miniaturize Battlecry: Give your hero +1 Attack and Windfury this turn.
flavor: This art HURT ME!!!

name: Thistle Tea Set
text: Discover a spell from another class. Get a copy of it.
flavor: Available with Swiftthistle or Decafthistle.

name: Sonya Waterdancer
text: After you play a 1-Cost minion, get a copy of it that costs (0).
flavor: Water you dancing to?

name: Bargain Bin Buccaneer
text: Rush Combo: Summon a copy of this.
flavor: Thrift stores have the best buccaneers.

name: Plucky Paintfin
text: [x]Poisonous Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion.
flavor: Not everyone can become a great painter. But a great painter can come from anywhere.

name: Treasure Distributor
text: After you summon a Pirate, give it +1 Attack.
flavor: As the illiterate pirates always say: There is no 'I' in 'piracy'.

name: Everything Must Go!
text: Summon two random 4-Cost minions. Costs (1) less for each card you've drawn this turn.
flavor: Go where??

name: Observer of Mysteries
text: Battlecry: Cast 2 random Secrets. At the start of your turn, destroy them.
flavor: Nobody tell him, but he still has his Secrets set to the "Try Me" mode.

name: Sandbox Scoundrel
text: [x]Miniaturize Battlecry: Your next card this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: "Really? A bunch of fake plastic gems AGAIN!?"

name: Watercannon
text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Pirate that attacks a random enemy.
flavor: There's a teeny tiny pirate trapped in each of the water balloons. Free them!

name: Game Master Nemsy
text: Battlecry: Draw a Demon. Deathrattle: Swap places with it.
flavor: "Rocks fall, and everyone dies. Oopsies!"

name: Malefic Rook
text: Battlecry: Attack YOUR hero.
flavor: Was a regular Pawn but Fel in with the wrong toys.

name: Cursed Campaign
text: [x]Give a friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon two copies of this minion that are Dormant for 2 turns."
flavor: Their group has been trying to schedule the next session since Kobolds and Catacombs came out.

name: Sing-Along Buddy
text:
Your Hero Power
triggers twice.
flavor: One of the buttons makes you sound JUST like Ragnaros. BY FIRE BE HEARD!

name: Wheel of DEATH!!!
text:
Destroy your deck.
In 5 turns, destroy
the enemy hero.
flavor: Why don't the good guys ever get a wheel?

name: Playhouse Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each card you've drawn this game.
flavor: WARNING: NOT A PLAYHOUSE. DO NOT ATTEMPT TO CLIMB.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the Whizbang's Workshop Tavern Pass.

name: Li'Na, Shop Manager
text:
[x]Whenever you cast a spell,
fill your board with random
minions of that Cost.
flavor: Somebody has to do the paperwork around here.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the Whizbang's Workshop Tavern Pass.

name: Factory Assemblybot
text: Miniaturize At the end of your turn, summon a 6/7 Bot that attacks a random enemy.
flavor: I call it Mini-me.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Whizbang's Workshop Reward Track.

name: Chemical Spill
text:
Summon the highest Cost minion
from your hand, then
deal $5 damage to it.
flavor: I said spill the TEA, not the acid!

name: Wreck'em and Deck'em
text:
[x]Choose a friendly Mech.
Summon a copy of it
that attacks a random
enemy, then dies.
flavor: ...and Check'em for any signs of life.

name: Boom Wrench
text: [x]Miniaturize Deathrattle: Trigger the Deathrattle of a random friendly Mech.
flavor:
Boom, the Inventor; Can he fix it?
Boom, the Inventor; No he can't!

name: Quality Assurance
text: Draw 2 Taunt minions.
flavor: I assure you this card is quality.

name: Testing Dummy
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 8 damage randomly split among all enemy minions.
flavor: Don't worry, they're having a blast. MUAHAHAHAHAAAA!

name: Inventor Boom
text: [x]Battlecry: Resurrect two different friendly Mechs that cost (5) or more. They attack random enemies.
flavor: The best part of inventing stuff is blowing it up!

name: Workshop Mishap
text: Deal $5 damage to a minion. Excess damages both neighbors. Outcast: Gain Lifesteal.
flavor: IT HAS BEEN [0] DAYS SINCE LAST ACCIDENT.

name: Umpire's Grasp
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Demon and reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor: PENALTY - FEL BALL!

name: Ball Hog
text: [x]Lifesteal Battlecry and Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to the lowest Health enemy.
flavor: "There's no hog in team... ANYMORE! I QUIT!"

name: Blind Box
text: Get 2 random Demons. Outcast: Discover them instead.
flavor: THREE Flame Imps?? C'mon, where's my pity timer?!

name: Red Card
text: Make a minion go Dormant for 2 turns.
flavor: Finally, Demon Hunter has expanded its color palette to TWO colors!

name: Lesser Opal Spellstone
text: Draw 1 card. (Attack with your hero 2 times to upgrade.)
flavor:
For those seeking glory and power
Be not swayed by Azari the Devourer
The opal grants victory to the weak
But leaves your soul barren and bleak

name: Messmaker
text: Lifesteal, Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all enemies.
flavor: The most painful 1 damage of your life.

name: Magtheridon, Unreleased
text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns. While Dormant, deal 3 damage to all enemies at the end of your turn.
flavor: Playing with this card can be penalized with up to a two-year suspension. Please wait until the card is officially released.

name: Lab Patron
text: [x]Whenever you gain Armor, summon another Lab Patron (once per turn).
flavor: When a Lab Patron fails out of school, they become a Grim Patron.

name: Window Shopper
text: [x]Miniaturize Battlecry: Discover a Demon. Set its stats and Cost to this minion's.
flavor: OMG THAT'S LITERALLY ME!

name: Giggling Toymaker
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/2 Mechs with Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: "HAHAhehehe. Hahaha he." -Me when I'm making toys
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Whizbang's Workshop Reward Track.

name: Splendiferous Whizbang
text:
[x]You start the game
with one of Whizbang's
Experimental Decks!
flavor: After his work at Boomsday Labs, he's taken what Dr. Boom taught him and applied it to the most important inventions of all - TOYS!!!

name: Colifero the Artist
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a minion. Transform all other friendly minions into copies of it.
flavor: You are what you paint! And Colifero is paint.
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a Whizbang's Workshop card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the Whizbang's Workshop Tavern Pass.

name: Fly Off the Shelves
text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. Repeat for each Dragon you're holding.
flavor: No, Whizbang, you can't pass off a poorly made shelf as a cool Priest spell.

name: Flash Sale
text: Summon a 1/2 Mech with Divine Shield and Taunt. Give your minions +1/+2.
flavor: HOW LOW! HOW LOW! HOW LOW!

name: Sparkling Phial
text:
[x]Deal $2 damage.
Your next card this turn
costs that much less.
flavor: Lemme pull up your phial.

name: Chia Drake
text: Miniaturize Choose One - Gain Spell Damage +1; or Draw a spell.
flavor: Huh-huh-huh Hearthstone!

name: Wind-Up Sapling
text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Refresh 1 Mana Crystal. (Trade to upgrade!)
flavor: I am Wind-Up Sapling.

name: Jade Display
text: [x]Deathrattle: Your Jade Displays have +1/+1 this game. Shuffle 2 of them into your deck.
flavor: The Jade Lotus just releases the same product every year but with an upgraded camera.

name: Woodland Wonders
text: Summon two 2/5 Beetles with Taunt. Costs (3) less if you have Spell Damage.
flavor: Is this a standup fight or another bug hunt?

name: Ensmallen
text: Reduce the Cost and Attack of minions in your deck by (1).
flavor: Come on, you know- I ensmallen, you ensmallen? He she me Ensmallen? Ensmallogy: the study of ensmallening?! IT'S FIRST GRADE.

name: Sky Mother Aviana
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 10 random Legendary minions into your deck. They cost (1).
flavor: It's a bird! It's a plane! It's 10 copies of Leeroy Jenkins!

name: Owlonius
text: [x]Spell Damage +1 Your spells get double bonus from Spell Damage.
flavor: They said you sound like an owl.

name: Crafter's Aura
text:
At the end of your turn, summon a random 6-Cost minion.
Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: She has at LEAST Craftsmanship +3.

name: Cardboard Golem
text: Battlecry: Increase the duration of Auras in your hand, deck, and battlefield by 1.
flavor: It's certainly... creative.

name: Painter's Virtue
text:
[x]After your hero attacks,
give minions in your
hand +1/+1.
flavor: For when the Light hits the painting at a certain angle.

name: Tigress Plushy
text: Miniaturize Rush, Lifesteal, Divine Shield
flavor: The sheervalue of this card is undeniable.

name: Pipsi Painthoof
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a random Divine Shield, Rush, and Taunt minion from your deck.
flavor: "Earthmother guide my paintbrush strokes, especially on the eyes."

name: Toy Captain Tarim
text: [x]Miniaturize Taunt. Battlecry: Set a minion's Attack and Health to this minion's.
flavor: Whizbang is now the sole proprietor of Un'Goro.
targeting_arrow_text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to this minion's.

name: Bucket of Soldiers
text: Deathrattle: Summon five 1/1 Soldiers with random Bonus Effects.
flavor: Life is like a bucket of soldiers. You never know what bonus effects you're gonna get.

name: Forgotten Animatronic
text: At the end of your turn, destroy a minion with less Attack than this.
flavor: He ALWAYS comes back.

name: Rambunctious Stuffy
text: Rush After you cast a Frost spell, gain Reborn.
flavor: The Lich King can't sleep without his stuffy.

name: Silk Stitching
text: Choose a friendly minion. Discover a spell that costs (4) or less for it to cast when it dies.
flavor: The slogan of their very exclusive sewing club is "You can't stitch with us."

name: Rainbow Seamstress
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck started with a Blood, Frost, or Unholy card, gain Lifesteal, Reborn, or Rush respectively.
flavor: Is this card any good? It would seam sew.

name: Darkthorn Quilter
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
deal this minion's Attack
damage randomly split
   among enemies.
flavor: Still mad about not being let into the spiders' sewing club.

name: Lesser Spinel Spellstone
text: Give Undead in your hand +1/+1. (Gain 5 Corpses to upgrade.)
flavor:
A story concluded, the kobolds had fought
Yet here is a spellstone Azari forgot
Pawned off to shops, considered a trinket
Dark powers contained, none would think it

name: Threads of Despair
text: Give all minions "Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions."
flavor: Mom, I frew up...

name: Shambling Zombietank
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Spend 5 Corpses to summon a copy of this.
flavor: Spider Tank in shambles.

name: Amateur Puppeteer
text: [x]Miniaturize, Taunt Deathrattle: Give Undead in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: "I'm a real toy!"

name: The Headless Horseman
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy the enemy minion with the most Attack! Shuffle my Head into your deck, you must get it back!
flavor:
This flavor text, you would expect
to rhyme and reference, to great effect!
It starts out strong, but as you can tell
it doesn't end very good.

name: Dr. Stitchensew
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a 5, 3, and 1-Cost minion to stitch to this. Deathrattle: Summon the 5-Cost minion.
flavor: First, do some harm.

name: Magical Dollhouse
text: [x]Gain Spell Damage +1 this turn only.
flavor:
Build your own dollhouse in 3 easy steps!
1. Build a castle.
2. Miniaturize it.
3. GLITTER!

name: Bottomless Toy Chest
text: Discover a card from your deck. If you have Spell Damage, copy it.
flavor: That's right, it goes in the toy chest.

name: Corridor Sleeper
text: Starts Dormant. After 7 minions die, awaken.
flavor:
In the workshop, I go deeper.
In the mulligan, I'm a keeper.
This time, I'm even cheaper.
You guessed it right, I'm Corridor Sleeper.

name: Wish Upon a Star
text: Give +2/+3 to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavor:
"What are you going to wish for?"
"I wish I had just a liiiiiiiittle more Attack and Health!"
"...Really? You don't want, like, a million more?"

name: Cosplay Contestant
text: After your opponent plays a minion, transform into a 3/4 copy of it.
flavor: She's the winner of the Valeera Cosplay Contest! Second place was Valeera.

name: Repackage
text:
Stuff all minions into a 2-Cost Box,
then shuffle it into the opponent's deck.
flavor: I don't want to play with you anymore.

name: Wind-Up Enforcer
text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Summon 1 copy of this minion. (Trade to upgrade!)
flavor: Code 6404.5 clearly states that all Enforcers remain in their packaging until told by authorized personnel.

name: Fancy Packaging
text: Give a minion with Divine Shield +2/+3.
flavor: Wow, this card is great value! Until you open it.

name: Trinket Artist
text: Battlecry: Draw a Divine Shield minion and an Aura.
flavor: Many Draenei found new hobbies on the long journey from Argus.

name: Table Flip
text:
Deal $3 damage to all enemy minions.
Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
flavor: "Judge!"

name: Crane Game
text: Summon copies of two Demons in your deck.
flavor: This claw machine is RIGGED! I keep getting demons that bite me!

name: Endgame
text: Resurrect your last Demon that died.

name: Workshop Janitor
text: Battlecry: If you control a location, draw 2 cards.
flavor: She works in a magical toy shop and they just gave her a regular mop? Make it make sense.

name: Nesting Golem
text: Deathrattle: Resummon this with -1/-1.
flavor: NESTING GOLEEEEEEEEEEEEM!!!!!!! Eh… It just doesn't feel the same.

name: Origami Frog
text: [x]Rush Battlecry: Swap Attack with another minion.
flavor: For extra-realistic fly-snatching action, use tape!

name: Origami Crane
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Swap Health with another minion.
flavor: I was born with 1-Health and paper skin.

name: Origami Dragon
text: [x]Divine Shield, Lifesteal Battlecry: Swap stats with another minion.
flavor: The fire will give you a papercut, which CAN burn. Does that count?

name: Floppy Hydra
text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle a copy of this into your deck with permanently doubled Attack and Health.
flavor: If you cut one of its heads off, it'll grow back twice as cute!
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Whizbang's Workshop Reward Track.

name: Botface
text: [x]Taunt After this takes damage, get two random Minis.
flavor: "NOBODY CALLS ME BOTFACE!!" -Botface

name: Safety Goggles
text:
Gain 6 Armor.
Costs (0) if you don't
have any Armor.
flavor:
Remember, always be safe in the lab to mitigate injuries!
*painfully snaps goggles onto face*

name: Fireworker
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Boom Bots. WARNING: Bots may explode.
flavor: The one job where a spark of creativity is unwanted.

name: Ci'Cigi
text: [x]Battlecry, Outcast, and Deathrattle: Get a random   first-edition Demon Hunter   card (in mint condition).
flavor: She once bought a 1of1 Golden Skull of Gul'dan written entirely in Thalassian for 2,000,000 Gold.

name: Wretched Queen
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon two 4/6 Knights with Taunt.
flavor: Mind your head when you're around her.

name: Tabletop Roleplayer
text: [x]Miniaturize Battlecry: Give a friendly Demon +2 Attack and Immune this turn.
flavor: "And then I uh... I curse them with... uh... OH! I got it! They have to speak in rhymes or they turn into a crab!"
targeting_arrow_text: Give a friendly Demon +2 Attack and Immune.

name: Sketch Artist
text: Battlecry: Draw a Shadow spell. Get a Temporary copy of it.
flavor: Never ask an artist how many pieces they've finished.

name: Rumble Enthusiast
text:
[x]After you play the left-
or right-most card in your
hand, deal 1 damage to
a random enemy.
flavor: There's always room for one more game in the tavern!

name: Joymancer Jepetto
text: [x]Battlecry: Get copies of every 1-Attack or 1-Health minion you've played this game.
flavor: Joymancy (noun): The practice of bringing joy to others through the use of magic. (see also: ethics)

name: Half-Time Scavenger
text: Stealth Overkill: Gain 3 Armor.
flavor: One player's trash is another's “Best In Slot”.

name: Totemic Smash
text: Deal $2 damage. Overkill: Summon a basic Totem.
flavor: Trolls are the first group to have a totem survive atmospheric re-entry.

name: Ticket Scalper
text: Overkill: Draw 2 cards.
flavor: Takes ten percent off the top.

name: Sightless Ranger
text: Rush Overkill: Summon two 1/1 Bats.
flavor: An eye for sore sights.

name: Serpent Ward
text:
At the end of your turn,
deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: When snakes get sick, they get sent to the Serpent Ward.

name: Haunting Visions
text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (3) less. Discover a spell.
flavor: When you're awake at 3 AM and can't stop thinking about that time you called your teacher "mom."

name: Bog Slosher
text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion to your hand and give it +2/+2.
flavor: It's the bane of freshly mopped floors everywhere.
targeting_arrow_text: Return a minion to your hand.

name: Spirit of the Frog
text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn. Whenever you cast a spell, draw a spell from your deck that costs (1) more.
flavor: It is Wednesday, my dudes.

name: Zul'jin
text: [x]Battlecry: Cast all spells you've played this game (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: If you can dodge an axe, you can dodge a ball.

name: Bloodsail Howler
text: [x]Rush Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other Pirate you control.
flavor:
They saw their fate a closin'
Aboard a pirate ship
On deck: The Howlin' Hozen
About to let one rip.

name: Serrated Tooth
text: Deathrattle: Give your minions Rush.
flavor: The tooth hurts, don’t it?

name: Gurubashi Hypemon
text: Battlecry: Discover a 1/1 copy of a Battlecry minion. It costs (1).
flavor:
Throw your hands in the air!
They cost (1).

name: Big Bad Voodoo
text: Give a friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon a random minion that costs (1) more."
flavor: Murlocs practice Small Nice Voodoo.

name: Zentimo
text:
[x]Whenever you target a
minion with a spell, cast it
again on its neighbors.
flavor: Serenity. Peace. Many frogs.

name: Spirit of the Shark
text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn. Your minions' Battlecries   and Combos trigger twice.
flavor: It has Stealth, but its ominous theme music keeps giving it away.

name: Griftah
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover two cards. Give one to your opponent at random.
flavor: With Griftah in your deck, sometimes you start the game with The Coin!

name: Seance
text: Choose a minion. Add a copy of it to your hand.
flavor:
“The spirits spoke to me.”
"What did they say?"
"You had lethal two turns ago."

name: Headhunter's Hatchet
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a Beast, gain +1 Durability.
flavor: Zul'jin's primary recruiting tool.

name: The Beast Within
text: Give a friendly Beast +1/+1, then it attacks a random enemy minion.
flavor: Undoes years of obedience school training.

name: Raiding Party
text: Draw 2 Pirates from your deck. Combo: And a weapon.
flavor: And a bowl of chips. And some of those little cocktail weenies!

name: Captain Hooktusk
text: Battlecry: Summon 3 Pirates from your deck. Give them Rush.
flavor: "You three! Get in the cannon!"

name: Cannon Barrage
text:
[x]Deal $3 damage to a
random enemy. Repeat
for each of your Pirates.
flavor: Why fire your cannons strategically when you can fire them all at once?

name: Regenerate
text: Restore #3 Health.
flavor: Finally a cure for degenerates.

name: Sand Drudge
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Zombie with Taunt.
flavor: Loves long walks on the beach, raising the dead, and chocolates.

name: Former Champ
text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Hotshot.
flavor: The last time he saw action, Undertaker ruled the meta.

name: Stolen Steel
text: Discover a weapon (from another class).
flavor: Because Thrall wouldn't lend me Doomhammer.

name: Walk the Plank
text: Destroy an undamaged minion.
flavor: Pirates will fall for anything.

name: Spirit of the Raptor
text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn. After your hero attacks and   kills a minion, draw a card.
flavor: “Loti! LOTI! Drop it. Drop it Loti! Down! Down Loti!”

name: Ironhide Direhorn
text: Overkill: Summon a 5/5 Ironhide Runt.
flavor: "Boy! Bring me my masks and skull rams."

name: Savage Striker
text: Battlecry: Deal damage to an enemy minion equal to your hero's Attack.
flavor: Ruthless at tribal roasts.
targeting_arrow_text: Deal damage equal to your Attack.

name: Gonk, the Raptor
text: After your hero attacks and kills a minion, it may attack again.
flavor: There’s a word for Zandalari druids who refuse to pledge loyalty to Gonk: “Delicious.”

name: Pounce
text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn.
flavor: Comes with an overwhelming urge to jump into the nearest open box.

name: Predatory Instincts
text:
[x]Draw a Beast from your
deck. Double its Health.
flavor: Somebody’s been eating their funnel cakes.

name: Shriek
text: Discard your lowest Cost card. Deal $2 damage to all minions.
flavor: The first warning sign of an oncoming warlock temper tantrum.

name: Void Contract
text: Destroy half of each player's deck.
flavor: “YOU SIGNED WHAT?!”

name: Soulwarden
text: Battlecry: Add 3 random cards you discarded this game to your hand.
flavor: Reduce, reuse, resoul.

name: Grim Rally
text: Destroy a friendly minion. Give your minions +1/+1.
flavor: There’s no “Aiiiieeee” in “Team.”

name: Spirit of the Bat
text: Stealth for 1 turn. After a friendly minion dies, give a minion in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Nah nah nah nah, nah nah nah nah, nah nah nah nah, nah nah nah nah

name: High Priestess Jeklik
text: [x]Taunt, Lifesteal When you discard this, add 2 copies of it to your hand.
flavor: If you love Jeklik, set her free. YOU CAN'T GET RID OF HER.

name: Hir'eek, the Bat
text: Battlecry: Fill your board with copies of this minion.
flavor: REPEL’S EFFECT WORE OFF.

name: Mark of the Loa
text: Choose One - Give a minion +2/+4 and Taunt; or Summon two 3/2 Raptors.
flavor: Ah, yes. Mark. The mightiest Loa.

name: Stampeding Roar
text: Summon a random Beast from your hand and give it Rush.
flavor:
[x]The Gurubashi Arena has an
extremely permissive policy on
pets in the workplace.

name: Blood Troll Sapper
text: After a friendly minion dies, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Main supplier of Blood Troll Syrup to the Intercontinental Hut of Funnel Cakes.

name: Mass Hysteria
text: Force each minion to attack another random minion.
flavor: Black Friday gets worse every year.

name: Princess Talanji
