flavor: Everyone wants to be a princess, but nobody ever considers the size of the hat.

name: Bwonsamdi, the Dead
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw 1-Cost minions from your deck until your hand is full.
flavor: Everyone's dying to meet him.

name: Shirvallah, the Tiger
text: [x]Divine Shield, Rush, Lifesteal Costs (1) less for each Mana you've spent on spells.
flavor: On bended knee Thekal placed his weapon upon Shirvallah’s altar, whereupon she slowly knocked it off with her paw.

name: Time Out!
text: Your hero is Immune until your next turn.
flavor: Highly effective against 3 year olds.

name: Farraki Battleaxe
text: Overkill: Give a minion in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: Only two things in life are certain: death and axes.

name: A New Challenger...
text: Discover a 6-Cost minion. Summon it with Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: … Arrives? Approaches? TELL US ALREADY!

name: Immortal Prelate
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle this into your deck. It keeps any enchantments.
flavor:
She protec.
She attac.
But most importantly,
she come bac.

name: Flash of Light
text:
Restore #4 Health.
Draw a card.
flavor: Hey! No cameras allowed!

name: High Priest Thekal
text: Battlecry: Convert all but 1 of your Hero's Health into Armor.
flavor: "…and then I beat him with 1 Health!"

name: Spirit of the Tiger
text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn. After you cast a spell, summon a Tiger with stats equal to its Cost.
flavor: Less of a cantrip and more of a cat-nip.

name: Elemental Evocation
text: The next Elemental you play this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: It's just lighter fluid.

name: Arcanosaur
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, deal 3 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Arcane energy… finds a way.

name: Spellzerker
text: Has Spell Damage +2 while damaged.
flavor: But don’t ask her to use it in a sentence.

name: Scorch
text:
[x]Deal $4 damage to a
minion. Costs (1) if you
played an Elemental
last turn.
flavor:
The hoof.
The hoof.
The hoof is on fire.

name: Pyromaniac
text: Whenever your Hero Power kills a minion, draw a card.
flavor: She prefers “Flammably Inclined.”

name: Jan'alai, the Dragonhawk
text: [x]Battlecry: If your Hero Power dealt 8 damage this game, summon Ragnaros the Firelord.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: You mess with the Bird, you get the Firelord.

name: Blast Wave
text: Deal $2 damage to all minions. Overkill: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavor: If you’re burning and you know it, wave your hands!

name: Hex Lord Malacrass
text: Battlecry: Add a copy of your opening hand to your hand (except this card).
flavor: Extremely awkward cousin of Hex Lord Malaclass.

name: Spirit of the Dragonhawk
text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn. Your Hero Power also targets adjacent minions.
flavor: Dragonhawks aren’t known for their accuracy.

name: Devastate
text: Deal $4 damage to a damaged minion.
flavor: No thanks, I already devast-ate.

name: Emberscale Drake
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain 5 Armor.
flavor: The third little dragon made his armor out of adamantite.

name: Heavy Metal!
text: [x]Summon a random minion with Cost equal to your Armor (up to 10).
flavor: This metal is so heavy it will satisfy your iron requirements for the next year.

name: Sul'thraze
text: Overkill: You may attack again.
flavor: “Griftah here with de Sul’chop. One chop, you get four damage. Two chops, eight damage - you gonna change de way you fight."

name: Smolderthorn Lancer
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy a damaged enemy minion.
flavor: Here comes “The Smolder.”

name: Spirit of the Rhino
text: Stealth for 1 turn. Your Rush minions are Immune the turn they're summoned.
flavor: Where did they get this preposterous hypothesis?

name: War Master Voone
text: Battlecry: Copy all Dragons in your hand.
flavor: War Master sounds cooler than Dragon Sitter.

name: Akali, the Rhino
text: Rush Overkill: Draw a Rush minion from your deck. Give it +5/+5.
flavor: Most trolls only get to “AAAAHHH!” and don’t make it to the “kali” part.

name: Master's Call
text: Discover a minion from your deck. If all 3 are Beasts, draw them all instead.
flavor: "Hello? Yes, this is Huffer."

name: Treespeaker
text: Battlecry: Transform your Treants into 5/5 Ancients.
flavor: Honestly, his delivery is a little wooden.

name: Wardruid Loti
text: Choose One - Transform into one of Loti's four dinosaur forms.
flavor:
“Ravasaur!”
“Pretty scary”
“…Blammodax!”
“Is that a thing?”
“SMAXODON!”
“….now you’re just making those up.”

name: Krag'wa, the Frog
text: Battlecry: Return all spells you played last turn to your hand.
flavor: Krag'wa has a ritual to honor his friends and a ritual to devour his enemies. No one can tell them apart.

name: Baited Arrow
text: Deal $3 damage. Overkill: Summon a 5/5 Devilsaur.
flavor: The card is common, but the steak is rare.

name: Springpaw
text: [x]Rush Battlecry: Add a 1/1 Lynx with Rush to your hand.
flavor: The terrible thing about lynxes is lynxes are terrible things. Their teeth are made out of biting, their paws are made out of springs!

name: Bloodscalp Strategist
text: Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, Discover a spell.
flavor: “Shoot them in the face” is more of a tactic than a strategy.

name: Rain of Toads
text: Summon three 2/4 Toads with Taunt. Overload: (3)
flavor: "Oh, THAT'S how she brings the warts!"

name: Likkim
text: Has +2 Attack while you have Overloaded Mana Crystals.
flavor: "I double frog dare you!"

name: Overlord's Whip
text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to it.
flavor: "This merit badge is for cruelty. This one's for whipping. And this one is for embroidery..."

name: Dragon Roar
text: Add 2 random Dragons to your hand.
flavor: Not to be confused with Dragon Yodel.

name: Saronite Taskmaster
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 0/3 Free Agent with Taunt for your opponent.
flavor: Don't even think of asking for time off.

name: Daring Fire-Eater
text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power this turn deals 2 more damage.
flavor: A few hours later he DESTROYED the arena bathrooms.

name: Splitting Image
text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon a copy of it.
flavor: Sometimes you get punched so hard they see double.

name: Untamed Beastmaster
text: Whenever you draw a Beast, give it +2/+2.
flavor: All it takes is a tummy rub.

name: Dozing Marksman
text: Has +4 Attack while damaged.
flavor: It's the sleeper of the set.

name: Waterboy
text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power this turn costs (0).
flavor: 100% organic troll sweat.

name: Grave Horror
text: [x]Taunt Costs (1) less for each spell you've cast this game.
flavor: Trolls can regenerate lost limbs, but this is what they do with the leftovers.

name: Gral, the Shark
text: [x]Battlecry: Eat a minion in your deck and gain its stats. Deathrattle: Add it to your hand.
flavor: “… We’re gonna need a bigger board.”

name: Surrender to Madness
text:
[x]Destroy 3 of your Mana
Crystals. Give all minions
in your deck +2/+2.
flavor: Never give up, always surrender!

name: Auchenai Phantasm
text: Battlecry: This turn, your healing effects deal damage instead.
flavor: “Okay kids did everyone remember to heal before we left?”

name: Spirit of the Dead
text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn. After a friendly minion dies, shuffle a 1-Cost copy of it into your deck.
flavor: Just because you’re dead doesn’t mean you’re off the team.

name: Scarab Egg
text: Deathrattle: Summon three 1/1 Scarabs.
flavor: They say you can’t make an omelet without AHHH THEY’RE EATING MY FACE!

name: Booty Bay Bookie
text: Battlecry: Give your opponent a Coin.
flavor: Also makes a great librarian. She's really good at fixing books!

name: Helpless Hatchling
text: Deathrattle: Reduce the Cost of a Beast in your hand by (1).
flavor: It can’t be all that helpful. Not wif dose widdle wings!

name: Gurubashi Chicken
text: Overkill: Gain +5 Attack.
flavor: “Ya hold it by da feet, mon. Den ya THROW.”

name: Sharkfin Fan
text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Pirate.
flavor: His taste in soup is criminal.

name: Regeneratin' Thug
text: At the start of your turn, restore #2 Health to this minion.
flavor: Regenerates any injury except heartbreak.

name: Banana Buffoon
text: Battlecry: Add 2 Bananas to your hand.
flavor: You could say he has a certain appeal.

name: Cheaty Anklebiter
text: Lifesteal Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
flavor: Famed hunter of the deadly Achilliosaur.

name: Mosh'Ogg Enforcer
text: Taunt Divine Shield
flavor: Can’t break the rules if you can’t read ‘em.

name: Belligerent Gnome
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If your opponent has 2 or more minions, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: Maybe don't put this one in your garden.

name: Rabble Bouncer
text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each enemy minion.
flavor: "Shirt? Shoes!? No service!"

name: Gurubashi Offering
text: At the start of your turn, destroy this and gain 8 Armor.
flavor: For a limited time, loa blessings are on a pray-one-get-two deal (on selected sacrifices only).

name: Arena Fanatic
text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Her fantasy Rumble league gives double points for dismemberment.

name: Murloc Tastyfin
text: [x]Deathrattle: Draw 2 Murlocs from your deck.
flavor: He was destined for the soup. One way or another…

name: Arena Patron
text: Overkill: Summon another Arena Patron.
flavor: Everybody with a ticket get in here!

name: Wartbringer
text: Battlecry: If you played 2 spells this turn, deal 2 damage.
flavor: “Does she cause them with magic, or just…like have a bucket she brings with her?”

name: Firetree Witchdoctor
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a spell.
flavor: If your tree is on fire - stop, drop, and troll.

name: Shieldbreaker
text: Battlecry: Silence an enemy minion with Taunt.
flavor: Can also break up fights, relationships, and unions.

name: Arena Treasure Chest
text: Deathrattle: Draw 2 cards.
flavor: Yeah it's great, but did you see the Arena Treasure Arms?!

name: Dragonmaw Scorcher
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Caution: Contains Flammable Material

name: Drakkari Trickster
text: [x]Battlecry: Give each player a copy of a random card from their opponent's deck.

name: Linecracker
text: Overkill: Double this minion's Attack.
flavor: "Tell me if you’ve heard this one!"

name: Masked Contender
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, cast a Secret from your deck.

name: Rumbletusk Shaker
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/2 Rumbletusk Breaker.
flavor:
Rub a dub dub, three trolls in a tub.
And who do you think dey be?
Da Shaker, Da Breaker, and Da Undatakah.
And all of dem comin' for me.

name: Mosh'Ogg Announcer
text:
[x]Enemies attacking this
have a 50% chance to
attack someone else.
flavor: One's play-by-play. The other is off-color.

name: Ice Cream Peddler
text: Battlecry: If you control a Frozen minion, gain 8 Armor.

name: Snapjaw Shellfighter
text:
[x]Whenever an adjacent
minion takes damage, this
 minion takes it instead.
flavor: Nonono, the turtle is the Shellfighter.

name: Da Undatakah
text: [x]Battlecry: Gain the Deathrattle effects of 3 friendly minions that died this game.
flavor:
First Deathrattle: Draw a card.
Second: Draw 2 cards.
Third: Throw Mon'kind off a steel cage and plummet sixteen feet through an announcer’s table.

name: Hakkar, the Soulflayer
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a Corrupted Blood into each player's deck.
flavor: ATTENTION: Do not enter any major city while infected with the Corrupted Blood!

name: Oondasta
text: Rush Overkill: Summon a Beast from your hand.

name: Bloodclaw
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavor: This weapon – ow! Requires a little – OWW! Finesse.

name: Zandalari Templar
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've restored 10 Health this game, gain +4/+4 and Taunt.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: YOU WERE A TEMPLAR, JONDAR!

name: Ornery Tortoise
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavor: "Dude, where's my pizza?!"

name: Amani War Bear
text: Rush Taunt
flavor: "I used to farm for hours! Now they just come in packs?"

name: Reckless Diretroll
text: Taunt Battlecry: Discard your lowest Cost card.
flavor: "Reck less!? ME WRECK MOAR!"

name: Demonbolt
text: Destroy a minion. Costs (1) less for each minion you control.

name: Mojomaster Zihi
text: Battlecry: Set each player to 5 Mana Crystals.

name: Revenge of the Wild
text: Summon your Beasts that died this turn.

name: Crowd Roaster
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 7 damage to an enemy minion.

targeting_arrow_text: Deal 7 damage to an enemy minion.

name: Soup Vendor
text: Whenever you restore 3 or more Health to your hero, draw a card.

name: Halazzi, the Lynx
text: Battlecry: Fill your hand with 1/1 Lynxes that have Rush.

name: Spirit of the Lynx
text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn. Whenever you summon a Beast, give it +1/+1.

name: Naval Mine
text: [x]Deathrattle: Deal 4 damage to the enemy hero.

name: Pufferfist
text: After your hero attacks, deal 1 damage to all enemies.

name: Multi-Strike
text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. They may attack an additional enemy minion.

name: Gangplank Diver
text: Dormant for 1 turn. Rush. Immune while attacking.

name: Slimescale Diver
text: Dormant for 1 turn. Rush, Poisonous
flavor: You try putting on a wetsuit with scales.

name: Baba Naga
text: Battlecry: If you've cast a spell while holding this, deal 3 damage.

how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Just an Old Fish Tale" Achievement.

name: Barbaric Sorceress
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Swap the Cost of a random spell in each player's hand.
flavor: Her four arms are for casting, and her forearms are for crushing.

name: Barbed Nets
text:
[x]Deal $2 damage to an
enemy. If you played a
Naga while holding this,
choose a second target.
flavor: I caught'ya a dollar.

name: Colaque
text: [x]Colossal +1 Immune while you control Colaque's Shell.
flavor: Ten thousand years ago, the city of Zin-Azshari fell to the bottom of the sea... and partially onto Colaque's shell.

name: Gaia, the Techtonic
text: [x]Colossal +2 After a friendly Mech attacks, deal 1 damage to all enemies.
flavor: Always planning ahead, Ini knew she'd need this invention to protect all her other inventions.

name: The Leviathan
text: [x]Colossal +1 Rush, Divine Shield After this attacks, Dredge.
flavor: Built by Ini Stormcoil, this massive vessel can withstand almost anything you put it through... although she would prefer you didn't!

name: Blademaster Okani
text: [x]Battlecry: Secretly choose to Counter the next minion or spell your opponent plays while this is alive.
flavor: Yet ANOTHER sword fighter that spams counters.
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a Voyage to the Sunken City card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the Voyage to the Sunken City Tavern Pass.

name: Gorloc Ravager
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw 3 Murlocs.
flavor: Be careful what you fish for.

name: Azsharan Scavenger
text: Battlecry: Put a 'Sunken Scavenger' on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: Some local Murloc populations have adapted to survive in the harsh conditions of the ruins, much to the fascination of Sir Finley.

name: School Teacher
text: Battlecry: Add a 1/1 Nagaling to your hand. Discover a spell that costs (3) or less to teach it.
flavor: She also tutors 3 Piranha Swarmers on her off hours.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Shale University" Achievement.

name: Rainbow Glowscale
text: Spell Damage +1
flavor: She prefers saying that she has Arcane, Fel, Fire, Frost, Holy, Nature, and Shadow Spell Damage +1.

name: Mecha-Shark
text:
[x]After you summon a Mech,
deal 3 damage randomly
 split among all enemies.
flavor:
"Why didn't you just build a normal submarine. Only you can fit inside"
"WhY DiDn'T YoU JuSt BuIlD anormalsub-WHY DO YOU THINK WREZIG!! If you can build a freaking Mecha-Shark, then you build a freaking Mecha-Shark!"

name: Seafloor Gateway
text: Draw a Mech. Reduce the Cost of Mechs in your hand by (1).
flavor: It's all about e-fish-ency.

name: Volcanomancy
text: Choose a minion. When it dies, deal 3 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Do it again, this time with Pompeii and circumstance.

name: Azsharan Defector
text: [x]Rush. Deathrattle: Put a 'Sunken Defector' on the  bottom of your deck.
flavor: "I've got a sinking feeling about this evil Queen."

name: Predation
text:
Deal $2 damage.
Costs (0) if you played a Naga while holding this.
flavor: No need to worry! The squid is actually being sent to a nice kelp farm upstate.

name: Bubblebot
text: [x]Battlecry: Give your other Mechs Divine Shield and Taunt.
flavor: Bubblebot, bubble bubble bubblebot.

name: Shimmering Sunfish
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Holy Spell, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: Just keep shimmering, just keep shimmering.

name: The Garden's Grace
text: [x]Give a minion +4/+4 and Divine Shield. Costs (1) less for each Mana you've spent on Holy spells this game.
flavor: The perfect place to hold Conchella.

name: Slithering Deathscale
text: Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, deal 3 damage to all enemies.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: Colossal minions know her better as Slithering Damagescale.

name: Helmet Hermit
text: Can't attack.
flavor: I’d avoid asking if it wants to join the battle. It’s been pretty crabby lately.

name: Ambassador Faelin
text: Battlecry: Put 3 Colossal minions on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: For thousands of years, Faelin has longed to return to his homeland. Will Zin-Azshari be as he hopes, or are the secrets of the deep better left forgotten?
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Voyage to the Sunken City Reward Track.

name: Amalgam of the Deep
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Discover a minion of the same minion type.
flavor: Most explorers call it a success to find just one new species. Imagine Finley's excitement when he identified ten at once!
targeting_arrow_text: Discover a minion of the same minion type.

name: Harpoon Gun
text: After your hero attacks, Dredge. If it's a Beast, reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor: Get ooooover here!

name: Twinbow Terrorcoil
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast a spell while holding this, your next spell casts twice.
flavor: Two shots. Two kills.

name: Conch's Call
text:
Draw a Naga and
a spell.
flavor: All hail the magic conch!

name: Raj Naz'jan
text: After you cast a spell, deal damage equal to its Cost to the enemy Hero.
flavor: When you play the Coin, he deals emotional damage.

name: Kotori Lightblade
text:
[x]After you cast a Holy spell
on this, cast it again on
  another friendly minion.
flavor: You need healing.

name: Immortalized in Stone
text: Summon a 4/8, 2/4, and 1/2 Elemental with Taunt.
flavor: They all secretly have 'Deathrattle: Become very mortalized.'

name: Radar Detector
text:
[x]Scan the bottom 5 cards
of your deck. Draw any
Mechs found this way,
then shuffle your deck.
flavor: "Yup! I definitely don't know how to read radar."

name: Seafloor Savior
text: [x]Battlecry: Dredge. If it's a minion, give it this minion's Attack and Health.
flavor: "TURTLE PROCURED. ADMINISTRATING BANDAGES AND KISSES. BOO BOO MUST BE ELIMINATED."

name: Cutlass Courier
text: After your hero attacks, draw a Pirate.
flavor: It may be a cutlass, but you can cut lads with it too.

name: Swordfish
text: Battlecry: Dredge. If it's a Pirate, give this weapon and the Pirate +2 Attack.
flavor: While you were partying, I studied the fish.

name: Commander Sivara
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, add those spells back to your hand.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: With six legs, gills, and an impressive array of magic, Sivara is an all-terrain-spellcaster.

name: Whirlpool
text: Destroy all minions and all copies of them (wherever they are).
flavor: In the southern hemisphere, it actually summons all minions instead.

name: Illuminate
text: Dredge. If it's a spell, reduce its Cost by (3).
flavor: BEHOLD THE GLORY OF A NEW CUP!

name: Whispers of the Deep
text: [x]Silence a friendly minion, then deal damage equal to its Attack randomly split among all enemy minions.
flavor: And in the darkest of depths, the sailor heard a command from inside his own mind… “You will also buff my original card to 9 Mana.”

name: Handmaiden
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, draw 3 cards.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: Why did she unspool the last roll of royal toilet paper?!

name: Queensguard
text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each spell you've cast this turn.
flavor: Archnemesis of the Guardian of Kings.

name: Serpent Wig
text:
[x]Give a minion +1/+2.
If you played a Naga while
holding this, add a Serpent
Wig to your hand.
flavor: Legends say that all those who look into her eyes are turned to plush.

name: Blackwater Behemoth
text: Colossal +1 Lifesteal
flavor: What's a Blackwater Behemoth's favorite meal? Fish n' Ships.

name: Wayward Sage
text: [x]Outcast: Reduce the Cost of the left and right-most  cards in your hand by (1).
flavor: Carry on my wayward sage. There'll be peace and no more rage.

name: Lady S'theno
text: [x]Immune while attacking. After you cast a spell, attack the lowest Health enemy.
flavor: Only a S'theno deals in absolutes.

name: Xhilag of the Abyss
text: [x]Colossal +4 At the start of your turn, increase the damage of Xhilag's Stalks by 1.
flavor: When ancient heroes drove a felhunter into the sea, they thought it was the end. But for Xhilag, it was only the beginning...

name: Abyssal Depths
text: Draw your two lowest Cost minions.
flavor: *Happy Wisp noises*

name: Coilskar Commander
text: [x]Taunt. Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, summon two   copies of this.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: Then thou shalt count to three, no more, no less. Three shall be the number thou shalt count, and the number of the counting shall be three. Four shalt thou not count, neither count thou two, excepting that thou then proceed to three. Five is right out.

name: Glaiveshark
text: [x]Battlecry: If your hero attacked this turn, deal 2 damage to all enemies.
flavor: Can smell a drop of vengeance in the water up to a mile away.

name: Voidgill
text: Deathrattle: Give all Murlocs in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: If you stare into the abyss, it’s said that it will stare back at you. What happens to those who’ve gazed at it their entire lives?

name: Spitelash Siren
text: [x]After you play a Naga, refresh two Mana Crystals. (Then switch to spell!)
flavor: Refresh the rainbow.

name: Wrathspine Enchanter
text: Battlecry: Cast a copy of a Fire, Frost, and Nature spell in your hand (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: If he could see, he might be better at targeting.

name: Schooling
text:
Add three 1/1 Piranha
Swarmers to your hand.
flavor: A group of Piranha are known as a Scholomance.

name: Click-Clocker
text: [x]Divine Shield. Battlecry: Give a random Mech in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Allan please add details

name: Piranha Poacher
text:
At the end of your turn,
add a 1/1 Piranha Swarmer to your hand.
flavor: This snack certainly isn’t smiling back…

name: Radiance of Azshara
text: [x]Fire Spell Damage +2 Your Nature spells cost (1) less. After you cast a Frost spell, gain 3 Armor.
flavor: Uses Arcane, Fire, and Frost magic to vanquish Queen Azshara's foes. And for her skincare routine!

name: Scalding Geyser
text: [x]Deal $2 damage. Dredge.
flavor:
”Wow, what’s that land formation called?”
“It s’cald a Geyser.”

name: Piranha Swarmer
text: [x]Rush After you summon a Piranha Swarmer, gain +1 Attack.
flavor:
One Fish, Two Fish.
Less Fish? You wish.

name: Glugg the Gulper
text: [x]Colossal +3 After a friendly minion dies, gain its original stats.
flavor: Food can be scarce in the Abyssal Depths, leading its top predators to pursue any potential source of sustenance. Even extra crunchy ones.

name: Reefwalker
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Piranha Swarmer.
flavor: A gentle giant with some not-so-gentle friends.

name: Queen Azshara
text: Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, choose an Ancient Relic.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: Hobbies include: Ordering subjects around, making deals with old gods, and taking long walks under the beach.

name: Trench Surveyor
text: Battlecry: Dredge. If it's a Mech, draw it.
flavor: Liquid cooled.

name: Spellcoiler
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast a spell while holding this, Discover a spell.
flavor: "Look, I know plenty of spells. I just need to see one first is all."

name: Azsharan Mooncatcher
text: [x]Divine Shield. Battlecry: Put a 'Sunken Mooncatcher' on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: The light of Elune faded from the ruins of Zin-Azshari, but not its treasures.

name: Stormcoil Mothership
text: Rush Deathrattle: Summon two random Mechs that cost (3) or less.
flavor: Has been known to abduct sea cows and leave kelp circles.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "All Your Mechs are Belong to Us" Achievement.

name: Seascout Operator
text: Battlecry: If you control a Mech, summon two 2/1 Mechafish.
flavor: The Mechafish are actually totally autonomous. We gave her a fake control pad, as a joke.

name: Pelican Diver
text: Dormant for 1 turn. Rush
flavor:
The pelican’s beak is so big, some Colossal minions can even fit inside!*
*This is a lie.

name: Coral Keeper
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 3/3 Elemental for each spell school you've cast this game.
flavor: This here is Carl. They're in charge of these elementals. Not all of them get along, so sometimes Carl corrals the quarreling coral.

name: Ini Stormcoil
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a friendly Mech. Summon a copy of it with Rush, Windfury, and Divine Shield.
flavor: Before setting her sights on exploration, Ini was known for many inventions, such as the airborne breadmaking dirigible, the hypersprocket 200X zoom binoculars, and jobes (jean robes).
targeting_arrow_text: Summon a copy with Rush, Divine Shield, and Windfury.

name: Flipper Friends
text: [x]Choose One - Summon a 6/6 Orca with Taunt; or six 1/1 Otters with Rush.
flavor: Despite the harsh conditions, friends can still be found under the sea.

name: Seaweed Strike
text:
[x]Deal $4 damage to a minion.
If you played a Naga while
holding this, also give your
hero +4 Attack this turn.
flavor: Even as mechs, fish will still end up wrapped in seaweed.

name: Green-Thumb Gardener
text: [x]Battlecry: Refresh empty Mana Crystals equal to the Cost of the highest Cost spell in your hand.
flavor: Sometimes all a plant needs is, like, A LOT of water.

name: Bottomfeeder
text: Deathrattle: Add a Bottomfeeder to the bottom of your deck with permanent +2/+2.
flavor: Someone keeps adding fish to my deck, and I'm going to get to the bottom of it.

name: Aquatic Form
text: Dredge. If you have the Mana to play the card this turn, draw it.
flavor: How long can YOU hold your breath underwater?

name: Miracle Growth
text: [x]Draw 3 cards. Summon a Plant with Taunt and stats equal to your hand size.
flavor: I’ve got NO idea what’s in that fertilizer.

name: Dozing Kelpkeeper
text: [x]Rush. Starts Dormant. After you've cast 5 Mana  worth of spells, awaken.
flavor: *Yaaaaawn* wake me up in another 5 Mana.

name: Hedra the Heretic
text: [x]Battlecry: For each spell you've cast while holding this, summon a minion of that spell's Cost.
flavor: Hedra was cast out millennia ago for her divisive opinions among the Naga, such as "Turning into evil underwater serpent people was bad, actually."

name: Trenchstalker
text: Battlecry: Attack three different random enemies.
flavor: Cooler heads prevail.

name: Nellie, the Great Thresher
text: [x]Colossal +1 Battlecry: Discover 3 Pirates to crew Nellie's Ship!
flavor: Not to be mistaken for her freshwater cousin, Nessie, this massive creature was harnessed to carry Hooktusk's favorite ship.

name: Switcheroo
text:
Draw 2 minions.
Swap their Health.
flavor: Would you rather fight one Whale-sized Goldfish, or 100 Goldfish-sized Whales?

name: Bloodscent Vilefin
text: [x]Battlecry: Dredge. If it's a Murloc, change its Cost to  Health instead of Mana.
flavor: Tired of eating Jellyfish and Peanut Butter fish, it’s moved on to more gruesome meals.

name: Azsharan Scroll
text: Discover a Fire, Frost or Nature spell. Put a 'Sunken Scroll' on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: Kids these days are always scrolling on their tomes.

name: Azsharan Ritual
text: Silence a minion and summon a copy of it. Put a 'Sunken Ritual' on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: The harmonious silence surrounding the ritual was unceremoniously BROKEN when HAROLD began eating stale potato chips.

name: Azsharan Sweeper
text: Battlecry: Put a 'Sunken Sweeper' on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: The enchanted objects of Zin-Azshari have extremely long warranties.

name: Murkwater Scribe
text: Battlecry: The next spell you play costs (1) less.
flavor: The pen is mightier than the trident.

name: Crushclaw Enforcer
text: Battlecry: If you've cast a spell while holding this, draw a Naga.
flavor: Yet another case of carcinization.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Army of Azshara" Achievement.

name: Vicious Slitherspear
text:
[x]After you cast a spell,
gain +1 Attack until
your next turn.
flavor: He goes by ‘Fun-Loving Slitherspear’ on his dating profile.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Seven-Sided Strike" Achievement.

name: Priestess Valishj
text: [x]Battlecry: Refresh an empty Mana Crystal for each spell    you've cast this turn.@ (@)
flavor: Some of the more stoic priestesses worry that she's living too lavishjly.

name: Naga Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each Mana you've spent on spells this game.
flavor: He might be giant, but he’s still a couple thousand protein shakes away from competing in the Colossal Wrestling Championship.

name: Sir Finley, Sea Guide
text: [x]Battlecry: Swap your hand with the bottom of your deck.
flavor: "No need to worry, ol' chums, I have the map right here. It says to continue going straight down!"

name: Tuskarrrr Trawler
text: Battlecry: Dredge.
flavor: "Fish scales? Junk. A gravestone? Junk. This weird looking puzzle box? Junk. AHA! An Ancharrr!"
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Seashells by the Seafloor" Achievement.

name: Excavation Specialist
text: Battlecry: Dredge. Reduce its Cost by (1).
flavor: With the jungles of Un’goro mapped out and the ruins of Uldum fully uncovered, explorers have to go a little out of their depth in their search of the great unknown.

name: Azsharan Vessel
text: Summon two 3/3 Pirates with Stealth. Put a 'Sunken Vessel' on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: Not even the sturdiest Highborne ship could survive the churning waters of the Sundering.

name: Azsharan Trident
text: [x]Deathrattle: Put a 'Sunken Trident' on the  bottom of your deck.
flavor: Nevermind the barnacles! A well-crafted weapon is eternally useful.

name: Bone Glaive
text: Battlecry: Dredge.
flavor: Resourceful Demon Hunters find a use for every part of the Demon.

name: Gone Fishin'
text: Dredge. Combo: Draw a card.
flavor:
Rogues want me
Fish fear me

name: Blackscale Brute
text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, summon a 5/6 Naga with Rush.
flavor: Black, the scales of angry Naga! Red, the flames of Azshari's past!

name: Azsharan Sentinel
text: [x]Taunt. Deathrattle: Put a 'Sunken Sentinel' on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: For some, the Sundering was the collapse of civilization. For others, it was a great core workout.

name: Anchored Totem
text: After you summon a 1-Cost minion, give it +2/+1.
flavor:
The Naga devised the perfect retaliation to any pirates
dropping anchor in their domain: vandalism.

name: Bioluminescence
text: Give your minions Spell Damage +1.
flavor: The perfect card for Spell Damage Shaman and Spelling Bee Shaman.

name: Abyssal Wave
text:
[x]Deal $4 damage to
all minions. Give your
opponent an Abyssal
Curse.
flavor: Often followed up with a chasmic handshake.

name: Rock Bottom
text: [x]Summon a 1/1 Murloc, then Dredge. If it's also a Murloc, summon one more.
flavor: I can't... *mrgglrg* understand... *mrgrllrg* your accent. *mrgrlrglr*

name: Smothering Starfish
text: Battlecry: Silence ALL other minions.
flavor: Is a sucker for small talk.

name: Azsharan Gardens
text: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1. Put a 'Sunken Gardens' on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: That's not what I meant when I asked you to water the garden.

name: Security Automaton
text: After you summon a Mech, gain +1/+1.
flavor: Honestly, I feel less secure when it's around.

name: Emergency Maneuvers
text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, summon a copy of it. It's Dormant for 1 turn.
flavor: DO A BARREL ROLL!

name: Blood in the Water
text: Deal $3 damage to an enemy. Summon a 5/5 Shark with Rush.
flavor: Fish are friends, not food! Gilgoblins on the other hand…

name: Bootstrap Sunkeneer
text: [x]Combo: Put an enemy minion on the bottom of  your opponent's deck.
flavor: Part of the deck, part of the crew.
targeting_arrow_text: Put an enemy minion on bottom of deck.

name: Pirate Admiral Hooktusk
text: Battlecry: If you've summoned 7 other Pirates this game, plunder the enemy!0 ({0} left!)0 (Ready!)
flavor: You win some, you ransom.

name: Selfish Shellfish
text: Deathrattle: Your opponent draws 2 cards.
flavor: Keeps any ancient book it finds all to its shelf.

name: Swiftscale Trickster
text: Battlecry: Your next spell this turn costs (0).
flavor: If you play your cards fast enough, who's to say how much they cost?

name: Crabatoa
text: Colossal +2 Your Crabatoa Claws have +2 Attack.
flavor: This giant crab loves to sink entire naval fleets, but it'll settle for a single dinghy in a pinch.

name: Treasure Guard
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavor: The real treasure was the Naga we met along the way.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked with "Shiny Hunting" Achievement.

name: Forged in Flame
text: Destroy your weapon, then draw cards equal to its Attack.
flavor: Don't worry, your wounds are self-cauterizing!

name: From the Depths
text: [x]Reduce the Cost of the bottom five cards in your  deck by (3), then Dredge.
flavor: "This is why I'm afraid of the deep end of the pool."

name: Guard the City
text: Gain 3 Armor. Summon a 2/3 Naga with Taunt.
flavor: At thousands of feet below the surface, it's a pretty high-pressure job.

name: Obsidiansmith
text: [x]Battlecry: Dredge. If it's a minion or a weapon, give it +1/+1.
flavor: Was able to produce more effective weapons than his predecessor, Kelpsmith.

name: Lady Ashvane
text: Battlecry: Give all weapons in your hand, deck, and battlefield +1/+1.
flavor: This is your brain on Azerite.

name: The Fires of Zin-Azshari
text: Replace your deck with minions that cost (5) or more. They cost (5).
flavor: One heck of a hot tub.

name: Azsharan Saber
text: [x]Rush. Deathrattle: Put a 'Sunken Saber' on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: Even in ancient times, the Night Elves were committed cat people.

name: Urchin Spines
text: Your spells this turn are Poisonous.
flavor: I shouldn't have licked that.

name: Naga's Pride
text: Summon two 2/2 Lionfish. If you played a Naga while holding this, give them +1/+1.
flavor: Lionfish, Naga, and Spears, oh my!

name: Gifts of Azshara
text: Draw a card. If you played a Naga while holding this, do it again.
flavor:
Barber: What do you want?
Naga: You ever have a thirst for arcane power?
Barber: Say no more.

name: Hydralodon
text: [x]Colossal +2 Battlecry: Give your  Hydralodon Heads Rush.
flavor: Deep beneath the waves, this hydra grew to incredible size based on a steady diet of literally anything that crossed its path.

name: Holy Maki Roll
text: Restore #2 Health. Repeatable this turn.
flavor: If you use all 10 mana, that's called the 'Lunch Special.'

name: Sira'kess Cultist
text: Battlecry: Give your opponent an Abyssal Curse.
flavor: "Sira'kess, she's the best! Puts her followers to the test.

name: Dragged Below
text:
[x]Deal $4 damage
to a minion.
Give your opponent
an Abyssal Curse.
flavor: I know this is a frustrating situation you’re in, Captain, but there’s no need to curse.

name: Chum Bucket
text:
[x]Give all Murlocs in your
hand +1/+1. Repeat for
each Murloc you control.
flavor: Time to go in for the krill.

name: Za'qul
text: [x]Your Abyssal Curses heal you for the damage they deal. Battlecry: Give your opponent an Abyssal Curse.
flavor: Everything’s going exzaq’ully to plan.

name: Twin-fin Fin Twin
text: Rush. Battlecry: Summon a copy of this.
flavor: They call him Murloc Joe, winner of the Big M Memorial Surf Off Competition.

name: Gigafin
text: [x]Colossal +1. Battlecry: Devour all enemy minions. Deathrattle: Spit them back out.
flavor: How much storage does Gigafin's Maw have? About a giga bite.

name: Filletfighter
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
flavor: "What do you mean this isn't the meal you asked for? ! I made you a Fillet Minion!"

name: Flesheating Ghoul
text: Whenever a minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: 'Flesheating' is an unfair name.  It's just that there's not really much else for him to eat.

name: Spellbender
text: Secret: When an enemy casts a spell on a minion, summon a 1/3 as the new target.
flavor: While it's fun to intercept enemy lightning bolts, a spellbender much prefers to intercept opposing Marks of the Wild.  It just feels meaner.  And blood elves... well, they're a little mean.

name: Watcher of the Sun
text: Battlecry: Get a random Holy spell. Forge: Also restore 6 Health to your hero.
flavor: "I've got my eye on y-AAA I'M BLIND!"

name: Cyclopian Crusher
text: Rush Forge: Gain +3/+2.
flavor: Really puts the rusher in crusher. Uses its one eye to C.

name: Sif
text: Spell Damage +1 (Improved by each spell school you've cast this game!)
flavor: She is Sif. He is Malygos. They are not the same person. They may have similar spell damage, they may have similar colors but they are different nonetheless.

name: Norgannon
text: Titan After this uses an ability, double the power of the other abilities.
flavor: His tremendous arcane magic was strong enough to save all of the spirits of the titans after Sargeras destroyed their physical forms.

name: Mechagnome Guide
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. Forge: It costs (3) less.
flavor: Theme park? Tropical island? Fiery pit of despair? We've got something for everyone.

name: Chill-o-matic
text: Magnetic Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
flavor: After a number of island vacations, he thought the Storm Peaks would be a nice change of pace.

name: Observer of Myths
text:
[x]After you summon a
minion with more Attack
than this, give all friendly
minions +1 Attack.
flavor: "Oh hey, look! A myth!"

name: Always a Bigger Jormungar
text: Give a minion +2 Attack and "Excess damage dealt by attacks hits the enemy hero."
flavor: I saw it! It's big, scary, and blue!

name: Fable Stablehand
text: [x]Rush Battlecry: If you control a minion with 4 or more Attack, gain +2/+2.
flavor: She took over the job when Feeble Steeblehand left.

name: Awakening Tremors
text: Get three 4/1 Worms. They cost (1).
flavor: A rude followup to the Sleepy Tremors.

name: Son of Hodir
text: Battlecry: Shuffle four 8/8 Giants into your deck that are summoned when drawn.
flavor: You look dehydrated, drink some water! Come on, chug! Chug! Chug! Chug!

name: Wisdom of Norgannon
text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each different spell school you've cast this game.
flavor: Now all we need is the power and courage of Norgannon.

name: Absorbent Parasite
text: Magnetic, Rush Can Magnetize to Mechs and Beasts.
flavor: Your beasts' iron levels are high, what have you been feeding them?

name: Starstrung Bow
text: [x]Costs (1) less for each  friendly Secret that has   triggered this game.
flavor: Shoot for the stars, but if you miss, aim for the enemy hero.

name: Prison of Yogg-Saron
text: [x]Choose a character. Cast 4 random spells (targeting it if possible).
flavor:
"We've finally captured Yogg-Saron! How should we keep him contained?"
"How about... an open pit... right below us... with four loose chains?"
"PERFECT!"
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a TITANS card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the TITANS Tavern Pass.

name: Aggramar, the Avenger
text: Titan Battlecry: Equip a 3/3 Taeshalach.
flavor: Formerly a trusted lieutenant of Sargeras, Aggramar helped him fight the demonic legions across many worlds before he was corrupted.

name: Aqua Archivist
text: [x]Battlecry: The next Elemental you play costs (2) less.
flavor: Do not summon! I JUST had to put all my scrolls in rice.

name: Titanforged Traps
text: Discover and cast a Secret. Forge: Do it twice.
flavor: Always place it underneath their health pack.

name: Lightning Reflexes
text: [x]Discover a Nature spell. If you play it this turn, Discover another.
flavor: If you can dodge a lightning bolt, you can dodge a ball.

name: Kologarn
text: [x]Rush. Whenever this attacks a minion, put it in your hand. Deathrattle: Move any in your   hand to your opponent's.
flavor: "So am I just supposed to stand here forever, or...?"

name: Astral Automaton
text:
[x]Has +1/+1 for each other
Astral Automaton you've
summoned this game.
flavor: You'll want to summon an automaTON of these.

name: Khaz'goroth
text: [x]Titan After this uses an ability, gain Immune this turn and attack a random enemy minion.
flavor: Creator of the titan-forged races, Khaz'goroth intended them to safeguard the world of Azeroth from corruption and discord.

name: Aman'Thul
text: [x]Titan After this uses an ability, Discover any Legendary  minion from any class.
flavor: The leader of the titans was the first to awaken. In his loneliness, he sought out other titans across many different worlds, and together, they formed the Pantheon.

name: Creation Protocol
text: Discover a copy of a minion in your deck. Forge: Get another copy.
flavor: If you want the destruction protocol, just go in reverse.

name: Shapeless Constellation
text: Battlecry: Transform into an 8/8 copy of a random minion in your hand.
flavor: Galaxy Brain.

name: Distressed Kvaldir
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle two random Plagues into your opponent's deck.
flavor: Oh look at that, I have been impaled.

name: Down with the Ship
text: Deal $3 damage. Shuffle two random Plagues into your opponent's deck.
flavor: It has been a privilege playing with you tonight.

name: Tomb Traitor
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Plague in your opponent's deck to deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: You enjoy raiding, I enjoying traitoring. We are not the same.

name: Thornveil Tentacle
text: [x]Lifesteal Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor: Jennifer dumped me.

name: Eulogizer
text: [x]Battlecry: Spend 3 Corpses to deal 3 damage. Forge: Gain them instead.
flavor: "Sorry for your Ranked mode loss."

name: XB-488 Disposalbot
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all enemy minions. Forge: Gain Lifesteal.
flavor: You'll be so surprised when you figure out what XB stands for.

name: Chained Guardian
text: [x]Rush, Reborn Costs (1) less for each Plague shuffled into the  enemy deck this game.
flavor: Eternally jealous of the Unchained Gladiator.

name: Mortal Eradication
text:
[x]Deal $5 damage randomly
split among all enemy
minions. Restore #2 Health
to your hero for each killed.
flavor: Clearly anything with 6 or more health is immortal. Such as Street Trickster. We are nerfing Street Trickster for lore accuracy.

name: Imprisoned Horror
text:
[x]Costs (1) less for each
damage you've taken on
your turns this game.
flavor: Prison changed Jeff.

name: Wing Welding
text:
[x]Discard your highest Cost
card. Deal damage equal
to its Cost to all minions.
flavor: This is not how you train your dragon.

name: Forge of Wills
text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a Giant with its stats and Rush.
flavor: Standing in the Forge of Wills fills you with a sense of DETERMINATION.

name: Minotauren
text: [x]Rush Whenever this minion deals damage, gain that much Armor.
flavor:
"Why's he so mad?"
"He's been stuck on one of Hearthstone's hidden maze puzzles for YEARS."

name: Craftsman's Hammer
text: Whenever your hero attacks, gain 4 Armor.
flavor: Also gives your hero Craftsmanship +1.

name: Steam Guardian
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a spell. Reduce the Cost of a Fire spell in your hand by (1).
flavor: Its boiling steam and erupting magma serve as a pretty good form of 2-Factor Authentication.

name: Stoneskin Armorer
text: Battlecry: If your Armor changed this turn, draw 2 cards.
flavor: Pretty sensitive for someone made of thick skin.

name: Trial by Fire
text: [x]Summon five 1/1 Val'kyr with Rush. When one dies, give the others +1/+1.
flavor: Well, in ya go.

name: Furious Furnace
text: [x]Magnetic Also damages minions next to whomever this attacks.
flavor: He is absolutely fuming.

name: Unchained Gladiator
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a card. Repeat for each Elemental you played last turn.@ (@)
flavor: We can't possibly buff this card any more, just look at him!

name: Discovery of Magic
text: Discover a spell from a spell school you haven't cast this game (from any class).
flavor: It's in a book, just take a look!

name: Molten Rune
text: Deal $3 damage. Get a random spell. Forge: This casts twice.
flavor: It's post-ancient modern realist neoclassical impressionist art. No idea what it means though.

name: Inquisitive Creation
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. (Improved by each spell school you've cast this game!)
flavor: This mech eats books for breakfast.

name: Flame Revenant
text:
[x]After you summon an
 Elemental, give it +1/+1.
flavor: 4x weak to water.

name: Elemental Inspiration
text: [x]For each spell school you have cast this game, summon a 4/5 Vortex with a random Bonus Effect.@ (@)
flavor: No Hero Power required.

name: Ra-den
text: [x]Taunt. Deathrattle: Summon each other minion you've played this game that did not start in your deck.
flavor: Regularly participates in Immortal Combat.

name: Student of the Stars
text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a copy of this into your deck with permanent +3/+3.
flavor: She is getting her major in Ursa.

name: Serenity
text: Give all enemy minions -2 Attack. Destroy any with 0 Attack.
flavor: Ra-den loves teaching yoga on his off-hours.

name: False Disciple
text: Battlecry: Discover a Legendary Priest minion from the past.
flavor:
"...and they were roommates..."
"oh my god"

name: The Stars Align
text: Transform minions in your hand into ones that cost (3) more. (They keep their original Cost.)
flavor: Sweet, three Desert Obelisks!

name: Monstrous Form
text:
Give a friendly
minion +3/+3 until your next turn.
flavor: Then, it lives. Horribly.

name: Loken, Jailer of Yogg-Saron
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a minion from your deck. Summon a Tentacle with its stats and Taunt.
flavor: Really great at his job! - Yogg-Saron

name: Disciple of Sargeras
text: Battlecry: Discard a spell to summon two 3/2 Imps. Forge: Give them +2 Health and Taunt.
flavor: An IMP-ortant card to Forge.

name: Disciple of Eonar
text: Battlecry: Your next Choose One card or power has both effects combined.
flavor: If you do not receive his rose, you will have to pack your bags and leave Ulduar immediately.

name: Bait and Switch
text: Secret: When a friendly minion is attacked, give it +3/+3.
flavor: Oh my god, the bait and switch works every time!

name: Containment Unit
text: [x]Magnetic Deathrattle: Summon a random 8-Cost minion.
flavor: Surprisingly ticklish.

name: Ancient Totem
flavor: This is SO much cuter than Tinyfin.

name: Saronite Tol'vir
text: [x]Taunt Whenever this is attacked, draw a card.
flavor: Talk to the hand.

name: Sharp-Eyed Seeker
text: Battlecry: If there is a card in your deck that didn't start there, draw it.
flavor: If you give it treats, it will give you shiny objects!
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the TITANS Reward Track.

name: Angry Helhound
text: Rush Has +4 Attack on your turn.
flavor: When you wake up on the all 3 wrong sides of the bed.

name: Runefueled Golem
text: Battlecry: Discover a weapon from any class.
flavor: Hmm, glyph gauge is running low. Better fill up at the next town.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the TITANS Reward Track.

name: Time-Lost Protodrake
text: [x]Taunt When you draw this, add a random Dragon to your hand.
flavor: Weird way to say "late" but ok.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the TITANS Reward Track.

name: Flame Behemoth
text: Battlecry: Get two random Magnetic Mechs. They cost (2) less.
flavor: Always look both ways before crossing the Formation Grounds.

name: Algalon the Observer
text: Battlecry: Replace your Hero Power with Algalon's Vision.
flavor: That's so Algalon, it’s the future he can see.
how_to_earn: Earnable after purchasing the TITANS Tavern Pass.

name: Starlight Whelp
text: Battlecry: Get a random card from your starting hand.
flavor: Starlight, star bright, first whelp I see tonight.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the TITANS Reward Track.

name: From the Scrapheap
text: Get three 1/1 Magnetic Sparkbots with random Bonus Effects.
flavor: Well that's a load of scrap.

name: V-07-TR-0N Prime
text: [x]T1T4N This minion's abilities repeat on another random friendly minion.
flavor: Long after the titans' departure, Mimiron dreamed of creating something with an approximation of their power. He may have actually succeeded!

name: Turn the Tides
text: [x]Give your hero +3 Attack this turn. Summon a 3/3 Elemental with Rush. Overload: (1)
flavor:
T
I
D
E
S

name: Tram Operator
text: Battlecry: Draw a Mech. The next Mech you play costs (2) less.
flavor: The guy in the back is screaming…  because the train ride is so fun!

name: Storm Giant
text: Taunt Forge: Costs (2) less. Can be Forged endlessly.
flavor: Storm Giant, Frost Giant, Molten Giant... I want Fair-weather and Sunshine Giant!
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the TITANS Reward Track.

name: Tempest Hammer
text: After your hero attacks, deal 3 damage to the lowest Health enemy.
flavor: LIKE SWATTING PESTS!

name: Tar Slick
text:
Minions take double damage this turn.
Deal $1 damage.
flavor: Has +2 Attack on its opponent's turn.

name: Thorignir Drake
text: [x]Rush Whenever this attacks, summon two 3/1 Whelps to attack the target first.
flavor: Throwing your children at enemies qualifies you for Worst Mother of the Year.

name: Pit Stop
text: Discover a Mech from your deck. Give it +2/+1.
flavor: "Guido! It's time."

name: Melted Maker
text: After you Forge a card, get a copy of it.
flavor: Melts what he makes (cheese) and makes a mean melt (grilled cheese).

name: Lab Constructor
text: [x]At the end of your turn, summon a copy of this. Forge: Gain Magnetic.
flavor: As Mimiron foretold: "Twinsies!"

name: Careless Mechanist
text: After you draw your second card in a turn, destroy this.
flavor: Fly lower, you fools!

name: Invent-o-matic
text: Whenever you Magnetize a minion, give it +1/+1.
flavor: The inventor was really proud, until they realized inventing something that invents things makes for poor job security.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the TITANS Reward Track.

name: Relentless Worg
text: Rush After this attacks and kills a minion, restore this to full Health.
flavor: It's the Year of the Worg! Wait - what do you mean 'wolf'?

name: Mecha-Leaper
text: Magnetic Deathrattle: Give a friendly Mech +2/+2 and this Deathrattle.
flavor: Now to find my Mecha-Macaw and my Mecha-Titus and we'll be Mecha-Set.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the TITANS Tavern Pass.

name: Northern Navigation
text: Discover a spell from your deck. If it's a Frost spell, Freeze a random enemy minion.
flavor: Leads directly to Greatfather Winter's workshop.

name: Staff of the Primus
text:
After your hero attacks, shuffle a random
Plague into your opponent's deck.
flavor: THE PRIMUS, RULER OF MALDRAXXUS, MASTER STRATEGIST, AND wielder of toothpicks!

name: The Primus
text: Titan After this uses an ability, Discover a card with that Rune.
flavor: As there is a Pantheon of titans, so is there also a Pantheon of Death, comprised of powerful rulers in the Shadowlands.

name: Disguised K'thir
text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform into a random card in your opponent's deck.
flavor: That is not a very good disguise, dude.

name: Celestial Projectionist
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a Temporary copy of it to your hand.
flavor: What if we're not really here, y'know? What if we're all just, like, projections in the mind of some cosmic entity? How would we know?
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the TITANS Reward Track.
targeting_arrow_text: Choose a friendly minion to get a temporary copy.

name: Frozen Over
text:
[x]Both players draw 2
cards. Your opponent can
not play them next turn.
flavor: We will find out who wins when we return in the spring.

name: Grace of the Highfather
text: Restore #8 Health. Discover a card that costs the amount Overhealed.
flavor: The fish was thiiiiis big, can you believe it?

name: Ignis, the Eternal Flame
text: Battlecry: If you've Forged a card this game, craft a custom weapon.
flavor: ETERNAL flame? He has 4 health?!
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the TITANS Tavern Pass.

name: Hodir, Father of Giants
text: Battlecry: Set the stats of the next three minions you play to 8/8.
flavor: Giant ladies, this one's a Keeper.

name: Bellowing Flames
text: Deal $5 damage to a minion. Forge: Then deal $5 damage split among all enemy minions.
flavor: Too much bellowing. Not enough flames.

name: Ravenous Kraken
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion. Deathrattle: Summon a copy of it.
flavor: He's witewally hitting the squiddy wight now.

name: Golganneth, the Thunderer
text: Titan Your first spell each turn costs (3) less.
flavor: With dominion over the seas and skies, Golganneth fearlessly wields the power of nature to serve the Pantheon.

name: Champion of Storms
text: After you cast a Nature spell, summon a 4/2 Elemental. Forge: With Rush.
flavor: Has some grievances it just can't wait to air out.

name: Smelt
text:
[x]Give a random minion in
your hand +3/+3. Lose
3 Armor to do it again.
flavor: Due to his heightened olfactory system, Kha'zgoroth is cursed with always being the one that dealt it.

name: Odyn, Prime Designate
text: [x]Battlecry: For the rest of the game, after your hero gains Armor, they gain that much Attack for that turn.
flavor: The best offense is a good defense. 30 defense to be exact.

name: Victorious Vrykul
text: After this attacks, get a 2/3 Val'kyr that costs (1).
flavor: Get three of these and you have a Trikul.

name: Flash of Lightning
text:
Draw a card.
Next turn, your Nature spells cost (1) less.
flavor: FLASH! AAAAAAAAA

name: Crash of Thunder
text: Deal $3 damage to all enemies. Costs (1) less for each Nature spell you've cast this turn.
flavor: ERROR: Lightning.exe has stopped working.

name: Trogg Exile
text: Rush Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to your hero.
flavor: Trogg used to rule…

name: Disciple of Golganneth
text: [x]At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of a random Overload card in your hand by (1).
flavor: Warning: If you are not made of rocks, do not stand in lightning water.

name: Thorim, Stormlord
text: [x]Battlecry: Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals. Draw that many cards.
flavor: In the mountains.

name: Crystalline Statue
text: Rush. Starts Dormant. After you draw 4 cards, this awakens.
flavor: Hey! Who Greened my statue?!

name: Momentum
text: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn. Costs (1) less for each card you've drawn this turn.
flavor: "Mass Times Velocity" wasn't as catchy.

name: Jotun, the Eternal
text: [x]Battlecry: For the rest of the game, cast a copy of the first spell you draw each turn at enemies.
flavor: He doesn't look like a turtle?

name: Eredar Deceptor
text: Whenever you draw a card, summon a 1/1 Demon with Rush.
flavor: But they were all of them deceived, for another Eredar was made.

name: Argunite Golem
text:
[x]Has +1 Attack for each card
you've drawn this turn.
flavor: Golem Bling never really caught on - the fad crumbled after the Cataclysm.

name: Runic Adornment
text: Discover a spell that costs (3) or less. Shuffle 2 copies into your deck that Cast When Drawn.
flavor: Rune, rune on the wall, who's the greenest of them all?

name: Helya
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle all three Plagues into your opponent's deck. Plagues they draw this game are unending.
flavor: Named after the first thing Odyn said after landing a sick kickflip.

name: Resistance Aura
text:
Your opponent's
spells cost (1) more.
Lasts 2 enemy turns.
flavor: Perfect for defending against Beasts. Specifically small ones. Like, a very specific species of small insectoid animal. Ants. It resists ants.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Paladin.

name: Noble Minibot
text: Magnetic After this attacks, give a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: I always get the minibot with the wobbly wheel.

name: Judge Unworthy
text: Set an enemy minion's Health to 1, then deal $1 damage to all enemies.
flavor: VEGETABLE JUSTICE!

name: Inventor's Aura
text: Your Mechs cost (1) less. Lasts 2 turns.
flavor: Ok, fine, I'll read the manual…

name: Tyr's Tears
text: [x]Resurrect 3 different minions from your class. Set their stats to 2/2. Forge: Resurrect another.
flavor: Liek this if u cri evertim

name: Disciple of Amitus
text:
[x]At the end of your turn, summon
a 2/2 Earthen that gains +2/+2
for each other Earthen you've
summoned this game.
flavor: "Oh great Amitus, I took your style advice on the poncho, but pray tell - one or two golden gloves?"

name: Tyr
text: Battlecry: Resurrect a 2, 3, and 4-Attack minion from your class.
flavor: Brought me back to life, S Tyr card.

name: Amitus, the Peacekeeper
text: Titan Taunt. Your minions can't take more than 2 damage at a time.
flavor: As a champion of harmony, Amitus abstained from the Pantheon's many conflicts until one day, shortly after the corruption of Sargeras, she vanished altogether.

name: Fate Splitter
text: Deathrattle: Get a copy of the last card your opponent played.
flavor: "What's the matter with these scissors!? The thread won't cut!!"

name: Drone Deconstructor
text: [x]Battlecry: Get a 1/1 Magnetic Sparkbot with a random Bonus Effect.
flavor: You have to deconstruct to reconstruct.

name: Disciple of Argus
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Elementals with Taunt.
flavor: "Aw nuts, I put both ends in the pencil sharpener."

name: Argus, the Emerald Star
text: [x]Titan Minions to the left of this have Rush, and ones to the right have Lifesteal.
flavor: Once a proud titan, Argus was fated to meet a darker end. Sargeras and his demons would later corrupt and shatter Argus to use his power for themselves.

name: Weight of the World
text: Draw 2 cards. Forge: Draw cards until you have as many in hand as your opponent first.
flavor: Unluckily for him, Azeroth has a tendency to get bigger every 2 years or so.

name: Mythical Terror
text: [x]Lifesteal At the end of your turn, force all enemy minions to attack this.
flavor: You cannot pet the Terror in Hearthstone.

name: Stoneheart King
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Earthen that gains +2/+2 for each other Earthen you've summoned this game.
flavor: I, too, am a king at playing Heart Stone.

name: Eonar, the Life-Binder
text: [x]Titan After this uses an ability, summon a 5/5 Ancient with Taunt.
flavor: Protector of all living things, she once saved the nascent world-soul of Azeroth from annihilation. It seems mercy was her greatest wisdom.

name: X-21 Repairbot
text: Deathrattle: Return any Mechs Magnetized to this to your hand.
flavor: The circle bolt goes in the square hole.

name: Astral Serpent
flavor: Call it lazy all you want, but it does have two more cards than you.

name: Crusader Aura
text: Whenever a friendly minion attacks, give it +2/+1. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: Also makes your animations 20% faster.
how_to_earn_golden: Unlocked after winning 250 games as Paladin.

name: Mimiron, the Mastermind
text:
[x]After you play a Mech,
get a random one of
Mimiron's Gadgets.
flavor: 1N1T14T1NG F74V0R T3XT S3QU3NC3.

name: Coppertail Snoop
text: [x]Magnetic Whenever this attacks, get a Coin.
flavor: Scavenges both nuts and bolts for the winter.

name: Gear Shift
text:
Shuffle the two left-most
cards in your hand into
your deck. Draw 3 cards.
flavor: You mean the PRNDL?

name: SP-3Y3-D3R
text: Magnetic Stealth for 1 turn.
flavor: The itsy bitsy spider magnetized onto the water spout.

name: Razorscale
text:
Cards can't cost
less than (2).
flavor: A razorscale, razormane, and razorclaw walk into the tavern.

name: Kaja'mite Creation
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from another class that costs (3) or less.
flavor: You made this? I made this.

name: Ancient of Growth
text: [x]Choose One - Summon three 2/2 Treants; or   Transform your Treants into    5/5 Ancients with Taunt.
flavor: Who passed greenhouse gas?

name: Conservator Nymph
text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly Treant into a 5/5 Ancient with Taunt.
flavor: Whatever you do, don't water your Treants after midnight!

name: Frost Lotus Seedling
text: Draw 1 card. Gain 5 Armor. (Blossoms in 3 turns.)
flavor: Even WORSE flavor text!

name: Imposing Anubisath
text: Taunt Can't attack.
flavor: He's just standing there... menacingly!

name: Chaotic Consumption
text: Destroy a friendly minion to destroy an enemy minion.
flavor: You're not you when you're hungry.

name: Freya, Keeper of Nature
text: [x]Choose One - Duplicate your hand; or Summon copies of all other friendly minions.
flavor:
Good things come in pairs.
Good things come in pairs.

name: Forest Seedlings
text: Summon two 1/1 Saplings. (Blossoms in 2 turns.)
flavor: You win some, you blossom.

name: Embrace of Nature
text: Draw a Choose One card. Forge: It has both effects combined.
flavor: BY OUR POWERS COMBINED…

name: Cultivation
text:
Give your minions +2/+2. Costs (1) less
for each Treant you've summoned this game.
flavor: Calling this an 8 mana card is missing the forest for the trees.

name: Lifebinder's Gift
text: Choose One - Get 2 random Nature spells; or Reduce the Cost of spells in your hand by (1).
flavor: Everyone's investing in Nature spells these days, but that bubble is about to burst.

name: Sargeras, the Destroyer
text: [x]Titan Battlecry: Open a portal that summons two 3/2 Imps each turn.
flavor: Formerly the Defender of the Pantheon, he became disillusioned by his mission and formed the Burning Legion to destroy all life within the universe.

name: Zephrys the Great
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, wish for the perfect card.
flavor: "Of course it's perfect, you're just not seeing how to use it."

name: Untapped Potential
text: [x]Quest: End 4 turns with any unspent Mana. Reward: Ossirian Tear.
flavor: The official term is "strategic laziness."

name: Crystal Merchant
text: If you have any unspent Mana at the end of your turn, draw a card.
flavor: I won't ask about your mana curve if you don't ask where I got these.

name: BEEEES!!!
text:
[x]Choose a minion.
Summon four 1/1 Bees
that attack it.
flavor: Right before CEEEES!!!

name: Hidden Oasis
text: Choose One - Summon a 6/6 Ancient with Taunt; or Restore #12 Health.
flavor: Amazing that it's been hidden, given the twenty-foot treant splashing around in it.

name: Worthy Expedition
text: Discover a Choose One card.
flavor: This isn't where I parked my mount.

name: Garden Gnome
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, summon two 2/2 Treants.
flavor: "Greetings, my little shrubs... It's whittlin' time."

name: Anubisath Defender
text: Taunt. Costs (0) if you've cast a spell that costs (5) or more this turn.
flavor: Also comes running when he hears a can opener.

name: Elise the Enlightened
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, duplicate your hand.
flavor: From cartographer to combatant, Elise has taken the road less traveled—because no one else could find it on a map.

name: Supreme Archaeology
text: Quest: Draw 20 cards. Reward: Tome of Origination.
flavor: Archaeology is the discovery of rare and powerful artifacts. Supreme Archaeology is TAKING THEM!

name: Pharaoh's Blessing
text: Give a minion +4/+4, Divine Shield, and Taunt.
flavor: Life hack: Sneeze near a pharaoh.

name: Brazen Zealot
text: Whenever you summon a minion, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: Some paladins really Light it up.

name: Ramkahen Wildtamer
text: Battlecry: Copy a random Beast in your hand.
flavor: She gets to decide what cards go to the Hall of Fame.

name: Pressure Plate
text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: The appropriate dishware for stressful situations.

name: Hyena Alpha
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a Secret, summon two 2/2 Hyenas.
flavor: Everything the sun touches is ours—so long as it's already dead.

name: Unseal the Vault
text: Quest: Summon 20 minions. Reward: Pharaoh's Warmask.
flavor: "Huh... That's a nice card back."

name: Dinotamer Brann
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, summon King Krush.
flavor: Brann's new dino-taming hobby is going well—his pet can already make him sit, stand, and roll over!

name: Questing Explorer
text: Battlecry: If you control a Quest, draw a card.
flavor: Earned her merit badges the hard way—twelve zhevra hooves at a time.

name: Sandstorm Elemental
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. Overload: (1)
flavor: Doot doot doot doot doot [Pause] Doot doot doot doot doot DEE doot doot doot doot doot!

name: Sinister Deal
text: Discover a Lackey.
flavor:
"So, what's in the sack?" 
"Something... sinister." 
"Okay, it's a deal."

name: Neferset Thrasher
text: Whenever this attacks, deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavor: Tough to do skateboard tricks with four legs.

name: EVIL Recruiter
text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly Lackey to summon a 5/5 Demon.
flavor: I'm starting to think the lackeys aren't evil, just taken advantage of.

name: Expired Merchant
text: [x]Battlecry: Discard your highest Cost card. Deathrattle: Add 2 copies of it to your hand.
flavor: The "best by" date is more like a guideline.

name: Riftcleaver
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Your hero takes damage equal to its Health.
flavor: Brings you face to face with your destructive impulses.

name: Diseased Vulture
text:
Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, summon a random
3-Cost minion.
flavor: He's off the twig! He's kicked the bucket! THIS IS AN EX-VULTURE!

name: Dark Pharaoh Tekahn
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Lackeys are 4/4.
flavor: He'll get that League of Explorers and their little murloc too!

name: Mogu Fleshshaper
text: [x]Rush. Costs (1) less for each minion on the battlefield.
flavor: He's here to shape *clap* you up!

name: Weaponized Wasp
text: Battlecry: If you control a Lackey, deal 3 damage.
flavor: Dr. Boom had one simple request: wasps with flippin' laser beams attached to their heads.

name: Totemic Surge
text: Give your Totems +2 Attack.
flavor: It's not really advanced shamanic magic, you just draw nasty eyebrows on them.

name: Plague of Murlocs
text: Transform all minions into random Murlocs.
flavor: This is horrible! And adorable!

name: Vessina
text: While you're Overloaded, your other minions have +2 Attack.
flavor: She wasn't happy when Hagatha sent her back to Uldum. But her "angry" hiss sounds like her "happy" hiss, so no one knew the difference.

name: Serpent Egg
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/4 Sea Serpent.
flavor: These things go from "adorable danger noodle!" to "MY FACE IS MELTING!" all too quickly.

name: Octosari
text: Deathrattle: Draw 8 cards.
flavor: Eight arms of sand-flinging, foe-wringing, card-slinging fury!

name: Siamat
text: [x]Battlecry: Gain 2 of Rush, Taunt, Divine Shield, or Windfury (your choice).
flavor: TAUNT. TAUNT.

name: Phalanx Commander
text: Your Taunt minions have +2 Attack.
flavor: Turns out he's really good at herding cats.

name: Sunstruck Henchman
text: At the start of your turn, this has a 50% chance to fall asleep.
flavor: There is E.V.I.L. here that DOES sleep.

name: Earthquake
text: Deal $5 damage to all minions, then deal $2 damage to all minions.
flavor: Shake it, sh-sh-sh-shake it like a Kalimdor fissure.

name: Spitting Camel
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
  deal 1 damage to another  
random friendly minion.
flavor: Were you expectorating another bad pun?

name: Anubisath Warbringer
text: Deathrattle: Give all minions in your hand +3/+3.
flavor: Some dogs will bring you a bone or a squeaky toy. This one brings war!

name: Kobold Sandtrooper
text: Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Stay while, take candle.

name: Temple Berserker
text: Reborn Has +2 Attack while damaged.
flavor: He's back. He's angry. And he's here to wrap things up.

name: Pharaoh Cat
text: Battlecry: Add a random Reborn minion to your hand.
flavor: Mightiest of mousers, enduring in kingship of the upper and lower cat tree, conqueror of the red dot, the all-wise Catshepsut.

name: Golden Scarab
text: Battlecry: Discover a 4-Cost card.
flavor: Who actually puts all the gold plating on these things, and why?

name: Faceless Lurker
text: Taunt Battlecry: Double this minion's Health.
flavor: Longtime lurker, first time attacker.

name: Pit Crocolisk
text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage.
flavor: PIT! Not PET!

name: Beaming Sidekick
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Health.
flavor: Sure, I'll carry the water! And the food! And the tents! And the cursed monkey paw!

name: Living Monument
text: Taunt
flavor: This is not the greatest card in the world. This is just a monument.

name: Wasteland Scorpid
text: Poisonous
flavor: After they get to a certain size, it doesn't matter if they're poisonous or not.

name: Frightened Flunky
text: Taunt Battlecry: Discover a Taunt minion.
flavor: Some people just aren't cut out to be supervillain material.

name: Neferset Ritualist
text: Battlecry: Restore adjacent minions to full Health.
flavor: The Neferset are great—they'll always make sure their friends are feline fine.

name: Quicksand Elemental
text: Battlecry: Give all enemy minions -2 Attack this turn.
flavor: Use a light abrasive to buff blemishes away but use a heavy abrasive to debuff problems.

name: Conjured Mirage
text: Taunt At the start of your turn, shuffle this minion into your deck.
flavor: What you see is Isiset.

name: Candletaker
text: Reborn
flavor: "You no waaaake caaaandle!"

name: Restless Mummy
text: Rush Reborn
flavor: Life-separation anxiety syndrome.

name: Ancestral Guardian
text: Lifesteal Reborn
flavor: No one knows whose ancestor he is, but he's still upset that you never call.

name: Khartut Defender
text: [x]Taunt, Reborn Deathrattle: Restore #3 Health to your hero.
flavor: Gesundheit!

name: Vulpera Scoundrel
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell or pick a mystery choice.
flavor: A spell is a spell, but the mystery choice could be anything! (It's also a spell.)

name: Wild Bloodstinger
text: Battlecry: Summon a minion from your opponent's hand. Attack it.
flavor: Tame Bloodstingers would politely invite your minion to tea.

name: Generous Mummy
text: Reborn Your opponent's cards cost (1) less.
flavor: Yeah, she's mummified, but her money hasn’t dried up!

name: Wrapped Golem
text: [x]Reborn At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Scarab with Taunt.
flavor: The end result of one of the greatest wrap battles of all time.

name: Puzzle Box of Yogg-Saron
text: Cast 10 random spells (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: "PUT THE BOX DOWN, RENO!"

name: Micro Mummy
text: [x]Reborn At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Attack.
flavor: The dramatically detailed terrifically trimmed replica of the real thing!

name: Mischief Maker
text: Battlecry: Swap the top card of your deck with your opponent's.
flavor: Fair trade is for noble-minded suckers with dignity and honor.

name: Whirlkick Master
text: Whenever you play a Combo card, add a random Combo card to your hand.
flavor: C-c-combo!

name: Tortollan Pilgrim
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell in your deck and cast it with random targets.
flavor: A tortollan made it to the desert!

name: Reno the Relicologist
text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemy minions.
flavor: All his life, Reno Jackson was only a gatling wand away from becoming the greatest and most terrifying mage who ever existed.

name: Flame Ward
text: Secret: After a minion attacks your hero, deal $3 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Not to be confused with the burn ward.

name: Arcane Flakmage
text: After you play a Secret, deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Ancient pandaren proverb: He who is without secrets lacks flak.

name: Infested Goblin
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Scarabs with Taunt to your hand.
flavor: Trust us. DON'T go cheap on the scarab repellent.

name: Tomb Warden
text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
flavor: Also known as an ancient copy machine.

name: Into the Fray
text: Give all Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: "You are in my FRAY!"

name: Armagedillo
text: [x]Taunt At the end of your turn, give all Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: We may never know what provoked it, but we will never forget the consequences.

name: High Priest Amet
text:
[x]Whenever you summon a
minion, set its Health equal
to this minion's.
flavor: All minions are equal, but some minions are more equal than others.

name: Embalming Ritual
text: Give a minion Reborn.
flavor: "Guess what! We're getting a new cat."

name: Grandmummy
text: [x]Reborn Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +1/+1.
flavor: A grandmummy’s love is eternal.

name: Psychopomp
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game. Give it Reborn.
flavor: "Come with me if you want to re-live."

name: Wretched Reclaimer
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion, then return it to life with full Health.
flavor: "Ok, here's the plan. We kill you, then bring you back." "Stronger?" "No, about the same."

name: Sandhoof Waterbearer
text: At the end of your turn, restore #5 Health to a damaged friendly character.
flavor: Used to carrying for his team.

name: Injured Tol'vir
text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to this minion.
flavor: Me-OW!

name: Holy Ripple
text: Deal $1 damage to all enemies. Restore #1 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: I still prefer the taste of banana fudge ripple.

name: Overflow
text:
Restore #5 Health
to all characters.
Draw 5 cards.
flavor: It's a high five followed by a low tide.

name: Wasteland Assassin
text: Stealth Reborn
flavor: They'll never see me coming, what with my glowing body, eyes and daggers.

name: Bone Wraith
text: Taunt Reborn
flavor: It uses only the eco-friendly bones from free-range humanoids.

name: EVIL Totem
text: At the end of your turn, add a Lackey to your hand.
flavor: A lot of people blame the parents when a totem goes bad.

name: Sahket Sapper
text: Deathrattle: Return a  random enemy minion to  your opponent's hand.
flavor: "Here, you dropped this."

name: Jar Dealer
text: [x]Deathrattle: Add a random 1-Cost minion to your hand.
flavor: What's in the jar? It could be anyone!

name: Hooked Scimitar
text: [x]Combo: Gain +2 Attack.
flavor: Oooooooooooow. I'm hooked on a scimitar!

name: Shadow of Death
text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 3 'Shadows' into your deck that summon a copy when drawn.
flavor: Making new friends takes skill.

name: Anka, the Buried
text: Battlecry: Change each Deathrattle minion in your hand into a 1/1 that costs (1).
flavor: "You look familiar. Were you at my first funeral?"

name: Fishflinger
text: Battlecry: Add a random Murloc to each player's hand.
flavor: The scent of fish lingers on the fishflinger's fish fingers.

name: History Buff
text: Whenever you play a minion, give a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: Actually... what happened was...

name: Corrupt the Waters
text: [x]Quest: Play 6 Battlecry cards. Reward: Heart of Vir'naal.
flavor: This is why Hagatha is banned from public pools.

name: Oasis Surger
text: Rush Choose One - Gain +2/+2; or Summon a copy of this minion.
flavor: Surge's up, dude!

name: Cloud Prince
text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, deal 6 damage.
flavor: "In West Cloudidelphia, born and raised; flinging lightning for the rest of my days."

name: King Phaoris
text: [x]Battlecry: For each spell in your hand, summon a random minion of the same Cost.
flavor: When you're the king of the cats, the whole desert is your litterbox.

name: Dwarven Archaeologist
text: Battlecry: Discover a card. Reduce its Cost by (1).
flavor: She's making great progress on paying off that advanced degree.

name: Impbalming
text: Destroy a minion. Shuffle 3 Worthless Imps into your deck.
flavor: With your complexion, Imp Balm is a great demonizer.

name: Bazaar Burglary
text: [x]Quest: Add 4 cards from other classes to your hand. Reward: Ancient Blades.
flavor: Just when you set up your "All-Natural Scented Candles" at the farmer's market and then some STUPID KOBOLD COMES AND TAKES THEM ALL!

name: Bazaar Mugger
text: Rush Battlecry: Add a random minion from another class to your hand.
flavor: Premium muggings at a discount price.

name: Clever Disguise
text: Add 2 random spells from another class to your hand.
flavor: "It me! Togwaggle!"

name: Dune Sculptor
text:
[x]After you cast a spell,
add a random Mage
minion to your hand.
flavor: Come for the magic show, stay for the sand castles.

name: Scarlet Webweaver
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of a random Beast in your hand by (5).
flavor: Isn't that nice? The spider made the explorer a sleeping bag!

name: Splitting Axe
text: Battlecry: Summon copies of your Totems.
flavor: The ancient shaman chant, "Control Axe, Control Vee."

name: Hunter's Pack
text: Add a random Hunter Beast, Secret, and weapon to your hand.
flavor: Oh look! It's a trap!

name: Desert Spear
text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Locust with Rush.
flavor: Goes on the right, next to the desert spoon.

name: Making Mummies
text: [x]Quest: Play 5 Reborn minions. Reward: Emperor Wraps.
flavor: "I do say, this gives me the vapors every single time!"

name: Raid the Sky Temple
text: Quest: Cast 10 spells. Reward: Ascendant Scroll.
flavor: "Why can't I hold all these scrolls?"

name: Naga Sand Witch
text: [x]Battlecry: Change the Cost of spells in your hand to (5).
flavor: 5 mana footlong, anyone?

name: Salhet's Pride
text: Deathrattle: Draw two 1-Health minions from your deck.
flavor: Pride cometh before the maul.

name: Sandwasp Queen
text: Battlecry: Add two 2/1 Sandwasps to your hand.
flavor:
Oooh, see that wasp! 
Watch that sting! 
Dig in the Sandwasp Queen!

name: Vilefiend
text: Lifesteal
flavor: Dreamed of becoming a Stylefiend, but fel was never in season.

name: Sir Finley of the Sands
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, Discover an upgraded Hero Power.
flavor: "The sands shall be my sea! And this scarab shall be my, er, strange and wriggly boat!"

name: Mortuary Machine
text: After your opponent plays a minion, give it Reborn.
flavor: The ankle bone's connected to the shin bone. The knuckle bone's connected to the... eh, it'll be fine.

name: Desert Obelisk
text:
[x]If you control 3 of these
at the end of your turn,
deal 5 damage to a
random enemy.
flavor: The Obelisk of the Stars can hide an entire land from prying eyes! Or zap a rando.

name: Mogu Cultist
text: Battlecry: If your board is full of Mogu Cultists, sacrifice them all and summon Highkeeper Ra.
flavor: Mogu cultists have the worst team-building exercises.

name: Blatant Decoy
text: [x]Deathrattle: Each player summons the lowest Cost minion from their hand.
flavor: "Hah! You is being tricked by ME! Togwaggle!"

name: Plague of Wrath
text: Destroy all damaged minions.
flavor: "Thanks, I HATE it!"

name: Livewire Lance
text: After your hero attacks, add a Lackey to your hand.
flavor: The lance is heavy but it’s the battery pack that really does a number on the shoulders.
