Gain 5 Armor.
Draw a card.
flavor: Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.

name: Inner Rage
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
flavor: They're only smiling on the outside.

name: Sorcerer's Apprentice
text: Your spells cost (1) less.
flavor: Apprentices are great for bossing around.  "Conjure me some mana buns! And a coffee!  Make that a mana coffee!"

name: Snipe
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal $4 damage to it.
flavor: A great sniper hits the spot.  Just like a delicious flank of boar. Mmmmm.

name: Explosive Trap
text: Secret: When your hero is attacked, deal $2 damage to all enemies.
flavor: It traps your food AND cooks it for you!

name: Freezing Trap
text: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, return it to its owner's hand. It costs (2) more.
flavor: "Dang, that's cold." - appropriate response to Freezing Trap, or a mean joke.

name: Kirin Tor Mage
text: [x]Battlecry: The next Secret you play this turn costs (0).
flavor: The Kirin Tor reside in the floating city of Dalaran.  How do you make a Dalaran float?  Two scoops of ice cream, one scoop of Dalaran.

name: Edwin VanCleef
text: Combo: Gain +2/+2 for each card played earlier this turn.
flavor: He led the Stonemasons in the reconstruction of Stormwind, and when the nobles refused to pay, he founded the Defias Brotherhood to, well, deconstruct Stormwind.

name: Illidan Stormrage
text: Whenever you play a card, summon a 2/1 Flame of Azzinoth.
flavor: Illidan's brother, Malfurion, imprisoned him beneath Hyjal for 10,000 years. Stormrages are not good at letting go of grudges.

name: Mana Wraith
text: ALL minions cost (1) more.
flavor: They come out at night to eat leftover mana crystals. "Mmmmmm," they say.

name: Deadly Shot
text: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: Our ballista operator is effective, but not picky.

name: Equality
text: Change the Health of ALL minions to 1.
flavor: We are all special unique snowflakes... with 1 Health.

name: Molten Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each damage your hero has taken.
flavor: He gets terrible heartburn.  BECAUSE HE IS FULL OF LAVA.

name: Circle of Healing
text: Restore #4 Health to ALL minions.
flavor: It isn't really a circle.

name: Shadow Word: Death
text: Destroy a minion with 5 or more Attack.
flavor: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

name: Temple Enforcer
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
flavor: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

name: Holy Fire
text: Deal $5 damage. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
flavor: Often followed by Holy Smokes!

name: Shadowform
text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage.' If already in Shadowform: 3 damage.
flavor: If a bright light shines on a priest in Shadowform… do they cast a shadow?

name: Mass Dispel
text: Silence all enemy minions. Draw a card.
flavor: It dispels buffs, powers, hopes, and dreams.

name: Sacrificial Pact
text: Destroy a Demon. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
flavor: This is the reason that Demons never really become friends with Warlocks.

name: Vanish
text: Return all minions to their owner's hand.

name: Kidnapper
text: Combo: Return a minion to its owner's hand.
flavor: He just wants people to see his vacation photos.

name: Starfall
text: Choose One - Deal $5 damage to a minion; or $2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Is the sky falling?  Yes.  Yes it is.

name: Ancient of Lore
text: Choose One - Draw 2 cards; or Restore #5 Health.
flavor: Go ahead, carve your initials in him.

name: Al'Akir the Windlord
text: Charge, Divine Shield, Taunt, Windfury
flavor: He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords.  And the other three don't let him forget it.

name: Kor'kron Elite
text: Charge
flavor: The Kor'kron are the elite forces of Garrosh Hellscream. Let's just say you don't want to run into these guys while wearing a blue tabard.

name: Mana Wyrm
text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: These wyrms feed on arcane energies, and while they are generally considered a nuisance rather than a real threat, you really shouldn't leave them alone with a bucket of mana.

name: Master of Disguise
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Stealth.
flavor: She's actually a male tauren.  People don't call him "Master of Disguise" for nothing.

name: Captain's Parrot
text: Battlecry: Draw a Pirate from your deck.
flavor: Pirates and Parrots go together like Virmen and Carrots.

name: Hungry Crab
text: Battlecry: Destroy a Murloc and gain +2/+2.
flavor: Murloc.  It's what's for dinner.

name: Bloodsail Raider
text: Battlecry: Gain Attack equal to the Attack of your weapon.
flavor: "I only plunder on days that end in 'y'."

name: Knife Juggler
text:
[x]After you summon a
minion, deal 1 damage
to a random enemy.
flavor: Ambitious Knife Jugglers sometimes graduate to Bomb Jugglers.    They never last long enough to make it onto a card though.

name: Wild Pyromancer
text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to ALL minions.
flavor: BOOM BABY BOOM!  BAD IS GOOD!  DOWN WITH GOVERNMENT!

name: Doomsayer
text: At the start of your turn, destroy ALL minions.
flavor: He's almost been right so many times. He was sure it was coming during the Cataclysm.

name: Dread Corsair
text: Taunt Costs (1) less per Attack of your weapon.
flavor: "Yarrrr" is a pirate word that means "Greetings, milord."

name: Faerie Dragon
text: Elusive
flavor: Adorable.  Immune to Magic.  Doesn't pee on the rug.  The perfect pet!

name: Captain Greenskin
text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1/+1.
flavor: He was this close to piloting a massive juggernaut into Stormwind Harbor. If it weren't for those pesky kids!

name: Bloodsail Corsair
text: [x]Battlecry: Remove 1 Durability from your opponent's weapon.
flavor: Every pirate uses the same four digits to access Automated Gold Dispensers.  It's called the "Pirate's Code".

name: Violet Teacher
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Violet Apprentice.
flavor: If you don't pay attention, you may be turned into a pig.  And then you get your name on the board.

name: Southsea Captain
text: Your other Pirates have +1/+1.
flavor: When he saves enough plunder, he's going to commission an enormous captain's hat.  He has hat envy.

name: Millhouse Manastorm
text: Battlecry: Enemy spells cost (0) next turn.
flavor: "I'm gonna light you up, sweetcheeks!"

name: Deathwing
text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions and discard your hand.
flavor: Once a noble dragon known as Neltharion, Deathwing lost his mind and shattered Azeroth before finally being defeated.  Daddy issues?

name: Animal Companion
text: Summon a random Beast Companion.
flavor: You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer!  Huffer is more trouble than he's worth.

name: Commanding Shout
text: Your minions can't be reduced below 1 Health this turn. Draw a card.
flavor: "Shout! Shout! Let it all out!" - Advice to warriors-in-training

name: Master Swordsmith
text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Attack.
flavor: He's currently trying to craft a "flail-axe", but all the other swordsmiths say it can't be done.

name: Gruul
text: At the end of each turn, gain +1/+1 .
flavor: He's Gruul "the Dragonkiller".  He just wanted to cuddle them… he never meant to…

name: Hogger
text: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt.
flavor: Hogger is super powerful. If you kill him, it's because he let you.

name: Stampeding Kodo
text: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
flavor: This Kodo is so big that he can stampede by himself.

name: Elite Tauren Chieftain
text: Battlecry: Give both players the power to ROCK! (with a Power Chord card)
flavor: He's looking for a drummer.  The current candidates are: Novice Engineer, Sen'jin Shieldmasta', and Ragnaros the Firelord.

name: Flesheating Ghoul
text: Whenever a minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: 'Flesheating' is an unfair name.  It's just that there's not really much else for him to eat.

name: Spellbender
text: Secret: When an enemy casts a spell on a minion, summon a 1/3 as the new target.
flavor: While it's fun to intercept enemy lightning bolts, a spellbender much prefers to intercept opposing Marks of the Wild.  It just feels meaner.  And blood elves... well, they're a little mean.

name: Sigil of Summoning
text: At the start of your next turn, summon two 2/2 Demons with Taunt.
flavor: Look, summoning ain’t exactly a science. Sometimes it takes a turn.

name: Fangbound Druid
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Reduce the Cost of a Beast in your hand by (2).
flavor: Bound by the law of the fang, these druid floss their teeth twice a day.

name: Primal Dungeoneer
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a spell. If it's a Nature spell, also draw an Elemental.
flavor: They wanted a Mature Dungeoneer. Instead they got this.

name: Lady Anacondra
text:
Your Nature spells
cost (2) less.
flavor: Do you think she got her name before or after she turned into a snake?

name: Serpentbloom
text: Give a friendly Beast Poisonous.
flavor: "Awww, it's so cute!" —Famous last words

name: Sin'dorei Scentfinder
text: Frenzy: Summon four 1/1 Hyenas with Rush.
flavor: Loves candles. Hates deodorant.

name: Devout Dungeoneer
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a spell. If it's a Holy spell, reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor: "Please do smaller pulls, this is my first time healing."

name: Against All Odds
text:
Destroy ALL
odd-Attack minions.
flavor: Time to EVEN out the playing field.

name: Water Moccasin
text: [x]Stealth Has Poisonous while you  have no other minions.
flavor: You need to be specific when you're ordering waterproof shoewear.

name: Shroud of Concealment
text: Draw 2 minions. Any played this turn gain Stealth for 1 turn.
flavor: This page left intentionally blank.

name: Savory Deviate Delight
text: [x]Transform a minion in both players' hands into a Pirate or Stealth minion.
flavor: "Savory" is a creative way to put it.

name: Perpetual Flame
text: Deal $3 damage to a random enemy minion. If it dies, recast this. Overload: (1)
flavor: Flame is perpetual.* *Perpetual only applies to current turn.

name: Unstable Shadow Blast
text:
[x]Deal $6 damage to a
minion. Excess damage
hits your hero.
flavor: "Unstable" usually means "awesome!"

name: Final Gasp
text:
[x]Deal $1 damage to a
minion. If it dies, summon
a 2/2 Adventurer with a
random bonus effect.
flavor: And with a raspy whisper, he uttered his final words, "rez plz."

name: Stealer of Souls
text: The first card you draw each turn costs Health instead of Mana.
flavor: The tooth fairy gig didn't work out.

name: Man-at-Arms
text: Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, gain +1/+1.
flavor: Arch nemesis of the Man-at-Legs.

name: Whetstone Hatchet
text: After your hero attacks, give a minion in your hand +1 Attack.
flavor: A bad hatchet can make a good spear better.

name: Kresh, Lord of Turtling
text: Frenzy: Gain 8 Armor. Deathrattle: Equip a 2/5 Turtle Spike.
flavor: Never should have flushed him.

name: Devouring Ectoplasm
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Adventurer with  a random bonus effect.
flavor: When it's on keto, it only devours tauren.

name: Meeting Stone
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
add a 2/2 Adventurer
with a random bonus effect
to your hand.
flavor: "I'm clicking on it, but nothing's happening."

name: Selfless Sidekick
text: Battlecry: Equip a random weapon from your deck.
flavor: "I got a real sense of humility from her when she bashed that quilboar's head in."

name: Mutanus the Devourer
text: [x]Battlecry: Eat a minion in your opponent's hand. Gain its stats.
flavor: As long as Naralex stays under the blanket, Mutanus can't get him.

name: Seedcloud Buckler
text: [x]Deathrattle: Give your  minions Divine Shield.
flavor: A shield to some, a frisbee to others (mainly dogs).

name: Judgment of Justice
text: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, set its Attack and Health to 1.
flavor: Look, we don't need a jury. We've got a paladin right here!

name: Party Up!
text: Summon five 2/2 Adventurers with random bonus effects.
flavor: Random? But what if we don't get a tank?

name: Archdruid Naralex
text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns. While Dormant, add a Dream card to your hand   at the end of your turn.
flavor: "Dormant? I think you mean naptime."

name: Deviate Dreadfang
text: After you cast a Nature spell, summon a 4/2 Viper with Rush.
flavor: Even with wings, snakes STILL don't have legs.

name: Venomstrike Bow
text: Poisonous
flavor: "You know you only have to coat the arrowhead in poison and not the entire bow, right?"

name: Taintheart Tormenter
text: Taunt Your opponent's spells cost (2) more.
flavor: Oh boo hoo, did someone's World Tree burn down?

name: Shattering Blast
text: Destroy all Frozen minions.
flavor: Let's be honest, they weren't going to unfreeze anyway.

name: Wailing Vapor
text:
[x]After you play an Elemental,
gain +1 Attack.
flavor: If you have The Vapors, your Humors might be imbalanced.

name: Felrattler
text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: It only rattles when YOU'RE in danger.

name: Cleric of An'she
text: Battlecry: If you've restored Health this turn, Discover a spell from your deck.
flavor: When it's her turn to cook, she'll always go for a Light sear.

name: Frostweave Dungeoneer
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a spell. If it's a Frost spell, summon two 1/1    Elementals that Freeze.
flavor: It's a woven blanket of ice but surprisingly comforting.

name: Floecaster
text: Costs (2) less for each Frozen enemy.
flavor: His real name is Melvin, but he prefers his friends call him ... <sigh> ..."Floecaster."

name: Knight of the Wild
text: Costs (1) less for each Beast you've summoned this game.
flavor: He gets a discount on the tournament entry fee because he is his own horse.

name: Addled Grizzly
text:
After you summon a
Beast, give it +1/+1.
flavor: Druids who spend too long in bear form are more susceptible to the whispers of the Old Gods.  Right now they are whispering the lyrics to "La Bamba".

name: Klaxxi Amber-Weaver
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, gain +5 Health.
flavor: Amberweaving is a specialty course at the local trade school.

name: Malorne
text: Deathrattle: Go Dormant. Revive after 2 friendly Beasts die.
flavor: When Malorne isn't mauling hordes of demons, he enjoys attending parties, though he prefers to go stag.

name: Aviana
text: Your minions cost (1).
flavor: Call her "Tweety".  She'll find it real funny.  I PROMISE.

name: Rat Sensei
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Turtles with Taunt to your hand.
flavor: The old teacher needed to find some tokens with attitude.

name: Invigorate
text: Choose One - Gain an empty Mana Crystal; or Draw a card.
flavor: No. 3 Most Internally Contentious Hearthstone Card of 2022.

name: Cenarion Hold
text: [x]Your next Choose One card this turn has both effects combined.
flavor: After the War of the Shifting Sands, Cenarion Hold became a strategic outpost, awaiting the moment when the armies of C'Thun would rise once again.

name: Snipe
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal $6 damage to it.
flavor: A great sniper hits the spot.  Just like a delicious flank of boar. Mmmmm.

name: Ball of Spiders
text: Summon three 1/1 Webspinners with "Deathrattle: Get a random Beast."
flavor: "THEY'RE EVERYWHERE GET THEM OFF!!!" - Everyone

name: Explorer's Hat
text: Give a minion +1/+1 and "Deathrattle: Get an Explorer's Hat."
flavor: Harrison Jones was disappointed that he didn't get to be part of the League of Explorers, but his hat did.

name: Lock and Load
text: Each time you cast a spell this turn, get a random Hunter card.
flavor:
Rexxar narrowed his eyes, grabbed his machine gun, and said: "It's go time.  Lock and load."
This card pays homage to that special moment.

name: Acidmaw
text: Whenever an enemy minion takes damage, destroy it.
flavor: With the help of his trusty sidekick Dreadscale, the giant jormungar Acidmaw is ready to face any knight!

name: Dreadscale
text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all enemies.
flavor: Let's be clear about this:  ACIDMAW is the sidekick.

name: Durnholde Imposter
text: [x]Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a random 3-Cost minion that gains Poisonous.
flavor: Assassins of the Infinite Dragonflight waited for their moment to strike at Thrall before he ever became Warchief.

name: Time-Lost Raptor
text: Echo Battlecry: Adapt your Time-Lost Raptors.
flavor: Much of his time lost no-lifeing Diablo IV.

name: Trial of the Jormungars
text: Summon copies of two Beasts in your deck that cost (3) or less.
flavor: The defendants were found guilty on 33 counts of wiping raid parties.

name: Dalaran Aspirant
text: Spell Damage +1 Inspire: Gain Spell Damage +1.
flavor: Is he aspiring or inspiring?  Make up your mind!

name: Mana Wyrm
text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: These wyrms feed on arcane energies, and while they are generally considered a nuisance rather than a real threat, you really shouldn't leave them alone with a bucket of mana.

name: Soot Spewer
text: Spell Damage +1 Battlecry: If you control another Mech, get a random Fire spell.
flavor: The inventor of the goblin shredder is involved in several patent disputes with the inventor of the soot spewer.

name: Goblin Blastmage
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a Mech, deal 6 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: If you can't find a bomb to throw, just pick up any goblin invention and throw that.

name: Servant of Yogg-Saron
text: [x]Battlecry: Cast a random  spell that costs (5) or MORE   (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: Yogg-Saron always likes to complain about how he has too many servants and there are too many mouths to feed.

name: Cabalist's Tome
text:
Get 3 random
Mage spells.
flavor: What's in there? I bet it's cookie recipes!

name: Flame Leviathan
text: [x]Rush When you draw this, deal 2 damage to all characters except Mechs.
flavor: Mimiron likes to take the Flame Leviathan out on some sweet joyrides.

name: Black Morass Imposter
text: [x]Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a   random 2-Cost minion that     gains Spell Damage +1.
flavor: Does something seem off about Medivh's apprentice to you?

name: Disco at the End of Time
text: Cast 5 random Secrets from the past. At the start of your turn, destroy them.
flavor: This is what you've been saving the last dance for.

name: Chromie, Timehopper
text: [x]Battlecry: Visit a Historical Epoch. Shuffle the others into your deck.
flavor: "Noz, you're telling me you built a time machine...out of a Hearthstone card?"

name: Ivory Knight
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell. Restore Health to your hero equal to its Cost.
flavor: Do NOT call it a "horse".

name: Grimestreet Enforcer
text: At the end of your turn, give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: "Sir, you don't have a permit to park your mount here."

name: Lay on Hands
text: Restore #8 Health. Draw 3 cards.
flavor: A grammatically awkward life saver.

name: Enter the Coliseum
text: Destroy all minions except each player's highest Attack minion.
flavor: You have to get past the vendors first.  So many are lost to shopping...

name: Timeless Blessing
text: Give four random minions in your hand +4/+4, +3/+3, +2/+2, and +1/+1.
flavor: To defeat the combined power of Murozond and C'Thun, Nozdormu would need heroes of Azeroth's past, present, and future.

name: Bronze Dragonknight
text: [x]Taunt. Battlecry: If this has 5 or more Attack,  summon a copy of this.
flavor: He had been here before, and in some ways, he would always be fighting in Silithus.

name: Runi, Time Explorer
text: Battlecry: Discover a location from the FUTURE!
flavor: In the future, Xyrella's daughter would become a hero of time, but Nozdormu needed her now, for this moment.

name: Museum Curator
text: Battlecry: Discover a Deathrattle card. It costs (1) less.
flavor: He is forever cursing the kids who climb on the rails and the evil archeologists who animate the exhibits.

name: Onyx Bishop
text: Battlecry: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game.
flavor: B4 is a nice place to visit, but he wouldn't want to live there.

name: Spawn of Shadows
text: Battlecry and Inspire: Deal 4 damage to each hero.
flavor: What did you expect to happen?  He's a Spawn.  Of Shadows.

name: Shadowfiend
text: Whenever you draw a card, reduce its Cost by (1).
flavor: Hopes to be promoted to "Shadowfriend" someday.

name: Shadowbomber
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to each hero.
flavor: Shadowbomber does her job, but she's kind of phoning it in at this point.

name: Confessor Paletress
text: Battlecry and Inspire: Summon a random Legendary minion.
flavor: She sees into your past and makes you face your fears.  Most common fear:  Getting Majordomo out of Sneed's Old Shredder.

name: Shadow Word: Forbid
text: Tradeable Destroy a 4-Attack minion. Corrupt: Destroy ALL 4-Attack minions.
flavor: At last, Priest has no more weaknesses.

name: Ship's Chirurgeon
text: After you summon a minion, give it +1 Health.
flavor: Knows the answer to every medical question except how to pronounce his name.

name: Murozond, Thief of Time
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, Discover a Dragon. Deal damage equal to its Cost to all other minions.
flavor: By unwinding the fall of C'Thun, Murozond would claim the Old God's power, and with it, the world.

name: Jade Swarmer
text: Stealth Deathrattle: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.
flavor: He's so good at swarming, he can swarm all by himself!

name: Jade Shuriken
text: Deal $3 damage. Combo: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.
flavor: Good news is, after you remove it from your wound, you can use it to pay your medical bills!

name: Burgle
text: Get 3 random cards (from your opponent's class).
flavor: Yoink!

name: Dark Iron Skulker
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all undamaged enemy minions.
flavor: He loves skulking. He skulks after hours just for the joy of it, but his friends are pretty worried he'll get burnt out.

name: Blade of C'Thun
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Add its Attack and Health to your C'Thun's (wherever it is).
flavor: C'Thun demands a sacrifice! Preferably a Deathwing.

name: Anub'arak
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/4 Nerubian with "Deathrattle: Summon Anub'arak."
flavor: Was actually a pretty nice guy before, you know, the whole Lich King thing.

name: Mount Hyjal Imposter
text: [x]Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a random 4-Cost minion that gains Stealth.
flavor: Among Tyrande's forces, Murozond had planted agents to ensure Archimonde's victory.

name: Jade Telegram
text: [x]Look at 3 cards in your opponent's hand and shuffle one of them into their deck. Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.
flavor: Golem-gram for Han'Cho! Golem-gram for Han'Cho!

name: The Scarab Lord
text: Battlecry: Summon a 0/1 Gong for your opponent. Combo: Gain Rush.
flavor: What did it cost? 41,400 Silithid Carapace Fragments, to start.

name: Tuskarr Totemic
text: Battlecry: Summon a random basic Totem.
flavor: Turns out the tuskarr aren't real choosy about their totems.

name: Jade Lightning
text: Deal $3 damage. Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.
flavor: Jade Lightning, goooo Jade Lightning!

name: Wicked Witchdoctor
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random basic Totem.
flavor: You can easily defeat her by either dealing 4 damage, or dropping a house on her.

name: Jade Chieftain
text: Battlecry: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem. Give it Taunt.
flavor: Seeing his Jade Golem grow up into the tall, handsome 6/6 standing before him was the proudest moment of his life.

name: Thunder Bluff Valiant
text: Battlecry and Inspire: Give your Totems +2 Attack.
flavor: Allowing totems to attack is not cheating.  I mean, there isn't anything in the rule books about it.

name: Call in the Finishers
text:
Summon four
1/1 Murlocs.
flavor: When you really need a job done… but you don't really care if it gets done right.

name: Pebbly Page
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw an Overload card. You can't be Overloaded this turn.
flavor: A good friend will lighten your Overload.

name: Totally Totems
text: Summon all FIVE?! basic Totems. Overload: (1)
flavor: Hmph. Should've been Grace of Air Totem. Hmph.

name: Al'Akir, the Winds of Time
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a Charge, Divine Shield, Taunt, and Windfury minion.
flavor: Murozond sought unlikely allies in his fight against the Bronze Dragonflight.

name: Demonfuse
text: Give a Demon +3/+3.
flavor: Very dangerous when attached to a demonbomb.

name: Darkbomb
text: Deal $3 damage to a character. If it dies, draw a Shadow spell.
flavor: If you're looking to make an "Emo" deck, this card is perfect!

name: Dark Peddler
text: Battlecry: Discover a 1-Cost card.
flavor: I'm offering you a bargain here!  This amazing vacuum cleaner for your soul!

name: Spreading Madness
text: Deal $13 damage randomly split among ALL characters.
flavor: Most citizens of Darkshire wear those surgical masks to prevent spreading Madness to tourists.

name: Silverware Golem
text: If you discard this minion, summon it.
flavor: From the secret research labs of the Swiss Army.

name: Tiny Knight of Evil
text: Whenever you discard a card, gain +2/+1.
flavor: "No, no, no. I asked for a tiny JESTER of evil."

name: Dark Bargain
text: Destroy 2 random enemy minions. Discard 2 random cards.
flavor: A prime example of lose-lose negotiating.

name: Chamber of Viscidus
text:
[x]Look at 3 cards in your
hand and choose one to
discard. Draw two cards.
flavor: Whose house? Ooze House.

name: Witch of the Arch-Thief
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 1/3 Voidwalker with Taunt. If your opponent has more minions, repeat.
flavor: A minion fit for a king.

name: Cho'gall
text: [x]Battlecry: Return all cards you discarded this game to your hand. They cost Health instead of Mana.
flavor: Even after all this time, Gul'dan still makes Cho'gall go get donuts and coffee.

name: Grimy Gadgeteer
text: At the end of your turn, give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: "You look like a Gadgetgun 3000-Mark IV man, am I right?"

name: Stolen Goods
text: Draw a Taunt minion. Give it +2/+2.
flavor: It fell off a kodo, I promise!

name: Ancient Shieldbearer
text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, gain 10 Armor.
flavor: Back in her day, each shield weighed two tons and she had to carry four of them on each arm!

name: Champions of Azeroth
text: [x]Choose Alliance or Horde. Get 2 of their Legendary Champions and reduce their Costs by (2).
flavor: Weeee are the champions of the Wooorld… of Warcraft!
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a The Great Dark Beyond card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after opening a golden The Great Dark Beyond card pack.

name: Iron Juggernaut
text: [x]Battlecry and Deathrattle: Shuffle a Mine into your opponent's deck. When drawn, explode for 10 damage!
flavor: The Iron Juggernaut guards Orgrimmar and has just earned the "Employee of the Month" award!

name: Blast from the Past
text: Get 2 Spare Parts. Summon two 1/1 Boom Bots. Shuffle a Bomb into your opponent's deck.
flavor: Talk about a nostalgia bomb.

name: Ivory Rook
text: Battlecry: Discover a Taunt minion. Gain Armor equal to its Cost.
flavor: Bringing back this cycle was risky, but the Ivory Queen thought it was worth the gambit.

name: Hobart Grapplehammer
text: [x]Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, give all minions in your hand and deck +2/+2.
flavor: Grapplehammer is the horrible mind behind the Automatic Piranha Launcher (banned in 7 districts)!

name: Jade Spirit
text: Battlecry: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.
flavor: "He's so cute!  I just want to squeeze him, then use him for Jade Golem parts!" - Aya Blackpaw

name: Twilight Geomancer
text: Taunt Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +1/+1 and Taunt (wherever it is).
flavor: "Ok C'Thun, repeat after me: 'Your mother was a hamster.'"

name: C'Thun's Chosen
text: [x]Divine Shield Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +3/+3 (wherever it is).
flavor: He gave her a promise ring and everything.

name: Disciple of C'Thun
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage. Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is).
flavor: C’Thun’s recruiting pitch involves cookies, which is why it’s the most popular Old God.

name: Sludge Belcher
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 1/2 Slime with Taunt.
flavor: DO NOT GIVE HIM A ROOT BEER.
how_to_earn: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
how_to_earn_golden: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

name: Kabal Courier
text: Battlecry: Discover a Mage, Priest, or Warlock card.
flavor: Hey, you park your kodo under a harpy nest, you get what you deserve.

name: Crazed Worshipper
text: [x]Taunt Whenever this minion takes damage, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
flavor: Every month they share a pancake breakfast with the Perfectly Rational Worshippers.

name: Emperor Thaurissan
text:
At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of cards
in your hand by (1).
flavor: His second greatest regret is summoning an evil Firelord who enslaved his entire people.

name: Twin Emperor Vek'lor
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, summon another Emperor.
flavor: Do they make decisions based on age? "I'm two minutes older therefore we burn this village."

name: C'Thun
text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: C'Thun's least favorite Hearthstone card: Eye for an Eye.

name: Aya Blackpaw
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.
flavor: Though young, Aya took over as the leader of Jade Lotus through her charisma and strategic acumen when her predecessor was accidentally crushed by a jade golem.

name: Don Han'Cho
text: Battlecry: Give a random minion in your hand +5/+5.
flavor: The brilliant mastermind of the Grimy Goons, Han sometimes thinks about ditching the idiot Cho, but that would just tear him apart.

name: Shark Puncher
text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly Pirate +2/+2.
flavor:
"And remember, if you come face-to-face with a shark, punch it in the nose."
"Yes. Me punch you in nose with shark."
"No, th- OW!"

name: Timeline Accelerator
text: Battlecry: Draw a Mech. It costs (2) less.
flavor: The future is NOW! No wait, NOW!

name: Future Emissary
text: [x]Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of all Dragons in your hand  by (1). Give them +1/+1.
flavor: When Murozond attacked the past, Nozdormu sought help from the future, even journeying as far as the Forbidden Reach.

name: Menagerie Mug
text: [x]Battlecry: Give 3 random friendly minions of different minion types +1/+1.
flavor: He's a chip off the old jug.

name: Menagerie Jug
text: [x]Battlecry: Give 3 random friendly minions of different minion types +2/+2.
flavor: It's art imitating Battlegrounds imitating life.

name: Infinite Amalgam
text: [x]Inspire, Frenzy, Spellburst, Honorable Kill, and Overkill: Summon a random 1-Cost minion.
flavor: The Infinite Amalgam sought Gammy, the greatest among them, though it feared the queen of the amalgams would never be found.

name: Eyestalk of C'Thun
text: [x]Taunt, Lifesteal Whenever your C'Thun gains Attack or Health, this does too (wherever it is).
flavor: C'Thun sees all...even next week's lottery numbers.

name: Avatar of Hearthstone
text: Battlecry: Open a Standard Pack. Play all cards from it.
flavor: Now introducing -- Hearthstone Portable!
how_to_earn: Earnable after opening a The Great Dark Beyond card pack.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after opening a golden The Great Dark Beyond card pack.

name: Soridormi
text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns. When this awakens, reduce the Cost of all Dragons in your hand by (4).
flavor: Perdón! I slept.

name: King of Beasts
text: [x]Taunt Has +1 Attack for each other Beast you control.
flavor: He never sleeps.  Not even in the mighty jungle.

name: Virmen Sensei
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +3/+3.
flavor: There is no carrot.

name: Mire Keeper
text: [x]Choose One - Summon a 2/2 Slime; or Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavor:
"Hey.... Is that Mire for sale?" 
"No.  I'm keeping it."

name: Jade Behemoth
flavor: I think we should talk about the jade elephant in the room.

name: Dark Arakkoa
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +4/+4 (wherever it is).
flavor: There's a whole gradient of Arakkoa! This one is on the darker side.

name: Menagerie Warden
text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Beast. Summon a copy of it.
flavor: Please? Can I keep him? I promise to clean his cage every day.

name: Cobra Shot
text:
Deal $3 damage to
a minion and the
enemy hero.
flavor: "Cobra Shot" hurts way, way, way more than "Cobra Cuddle."

name: Shaky Zipgunner
text: [x]Deathrattle: Give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: The Grimy Goons can get you any weapon you want but if you want it to not explode you gotta pay extra.

name: Kabal Crystal Runner
text: Costs (2) less for each Secret you've played this game.
flavor: "Listen, I can cut you in on a little of this premium mana, but you can't tell my boss."

name: Silvermoon Portal
text:
Give a minion +2/+2. Summon a random
2-Cost minion.
flavor: What's Millhouse Manastorm doing in Silvermoon?

name: Steward of Darkshire
text: Whenever you summon a 1-Health minion, give it Divine Shield.
flavor: Turns out divine shields are way cheaper if you buy in bulk.

name: Keeper of Uldaman
text: Battlecry: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.
flavor: U da man!  No, U da man!

name: Wickerflame Burnbristle
text: Taunt Divine Shield Lifesteal
flavor: Wickerflame spent years as a recruit for the Goons, never making the big-time because he always fired his chest-cannon too slowly.  "Hey," he thought, "maybe if I keep my beard lit on fire, I can do this faster."  BOOM, promoted.

name: Hooded Acolyte
text: [x]Taunt Whenever a character is healed, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
flavor: Wait, what kind of acolyte doesn't wear a hood?

name: Shrinkmeister
text: Battlecry: Give a minion -3 Attack this turn.
flavor: After the debacle of the Gnomish World Enlarger, gnomes are wary of size-changing inventions.

name: Darkshire Alchemist
text: Battlecry: Restore #5 Health.
flavor: The secret ingredient: liquified funnel cake.

name: Shado-Pan Rider
text: Combo: Gain +4 Attack.
flavor: He needed a break after that business in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms. Naturally, he chose to spend his vacation in an icy snowscape killing monsters.

name: Undercity Huckster
text: Deathrattle: Get a random card (from your opponent's class).
flavor: Psst! Wanna buy a random class card (from your opponent's class)?

name: Poisoned Blade
text:
Your Hero Power gives this +1 Attack instead
of replacing it.
flavor: How much more poisoned can a blade get?  The answer is a lot.  A lot more poisoned.

name: Healing Wave
text: Restore #8 Health. Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, restore #16 instead.
flavor: Favored by shaman who study the art of restoration and healing, this spell would feel smug, if it had feelings.

name: Charged Hammer
text: Deathrattle: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage.'
flavor: You can only pick it up if you are worthy.

name: Usher of Souls
text: Whenever a minion dies, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
flavor: Nothing unburdens your soul like a good ushing!

name: Bane of Doom
text: Deal $3 damage to a character. If that kills it, summon a random Demon.
flavor: My advice to you is to avoid Doom, if possible.

name: Krul the Unshackled
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, summon all  Demons from your hand.
flavor: Spicklefizz pondered his life choices as he looked at the chain around his neck. "Become a warlock," they said. "You get to enslave demons," they said.

name: Bouncing Blade
text: Deal $1 damage to a random minion. Repeat until a minion dies.
flavor: Only goblins would think this was a good idea. Even they are starting to have their doubts.

name: Brass Knuckles
text:
[x]After your hero attacks,
give a random minion in
your hand +1/+1.
flavor: For the goon that wants to make a fashion statement.

name: Mukla's Champion
text: Inspire: Give your other minions +1/+1.
flavor: An elegant gorilla, for a more civilized age.

name: Blackwing Corruptor
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 5 damage.
flavor: He got his name when he gave Blackwing some comic books and rock & roll records.

name: Cult Apothecary
text: Battlecry: For each enemy minion, restore #2 Health to your hero.
flavor: Cults need pharmacists too.

name: Grimestreet Informant
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a Hunter, Paladin, or Warrior card.
flavor: "Naw, naw.  You're talkin' about Grime BOULEVARD.  I ain't know nuthin' 'bout that."

name: Lotus Agents
text: Battlecry: Discover a Druid, Rogue, or Shaman card.
flavor: Mostly, they stand around and look cool.

name: A Light in the Darkness
text: Discover a Paladin minion. Give it +2/+2.
flavor: Wait, how can you have a light in the dark?  If you turn on a light while it’s dark, doesn’t that mean it’s no longer dark?

name: Mysterious Challenger
text: Battlecry: Put one of each Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
flavor: He may sound surly and antisocial, but he's actually just really shy.

name: Reincarnate
text:
Destroy a minion,
then return it to life with full Health.
flavor: It's like birth, except you're an adult and you were just dead a second ago.

name: Hallazeal the Ascended
text: Spell Damage +1 Your spells have Lifesteal.
flavor: Hallazeals all your dallazamage.

name: Ironforge Portal
text:
Gain 4 Armor.
Summon a random
4-Cost minion.
flavor: Come to beautiful Ironforge! Where irons are forged and the forges are iron!

name: Axe Flinger
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor: Once a lowly "Stick Flinger", he's been relentless on the path to his ultimate dream: "Tauren Flinger".

name: Alley Armorsmith
text: [x]Taunt Whenever this minion deals damage, gain that much Armor.
flavor: The rent is cheap and she passes the savings onto YOU!

name: Tomb Pillager
text: Deathrattle: Get a Coin.
flavor: After the guild broke up, he could no longer raid the tombs.

name: Flame Lance
text:
Deal $25 damage
to a minion.
flavor: It's on the rack next to ice lance, acid lance, and English muffin lance.

name: Convert
text: Put a copy of an enemy minion into your hand. It costs (1).
flavor: "Are you interested in... HEALTH benefits?!"

name: Spellslinger
text: Battlecry: Both players get a random spell. Yours costs (2) less.
flavor: Does he sling spells, or do his spells linger about.  Who can say?

name: Valstann Staghelm
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a Taunt minion from your deck.
flavor: Son, Champion, Martyr

name: Smuggler's Crate
text: Give a random Beast in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: Are you sure these are the crates that are supposed to go to the Gadgetzan petting zoo?

name: I Know a Guy
text: Discover a Taunt minion. Give it +1/+2.
flavor: Well… a guy who knows a guy.

name: Small-Time Buccaneer
text: Has +2 Attack while you have a weapon equipped.
flavor: "Oh, I'm not serious about it.  I only pirate on the weekends."

name: Acolyte of Pain
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, draw a card.
flavor: He trained when he was younger to be an acolyte of joy, but things didn’t work out like he thought they would.

name: Street Trickster
text: Spell Damage +2
flavor: His first trick: making your wallet disappear!

name: Worgen Greaser
flavor: Hair products are 79% of his monthly budget.

name: Trust Fall
text: [x]Discover two minions that cost (5) or less. They gain each other's Attack and Health.
flavor: Earthmother, catch me.

name: Busy-Bot
text: Battlecry: Give your 1-Attack minions +1/+1.
flavor: Busy-Bot likes a clean desktop.

name: Vacation Planning
text: Restore #4 Health. Summon 3 Silver Hand Recruits. Draw 2 cards.
flavor: Reporting for vacation!

name: Agency Espionage
text: Shuffle a card from each other class into your deck. They cost (1).
flavor: What gnomish monitoring devices lack in subtlety, they make up for in robustness.

name: Sharp Shipment
text: Give your weapon +2/+2.
flavor: Pre-check is amazing these days. New rules say you don't have to take off your shoes, helmet, or daggers!

name: Robocaller
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw an {0}, {1}, and {2}-Cost card. (Numbers dialed randomly each turn!)
flavor: When I was your age, robocallers had to dial themselves!

name: Deadline
text: Tradeable, Temporary Destroy a minion.
flavor: For all you procrastinators out there, don't worry. That's why we added Tradeable.

name: Fine Print
text: Deal $4 damage to all minions. (Excess damage hits your hero.)
flavor: Text in italics can't hurt you. (Yes it can.)

name: Imployee of the Month
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Lifesteal.
flavor: Imployee of the Month, 666 months running.

name: Travel Security
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Summon a random 8-Cost minion.
flavor:
"You're just gonna let ANY 8-Cost minion get past you!?"
"...Yeah..."

name: Hydration Totem
text:
[x]At the end of your
turn, give adjacent
minions +1/+1.
flavor: This filtered water really cleanses the spirit.

name: Huddle Up
text: Fill your board with random Naga.
flavor: Spell, Naga, Naga, Naga, Naga, Naga, Naga, Naga...

name: Turbulus
text: Hunter Tourist. Battlecry: Give +1/+1 to all other Battlecry minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavor: "Passengers, we will be experiencing some minor Turbulus in the next few expansions."

name: Demonic Deal
text: [x]Lifesteal. Deal $4 damage to a minion. Put a random Demon that costs (5) or more on top of your deck.
flavor: The Burning Legion upped their efforts to sell Argus Timeshares.

name: Spirit Peddler
text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Reduce the Cost of a random minion in your hand by (6).
flavor: *facepalm* I asked for an art piece of a ghost on a bicycle...

name: Infernal Stapler
text: After your hero attacks, deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavor: Excuse me, I believe you have my stapler…

name: Silvermoon Brochure
text: Give a minion Immune this turn and +2/+2. (Flips each turn.)
flavor: It's lovely to visit this time of year. Just ignore that enormous scarred area outside.

name: Workhorse
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/1 Ponies.
flavor: Give me ONE reason why a horse shouldn’t be allowed in the travel agency.

name: Cash Cow
text: [x]Taunt Whenever this takes damage, get a Coin.
flavor: Show me the moo-ney!

name: Monkey Business
text: Add 8 Bananas to your hand. Any that can't fit are randomly fed to friendly minions in play.
flavor: Why aren't the bananas randomly split???

name: Reserved Spot
text:
[x]Give a random minion
in your hand +4/+4.
If it's the only one there,
reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor: She needs a spot to make sure she can quickly get to her trunk.

name: Punch Card
text: Give your hero +3 Attack and "Also damages adjacent minions" this turn.
flavor: Don't forget to punch out when you Cleave.

name: Alloy Advisor
text: Taunt Whenever this takes damage, gain 3 Armor.
flavor: Numbers may betray you, but steel... steel you can trust.

name: Handle with Bear
text: [x]Get two 3/3 Bears with Taunt. Each turn they are in your hand, they gain +1/+1.
flavor: We guarantee your luggage will arrive at the speed of bear.

name: Number Cruncher
text: [x]Rush, Taunt Choose Thrice - Gain +2 Attack; or +2 Health.
flavor: *gasp* So 7 DID eat 9!!

name: Burndown
text:
[x]Draw 3 cards and
light them on fire.
In 3 turns, any still
  in hand are destroyed!
flavor: Trust me, the next 3 cards in my deck are FIRE.

name: Dreamplanner Zephrys
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose a Travel Tour to get two potentially perfect cards from it.
flavor: "Your trip is my suggestion!"

name: Eternal Layover
text: [x]Give ALL minions Reborn, then destroy all minions.
flavor: Get away from it all! Forever.

name: Icecrown Brochure
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion and Freeze its neighbors. (Flips each turn.)
flavor: The Icecrown ski slopes really are to die for.

name: Envoy of Prosperity
text: Battlecry: Put the highest Cost card in your hand on top of your deck.
flavor: "Our prosperity is beyond a shadow of a doubt!"

name: Job Shadower
text: Battlecry: If your hero took damage this turn, summon a copy of this.
flavor: "Our prosperity… is beyond… a shadow of… a doubt! Ok, got it!"

name: Clumsy Steward
text: After ANY card is drawn, make it Temporary.
flavor: "Aww, bummer! I spilled coffee all over your cards! Dang it! What a shame!"

name: Busy Peon
text: Deathrattle: Your next location costs (2) less.
flavor: Chopping wood, mining gold and repairing buildings? None of these pursuits called to Grob...pencil doodling on wood was his true labor of love.

name: Carnivorous Cubicle
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion. Summon a copy of it at the end of your turns.
flavor: Hey, no eating at your desk!

name: Travelmaster Dungar
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon three minions from your deck that are from different expansions.
flavor: Our travel options will take you to Paradise and beyond!

name: Un'Goro Brochure
text: [x]Draw two minions. Give them +2/+2. (Flips each turn.)
flavor: Our Un'Goro package includes the Tortollan travel tour! Just don't mind the Devilsaurs.

name: Portalmancer Skyla
text: [x]Rogue Tourist Battlecry: Swap the Costs of the lowest and highest Cost spells in your hand.
flavor: "Say goodbye to red-eye gryphon flights!"

name: Soul Searching
text: Discover a card from your deck. Spend 5 Corpses to copy it.
flavor: ctrl-f 'soul'

name: Kobold Miner
text: Battlecry: Excavate a treasure.
flavor: A mining kobold that costs 2, has very low health, and gives you resources… what is this, Warcraft Rumble?
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Showdown in the Badlands Reward Track.

name: Burrow Buster
text: Rush Battlecry: Excavate a treasure.
flavor: We almost went with the name "Giant Drill", but then it would've HAD to be an 8/8.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Showdown in the Badlands Reward Track.

name: Bounty Board
text: Your Excavate, Quickdraw, Tradeable, and Legendary cards cost (1) less.
flavor: Reno's desire to be a face known around the Badlands might have backfired a little bit.

name: Dart Throw
text: [x]Throw two $2 damage darts at random enemy minions. (If both hit the same minion, get a Coin!)
flavor: Did you know: Hitting the same target twice is only for skilled players. This has been a 'Dart Fact'!

name: Cryopreservation
text: Freeze an enemy. Excavate a treasure.
flavor: Remember to take the elementals out of the freezer before Mom gets home!

name: Doctor Holli'dae
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck started with no duplicates, equip the Staff of the Nine Frogs.
flavor: If anything can heal the Badlands, it is the power of frogs!

name: Living Prairie
text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, summon two 3/3 Cows with Rush.
flavor:
Whoooooa, we're half way there
Whooa-oh, -

name: Azerite Giant
text:
[x]Costs (1) less for each
turn in a row you've
played an Elemental.
flavor: Either that giant isn't really giant, or that doorway is HUGE!
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Showdown in the Badlands Reward Track.

name: Skarr, the Catastrophe
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemies (improved by each turn in a row you've  played an Elemental).
flavor: We're not in Karazhan anymore, Reno.

name: Trusty Companion
text:
[x]Give a minion +2/+3.
If it has a minion type,
draw one of that type.
flavor: Textbook big-sibling and little-sibling relationship.

name: Disposal Assistant
text: [x]Battlecry and Deathrattle: Put a Barrel of Sludge on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: A bright green liquid that people say is bad for you... That's either hazardous waste OR a new popular brand of soft drink.

name: Waste Remover
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
destroy the bottom 3
cards of your deck.
flavor: Always follow the three Rs: REDUCE their world to ash, REUSE their bones as paperweights, and RECYCLE!

name: Sludge on Wheels
text: [x]Rush. Whenever this takes damage, get a Barrel of Sludge and add one to the bottom of your deck.
flavor: Cruisin' for an oozin'.

name: Tram Mechanic
text: Deathrattle: Get a Barrel of Sludge. TOXIC WASTE: Handle with care.
flavor: He looks at life through sludge-tinted glasses.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Showdown in the Badlands Reward Track.

name: Showdown!
text: Both players summon three 3/3 Outlaws. Give yours Rush.
flavor: An epic confrontation between the outlaws and the in-laws.

name: Swarm of Lightbugs
text: Summon 10 1/1 Lightbugs with Lifesteal. Save any excess in a 1-Cost Bottle.
flavor: No, I asked for 'lightNING in a bottle'!

name: Tram Heist
text:
Get a copy of each
card your opponent played last turn.
flavor: How are they gunna steal the whole tram!?

name: Reno, Lone Ranger
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck started with no duplicates, remove all enemy minions from the game.
flavor: With an uncertain past and a questionable future, Reno was lucky to find his home on the range.

name: Amphibious Elixir
text: Restore #5 Health. Discover a spell.
flavor: Made by frogs, for frogs, from frogs.

name: Giant Tumbleweed!!!
text: Deal $6 damage to all minions. Summon a 6/6 Tumbleweed.
flavor: Skarr's second-biggest hobby after laying waste to the Badlands is bowling.

name: Pop'gar the Putrid
text: Your Fel spells cost (2) less and have Lifesteal. Battlecry: Get two Barrels of Sludge.
flavor:
All around the arid badlands
The Outlaws chased the Townsfolk
Gerry had a train full of sludge
POP! goes the sludge train

name: Fracking
text:
[x]Look at the bottom
3 cards of your deck.
Draw one and destroy
the others.
flavor: For fhe person who jusf cannof decide whaf card fo puf info a deck!

name: Trapdoor Spider
text: [x]Stealth, Poisonous After your opponent plays a minion, attack it.
flavor: I can respect that they're important for the ecosystem, as long as you keep them waaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaay over there.

name: Skeleton Crew
text: [x]Battlecry: Excavate a treasure. It costs (0).
flavor: They don't sweat, breathe or need lit candles... what more could you ask?

name: Pile of Bones
text: Deathrattle: The next time you Excavate, resummon this.
flavor: It's a very well-organized pile, I'll give you that.

name: Dehydrate
text: Lifesteal. Deal $4 damage to a minion. Quickdraw: Costs (1).
flavor: JUST A LITTLE FURTHER LITTLE GUY, YOU CAN MAKE IT!!!

name: Minecart Cruiser
text: [x]Rush, Overload: (2) Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, don't Overload.
flavor:
Where are you drivin',
Minecart Cruiser?
Where is your bounty,
fortune, and fame?

name: Cactus Cutter
text: Battlecry: Draw a spell. If you cast it this turn, gain +1/+2 and Taunt.
flavor: Best friend of Spinetail Drake.

name: Detonation Juggernaut
text: Taunt. Battlecry: Give Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: Did you really need a whole giant mecha-suit just for one bundle of dynamite?

name: Miracle Salesman
text: Deathrattle: Get a Tradeable Snake Oil.
flavor: "Hey! Hope you’re well. Have you ever wanted to be your own boss?"

name: Snake Oil Seller
text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle 2 Tradeable Snake Oils into your opponent's deck.
flavor: This oil is absolutely essential to your gameplan.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Showdown in the Badlands Reward Track.

name: Howdyfin
text:
[x]Whenever your hand has
less than 3 cards in it,
get a random Murloc.
flavor: You know who to blame if your drinking water tastes a little fishy.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the Showdown in the Badlands Tavern Pass.

name: Reinforced Plating
text: Gain 6 Armor. Excavate a treasure.
flavor: I am become death, destroyer of azerite.

name: Holy Cowboy
text: Battlecry: Your next Holy spell costs (2) less.
flavor: Wait, but… Isn't he more of a 'holy kodoboy'?

name: Prismatic Beam
text:
[x]Deal $3 damage to all 
enemies. Costs (1) less
for each enemy minion.
flavor: Seven colors of the rainbow, one for each enemy minion.

name: Spirit of the Badlands
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck started with no duplicates, get a permanent Mirage.
flavor: That's the spirit! Of the Badlands.

name: Deputization Aura
text: Your left-most minion has +1 Attack and Lifesteal. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: You're my favorite deput- oh. You died… Ok just kidding, THAT guy is my favorite deputy.

name: Lawful Longarm
text: [x]Rush, Lifesteal Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each card in your hand.
flavor: Loves to lob law bombs from his law blog.

name: Hi Ho Silverwing
text: Divine Shield Deathrattle: Draw a Holy spell.
flavor: I swear this minion had 3000 Attack at one point!

name: The Badlands Bandits
text: [x]Get eight 3/2 Bandits with Bonus Effects. Any that can't fit in your hand are summoned instead.
flavor: Bandits... ASSEMBLE!

name: Blast Tortoise
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Deal damage to all enemy minions equal to this minion's Attack.
flavor:
Who's that minion?
...
Iiiiit's Blast Tortoise!
"Blast tortoise."

name: Battlepickaxe
text: After you play a Taunt minion, gain +1 Durability.
flavor: You can pick your battles, and you can pick your axes, but you can't uh… pick your friends' battlepickaxes?

name: Misfire
text: Deal $3, $2, and $1 damage to random minions. Quickdraw: Choose the targets.
flavor: "Me should not have taken candle."

name: Badlands Brawler
text: Battlecry: Start a Brawl! If you've Excavated twice, this always wins.
flavor: Watch out watch out watch out - R.K.O. outta nowhere!

name: Cattle Rustler
text: Battlecry: Draw a Beast. It costs (3) less.
flavor: What once started as a small-time cat burglary gig has turned into a life of cattle rustling. What a shame.

name: Reap What You Sow
text: Deal $3 damage. Excavate a treasure.
flavor: With a hat like that, I'd say their tailor did all of the sowing.

name: Fistful of Corpses
text: Deal damage to a minion equal to your Corpses.
flavor: Technically, they're not Corpses YET.

name: Harrowing Ox
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you've Excavated twice, your next card this turn costs (7) less.
flavor: Dead or alive, you're pulling that plow.

name: Maw and Paw
text: [x]At the end of your turn, gain 5 Corpses. At the start of your turn, spend 5 Corpses to give your hero +5 Health.
flavor: Home is where the disfigured, rotten heart is.

name: Farm Hand
text: Battlecry: Discover an Undead. Quickdraw: It costs (2) less.
flavor: I know it's an Undead hand, but bending your pinky in that way can NOT be good for your joints.

name: Sheriff Barrelbrim
text: Battlecry: If you have 20 or less Health, open the Badlands Jail.
flavor: Is that Sheriff Barrelbrim, owner of the Badlands Barrelbuilding?
how_to_earn: Earnable after collecting 30 Showdown in the Badlands cards.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the Showdown in the Badlands Tavern Pass.

name: Azerite Chain Gang
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry and Quickdraw: Summon a copy of this.
flavor: How long can this go on? For 6 years at least!
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Showdown in the Badlands Reward Track.

name: Bounty Wrangler
text: Quickdraw or Combo: Get a Coin.
flavor: With a smile like that and Coins in her hands, she's one greedy grinner.

name: Velarok Windblade
text:
[x]While this is in your hand,
play a card from another
class to reveal Velarok's
true form!
flavor: His deceptive manipulations have dug the Bloodrock Company into a hole they can't get out of.

name: Lay Down the Law
text: Tradeable Set a minion's Attack and Health to 1. Quickdraw: Then deal $1 damage to it.
flavor: The official term for "Because I said so!".

name: Living Horizon
text: [x]Taunt, Divine Shield Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
flavor: Even in the darkest of days, the sun never sets on the Badlands.

name: Unlucky Powderman
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Give Taunt minions in your hand and deck +1/+1.
flavor: Welp, guess I'll die... again.

name: Crop Rotation
text: Summon four 1/1 Undead with Rush that die at the end of turn.
flavor: "Dave, you're never gunna believe this! The plants ARE the zombies!"

name: Boomboss Tho'grun
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 3 T.N.T. into your opponent's deck. When drawn, blow up a card in their hand, deck, and board.
flavor: Ever since the Bloodrock Company hired this guy, business has been booming!

name: Reska, the Pit Boss
text: [x]Rush. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this game. Deathrattle: Take control of a random enemy minion.
flavor: Overseer of the Bloodrock Mine, Reska will work you to the bone. They'll then reanimate your bones and work THOSE bones to the bone.

name: Corpse Farm
text: Spend up to 8 Corpses to summon a random minion of that Cost.
flavor: It ain't much, but it's dishonest work.

name: Slagmaw the Slumbering
text: Rush, Taunt Dormant for 6 turns. (Excavate to awaken 2 turns sooner!)
flavor: You delved too greedily and too deep. You know what they awoke in the darkness of the Badlands: Rush and Taunt.

name: Cactus Rager
text: Poisonous
flavor: What doesn't kill ya makes you deader.

name: Heat Wave
text: [x]Deal $2 damage to an enemy minion and its neighbors. Quickdraw: To all enemies instead.
flavor: This is the hottest summer of your life so far.

name: Smokestack
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If it dies, Excavate a treasure.
flavor: Don't worry, it's green energy!

name: Flint Firearm
text: [x]Battlecry: Get a random Quickdraw card. If you play it this turn, repeat this.
flavor: You'll never guess why they call him that.

name: Blast Charge
text: Destroy a damaged enemy minion. Excavate a treasure.
flavor: Your Blast spells have +1 Attack.

name: Injured Hauler
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to this minion. Overheal: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: With how many cacti are all over the Badlands, this job has to be some sort of sick joke.

name: Walking Mountain
text: Rush, Lifesteal, Mega-Windfury Overload: (2)
flavor: The hills are alive with the sound of YEEEEHAAAWWWW!

name: Dryscale Deputy
text: Battlecry: The next time you draw a spell, get a copy of it.
flavor: He's here to tip the scales in our favor… and moisturize them too.

name: Benevolent Banker
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from your deck. Quickdraw: Enemy deck instead.
flavor: "Oh no, you've got me confused. I'm Ben, the evil ent banker. I only work with evil trees!"

name: Thirsty Drifter
text: Taunt Costs (1) less for each 1-Cost card you've played this game.
flavor: Quick! Someone bring her a Manathirst card!

name: Gold Panner
text: At the end of your turn, draw a card.
flavor: "I don't know why everyone's got their overalls in a jumble with Azerite minin' when there's all this GOLD for the takin'!"

name: Elise, Badlands Savior
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck started with no duplicates, summon 5/5 copies of 4 random minions in your deck.
flavor: From the library to the field, she's proved herself to be a leading intellectual.

name: Invasive Shadeleaf
text:
Deal $10 damage to an enemy minion.
Save any excess in a
1-Cost Bottle.
flavor: Don't throw shade, bottle it!

name: Pip the Potent
text: Battlecry: Copy each 1-Cost card in your hand.
flavor: One time, I was trying to get Pip's attention to warn her that the dangerous outlaw Cheery Ollie, who also goes by just 'O', was headed her way. "Pip! Pip! Cheery O!", I shouted.

name: Holy Springwater
text:
Restore #8 Health to a damaged character.
Save any excess in a
1-Cost Bottle.
flavor: Issa bah oh auh woh ah!

name: Dang-Blasted Elemental
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to all minions except friendly Elementals.
flavor: We were told that "Dag-Nabbin' Dang-Blastin' Rootin'-Tootin' High-Falutin' Elemental" was too long.

name: Gaslight Gatekeeper
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw that many cards.
flavor: This girl is such a boss.

name: High Noon Duelist
text: Deathrattle: Both players DRAW! Destroy the card that costs less.
flavor: "My ultimate is rea- ah, errr, I mean, I have enough Mana."

name: Snake Eyes
text: [x]Battlecry: Roll two dice, then Discover two cards of those Costs. (Doubles get an extra Discover!)
flavor: Hey, put ALL of your hands on the table!

name: Gunslinger Kurtrus
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck started with no duplicates, fire six 2 damage shots at minions in the enemy's hand.
flavor: "I have given up (a single copy of) EVERYTHING! What have YOU sacrificed?"

name: Blindeye Sharpshooter
text: [x]After you play a Naga, deal 2 damage to a random enemy and draw a spell. (Then switch!)
flavor: "Bullseye… I think."

name: Pocket Sand
text: Deal $3 damage. Quickdraw: Your opponent's next card costs (1) more.
flavor: I was only trying to get it in your eyes, man. YOU didn't need to open your mouth like that!

name: Oasis Outlaws
text: Discover a Naga. If you've played a Naga while holding this, reduce its Cost by (1).
flavor: With their oasis polluted by the Bloodrock Mining Company, Snake Eyes has set aside her differences with the outlaws of the Badlands to put an end to Bloodrock's operation.

name: Fan the Hammer
text: Deal $6 damage split among the lowest Health enemies.
flavor: I thought Kurtrus was more of a fan of glaives.

name: Midnight Wolf
text: Rush Outcast: Summon a copy of this.
flavor: Three of these would make for an EPIC T-shirt.

name: Parched Desperado
text: Battlecry: If you've cast a spell while holding this, give your hero +3 Attack this turn.
flavor:
I'm green
And I'm about to die
Da ba dee da ba di

name: Bartend-O-Bot
text: Battlecry: Draw an Outcast card and slide it to the left side of your hand.
flavor: Bartend-O-Bot! Make my Outcast card DO SOMETHING!

name: Load the Chamber
text:
[x]Deal $2 damage.
Your next Naga, Fel spell,
and weapon cost (1) less.
flavor: Wait! Before we duel, I gotta install these shaders.

name: Triple Sevens
text: Deal $7 damage to a minion. Draw 7 cards.
flavor: If you count the 'seven' in the name, there's actually four total 7s, not three. Huge oversight from the designers.

name: Stick Up
text: [x]Discover a Quickdraw card from another class.
flavor: Dude, Velarok, give me a minute to play my turn, the rope's burning!

name: Bloodrock Co. Shovel
text: Deathrattle: Excavate a treasure.
flavor: The 'mpany' is silent.

name: Antique Flinger
text: Battlecry: If you've Excavated twice, destroy an enemy minion.
flavor: One man's treasure is another man's statue to the face.

name: Wishing Well
text: [x]After you play a Coin, get a random Legendary minion from another class and set its Cost to (1).
flavor: Wishing upon a star? Pssshhh, that's so childish. Anyways, let me throw all my Coins into this well.

name: Shell Game
text:
[x]Get a random Epic,
Rare, and Common card
from other classes.
flavor: I thiiink… It's under all three of 'em!

name: Drilly the Kid
text: Battlecry, Quickdraw, and Deathrattle: Excavate a treasure.
flavor: "I HATE that nickname. Call me Drilliam!"

name: Ogre-Gang Outlaw
text: Rush 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
flavor: Why don't they just buy another hat?

name: Ogre-Gang Rider
text: [x]Rush 50% chance to give your hero +3 Attack this turn instead of attacking.
flavor: Doesn't know his ride from his left.

name: Ogre-Gang Ace
text: [x]Rush Whenever this attacks, gain Divine Shield. (50% chance to  gain Lifesteal instead.)
flavor: 100% chance to not play by the rules.

name: Kingpin Pud
text: Battlecry: Resurrect your Ogre-Gang. Give them Windfury.
flavor: The good, the bad, and the ugly stats for the Cost.

name: Azerite Vein
text: [x]Secret: When the enemy plays a card on the turn that it entered their hand, get a copy that costs (0).
flavor: When the ground trembles near it, are those earthquakes or heartbeats?

name: Saloon Brewmaster
text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion to your hand. Give it +2/+2.
flavor: Brewmaster Bru brought Barrelbrim bursting barrels of barely brewed barley brew. Barrelbrim bought Bru's barley brew, barring the barrels broken from the brazen brunch brawl.
targeting_arrow_text: Return a friendly minion to hand and give it +2/+2.

name: Overflow Surger
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a copy of this for each turn in a row you've played an Elemental.@ (@)
flavor: The drip on this elemental is straight fire!

name: Stargazing
text: Draw a different Arcane spell. If you play it this turn, it casts twice.
flavor: See those dots up there? Those are called "stars." Except for that one. That's called an "airplane."

name: Blastmage Miner
text: [x]Battlecry: Excavate a treasure. For each card in your hand, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: "So anyways, I started blastminin'!"

name: Sunset Volley
text:
Deal $10 damage randomly split among
all enemies. Summon a random 10-Cost minion.
flavor: When the light is just right during Golden Hour, that is when you take out the selfie stick and start casting.

name: Eroded Sediment
text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, Discover any Elemental from the past.
flavor: A perfect minion for those feeling sedimental about their past.

name: Mes'Adune the Fractured
text: Battlecry: Draw an Elemental. Split it into two halves.
flavor: Cracking open an elemental with the boys.

name: Tae'thelan Bloodwatcher
text: [x]Cards that didn't start in your deck cost (4) less (but not less than 1).
flavor: He's a big fan of Control Death Knight live streams.

name: Gattlesnake
text: [x]At the end of your turn,   load two bullets that deal 1   damage each. Deathrattle:  Fire at random enemies!
flavor: He used to be an ordinary snake until he slithered through a saloon during a brawl and walked out looking like this.

name: Reliquary Researcher
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've Excavated twice, cast two random Mage Secrets.
flavor: What good is a researcher if they're just gunna keep it all a secret?

name: Linedance Partner
text: Battlecry: If you're holding another 3-Cost card, summon a random 3-Cost minion.
flavor:
Where did you come from? (Linedance Partner's Battlecry)
Where did you go? (Face)

name: Sunspot Dragon
text: [x]Tradeable, Lifesteal Quickdraw: Deal 6 damage.
flavor: THIS is why you shouldn't look directly at the sun.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable on the Showdown in the Badlands Reward Track.

name: Bunny Stomper
text: Your Beasts have Rush.
flavor: Has a PhD in stomputational chemistry.

name: Trolley Problem
text: Discard your lowest Cost spell. Summon two 3/3 Tram Cars with Rush. Quickdraw: Don't discard.
flavor: If only there were thousands of hypotheticals to prepare me for this moment!

name: Tram Conductor Gerry
text: Battlecry: If you've Excavated twice, summon six 3/3 Tram Cars with Rush.
flavor: His name is pronounced like 'gif'.

name: Thunderbringer
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon an Elemental and Beast from your deck.
flavor: You can lead a horse to water, but you can't stop it from electrocuting everything in the water.
how_to_earn_golden: Earnable after purchasing the Showdown in the Badlands Tavern Pass.

name: Furnace Fuel
text:
When this is played,
discarded, or destroyed,
draw 2 cards.
flavor: Remember Ultrasaur? This is him now. Feel old yet?

name: Mo'arg Drillfist
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Excavate a treasure.
flavor: Also functions as the town dentist.

name: Posse Possession
text:
Summon a 4/4 copy
of a random minion in your opponent's hand.
flavor: Keep your friends close, your enemies closer, and your shadows at gunpoint.

name: Sneaky Snakes
text: Summon two 1/1 Snakes with Stealth.
flavor: You're a sneaky lil snake, aren'tcha?

name: Messenger Buzzard
text: [x]Deathrattle: Draw a Beast. Give minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: The bird brings the word (which happens to be bird).

name: Silver Serpent
text: Rush, Poisonous Quickdraw: Gain Immune this turn.
flavor: Skilled at exploring hidden temples.

name: Bovine Skeleton
text: Deathrattle: If this has 4 or more Attack, summon a Bovine Skeleton.
flavor: The secret cow level has been unearthed.

name: Camouflage Mount
text: Give a minion +3/+3 and a random Bonus Effect. When it dies, summon a Chameleon.
flavor: What mount? I don't see anything…

name: Ten Gallon Hat
text: [x]Draw a minion. Give it +1/+1 and "Deathrattle: Get a Ten Gallon Hat."
flavor: It actually only holds three quarters of a gallon, but that doesn't sound as good.

name: Saddle Up!
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a random Beast that costs (3) or less."
flavor: And then they rode off into the sunset, not knowing they left their stove on.

name: Starshooter
text: After your hero attacks, get an Arcane Shot.
flavor: Shoot for the stars! And if you miss, just don't hit me.

name: Spurfang
text: [x]Battlecry and Deathrattle: Summon a random Beast with Cost equal to this minion's Attack.
flavor: He's always smiling… Not by choice, but because it hurts to close his mouth.

name: Theldurin the Lost
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck started with no duplicates, gain Immune this turn and attack all enemies.
flavor: He might be lost, but he knows where you can find these hands.

name: Take to the Skies
text:
Draw two Dragons.
Give them +1/+1.
flavor: This is one step above reaching for the skies.

name: Cactus Construct
text: Discover a 2-Cost minion. Summon a 1/2 copy of it.
flavor: "I am not Malfurion! I am CACTUS LORD!"

name: Splish-Splash Whelp
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavor:
Little Whelpy, you're the one
You make Mana lots of fun

name: Spinetail Drake
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 5 damage to an enemy minion.
flavor: Mortal enemy of Cactus Cutter.
targeting_arrow_text: Deal 5 damage to an enemy minion.

name: Dragon Tales
text: Choose One - Get two random Dragons that cost (5) or less; or Get two that cost more than (5).
flavor: "Once upon a time, there was a maaaagical toy shop, filled with wonder and Dragons!"

name: Dragon Golem
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Summon a copy of this for each Dragon in your hand.
flavor:
I have a Dragon, I have a Golem.
UH! Dragon Golem!

name: Rehydrate
text: Restore #7 Health. Quickdraw: Refresh 2 Mana Crystals.
flavor: Just doing our part as the Hearthstone development team in reminding you to drink more water!

name: Rheastrasza
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck started with no duplicates, summon the Purified Dragon Nest.
flavor: Rheastrasza ascends above loyalty to just her dragonflight to serve all dragonkind. She believes all flights deserve a future and will give her life for the future dragon prince.

name: Fye, the Setting Sun
text: [x]Rush, Lifesteal, Taunt Costs (1) less for each Dragon you've summoned this game.
flavor:
There is a dragon way down in Bloodrock
They call the Setting Sun

name: Desert Nestmatron
text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, refresh 4 Mana Crystals.
flavor: Not as sweet as the Dessert Nestmatron, but still just as refreshing!

name: Whelp Wrangler
text: At the end of your turn, get a 1/2 Whelp with Taunt.
flavor: "Gosh darn it! How did these winged, airborne creatures manage to escape my knee-high, fenced enclosure AGAIN!?"

name: Horseshoe Slinger
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy minion. Quickdraw: And one of its neighbors.
flavor: Some people think this card is broken, but I think it's farrier than that.

name: Greedy Partner
text: Battlecry: If you're holding another 2-Cost card, get a Coin.
flavor: "Don't worry, we'll evenly split the bounty. Then I'll have two evenly sized piles of gold!"

name: Rowdy Partner
text: Battlecry: If you're holding another 4-Cost card, deal 4 damage.
flavor: Rowdy, partner!

name: Rising Winds
text: Twinspell Choose One - Draw a card; or Summon a 3/2 Eagle.
flavor: Do not talk to me or my chick ever again.

name: Winged Guardian
text: Taunt Reborn Elusive
flavor: Take these broken wings, be reborn, and learn to fly again.

name: Chopshop Copter
text: After a friendly Mech dies, add a random Mech to your hand.
flavor: Invention is the mother of entropy.
targeting_arrow_text: Become a copy of a Mech.

name: Fresh Scent
text: Twinspell Give a Beast +2/+2.
flavor: *Sniff, sniff* Elite troops... *sniff, sniff* ...armed to the teeth and... *sniff, sniff* ...BAAACON!

name: Escaped Manasaber
text: [x]Stealth Whenever this attacks, gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavor: Captive manasabers don't behave much better--they're always scratching your furniture and coughing up mana balls.

name: Animated Avalanche
text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, summon a copy of this.
flavor: Always sliding down mountains because it can't stop talking with its hands.

name: Arcane Amplifier
text: Your Hero Power deals 2 extra damage.
flavor: Not on good terms with warlocks.

name: The Amazing Reno
text: Battlecry: Make all minions disappear. *Poof!*
flavor: "Reno!" "Please address me by my proper title." " Amazing Reno..."

name: Shotbot
text: Reborn
flavor: Impact detected. Assuming hero pose.

name: Air Raid
text: Twinspell Summon two 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits with Taunt.
flavor: It's difficult to get an air raid together. You have to get twenty-five people, and they all want to play a paladin!

name: Cleric of Scales
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a spell from your deck.
flavor: If she can't find a spell, it's a clerical error.

name: Aeon Reaver
text: Battlecry: Deal damage to a minion equal to its Attack.
flavor: Ripping centuries asunder helps him manage his busy schedule.
targeting_arrow_text: Deal damage equal to a minion's Attack.

name: Dark Prophecy
text: Discover a 2-Cost minion. Summon it and give it +3 Health.
flavor: It's always a dark prophecy with Madame Lazul. Where's my happy, fluffy prophecy?!

name: Skyvateer
text: Stealth Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavor: When you go without fruits in an airship, you get a nasty case of skyvy.

name: Shadow Sculptor
text: Combo: Draw a card for each card you've played this turn.
flavor: Carving out new territory in the realm of shadow puppetry.

name: Waxmancy
text: Discover a Battlecry minion. Reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor:
The waxmancer works with flame and form, giving shape to figures warm. 
Some think he's a crazy creeper, but crafting minions is simply cheaper.

name: Explosive Evolution
text: Transform a minion into a random one that costs (3) more.
flavor: Let's give a big hand for goblin experimentation!

name: Risky Skipper
text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavor: Sworn enemy of the Safety Matey.

name: Boom Squad
text: Discover a Lackey, Mech, or Dragon.
flavor: Discover the meaning of squad goals.

name: Bomb Wrangler
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 1/1 Boom Bot.
flavor: Bomb Wranglers tend to have short fuses and even shorter lifespans.

name: Twisted Knowledge
text: Discover 2 Warlock cards.
flavor: People eat eight spiders in their sleep per year. Centaurs have two rib cages. Dwarves are just counterfeit titans.

name: Fiendish Servant
text: [x]Deathrattle: Give this minion's Attack to a random friendly minion.
flavor: Putting the "r" in fiend.

name: Chaos Gazer
text: [x]Battlecry: Curse a playable card in your opponent's hand. They have 1 turn to play it!
flavor: No matter the game rules, it's always playing Go Fish.

name: Skydiving Instructor
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 1-Cost minion from your deck.
flavor:
"Is it dangerous?"
"For me? Not at all. Now jump!"

name: Hailbringer
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Ice Shards that Freeze.
flavor: Knows every way to greet someone.

name: Licensed Adventurer
text: [x]Battlecry: If you control a Quest, add a Coin to your hand.
flavor: "Just point me in the vague direction of the things you want smashed, and you got yourself a deal!"

name: Frenzied Felwing
text: Costs (1) less for each damage dealt to your opponent this turn.
flavor: Not to be confused with the "friendsy” felwing.

name: Boompistol Bully
text: Battlecry: Enemy Battlecry cards cost (5) more next turn.
flavor: Preventing insults with injuries.

name: Grand Lackey Erkh
text: After you play a Lackey, add a Lackey to your hand.
flavor: Esteemed leader of Rafaam's Inhuman Resources department.

name: Rotnest Drake
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: Clean your room, or I'm taking your favorite minion away!

name: Sky Gen'ral Kragg
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: If you've played a Quest this game, summon a 4/2 Parrot with Rush.
flavor: He's gunning for Sky Adm'ral.

name: Steel Beetle
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, gain 5 Armor.
flavor: Steel you can trust—fashioned from the husk of an over-sized creepy-crawly.

name: Eye of the Storm
text: Summon three 5/6 Elementals with Taunt. Overload: (3)
flavor: If that's the eye, I would hate to see the rest of the storm.

name: The Fist of Ra-den
text: [x]After you cast a spell, summon a Legendary minion of that Cost. Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: The mighty Ra-den was known as the Keeper of Storms. Unfortunately, he could not keep his fist.

name: Scalelord
text: Battlecry: Give your Murlocs Divine Shield.
flavor: It's about what they have in common, not what makes them different.

name: Celestial Shot
text: Deal $3 damage. Your next spell has Spell Damage +2.
flavor: He sure did.

name: Shadowtouched Kvaldir
text: Battlecry: Your next healing effect deals damage instead.
flavor: Four out of five deck doctors say this works great with Reno Jackson!

name: Encroaching Insanity
text:
Both players take
Fatigue damage, twice.
flavor: Pictured here is Loken stuck at his 20th hour on Diamond 5.

name: Sigil of Time
text:
At the start of your
next turn, draw 3 additional cards.
flavor: Sigil of Right A Down Right A Down.

name: Mindbender
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage for each card you have drawn this turn.@ (@)
flavor: I like my brain unbent, thanks.
targeting_arrow_text: Deal 1 damage for each card drawn this turn.

name: Aerosoilizer
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Treant.
flavor: Banned in Wild for opening a hole in the ozone layer.

name: Assembly Line
text: Discover a Mech from another class.
flavor: add ecx, eax

name: Prison Breaker
text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast 5 or more spells this game, deal 2 damage to all enemies. @ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor: Flavor fail! Demolition Renovator did it FIRST!

name: General Vezax
text: [x]Rush Battlecry: Gain 4 Armor. Deathrattle: Lose 4 Armor to resummon this.
flavor: Contrast this with Specific Vezax, who only gets resummoned if you have exactly 4 Armor.

name: Battleworn Faceless
text: Battlecry: Transform into a copy of a damaged minion.
flavor: "I shall hug him and squeeze him and call him Earthen George."
targeting_arrow_text: Transform into a copy of it.

name: Sanitize
text: [x]Deal damage equal to your Armor to all minions. Forge: Gain 3 Armor first.
flavor: We were originally going to make a joke about a popular streamer, but one of our designers is a total germaphobe.

name: Curse of Flesh
text: Enemy minions cost Health instead of Mana next turn.
flavor: No! My rock-hard chiseled abs!

name: Bestial Madness
text:
[x]Give +1 Attack to all
minions in your hand,
deck, and battlefield.
flavor: "Hey this isn't what we were trying to excavate!"

name: Twisted Frostwing
text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Summon a Chimaera with stats equal to this minion's Attack.
flavor: Not currently valid in the Twist format.

name: Void Scripture
text: Discover a spell. If you have enough Mana to play it, cast a copy of it at a random enemy.
flavor: The Old Gods like to think of them as "Addendums."

name: Twilight Torrent
text: Choose a character. If it's friendly, restore #6 Health. If it's an enemy, deal $3 damage.
flavor: I hope it’s the first one.

name: Keeper's Strength
text:
Give a friendly minion +2/+2. Deal
its Attack damage to
all other minions.
flavor: Finders keepers, losers DIE.

name: Alarmed Securitybot
text: [x]Deathrattle: Draw another minion. Set its Attack, Health, and Cost to 5.
flavor:
THREAT LEVEL: 5!
Which doesn't actually sound that bad to be honest.

name: Runes of Darkness
text: Discover a weapon. Spend 3 Corpses to give it +1/+1.
